1b1(mdo sde): / rgya gar skad du.Ar+ya ga ga na gan dza pa ri br-id
1b2(mdo sde): nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra/ bod skad// du/ 'phags pa nam mkha'i
1b3(mdo sde): mdzod kyis zhus pa zhes bya batheg pa chen po'i mdo/ / //
2a1(mdo sde): bya bya bya// bam po dang po// // sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa'
2a2(mdo sde): thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ / 'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na/ bcom
2a3(mdo sde): ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyod yul rin po che bkod pa'i 'khor gyi khyams/ de
2a4(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pa'i gnas bsod nams chen po'i rgyan gyi tshogs bsags pa/ sprod pa chen
2b1(mdo sde): po'i rgyu 'thun pa/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad rnam par smin pas mngon par grub pa/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i gnas
2b2(mdo sde): mtha' yas pa nges par bstan pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par sprul pa'i byin gyi rlabs mi chags pa'i spyod yul gyi ye shes la 'jug
2b3(mdo sde): pa dga' ba rgya chen po rab tu bskyed pa/ dran pa dang / blo gros dang / rtogs pa la 'jug pa/ kun nas ma smad pa/ ye shes kyis rnam par
2b4(mdo sde): dpyod pa/ de'i rang bzhin ma yin pa la 'jug pa/ phyi ma'i mtha'i bskal par mngon du bstod pa/ yon tan gyi tshogs thams cad dpag tu med
2b5(mdo sde): pa na bzhugs te/ bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid ni mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas/ chos kyi 'khor lo ni rab tu bskor/
3a1(mdo sde): slob ma shin tu dul ba mtha' yas pa'i tshogs ni mnga'/ chos thams cad la mnga' ni brnyes/ sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa'i
3a2(mdo sde): bya ba ni shin tu mkhyen/ dbang po dam pa'i pha rol tu ni byon/ sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa'i bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba yang dag par 'joms
3a3(mdo sde): pa la ni mkhas shing / sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa lhun gyis grub pa ni rgyun ma bcad do// dge slong sa ya phrag drug gis dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang thabs
3a4(mdo sde): cig ste/ thams cad kyang cang shes kyi sems dang ldan pa/ yang dag pa'i shes pas sems shin tu rnam par grol ba/ nyon mongs pa thams cad kyi bag/
3a5(mdo sde): chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba yang dag par 'joms pa la brtson pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi rgyal po'i sras/ chos zab mo la gnas par mkhas pa/
3a6(mdo sde): dmigs su med pa'i chos las nges par byung ba/ spyod lam mdzes pa phun sum tshogs pa/ sbyin pa'i gnas chen por gyur pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i
3b1(mdo sde): bka' la shin tu zhugs pa sha stag go/ / sangs rgyas kyi zhing sna tshogs nas 'dus pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dpag tu med/ grangs med/ bsam gyis ma khyab/
3b2(mdo sde): mtshungs pa med pa/ gzhal du med pa// tshad med brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs chen po dang yang thabs cig te// thams cad kyang sems kyi skad cig gis sangs
3b3(mdo sde): rgyas kyi zhing mtha' yas par 'gro ba la mkhas pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la mchod pa dang / rim gro bya ba la mkhas pa/ chos mnyan pa la mi ngoms par yang dag par tshol ba/ rtag tu/
3b4(mdo sde): rgyun mi 'chad par sems can thams cad yongs su smin par byed pa la brtson pa// thabs dang shes rab dam pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa/ sgrib pa med pa'i rnam par thar pa la rab tu gnas pa// rtog
3b5(mdo sde): pr-i dang / rnam par rtog pa dang / spros pa thams cad las yang dag par 'das pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes la nye bar gyur pa sha stag la 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' glog
3b6(mdo sde): gi lA zhes bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' g.yul las rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnam par snang mdzad snying po zhes bya ba dang / byang chub sems
3b7(mdo sde): dpa' rnam par gnon pa dpa' bo zhes bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' yid gnyis yang dag par 'joms pa zhes bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnam par bsgrags ldan zhes bya ba
4a1(mdo sde): dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnam par lta ba'i mig ces bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' mun pa dang bral zhes bya ba dang // de dag la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa'
4a2(mdo sde): sems dpa' chen po dpag tu med/ tshad med/ grangs med/ bsam gyis mi khyab/ mtshungs pa med/ gzhal du med/ dpag gis mi lang / brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du
4a3(mdo sde): med pa dag dang yang thabs cig go/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das 'dus pa chen po'i le'u zhes bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams
4a4(mdo sde): la rab tu ston te/ 'dus pa chen po'i le'u chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad pa na thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de nam mkha'i dkyil na 'khod cing bkod pa chen po'i khang pa brtsegs pa'i
4a5(mdo sde): nang na bdag 'dug pa snyam du shes so/ / khang pa brtsegs pa de dag gi bkod pa de nyid sems can rnams kyi mig sngar snang bar gyur te/ khang pa brtsegs pa na 'khod pa'i byang chub
4a6(mdo sde): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams dang / nyan thos chen po rnams dang / gzhan yang lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za'i 'khor de dag thams cad ma gtogs par
4a7(mdo sde): stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na gzugs su snang ba lhag ma gzhan thams cad med par gyur te/ / thams cad kyang nam mkha' lta bur gyur pa snyam du shes so// 'di lta ste/
4b1(mdo sde): dper na bskal pas shin tu bsregs te/ nam mkha' bzhin du gyur pa na stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na gzugs su snang ba gang yang mig sngar snang bar mi 'gyur ba de
4b2(mdo sde): bzhin du/ de'i tshe na gang gzugs su snang ba rnams sems can dag gi mig sngar mi snang bar gyur to// 'di lta ste/ dper na de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che bkod pa gcig pa'i 'jig
4b3(mdo sde): rten gyi khams bkod pa chen po zhes bya ba na/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag gi khang pa brtsegs pa yongs su longs spyod pa de 'dra ba'i khang pa brtsegs pa de na snang ngo // nam mkha' la khang pa/
4b4(mdo sde): brtsegs pa 'dug pa de dag ma gtogs par stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di sa'i steng dang gzhi'i bar du thams cad kyang mi snang ba snyam du rab tu shes te/ ri'i rgyal po ri rab
4b5(mdo sde): dang / khor yug gi ri dang / khor yug gi ri chen po dag sems can gang gi mig sngar yang mi snang bar gyur to// grong dang / grong khyer dang / grong rdal dang / ljongs dang / yul 'khor dang
4b6(mdo sde): rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor rnams kyang mi snang ste/ gzhan du na nam mkha'i dkyil na gnas pa'i khang pa brtsegs pa de dag nyid du shes shing / bcom ldan 'das kyi seng ge'i khri ni 'phang du dpag tshad khrir
4b7(mdo sde): 'phags par rab tu snang ngo / / gang la bcom ldan 'das bzhugs pa'i seng ge'i khri de'i 'od kyis kyang stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams snang ba chen pos khyab par gyur te/ gang stong gsum gyi
5a1(mdo sde): stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di'i nyi ma dang / zla ba dang / skar ma dang / brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba'i 'od de dag thams cad kyang mos
5a2(mdo sde): mog por byas par gyur to/ / de nas byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor de dag thams cad kyis 'di lta bu'i tshe 'phrul ngo mtshar dang drang du byung ba mthong nas/ phan tshun du lbab/ khang pa brtsegs pa
5a3(mdo sde): 'di'i bkod pa ci 'dra ba de ni/ bdag cag gi tshe'i tshad bskal par 'dug par gyur kyang / bdag cag gis rgya cher rnam par dbye ba bstan par sla ba ma yin te/ de tsam du khang pa brtsegs pa 'di
5a4(mdo sde): dag gi yon tan bkod pa ni tshad med do zhes 'dzer to/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi mthus gnas brtan shA ri'i bu khang pa brtsegs pa de nas langs nas nam mkha' la 'dug ste/ pus mo
5a5(mdo sde): g.yas pa'i lhang btud nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la bde logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das nam
5a6(mdo sde): mkha' la mchis pa'i khang pa brtsegs pa 'di ma lags pa/ gzhan stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad nam mkhar gyur cing / nam mkha'i rang bzhin du gda' ba 'di
5a7(mdo sde): su'i snga ltas lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sha ri'i bu khyod kyis khang pa brtsegs pa 'di mthong ngam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mthong lags so// bcom ldan
5b1(mdo sde): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu khyod kyis khang pa brtsegs pa 'di dag gi bsngags pa yongs su brjod pa'i mtha' shes par nus sam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag gi tshe'i tshad
5b2(mdo sde): nges par gyur kyang / khang pa brtsegs pa 'di dag gi bsngags pa'i mtha' rtogs par mi nus so// bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu ji ltar 'khor 'di dag thams cad nam mkha' la song zhing / 'ang pa
5b3(mdo sde): brtsegs pa bkod pa chen por zhugs par snang ba bzhin du/ bkod pa chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi khang pa brtsegs pa de'ang 'di 'dra'o// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bkod pa chen po
5b4(mdo sde): 'jig rten gyi khams de gang gi phyogs na mchis/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu de ni 'di nas shar phyogs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing brgyad kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul gyis yongs su gang bsnyed
5b5(mdo sde): kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams 'das pa na/ bkod pa chen po zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams na/ de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che bkod pa gcig pa zhes bya ba da lta na bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la
5b6(mdo sde): chos kyang ston to/ / shA ri'i bu bkod pa chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams de na/ byang chub kyi sems rin po che las rin po che gzhan mi 'byung ngo // de bas na de bzhin gshegs pa de rin po che bkod pa gcig
5b7(mdo sde): pa zhes bya'o/ / de bzhin gshegs pa de'ang nam byang chub sems dpa' de dag la chos 'chad pa de na seng ge'i khri dang bcas te/ ta la bye ba phrag brgyad cu srid kyi nam mkha'i dkyil du
6a1(mdo sde): mngon par 'phags so/ / byang chub sems dpa' de dag kyang khang pa brtsegs pa bkod pa chen po der nam mkha'i dkyil du mngon par 'phags nas/ de bzhin gshegs
6a2(mdo sde): pa de la chos nyan te/ de bzhin gshegs pa de'ang nam mkha'i dkyil yongs su dag pa zhes bya ba'i chos kyi phyag rgya yang dag par rab tu ston to// shA ri'i bu bkod pa chen po'i 'jig
6a3(mdo sde): rten gyi khams de na gang byang chub sems dpa' de dag gi khang pa brtsegs pa'i yongs su longs spyod pa de ni bskul par yang brjod mi nus so/ / shA ri'i bu khyod kyis nga'i seng ge'i khri 'di mthong
6a4(mdo sde): ngamagasol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mthong ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che bkod pa gcig de'i seng ge'i
6a5(mdo sde): driyang 'di 'dra ste/ de la bcom ldan 'das de bzhugs nas/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag la rnam pa sum cu rtsa gnyis la 'jug pa/ nam mkha'i dkyil yongs su dag pa'i chos kyi
6a6(mdo sde): phyag rgyu yang dag par rab tu ston to/ / rnam pa sgyus cu rgya gnyis la 'jug pa nam mkha'i dkyil yongs su dag pa'i chos kyi phyag rgya gang zhe na/ 'di ltaste/ dngom po med pas chos thams
6a7(mdo sde): cod yod pa dang med pa dang bral ba dang / rnam par rig pa'i mtshan nyid pas/ chos thams cad dngos po med pa dang / snang bar 'gyur ba med pas chos thams cad rnam par rig pa med pa dang /
6b1(mdo sde): rgyu dang dmigs pa med pas chos thams cad snang bar gyur pa med pa dang / nye bar zhi ba'i mtshan nyid pas/ chos thams cad dmigs pa med pa dang / gnyis su med pas chos thams
6b2(mdo sde): cad nye bar zhi ba dang / so so tha dad pa med pas chos thams cad gnyis su med pa dang / tshul gcig la zhugs pas chos thams cad tha dad pa med pa dang / ngo bo nyid kyi mtshan nyid
6b3(mdo sde): dang bral bas chos thams cad tshul gcig pa dang / dus gsum las yang dag par 'das pas/ chos thams cad ngo bo nyid med pa dang / thams cad la mi gnas pas chos
6b4(mdo sde): thams cad nam mkha'i dkyil dang / thams cad du mi snang bas chos thams cad mi gnas pa'i sgo dang / yul gyi lam las yang dag par 'das pas chos thams cad snang ba med pa
6b5(mdo sde): dang / nang dang phyi rnam par dag pas chos thams cad yul med pa dang / rang bzhin gyis kun nas nyon mongs pa can ma yin pas/ chos thams cad rnam par dag pa dang / ngo bo nyid kyis
6b6(mdo sde): nye bar zhi bas/ chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis yongs su dag pa dang // sems dang / yid dang / rnam par shes pa med pas/ chos thams cad nye bar zhi ba dang / gzod ma nas ma byung bas
6b7(mdo sde): chos thams cad mtshan nyid med pa dang / nga'i ba med cing yongs su 'dzin pa med pas/ chos thams cad gzod ma nas ma byung ba dang / bdag po med pas// chos thams cad nga'i ba med cing yongs su
7a1(mdo sde): 'dzin pa med pa dang / rang bzhin gyis bdag med pas chos thams cad bdag do med pa dang / gzong sa nas rnam par dag pas/ chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis /
7a2(mdo sde): med pa dang / ldog pa med pas chos thams cad gzod pa nas rnam par dag pa dang / sgyu ma'i mtshan nyid kyi rang bzhin pas/ chos thams cad ldog pa med pa dang / dngos
7a3(mdo sde): po med pas chos thams cad sgyu ma lta bu dang / mngon par 'du mi byed pa'i mtshan nyid pas/ chos thams cad dngos po med pa dang / sems dang lus dben pas// chos
7a4(mdo sde): thams cad mngon par 'dus ma byas pa dang / mtshan nyid med cing mtshan nyid kyi gni'i mtshan nyid med pas/ chos thams cad dben pa'i mtshan nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid
7a5(mdo sde): las ma g.yos pas chos thams cad mtshan nyid med pa dang / gnas dmigs su med pas chos thams cad ma g.yos pa dang / dmigs pa med pa'i mtha' la rab tu gnas pas/
7a6(mdo sde): chos thams cad gnas pa med pa dang / kun gzhi med pas chos thams cad dmigs pa med pa dang / kun gni dang bral bas chos thams cad kun gzhi med pa ste// shA ri'i bu de ltar de bzhin
7a7(mdo sde): gshegs pa rin po che bkod pa gcig pa de byang chub sems dpa' de dag la rnam pa sum cu rtsa gnyis la 'jug pa nam mkha'i dkyil yongs su dag pa'i chos kyi phyag rgya yang dag par rab tu ston te/ de thos pas kyang byang chub sems dpa' tshad med pa dag mngon par shes pa rnam par dag pas rnam par shes pa la bzod pa/
7b1(mdo sde): chos thams cad la dbang byed pa rjes su 'thob bo// yang shA ri'i bu
7b2(mdo sde): bkod pa chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams de'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni sbyin pas brgyan cing bskal pa grangs med par gtong ba rjes su song ba/ tshul khrims kyis brgyan cing bro shin tu byang ba
7b3(mdo sde): bzod pas brgyan cing sems can thams cad la zhe 'gras pa med pa'i sems dang ldan pa/ brtson 'grus kyis brgyan cing sangs rgyas kyis chos kyis chos thams cad kyi tshogs bsags pa// bsam
7b4(mdo sde): gtan gyis brgyan cing / bsam gtan dang / rnam par thar pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / snyoms par 'jug pa dang / mngon par shes pa thams cad kyis rnam par rtsen pa// shes rab kyi sa brgyan/
7b5(mdo sde): cing bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad dang bral ba/ byams pa chen pos brgyan cing / sems can thams cad yongs su skyob par gnas pa/ snying rje chen pos brgyan
7b6(mdo sde): cing sems can thams cad yongs su mi gtong bar gnas pa/ dga' ba chen pos brgyan cing sems can thams cad dga' ba dang / bde ba dang / rab tu dga' ba la so sor 'god pa'i rgyun mi
7b7(mdo sde): gcod pa btang snyoms chen pos brgyan cing / sems can thams cad mi mtho mi dma' ba la 'god pa rgyun mi gcod par sbyor ba sha stag go// yang shA ri'i bu bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
8a1(mdo sde): gshegs pa rin pa cha spyod pa gcig pa de'i sangs nasu bi zhing na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam mnga'i mdzod ces pa ba 'dugaste/ bsod nangs kyig/
8a2(mdo sde): brjid kyis shin tu brjid pa/ ye shes mthong ba thogs pa med pa/ mtshan rnams kyis lus brgyan pa/ dpe byad bzang po rnams kyis byams pa brgyan pa/ spobs pas ngag brgyan pa
8a3(mdo sde): gzungs kyis sems brgyan pa/ thos pas dran pa brgyan pa/ nges par sems pas bden pa brgyan pa/ rtogs pas don rtogs pa brgyan pa/ bsam pas dam bcas pa brgyan pa/ khyad
8a4(mdo sde): par du 'gro bas lhag pa'i bsam pa brgyan pa/ sbyor bas brgyan cing chos thams cad la the tsom med par gyur pa/ btang snyoms chen pos brgyan cing mtho dman med pa/ mngon par shes pa chen
8a5(mdo sde): pos brgyan cing / rdzu 'phrul gyis rnam par rtsen pa thams cad mngon par shes pa/ bsod nams kyis brgyan cing // lag na rin po che gtong ba mngon par grub pa/ ye shes kyis brgyan cing sems
8a6(mdo sde): can thams cad kyi sems kyi bsam pa la zhugs pa/ blos brgyan cing sems can thams cad dge ba'i rtsa ba rtogs par byed pa// mig gis brgyan cing mig lnga'i yul la shin tu rnam par dag pa
8a7(mdo sde): rna bas brgyan cing sgra dang / don thams cad rtogs pa snying po dang ldan pa/ so so yang dag par rig pas brgyan cing / don dang / chos dang / nges pa'i tshig dang / spobs pa so so yang dag par rig pa
8b1(mdo sde): mi zad par ston pa/ stobs kyis brgyan cing / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu rjes su thob pa/ mi 'jigs pas brgyan cing / pas kyi rgol ba thams cad kyis zil gyis mi non pa/ yon tan
8b2(mdo sde): gyis brgyan cing sangs rgyas kyi yon tan mtha' yas pa thob pa/ chos kyis brgyan cing spu'i bu ga thams cad nas chos sgrog pa/ so sor rig pa'i rjes su song ba/ snang bas brgyan cing sangs rgyas kyi
8b3(mdo sde): chos thams cad lag mthil du thob pa/ 'od kyis brgyan cing sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad snang bar byed pa/ kun nas ston pas brgyan cing chad par lung ston pa/ gdams pa dang rjes su bstan pas brgyan
8b4(mdo sde): cing / de byed pa'i chos tshar phyin pa/ rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul gyis brgyan cing rdzu 'phrul rnam par dag pas rnam par grol ba thams cad ston pa/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyis mngon par bstod pas
8b5(mdo sde): brgyan cing gzhan la rag ma lus pa'i ye shes la gnas pa/ tshogs thams cad kyi yon tan gyis brgyan cing sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos 'dul ba'i rjes su zhugs pa ste/ shA ri'i bu gang bkod/
8b6(mdo sde): pa 'di lta bu kun tu snang ba 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' mdzod kyi byin gyi rlabs so// shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha' mdzod de nga la blta ba dang
8b7(mdo sde): phyag 'tshal ba dang / bsnyen bkur bya ba dang / 'dus pa chen po'i le'u chos kyi rnam grangs 'di rab tu yongs su gzung ba dang / phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams nas 'dus pa'i
9a1(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' 'di dag chos kyi dga' ba dang / bde ba dang / mchog tu dga' ba bskyed pa dang / theg pa chen po 'di'ang rab tu yongs su gzung ba dang / byung /
9a2(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos kyang yongs su gzung ba'i phyir nga'i gan du 'ong ngo // de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha'
9a3(mdo sde): mdzod de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che bkod pa gcig pa de la gsol nas/ byang chub sems dpa' bye ba phrag bcu gnyis kyis yongs su bskor te/ mdun du bdar nas lhan cig tu mngon du gyur
9a4(mdo sde): pa'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du mi byed pa/ sangs rgyas kyi rnam par rol pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pas bkod pa chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams de nas mi snang bar gyur te/ sems kyi skad cig gcig
9a5(mdo sde): 'byung ba tsam gyis mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir phyin nas de bar snang la 'dug ste/ bkod pa chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi me tog dang / 'phreng ba dang / phye ma dang
9a6(mdo sde): spos dang / byug pa dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan ci 'dra ba de 'dra ba'i char rab tu phab pa 'di lta ste/ zla ba dang / zla ba chen po dang / shin tu mdzes pa'i zla ba dang
9a7(mdo sde): nyi ma'i 'od dang / nyi ma rab tu 'bar ba dang / me shal dang / mdog mdzes dang / mdog mdzes chen po dang / mdog mdzes par 'dug pa dang / sbrul dang / sgra la chen po dang / sgra la
9b1(mdo sde): rab tu mdzes pa dang / dri ma med dang / kun tu dri ma med pa dang / rnam dag 'od dang / gser du snang dang / nam mkha' snang dang / reg gyur dang / dri chen dkar dang / 'dab brgya pa dang /
9b2(mdo sde): ze ba stong ldan dang / mya ngan sel dang / dga' byed dang / lhas bstod dang / klu'i me tog dang / dga' bde kun skye dang / bsam gtan yan lag dang / dris dga' dang // lus sems
9b3(mdo sde): tshim byed dang / stong gsum dri dang / nad kun zhi byed dang / nad kun sel dang / bdag gi gzi brjid kyis brgyan cing dpag tu med pa'i bsod nams kyis grub pa/ phyogs bcu'i byang chub
9b4(mdo sde): sems dpas reg pa de lta bu'i me tog gis stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di kun tu khebs par byas pas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad du me tog pus mo nub tsam/
9b5(mdo sde): du gang bar gyur to// de nas thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor des sngon ma thos ma mthong ba'i me tog de mthong nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan/
9b6(mdo sde): 'das 'di lta bu'i me tog blta na sdug pa 'di dag ga las mchis/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ skyes bu dam pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha'i mdzod de
9b7(mdo sde): bkod pa chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams de nas 'dir 'ongs te/ de nam mkha'i dkyil du 'dug nas/ 'di lta bu'i me tog gi char rab tu phab bo// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
10a1(mdo sde): nam mkha'i mdzod byang chub sems dpa' bye ba phrag bcu gnyis po de dag dang lhan cig tu nam mkha'i dkyil de nas babs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag
10a2(mdo sde): 'tshal nas/ lan gsum bskor ba byas te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che bkod pa gcig pa ni/ bcom ldan 'das la gnod
10a3(mdo sde): pa chung ngam/ nyam nga ba nyung ngam/ bskyod pa yang ngam/ stobs dang bde bar reg pa la gnas sam zhes snyun gsol zhing / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha' mdzod la sogs pa
10a4(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' bye ba phrag bcu gnyis po 'dus pa chen po'i le'u chos kyi rnam grangs nyan 'tshal ba 'di dag ji ltar chos thams cad la dbang bgyid cing chos chen po dang ldan pas/ slar ldog par
10a5(mdo sde): 'gyur ba'i chos kyi bka' mchid kyis/ bcom ldan 'das kyis mgu bar mdzod cig ces de skad kyang gsung ngo // de nas byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha'i mdzod kyis bcom
10a6(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyi seng ge'i khri'i steng gi bar snang la dpag tshad stong phrag bcu tsam gyi rin po che'i gdugs su byin gyis brlabs nas/ bcom ldan 'das la thal mo sbyar te/ phyag 'tshal nas tshigs su
10a7(mdo sde): bcad pa dag gis mngon par bstod pa/ chos dang don dang yon tan ye shes 'phags pas na// yongs dag rnam dag snga nas dag cing dri ma med// gnas med nam mkha' 'dra bar mi g.yo rab tu brnyes//
10b1(mdo sde): rab zab kun nas spyod yul min la phyag 'tshal lo// rgyal ba chos kyi skus ni rab phye sku mnyam yang // gzugs mdzes ldan zhing gzugs bzang sku yang ston par mdzad// sems can rnams la phan
10b2(mdo sde): pa'i thugs rje rab bskyed nas/ / bsod nams brgya pa'i mtshan gyi sku yi mchog kyang ston// khyod ni mi gsung rtog med sgra dang tshig kyang med// tshig gis rang bzhin drag cha'i mtshan nyid gzung du med/
10b3(mdo sde): sgra med rtag med yi ge med pa mkhyen nas kyang // byams pa khyod ni snying rje can pas rgyal ba'i tshig kyang gsung // sems can kun gyi sems dang sems byung rjes su rig/ khyod ni sems kyi rang bzhin sgyu
10b4(mdo sde): ma'i mtshan nyid mkhyen/ / sems kyi rgyud kyi rang bzhin ci 'dra rab mkhyen kyang // sems dang yid rnams la ni khyod kyi sems mi gnas// 'gro ba rnams la khyod kyis spyod pa kun bstan te// bde bar
10b5(mdo sde): gshegs pa'i sku ni 'gyur ba yong ma mchis/ / gang gi gzugs dang sems dang yon tan ci 'dra bar// mtshan dang spyod lam dag kyang de yi tshul tu ston// bde gshegs chos 'di la ni nga yir 'dzin pa
10b6(mdo sde): med/ / khyod ni chos la gnas pa med cing 'dzin pa med// sems can mang po kun rtog chos kyis 'dul mkhyen nas// khyod ni bla na med pa'i chos rnams rtag tu ston// rgyal ba'i sku la 'khor 'di kun gyis
10b7(mdo sde): bltas pa na/ / gzugs dang mtshan ma tha dad skal ba mi mnyam gnas// khyod kyi sku ni mi 'gyur rtog med mtshan med de// 'khor rnams ji lta'i sems dang bsam bzhin tshim par mdzad// chos 'di
11a1(mdo sde): thams cad rgyu dang rkyen las skyes pa ste/ / byed med ngo bo nyid med kun tu rtog las skyes// bde gshegs de 'dra'i chos kyi tshul rnams mkhyen nas su// byang chub mi 'gyur zhib bla na
11a2(mdo sde): med pa brnyes/ / mtha' dang de bzhin dbus bcad rnam par rtog pa med// stong zhing gsog la rang bzhin gsob ste ya ma brla// khyod kyis de 'dra'i chos nyid rnam dag mkhyen nas su// 'gro ba rnams la rgyu
11a3(mdo sde): dang las dang byed pa ston/ / chos 'di sems can med cing srog dang gang zag med// nam mkha' mtshungs mnyam pas ni mang yang rnam par dag/ sems can gan du nyer gshegs yang dag bdag med pa/
11a4(mdo sde): mi 'chi 'dus ma byas la sems can mang sad mdzad// brtson 'grus mthu dang stobs kyis byang chub 'di chol phyir// khyod kyis bskal pa bsam yas bye ba phrag brgyar bshad// sgrub pa med pa'i
11a5(mdo sde): nan tan mtshan nyid byang chub ste/ / gang phyir spyod pa'i don de rjes su thob par gyur// chos rnams mnyam pa nyid ni mnyam par bzhag mkhyen pas// rab dang 'bring dang tha ma dag kyang mnyam par
11a6(mdo sde): mkhyen/ / mnyam pa nyid la mnyam nyid rtag bzhugs rnam mi rtog/ de phyir rgyal ba mnyam par bzhag cing mi 'gyur ba// phung po khams dang dbang po ji ltar sgyu ma bzhin// 'jig rten
11a7(mdo sde): gsum po chu zla 'dra ste 'pho ba med/ / sems can rnams ni rmi lam lta bur dngos med de// mkhyen pas rmi lam bzhin du rtogs nas chos 'di gsung // byang chub mchog rab brta yi rang bzhin khyod kyis brnyas/
11b1(mdo sde): / de ni thob dang mthob pa zhes brjod du med// ji ltar byang chub khyod kyis de bzhin 'khor lo yang // tshul dang tshul min 'jug pa'i mtshan dral rab tu bskor// brgal nas sems can mang po bsam yas/
11b2(mdo sde): rab sgrol ba// grol nas bcings pa'i nang na mchis pa shin tu 'grol// theg chen bla med 'di la 'gro ba dbugs 'byin cing // nges 'byin mnyam pa brnyes pa mya ngan 'das la 'god// gang na'ang sems
11b3(mdo sde): can nam yang mya ngan 'das ma mchis/ / sems can gdod nas rnam dag sems can nyid mi sgrub// sems can sgyu ma'i mtshan du byang chub sangs rgyas nas// 'di yi mtha' rnams sems can mang po rtogs par
11b4(mdo sde): mdzad/ / nam mkha' la ni gzugs rnams nam yang mi snang bzhin// de ltar 'gro ba kun gyi gzugs ni gzugs nyid mtshungs// chos de gzugs dang gzugs med gzugs min mtshan nyid de// gang gis/
11b5(mdo sde): de ltar don rnams yang dag dang ni rtogs pa// ji tsam rgyal ba'i bsngags pa dag gi dper bgyis pa// de dag thams cad bsngags pa 'di la mthong chags te// rang gi yon tan rnams kyi 'dren bsngags
11b6(mdo sde): nam mkha' 'dra/ / gnyis med bsngags brjod 'di ni rgyal ba'i bsngags pa'o// sangs rgyas 'gro bsad par mdzad cing dmigs med pa// sems med sems nyid brnyes pa khyod la phyag 'tshal lo//
11b7(mdo sde): ji ltar 'dren pa kun gyis mi yi seng ge bsngags// de ltar de bzhin nyid phyir yang dag yon tan bsngags// sems can thams cad bdag med mtshan nyid ye shes mnyam// thams cad rtogs nas chos
12a1(mdo sde): dbyings rjes su rig par bgyid/ / chos kun 'dod chags bral ba'i mtshan gyi tshul shes pa// des ni mnyam pa nyid kyis 'dren pa mchod par 'gyur// byang chub sems
12a2(mdo sde): dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha'i mdzod kyis tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras ma thag tu/ nam mkha' la 'dug pa'i khang pa brtsegs pa bkod pa chen po de'ang rnam pa drug tu rab tu g.yos so//
12a3(mdo sde): bar snang las kyang gang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis bskal pa grangs med pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du yang dag par bsgrubs pa/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub de ni
12a4(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha'i mdzod kyis tshigs su bcad pa'i dbyangs kyis kun brjod do/ / byang chub sems dpa' de dag ni rmi lam na'ang mngon par zhen pas dmigs par lta ba
12a5(mdo sde): mi 'byung ngo / / gang dag tshigs su bcad pa'i chos kyi tshul 'di thos nas mos pa dang / gang yang thos nas sgrub pa de dag ni/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' mdzod da ltar seng ge'i sgra sgrog pa
12a6(mdo sde): bzhin du de dag kyang seng ge'i sgra sgrog par 'gyur ro zhes de lta bu'i sgra byung ngo / / de nas byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha'i mdzod kyis tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras nas// bcom
12a7(mdo sde): ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ / bcom ldan 'das bdag kyang 'dus pa chen po'i le'u chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i ming thos nas/ mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir bcom ldan 'das
12b1(mdo sde): la blta ba dang / phyag bgyi ba dang / bsnyen bkur bgyi ba dang / chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la'ang chos snang bar bgyi ba gang cung zad bstan pa'i slad du 'dir mchis so// bcom ldan 'das gang skyes bu dam pa/
12b2(mdo sde): 'di dag gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la rang rang gi chos la the tsom du gyur pa nges par bstan pa/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa la yongs su zhu ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa nges pa'i blo la rab
12b3(mdo sde): tu gnas pas de dag gi the tsom thams cad kyang rab tu bsal cing / sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad snang bar bgyis pa de legs so// bcom ldan 'das gal te de bzhin gshegs pas bdag la skabs phye
12b4(mdo sde): na/ chos rnam par nges pa la 'jug pa'i bka' mchid cung zad cig bdag zhu'o// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das ni mi chags pa'i ye shes can te/ sems can thams cad kyi dbang po mchog dang /
12b5(mdo sde): mchog ma lags pa mkhyen pa/ ye shes la mkhas pa/ bcom ldan 'das ni snang ba brnyes pa ste/ mun pa thams cad dang bral ba/ bcom ldan 'das ni don mkhyen pa ste/ tshigs thams cad rab tu dbye ba'i
12b6(mdo sde): ye shes la mkhas pa/ bcom ldan 'das ni dus mkhyen pa ste/ chod las mi 'da' zhing phyed par lung ston pa/ bcom ldan 'das ni chod mkhyen pa ste/ sems can thams cad la so so ci rigs par chos ston pa/
12b7(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das ni rnam par rol pa ste/ mngon par shes pa dang rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnam par nges pa'i ye shes la mkhas pa/ bcom ldan 'das ni shin tu rnam par gzigs pa'i blo dang ldan pa ste/ sems
13a1(mdo sde): can thams cad kyi sems kyi spyod pa phyag mthil du 'jog par kun ston pa/ bcom ldan 'das ni mngon par 'phags pa ste/ spyi gtsug bltar mi mthong ba/ bcom ldan 'das ni
13a2(mdo sde): zil gyis mnon pa ste/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na dpa' bo gcig po// bcom ldan 'das ni rang byung ba ste/ slob dpon med par chos thams cad rang gis mngon par rdzogs par
13a3(mdo sde): sangs rgyas pa/ bcom ldan 'das ni 'dren pa ste/ 'dren pa med pa dang lam ngan par zhugs pa rnams la yang dag pa'i lam ston pa/ bcom ldan 'das ni sman pa'i rgyal po ste/ thog ma dang tha ma ma mchis
13a4(mdo sde): pa'i 'dod pa ste/ nyon mongs pa dang / kun tu sgrib pa dang / shin tu sgrib pa dang / kun nas ldang bas bsgribs pa'i 'jig rten gnas pa rnams nad ma mchis pa/ 'chi ba ma mchis pa'i gnas kyi lam
13a5(mdo sde): la rab tu 'god pa/ bcom ldan 'das ni stobs dang drag shul 'chang ba ste/ gnas dang gnas ma yin pa mkhyen pa la mkhas shing gsum rig pa'i rig pa brnyes pa/ bcom ldan 'das ni mi 'jigs
13a6(mdo sde): pa chen po brnyes pa ste/ zag pa zad cing mnyam pa nyid mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te/ kun nas nyon mongs pa dang rnam par byang ba mkhyen pa la mkhas pa/ lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyi mdun
13a7(mdo sde): du khyu mchog seng ge'i sgra sgrog pa/ bcom ldan 'das ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa dang ldan pa ste/ dus gsum la thogs pa med pa'i ye shes can/ bcom ldan 'das ni sku dang / gsung dang / thugs
13b1(mdo sde): yongs su dag pa ste/ 'khrul pa dang ca co mi mnga' ba/ snyoms par 'jug pa thams cad dang / rnam par grol ba'i ye shes gzigs pa/ bcom ldan 'das ni byams pa chen po la gnas pa ste/ zhe/
13b2(mdo sde): 'gras pa med pa'i blo dang ldan pa/ sems can thams cad la sems snyoms pa/ nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa'i 'od zer gyis gzigs pa'i spyan dang ldan pa/ bcom ldan 'ad ni thugs rje chen po la gnas
13b3(mdo sde): pa ste/ legs par byas pa dang / nyes par byas pa dang / bde ba dang sdug bsngal bas mi bskyod pa dang / sems can thams cad mnyam par 'jug pa'i blo dang ldan pa// bcom ldan 'das
13b4(mdo sde): ni sangs rgyas thams cad dang mnyam pa ste/ mnyam pa'i ye shes gnyis su med pa la zhugs pa/ bcom ldan 'das ni bye brag med pa ste/ nam mkha' lta bur shin tu rnam par dag cing // sems
13b5(mdo sde): can thams cad la mnyam par sbyor ba/ bcom ldan 'das ni 'dod pa med pa ste/ shes rab kyis ngoms pa/ rnyed pa dang / bkur sti dang / tshigs su bcad pa dang bral ba/ bcom ldan 'das
13b6(mdo sde): ni thams cad mkhyen cing thams cad gzigs pa/ spyan lnga'i tshul yongs su dag pa'o// bcom ldan 'das de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan dang / chos dang / ye shes tshad ma mchis pa dang ldan
13b7(mdo sde): par bdag gis rig nas chos rab tu brjod pa'i sgo yongs su zhu bar 'tshal te/ gus pa dang bcas shing chos la gces smras su bgyi ba dang ldan pa ste/ nga rgyal ma mchis shing sems can thams cad chos la sbyor ba
14a1(mdo sde): thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes mngon par bsgrubs pas chos 'tshal ba'i slad du de bzhin gshegs pa la yongs su zhu'o/ / de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom
14a2(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha'i mdzod la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// legs so legs so// skyes bu dam pa ji ltar khyod gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sangs
14a3(mdo sde): rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la dris pa rnams lung bstan pa thob pa/ / rigs kyi bu khyod ci dang ci 'dod pa de bzhin gshegs pa la dris shig dang / dris pa de dang de nyid lung bstan pas ngas khyod kyi sems
14a4(mdo sde): rangs par bya'o/ / de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yon tan gyi rgyal po rab tu snang ba zhes bya ba 'khor der 'dus par gyur te/ 'dug pa des byang chub sems dpa' sems
14a5(mdo sde): dpa' chen po nam mkha'i mdzod la 'di skad ces smras so/ / ci zhig gi phyir rigs kyi bu khyod de bzhin gshegs pa la zhu bar 'dod// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
14a6(mdo sde): nam mkha'i mdzod kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yon tan gyi rgyal po rab tu snang ba la tshigs su bcad pas smras pa/ gang rnams sems dang sems la sems yid mtshungs// shin tu bsams
14a7(mdo sde): sems ye shes mnyam la gnas/ / sems la sems med par ni zhugs pa'i tshul// de dag don du rgyal la bdag zhu'o// snang ba thob cing mun pa dri ma med// yid gnyis can gyi yid gnyis blo gcod pas//
14b1(mdo sde): nges byas rnam par thar pa lag bzhag pa// de dag ched du bde bar gshegs la zhu// bdag la bdag med shin tu rnam dag yid// sems can don zhugs sems can med la dga'// sems can bdag med//
14b2(mdo sde): gnyis las thar byed pa// rnam par nges pa'i chos kyi gtam 'dri'o// cho ga spyod pa brtul zhugs yongs su dag/ bsam pa dag cing sems ni nam mkha' 'dra// lhun po lta bur brtan zhing mi g.yog/
14b3(mdo sde): de dag ched du yon tan mdzad la zhu// blo zlogs brtan pa brtson 'grus kun nas bzang // dpa' bo bdud kyi dgra yi nga rgyal bcom// nyon mongs rab tu nyon mongs dri sbyong ba// mthong dga' de dag don du 'di
14b4(mdo sde): zhu'o/ / thos sbyin tshul khrims bzod pa brtson 'grus dga'// bsam gtan rnam thar shes rab mchog tu gyur// mngon shes bsam gtan rnam par grol ba'i 'od// rab dag dri med don du bdag zhu'o//
14b5(mdo sde): stong pa mtshan ma med cing mi smon gnas// bsams bzhin shi 'pho dang ni skye ba ston// skyes pa med cing mi gnas 'chi 'pho med// de dag don du mi yi spyod pa lu// nyan thos rang rgyal skye bo gzhan dag gis/
14b6(mdo sde): rtogs par dka' zhing zab mo mthong dka' ba// skye bo kun gyi yid rnams bskul ba yi// chos kyi gtam ni bde bar gshegs la zhu// legs par byas pa rdzogs pa'i chos la dga'// chos la chos med
14b7(mdo sde): 'dzin pa gnyis las 'grol/ / rtag tu mnyam bzhag mchog gi chos la dga'// sems kyang nam mkha' mtshungs pa'i don du zhu// gang dag sangs rgyas rigs gnas chos la dga'// rtag tu sangs//
15a1(mdo sde): rgyas bstod pa kun med blo// grags pa mtha' yas 'jig rten gsum du thos// yon tan rgya mche de phyir 'di zhu'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ byang chub sems dpa'//
15a2(mdo sde): sems dpa' chen po nam mkha' mdzod kyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' dag sbyin pa nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa rnams lags
15a3(mdo sde): tshul khrims nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa dang / bzod pa nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa dang / brtson 'grus nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa dang / bsam gtan nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa dang / shes rab
15a4(mdo sde): nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa dang / bsod nams nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa dang / ye shes nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa rnams lags// sangs rgyas kyis gnang ba'i sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa dang /
15a5(mdo sde): chos rjes su dran pa dang / dge 'dun rjes su dran pa dang / gtong ba rjes su dran pa dang / tshul khrims rjes su dran pa dang mi 'bral ba rnams lags/ sangs rgyas kyis gnang ba'i lha rjes su dran pa
15a6(mdo sde): dang mi 'bral ba rnams lags/ mya ngan las 'das pa dang mnyam pa thob cing byang chub sems dpa' spyod pa'ang spyod de/ sems can thams cad kyis spyod pa'i mtshan nyid dang cho ga shes pa rnams
15a7(mdo sde): lags/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi chos dkon mchog gi mdzod 'dzin pa dang / mtshan nyid kyi ngo bo nyid kyi chos gang de bzhin gshegs pas mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'i mtshan
15b1(mdo sde): nyid kyi ngo bo nyid de'i chos thams cad yongs su 'dzin pa dang / thog ma nas sems can rnam par dag pas/ sems can thams cad yongs su smin par bgyid pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos thams
15b2(mdo sde): cad yang dag par bsgrub pa'i slad du/ tshul bzhin du'ang rab tu sbyor ba rnams lags/ mngon par shes pa las ma nyams shing chos thams cad la dbang bgyid pa rnams lags/ nyan thos dang rang sangs
15b3(mdo sde): rgyas thams cad kyis shin tu rtogs par dka' ba'i chos kyi tshul zab mo la zhugs pa rnams lags/ rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba la 'jug pa'i shes pa la mkhas te/ mtha' gnyis su lta ba thams
15b4(mdo sde): rung dang bral ba rnams lags/ / de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag rgyas btab pas de bzhin nyid dbyer med pa shes pa la mkhas pa rnams lags/ chos kyi dbyings kyi tshul rab tu zhugs shing chos kyi dbyings
15b5(mdo sde): thams cad la yang dag par gzhol ba rnams lags/ bsam pa rdo rje ltar sra zhing mi phyed de theg pa chen po 'di la legs par gnas shing mi g.yo ba rnams lags/ sangs rgyas kyi yul rjes su thob cing
15b6(mdo sde): rang gi yul yongs su dag pa rnams lags/ gzungs thob pa rtag tu mi brjed par spyod pa rnams lags/ spobs pa thogs pa med cing rgyun mi 'chang la rtag tu sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis byin gyis
15b7(mdo sde): brlabs pa rnams lags/ skye ba dang / 'chi 'pho ba dang / 'byung ba rnams la dbang thob pa rnams lags/ bdud bzhi'i lam las yang dag par 'das shing / bdud dang phyir rgol ba thams
16a1(mdo sde): cad bcom pa rnams lags bsod nams kyi tshogs tshad med pa bsags shing sems can thams cad kyi 'tsho bar gyur pa rnams lags/ sangs rgyas rnams ma byung yang /
16a2(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pas sems can rnams la nye bar gnas pa rnams lags// rgya mtsho'i phyag rgya'i ting nge 'dzin thob cing / sems can thams cad kyi sems dang spyod pa la mi chags pa rnams
16a3(mdo sde): lags/ chags pa thams cad las yang dag par 'das pa dang / nam mkha' la rlung mar lta bu'i sems dang ldan pa rnams lags/ cho ga dang spyod pa'i tshul shes pa dang mun pa dang bral zhing snang ba thob
16a4(mdo sde): pa rnams lags/ gzhan gyi dring la mi 'dzeg cing rang byung gi ye shes shin tu rtogs pa rnams lags/ myur du theg pa chen po la thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes 'di thob par 'gyur lags
16a5(mdo sde): de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha'i mdzod la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// skyes bu dam pa khyod legs so legs
16a6(mdo sde): so/ / skyes bu chen po khyod de bzhin gshegs pa la don 'di 'dri bar sems pa legs so// 'di lta ste/ khyod ni sems can thams cad kyis gsol ba ma btab pa'i bshes gnyen// sangs rgyas
16a7(mdo sde): kyi chos thams cad la snang ba thob pa/ byams pa chen po dang snying rje chen po'i go cha bgos pa/ bgrang ba las 'das pa'i sangs rgyas la bsnyen bkur byas pa/ rtag tu chos tshol bas mi ngoms pa
16b1(mdo sde): ye shes kyi mtshon cha can/ nga rgyal gyi rnam pa thams cad las yang dag par 'das pa/ rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par sems can gyi don la brtson pa/ 'jig rten gyi chos brgyad las yang dag par
16b2(mdo sde): 'das pa/ nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa'i sems kyis thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes yang dag par sgrub pa ste/ skyes bu dam pa khyod kyi yon tan rnams kyi mtha' rtogs par slab ma yin no// de'i
16b3(mdo sde): phyir rigs kyi bu khyod legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zung zhig dang / ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams yon tan rnams dang gzhan dag kyang thob par 'gyur ba bshad do//
16b4(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das legs so zhes gsol nas/ byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha'i mdzod bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar nyan pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//
16b5(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu chos bzhi dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' sbyin pa nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ bdag rnam par dag pas sems can rnam par dag pa la 'jug
16b6(mdo sde): pa dang / sems can rnam par dag pas sbyin pa rnam par dag pa la 'jug pa dang / sbyin pa rnam par dag pas bsngo ba rnam par dag pa la 'jug pa dang / bsngo ba rnam par dag pas/ byang chub rnam par dag
16b7(mdo sde): pa la 'jug pa ste/ rigs kyi bu chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na// byang chub sems dpa' sbyin pa nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa yin no// des rnam par dag pa brgyad kyi sgo nas sbyin pa de sbyin te/ brgyad gang
17a1(mdo sde): zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ ngar 'dzin pa rnam par dag par sbyin pa de sbyin/ nga yir 'dzin pa rnam par dag par sbyin pa de sbyin/ rgyu rnam par dag par sbyin pa de sbyin// lta ba rnam par dag par
17a2(mdo sde): sbyin pa de sbyin/ mtshan ma rnam par dag par sbyin pa de sbyin/ tha dad pa rnam par dag par sbyin pa de sbyin/ rnam par smin pa la mi re ba rnam par dag par sbyin pa de sbyin/ nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa'i
17a3(mdo sde): sems rnam par dag par sbyin pa de sbyin te/ rnam par dag pa brgyad po 'di dag gi sgo nas sbyin pa de sbyin no// ji ltar na nam mkha' mtha' med pa de bzhin du sems mtha' med par byas te/ sbyin pa de
17a4(mdo sde): sbyin/ ji ltar nam mkha' rgya che zhing bsgribs pa med pa de bzhin du/ byang chub tu bsngos te sbyin pa de sbyin/ ji ltar nam mkha' la gzugs med pa de bzhin du/ gzugs thams cad la mi gnas par sbyin pa de
17a5(mdo sde): sbyin/ ji ltar nam mkha' la tsher ba med pa de bzhin du tshor ba thams cad dang bral bar sbyin pa de skyon/ ji ltar nam mkha' la 'du shes med pa de bzhin du// 'du shes thams cad kyi 'dud pa med par sbyin pa de sbyin/
17a6(mdo sde): ji ska nam mkhara' 'dus ma byas pa de bzhin du/ 'dus byas thams cad med par ston pa'i sbyin/ ji ltar nam mnga' mtshan nyid rnam par rig pa med pa'i bzhin du/ rnam par shes pa mi gnas par sbyin
17a7(mdo sde): bde sbyin/ ji ltar nam mkhas sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad khyab pa de bzhin du/ sems can la byams pas khyab par sbyin pa de sbyin/ ji ltar nam mkha' mi zad pa de bzhin du/ dkon mchog gsum gyi
17b1(mdo sde): rigs mi zad par bsngo zhing sbyin pa de phyin/ ji ltar nam mkha' la mun pa mad pa de bzhin du/ nyon mongs pa thams cad kyi mun pa med par sbyin pa de sbyin/ ji ltar nam mkhar nag par rab tu snang ba de
17b2(mdo sde): bzhin du/ sems kyi rang bzhin yongs su dag par sbyin pa de sbyin// ji ltar nam mkha' sems can thams cad kyi go skabs 'byed pa de bzhin du/ sems can thams cad nye bar 'tsho bar sbyin pa de sbyin/ ji ltar
17b3(mdo sde): nam mkha' la nga'i ba med pa de bzhin du/ sems can thams cad yid la byed pa thams cad dang bral bar sbyin pa de sbyin/ ji ltar sprul pas sprul pa la sbyin pa de sbyin pa lta bur rnam par mi rtog cing // lhun gyis/
17b4(mdo sde): 'grub ste/ sems dang / yid dang / rnam par shes pa dang bral zhing chos thams cad la re ba med pa de ltar gnyis dang bral ba'i phyir/ sgyu ma'i mtshan nyid kyi ngo bo nyid rnam par dag par byang chub sems dpas
17b5(mdo sde): sbyin pade sbyin te/ rigs kyi bu gang de lta bur sbyin pa yongs su gtong ba de ni shes rab kyis ni sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa thams cad yongs su 'dor zhing / thabs kyi ye shes kyis ni sems can
17b6(mdo sde): thams cad mi gtong ba ste/ rigs kyi bu de lta bur gtang ba'i sems ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sbyin pa nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa yin no// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag
17b7(mdo sde): na mar me zhes bya ba 'khor de nyid du 'dus par gyur te 'dug pa des/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' gang dag gi sbyin pa
18a1(mdo sde): yongs su gtong ba 'di 'dra ba lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang de dag rnam pa med pa ste/ rnam pa/
18a2(mdo sde): rnam par dag pa sems can gyi rnam pa ste/ sems can rnam par dag pa chos kyi rnam pa ste/ chos rnam par dag pa ye shes kyi rnam pa ste/ ye shes rnam par dag pa shes rab kyi rnam pa ste/ shes rab
18a3(mdo sde): rnam par dag pa sems kyi rnam pa ste/ sems rnam par dag pa 'jig rten gyi rnam pa ste/ 'jig rten rnam par dag pa/ gzugs med pa gzugs su ston pa dang / mi ston pa'i ye shes rnam
18a4(mdo sde): par dag pa/ mun pa med cing mun pa rab tu snang bar byed pa/ mtshan ma thams cad rnam par bshig pas mtshan ma med pa'i mthar gyur pa/ mthar phyin pa'i ye shes rnam par dag pa/ mi zad
18a5(mdo sde): pa'i bzod pa dang ldan pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes kyis mkhyen pa'i lung bstan pa thob/ mtshams bcad cing byang chub sems dpa'i nges par gyur pa la zhugs pa/ phyir mi ldog pa'i
18a6(mdo sde): phyag rgyas btab cing dbang bskur ba thob pa/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la yang dag par zhugs shing mnyam pa nyid kyis mnyam par spyod pa/ legs par spyod pa la spyad pa/ sems can thams
18a7(mdo sde): cad kyi spyod pa'i mtshan nyid dang chog shes pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag gi spyod yul te/ skyes bu dam pa de dang de dag ni de lta bu'i sbyin pa sbyin par byed do// bstan pa
18b1(mdo sde): 'di bshad pa na/ byang chub sems dpa' khri drug stong nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa'i sbyin pa la bzod pa skyes so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i rje tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag
18b2(mdo sde): gsungs so/ / dag pa'i sems kyis rtag tu sbyin pa byin// byang chub phyir te rnam smin yang mi 'dod// dga' zhing mgu nas rjes su gdung med de// rab tu grol nas rtag tu sbyin pa byin// mkhas pas
18b3(mdo sde): chos rnams sgyu 'drar shes nas su/ / lus dang srog la'ang chags par mi 'gyur zhing // de dag la ni nams kyang 'dzin pa med// de ltar de dag bsam pa byang chub nges// thams cad btang yang mi
18b4(mdo sde): dgar mi 'gyur zhing / / de la zhum pa med de gong ba med// de yis nam mkha' mtshungs par chos rnams bsgoms// de bas dga' bar mi 'gyur zhum pa'ang med// bdag gi rang bzhin snga nas rnam
18b5(mdo sde): par dag/ byang chub rnam par dag pas sbyin pa sbyin// de ni sems kyi rgyud la mi chags par// spros pa med par sbyin pa rab tu sbyin// sems mnyam nyid kyang mnyam pas kun tu sbyin pa gtong //
18b6(mdo sde): rab 'bring tha ma gsum yang med par sbyin// bsam pa yongs dag dri ma med pa yis// thams cad gtong yang rnam par smin mi 'dod// lus dang tshe ni mi rtag sgyu ma 'dra// longs spyod rmi lam glog
18b7(mdo sde): bzhin snying po med/ / 'jig rten kun la snying rje brtse bskyed nas// 'jig rten chos kyis mgos sbyin pa sbyin// nyon mongs dag phyir bdag gi nor kun gtong // rgyal ba'i tshig gi gnas su 'gyur snyam
19a1(mdo sde): ste/ / bdud rnams kyis kyang bdag la glags mi rnyed// de ltar brtags nas thams cad gtong ba yin// stobs bcus sbyin pa rtsa ba yin zhes gsungs// de la rab tu gnas/
19a2(mdo sde): dang tshul khrims ldan// tshul khrims yon tan gnas nas bsam gtan rnyed// bsam gtan ma chags shes rab rdzogs par byed// sbyin pa dang ni dul bas sems rab tshim// nyon mongs rnams
19a3(mdo sde): kyang tshi gnas phyir mi skye/ / sbyin pa bdag dang gzhan la phan pa gsungs// phan dang bde ba 'dus byas sbyin pas mgu// sbyin gtong nyon mongs spangs shing dge ba'i phyir// des na 'dzin pa la ni
19a4(mdo sde): chags mi 'gyur/ / pha rol nyon mongs phyir ni mi gtong ste// bdag blo rnam dag byang chub phyir gtong ngo // ji lta ji ltar ma zhum sems kyis gtong // de ltar des ni byang chub yon tan mthong // ji lta ji
19a5(mdo sde): ltar byang chub yon tan mthong / / de lta de ltar sems can brgya tshim byed/ de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha' mdzod la bka' stsal pa/
19a6(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu chos bzhi dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ gzugs brnyan lta bu'i lus mnyam pa nyid de dang / drag cha lta/
19a7(mdo sde): bu'i sgra mnyam pa nyid dang / sgyu ma lta bu'i sems mnyam pa nyid dang / nam mkha' lta bu'i blo mnyam pa nyid de/ rigs kyi bu chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' tshul khrims nam mkha' dang
19b1(mdo sde): mtshungs pa yin no/ / rigs kyi bu brgyad po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa'i sems kyi tshul khrims yongs su dag pa ste/ brgyad gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sems rnam par dag pa'i phyir/ byang chub kyi
19b2(mdo sde): sems dang mi 'thal ba dang / tshad mar gyur pa rnam par dag pa'i phyir/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi sems med pa dang / dam bcas pa rnam par dag pa'i phyir/ bslab pa thams cad mi 'dor ba dang / skyon
19b3(mdo sde): lam yongs su dag pa'i phyir/ skye ba thams cad du mi 'jug pa dang / mngon par 'du mi byed pa yongs su dag pa'i phyir mi lhod pa dang / mtshan ma yongs su dag pa'i phyir/ byang chub tu bsngo ba dang // nyon mongs
19b4(mdo sde): pa yongs su dag pa'i phyir/ kun nas gdung ba med pa dang / byang chub yongs su dag pa'i phyir/ smon lam yongs su rdzogs pa ste/ rigs kyi bu brgyad po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams
19b5(mdo sde): kyi tshul khrims yongs su dag pa'o/ / gzhan yang tshul khrims yongs su dag pa ni nam mkha' dag pa ste// tshul khrims de'ang dag pa'o// nam mkha' dri ma med pa ste/ tshul khrims de'ang dri ma med
19b6(mdo sde): pa'o/ / nam mkha' zhi ba ste/ tshul khrims de'ang zhi nga'o// nam mkha' mi mtho ba ste/ tshul khrims de'ang mi mtho ba'o// nam mkha' mi dma' ba ste// tshul khrims de'ang mi dma' ba'o//
19b7(mdo sde): nam mkha' gzung du med pa ste/ tshul khrims de'ang gzung du med pa'o// nam mkha' gnas med pa ste/ tshul khrims de'ang gnas med pa'o// nam mkha' med pa med ma yin te/ tshul
20a1(mdo sde): khrims de'ang med pa ma yin pa'o/ / nam mkha' rtag pa ste/ tshul khrims de'ang rtag pa'o// nam mkha' mi zad pa ste/ tshul khrims de'ang mi zad pa'o// nam mkha'
20a2(mdo sde): mtshan ma med pa ste/ tshul khrims de'ang mtshan ma med pa'o// nam mkha' rgyu ba med pa ste/ tshul khrims de'ang rgyu ba med pa'o// nam mkha' spros pa med pa ste/ tshul khrims de'ang spros pa med
20a3(mdo sde): pa'o/ / nam mkha' zag pa med pa ste/ tshul khrims de'ang zag pa med pa'o// nam mkha' 'dus ma byas pa ste/ tshul khrims de'ang 'dus ma byas pa'o// nam mkha' mi 'gyur ba ste/ tshul
20a4(mdo sde): khrims de'ang mi 'gyur ba'o/ / nam mkha' rnam par mi rtog pa ste/ tshul khrims de'ang rnam par mi rtog pa'o// nam mkha' thams cad du song ba ste/ tshul khrims de'ang thams cad du song ba'o//
20a5(mdo sde): nam mkha' mchod mi phyed pa ste/ tshul khrims de'ang mchod ma phyed pa'o// nam mkha' mtshungs par sbyor ba ste/ tshul khrims de'ang mtshungs par sbyor ba'o// nam mkha' rang bzhin gyis
20a6(mdo sde): kun nas nyon mongs pa can ma yin pa ste/ tshul khrims de'ang rang bzhin gyis kun nas nyon mongs pa can ma yin pa'o// rigs kyi bu de ltar gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' tshul khrims
20a7(mdo sde): nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa yin no/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di skad gsungs so// sems zhi tshul khrims dri med srung zhing gdung ba med// lus
20b1(mdo sde): dang sems kyang rnam dag ngag yid thams cad bsdams/ / mkhas pa rtag tu nang zhi tshul khrims dregs mi snyems// blo 'chang sems la mi gnas byang chub sems la rton// las gang ma byas ma bsams
20b2(mdo sde): de bzhin ma brtags te/ de ni dmar sngo ser min kha dog gzugs mi gnas// gzung med mi bden mig yo dben pa nam mkha' bzhin// tshul khrims lta ba gnas med mkhas pa kun gyis bsngags
20b3(mdo sde): tshul khrims de ni rab zhi zhi byed nyon mongs zhi/ / zhi gnas lhag mthong dag gi mthar phyin mthar ston pa// gang su bcings las grol ba de dag tshul khrims bsnyen// de bas tshul khrims thar byed byang chub rtsa
20b4(mdo sde): ba'i gzhi/ / gang su sbyangs pa dgon gnas 'dod nyung chog shes pa// yo byad bsnyungs shing bsam gtan dben tshogs sems sbyangs pa// tshul khrims de yi gnas nges sems rkang thar pa'i rten// de phyir
20b5(mdo sde): tshul khrims brgyan pa lam bde thams cad sgrub/ / g.yo ba rlom sems kun bral lta ba'i nyon mongs gcod// nam mkha' mtshungs mnyam byams pas khyab cing mthar 'dzin sbyong // byang chub phyir nges mi
20b6(mdo sde): gtong byang chub kun mi rtog/ gang mkhas chog shas de 'dra tshul khrims pha rol phyin// / 'gra pa rnamam bla mdzod kyi mdo bam po gnyis pa/ rigs kyi bu de la ji ltar na byang
20b7(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' bzod pa nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa yin zhe na/ rigs kyi bu chos bzhi dang ldan na// byang chub sems dpa' bzod pa nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste
21a1(mdo sde): tshig nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa'i phyir/ gshe yang slar mi gshe ba dang / lus nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa'i phyir brdegs kyang slar mi rdeg pa dang / sems nam mkha'
21a2(mdo sde): dang mtshungs pa'i phyir/ spos kyang slar mi spro ba dang / bsam pa nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa'i phyir/ khros kyang slar mi khro ba ste/ rigs kyi bu chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems
21a3(mdo sde): dpa' bzod pa nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa yin no/ / rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bzod pa nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa yongs su dag pa 'di brgyad de/ brgyad gang zhe na/ 'di lta
21a4(mdo sde): ste/ nam mkha' la zhe 'gras pa med de/ sems can thams cad la zhe 'gras pa med pa'i bzod pa yongs su dag pa dang / nam mkha' la rjes su chags pa med de/ rnyed pa dang bkur sti la
21a5(mdo sde): rjes su chags pa med pa'i bzod pa yongs su dag pa dang / nam mkha' ni mnyam par sbyor ba ste/ sems can thams cad la sems mnyam pa'i bzod pa yongs su dag pa dang / nam mkha' ni ma
21a6(mdo sde): snang ma nyams pa ste/ lus dang sems zad pas nyams pa med pa'i bzod pa yongs su dag pa dang / nam mkha' ni bag la nyal thams cad spangs pa ste/ bag la nyal med pa'i bzod pa yongs su dag
21a7(mdo sde): pa dang / nam mkha' ni yid dang dmigs pa med pa ste/ yid dang dmigs pa med pa'i bzod pa yongs su dag pa dang / nam mkha' ni ma skyes ma byung ba ste/ ma skyes ma byung ba'i bzod pa can gyi bzod
21b1(mdo sde): pa yongs su dag pa dang / nam mkha' ni gzugs dang / gzugs med pa thams cad la khyab pa ste/ byams pas khyab pa'i bzod pa yongs su dag pa'o// rigs kyi bu brgyad po de dag ni
21b2(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bzod pa yongs su dag pa nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa'o/ / rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi chos la nges par rtog pa'i bzod pa ni 'di brgyad de/
21b3(mdo sde): brgyad gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ stong pa nyid la bzod kyang lta ba gzhig pa'i phyir ma yin pa dang / mtshan ma med pa la bzod kyang mtshan ma sel ba ma yin pa dang / smon pa med pa la bzod kyang / byang
21b4(mdo sde): chub tu smon pa med pa med pa ma yin pa dang / mngon par 'du mi byed pa la bzod kyang / 'dus byas rnam par gzhig pa'i phyir ma yin pa dang / skye ba med pa la bzod kyang / 'dus ma byas kyi mtshan
21b5(mdo sde): nyid kyis ma yin pa dang / 'byung ba med pa la bzod kyang / skye ba dang gnas pas ma yin pa dang / sems can med pa la bzod kyang / dngos po rnam par gzhig pa'i phyir ma yin pa dang / ji lta ba
21b6(mdo sde): bzhin du bzod kyang dus rnam par gzhig pa'i phyir ma yin pa ste/ rigs kyi bu brgyad po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi chos la nges par rtog pa'i bzod pa'o// bzod pa zhes bya ba ni 'di dag/
21b7(mdo sde): bdag la ka she'ang bzod do snyam pa de ni nga yir 'dzin pa'i bzod pa ste/ 'don nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa'i bzod pa ma yin no// 'di dag gsheb padag gis bzod par bya'o snyam pa de ni 'dzin pa'i
22a1(mdo sde): bzod pa ste/ de ni nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa'i bzod pa ma yin no// 'di dag ni yi ge snor ba'o snyam pa de ni sgra dang skad kyi bzod pa ste/ de ni nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa'i
22a2(mdo sde): bzod pa ma yin no/ / 'di'ang stong pa bdag kyang stong pa'o snyam pa de ni yid la byed pa sbyor ba'i bzod pa ste/ de ni nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa'i bzod pa ma yin no// bdag gis bzod pa bya'o snyam
22a3(mdo sde): pa de ni rnam par rig pa'i bzod pa ste/ de ni nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa'i bzod pa ma yin no// 'di lta ste/ dper na shing sA la chen po rig la yod par la la zhig 'ongs te/
22a4(mdo sde): shing sA la bcad na/ de la shing sA la bcad pa'i lhag ma rnams 'di snyam du 'di dag ni bcad do// bdag ni ma bcad do snyam du mi sems te/ de dag la rjes su chags pa'ang med/ khong khro ba'ang
22a5(mdo sde): med de/ mi rtog/ rnam par mi rtog/ yongs su mi rtog pa de bzhin du/ gang bzod pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i bzod pa nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa yongs su dag pa'i mchog go/
22a6(mdo sde): de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshogs su bcad pa 'di dag gsungs so// zad pa shes pa bzod pa mi zad gtsang // yid ni yul la ma chags shin tu bsgoms// phyi nang shin tu rnam
22a7(mdo sde): dag mi gnas pa/ / nam mkha' mtshungs mnyam sems mchog bzod pa'o// lus 'di gzugs brnyan rtsi shing rtsig pa 'dra// sems kyang gzugs med mi snang sgyu ma 'dra// chos 'di lta ba'i gar+tha
22b1(mdo sde): med nam mkha' bzhin/ / lus kyang mi 'gyur yid la khro ba med// bkur sti byed la dka' dang zhe sdang med// mtho dang dma' bar rnam par rtog pa med// theg pa gang 'dra sa ltar sbyor ba de/
22b2(mdo sde): sems can dag pa bstan 'dir bzod smras yin// srog med gang zag bdag med sems can med// chos 'di thams cad stong par gang bzod cing // rgyu dang rkyen dang byed dang 'gal mi byed//
22b3(mdo sde): de ni bstan 'dir bzod mchog yang dag nyid// kha ngan zer ba'i tshig thos mi gshe zhing // byed pa med pa nam mkha'i sprin sgra bzhin// bdag rnams bsal yid stong pa'i mchog mthong de// bstan
22b4(mdo sde): 'dir sems can gtsang ma bzod smra yin/ / rigs kyi bu de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' brtson 'grus nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa yin zhe na/ rigs kyi bu chos bzhi dang ldan na/ byang chub
22b5(mdo sde): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad la rtsom yang chos thams cad yongs su ma grub par
22b6(mdo sde): rab tu shes pa dang / sangs rgyas thams cad la mchod pa dang / rim gro bya ba mngon par 'du byed kyang / de bzhin gshegs pa rnams chos kyi sku mnyam par yang dag par rjes su mthong ba dang / sems
22b7(mdo sde): can yongs su smin par byed kyang / sems can rnam par dag pas sems can mi dmigs pa dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin kyang / 'dod chags dang bral bar bya
23a1(mdo sde): pa'i chos yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba ste/ rigs kyi bu chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus nam mkha' dang mtshungs
23a2(mdo sde): pa yin no/ / rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi brtson 'grus yongs su dag pa 'di brgyad de/ brgyad gang zhe na/ brtson 'grus gang gis lus brgyan pa'i lus de gzugs brnyan lta bur
23a3(mdo sde): rig pas mi dmigs pa dang / brtson 'grus gang gis tshig mngon par 'du byed pa'i tshig de ya ma brlar rnam par brtags te mi dmigs pa dang / brtson 'grus gang gis sems ting nge 'dzin gyi gnas su
23a4(mdo sde): 'jog pa'i sems de sems kyi chos nyid kyis rnam par brtags te mi dmigs pa dang / brtson 'grus gang gis pha rol tu phyin pa'i phyogs thams cad rab tu sdud par byed kyang / de gcig nas gcig tu
23a5(mdo sde): sems zad pa'i chos nyid kyis shin tu brtags te mi dmigs pa dang / brtson 'grus gang gis byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos thams cad yang dag par sgrub kyang byang chub de dngos po'i mtshan nyid du rnam par
23a6(mdo sde): brtags te yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba dang / brtson 'grus gang gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su sbyong bar byed pa'i zhing de'ang nam mkha' dang tshungs pas rnam par brtags te mi dmigs pa dang //
23a7(mdo sde): brtson 'grus gang gis thos pa thams cad 'dzin par byed pa de sgra brag cha dang mtshungs par yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba dang / brtson 'grus gang gis sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad rab tu sgrub pa
23b1(mdo sde): de'ang chos kyi dbyings dbyer med pa'i mtshan nyid du rnam par brtags nas mi dmigs pa ste/ rigs kyi bu brgyad po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi brtson 'grus yongs su dag pa'o// rigs kyi
23b2(mdo sde): bu 'di gnyis ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi brtson 'grus te/ gnyis gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sbyor ba'i brtson 'grus dang / yongs su chad pa'i brtson 'grus so// de la sbyor ba'i brtson 'grus/
23b3(mdo sde): ni/ lus dang / ngag dang / sems dang rab tu ldan pa'o// yongs su chad pa'i brtson 'grus ni ldan pa med pa/ 'dor ba med pa/ gnas pa med pa ste/ nam byang chub sems dpa' lus
23b4(mdo sde): dang ngag dang / sems sbyor ba'i brtson 'grus rtsa ba nas mi gnas par shin tu brtags nas/ mi dmigs shing yongs su chad pa'i brtson 'grus ni chos kyi dbyings kyi rjes su 'jug pas rjes su
23b5(mdo sde): 'gro ba ste/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa'i brtson 'grus nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa yin no// ji ltar nam mkha' gzugs med cing sems can thams cad rab tu rgyu ba de bzhin du/ byang chub sems
23b6(mdo sde): dpa' rnams kyi brtson 'grus de'ang chos thams cad la mi gnas shing sems can thams cad yongs su smin par byed do/ / ji ltar nam mkhas gzugs thams cad la go skabs 'byed cing bla gab
23b7(mdo sde): med pa de bzhin du/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi brtson 'grus de'ang sems can thams cad la go skabs 'byed cing lta ba thams cad dang bral ba'o// ji ltar nam mkha' las rtswa dang /
24a1(mdo sde): nags tshal dang / lo tog skye'ang rtsa ba med cing gnas med pa de bzhin du/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi brtson 'grus de'ang sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad skyed kyang
24a2(mdo sde): 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i rtsa ba la gnas pa med do/ / ji ltar nam mkha' thams cad du song yang 'pho ba'i mtshan nyid ma yin pa de bzhin du/ byang chub sems dpa'i brtson 'grus de'ang dge ba'i chos
24a3(mdo sde): thams cad kyi rjes su song yang 'pho ba'i mtshan nyid ma yin no/ / ji ltar nam mkha' mtshungs par sbyor zhing / gzugs tha dad par ston pa de bzhin du/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi brtson
24a4(mdo sde): 'grus de'ang sems can thams cad la chos thams cad mtshungs par sbyor zhing spyod pa sna tshogs kun tu ston to/ / nam byang chub sems dpa' gang kun tu sgrub par byed pa de mnyam pa nyid pas yang
24a5(mdo sde): dag par rjes su mi mthong zhing gang la rtsom pa de'ang rnam par brtags na mi dmigs te/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa'i brtson 'grus nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa yin no// de nas bcom
24a6(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshogs su bcad pa 'di dag gsungs so/ / brtson 'grus dag gi stobs kyis mthu bskyed nas// lus dang srog la'ang 'phangs par mi byed cing // bdag nyid chen po byang chub spyad
24a7(mdo sde): papa spyod/ / sems can phan pa'i don byed pan sems pa// sngon gyi srid par 'dus byas ji srid pa// byang chub yon tan phyir ni de srid 'khor// de dag skyo bar 'gyur ba'ang yong med de// phyi phyir
24b1(mdo sde): brtson 'grus dag ni rab tu skyed/ / sems can bsam mi khyab pa 'grol bar brtson// sangs rgyas bsam mi khyab pa mchod par brtson// zhing rnams bsam gyis mi khyab blta bar brtson/
24b2(mdo sde): bsam gyis mi khyab bdud rnams gdul bar brtson// sbyin pa bsam gyis mi khyab gtong bar brtson// tshul khrims bsam gyis mi khyab bsgoms par brtson// bzod pa bsam gyis mi khyab bsgom
24b3(mdo sde): par brtson/ / brtson 'grus bsam gyis mi khyab dge bar brtson// bsam gtan bsam gyis mi khyab sems par brtson// shes rab bsam gyis mi khyab bsgom par brtson// byams pa bsam gyis mi
24b4(mdo sde): khyab bsgom par brtson/ / don dang yon tan sgrub par rab tu brtson// srog dang lus kyang mi 'phangs brtson par byed// nyon mongs thab kun las rnam par grol// stong pa rnam thar bdag med mngon par
24b5(mdo sde): brtson/ / bdag la bdag med che ba'i bdag nyid brtson// lta bas rnam grol byang chub phyir yang spyod// sgyu ma smig rgyu'i ngo bo nyid du brtson// sems med sems kyang sems ma yin pa thob// g.yo ba med
24b6(mdo sde): pa'i chos rnams ston par brtson/ / 'gro ba kun tu spyod cing rnam par grol// bshad cing klog pa la ni rab tu brtson// chos dang chos min gnyis las shin tu 'das// sgra dang yi ge'i ngo bo nyid la brtson//
24b7(mdo sde): 'gro ba rnams la mdo sde stong rnams smra// sangs rgyas yon tan rnams ni mtha' yang med// sems can spyod pa rnams la'ang mtha' med de// mkhas pa de la rtag tu brtson 'grus sbyor// sems can
25a1(mdo sde): spyod mtha' med la rab tu 'jug/ chos 'di rnams ni skye med 'gog med de// mkhas pa de dag sems kyang mi zhum zhing // phyi phyir brtson 'grus rlabs chen rab bskyed de// 'di/
25a2(mdo sde): 'dra'i chos la sems can bsgom du btsud// rigs kyi bu de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' bsam gtan nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa yin zhe na/ rigs kyi bu chos bzhi dang ldan na/ byang chub sems
25a3(mdo sde): dpa' bsam gtan nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sems nang du yang dag 'jog la/ nang du sems gnas par yang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba dang /
25a4(mdo sde): sems phyi rol nas kyang bzlog la/ phyi rol tu sems rgyu ba mi dmigs pa dang / bdag gi sems mnyam pa nyid kyis sems can thams cad kyi sems kyang mnyam pa nyid du snyoms par 'jug pa dang /
25a5(mdo sde): sems mnyam pa nyid de'ang sems sgyu ma'i chos su mnyam pa nyid du snyoms par 'jug pa ste/ rigs kyi bu chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' bsam gtan nam mkha' dang
25a6(mdo sde): mtshungs pa yin no/ / rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bsam gtan yongs su dag pa ni 'di brgyad de/ brgyad gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ bsam gtan byed kyang phung po la gnas te
25a7(mdo sde): bsam gtan mi byed pa dang / bsam gtan byed kyang khams la gnas te/ bsam gtan mi byed pa dang / bsam gtan byed kyang mched la gnas te/ bsam gtan mi byed pa dang / bsam
25b1(mdo sde): gtan byed kyang 'jig rten 'di la gnas te/ bsam gtan mi byed pa dang / bsam gtan byed kyang 'jig rten pha rol la gnas te/ bsam gtan mi byed pa dang / bsam gtan byed kyang 'dod
25b2(mdo sde): pa'i khams la gnas te/ bas gtan mi byed pa dang / bsam gtan byed kyang gzugs kyi khams la gnas te/ bsam gtan mi byed pa dang / bsam gtan byed kyang gzugs med pa'i khams
25b3(mdo sde): la gnas te/ bsam gtan mi byed pa ste/ rigs kyi bu brgyad po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bsam gtan yongs su dag pa'o// gzhan yang nges par rtog pa'i sems ni bsam gtan
25b4(mdo sde): yongs su dag pa ste/ de la nges par rtog pa'i sems nyid gang zhe na/ gang chos rnams la mi mtho mi dma' ba/ mi stod mi smod pa/ 'gyur ba med pa/ rnam par mi rtog pa/ sogs pa med pa/
25b5(mdo sde): 'bri ba med pa/ 'dzin pa med pa/ gtong ba med pa/ mun pa med pa/ snang ba med pa/ rtog pa med pa dang / rnam par rtog pa med pa/ 'du shes med pa/ yid la byed pa med pa/ gcig pa
25b6(mdo sde): 'ang ma yin/ gnyis pa'ang ma yin/ gnyis pa yin pa'ang ma yin pa/ g.yo ba med pa/ rlom sems med pa/ spros pa med pa/ sogs pa med pa/ phri ba med pa/ sgom pa med pa/
25b7(mdo sde): 'jig pa med pa ste/ gang mtshan ma dang / dmigs pa thams cad la mi gnas pa'o// gang sems mi gnas pa de ni sems nges par rtog pa'o// sems nges par rtogs pa ni gzugs rnam
26a1(mdo sde): la mi rgyu ga ste/ mig dang / gzugs dang / rnam par shes pa rig cing rang gi mtshan nyid rnam par dag par bsam gtan byed do// sems nges par rtog pa ni sgra rnams
26a2(mdo sde): la mi rgyug ste/ rna ba dang / sgra dang / rnam par shes pa rig cing rang gi mtshan nyid rnam par dag par bsam gtan byed do// sems nges par rtog pa ni dri rnams la mi rgyug ste/ sna dang / dri dang //
26a3(mdo sde): rnam par shes pa rig cing rang gi mtshan nyid rnam par dag par bsam gtan byed do// sems nges par rtog pa ni ro rnam la mi rgyug ste/ lce dang / ro dang / rnam par shes pa rig cing rang gi mtshan
26a4(mdo sde): nyid rnam par dag par bsam gtan byed do/ / sems nges par rtog pa ni reg pa rnams la mi rgyug ste/ lus dang / reg pa dang / rnam par shes pa rig cing rang gi mtshan nyid rnam par dag par bsam
26a5(mdo sde): gtan byed do/ / sems nges par rtog pa ni chos rnams la mi rgyug ste/ yid dang / chos dang / rnam par shes pa rig cing / rang gi mtshan nyid rnam par dag par bsam gtan byed do// rigs kyi
26a6(mdo sde): bu 'di lta ste/ dper na bskal pas bsreg pa na nam mkha' mi 'tshig cing / chus 'jig pa na nam mkha' gsher bar mi 'gyur ba de bzhin du/ byang chub sems pa'i bsam gtan nam mkha' mtshungs
26a7(mdo sde): pa'ang nyon mongs pa thams cad kyis mi 'tshig cing / bsam gtan dang / rnam par thar pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / snyoms par 'jug pa thams cad la'ang ma chags pa yin no// mnyam par
26b1(mdo sde): bzhag pa'ang yin la/ sems rnam par g.yengs pa'i sems can rnams kyang shin tu 'god do// mnyam par bzhag kyang dga' ba med la/ langs nas kyang khong khro ba med pa yin no// 'phags/
26b2(mdo sde): pa'i skye bo rnams la zhi ba nye bar ston kyang 'phags pa ma yin pa'i skye bo rnams yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir/ brtson 'grus rab tu 'bar bar yang byed do// mnyam par gzhag cing mnyam pa'ang yin/
26b3(mdo sde): la/ mi mnyam par spyod pa rnams la tha dad par ston pa'ang rab tu ston to// mnyam pa nyid kyis mi mnyam pa'ang mi mthong la/ mi mnyam pas mnyam pa nyid dang 'gal bar yang mi byed do// de ni mi
26b4(mdo sde): 'gal zhing 'gal ba med pa nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa'i sems kyi bsam gtan pa zhes bya'o/ / shes rab che ba'i bsam gtan pa zhes bya'o// rnam par shes pa rab tu mi gnas pa'i bsam gtan pa
26b5(mdo sde): zhes bya'o/ / gang gis bsam gtan de ltar mngon par rtogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de bsam gtan nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa ste/ mi gnas pa'i bsam gtan yin no// de nas bcom ldan
26b6(mdo sde): 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsungs so/ / bsam gtan rnams kyi dbang po yongs su dag/ dran pa rtse gcig yid ni mnyam par gzhag gnas rnams thams cad la yang mi gnas
26b7(mdo sde): shing / / 'gro ba kun la mnyam nyid snyoms par bzhag/ nang dang phyi rol dag na gnas pa yi// phung po skye mched khams la mi gnas shing // nye bar zhi ba dben pa spyod yul te// mkhas pa de
27a1(mdo sde): ngag rtag tu mnyam par gzhag/ mnyam pa nyid kyis rtag tu mnyam bzhag pa/ chos kyi dbyings dang mnyam zhing mtshungs pa'i yod// shin tu dben pa'i sems kyang ston byed cing
27a2(mdo sde): mkhas pa bsam gtan kun la'ang mi chags so/ / 'gro ba rnams kyang yongs su smin bya'i phyir// 'chi 'pho skye ba 'chi ba nyer ston kyang // ting nge 'dzin las de dag mi nyams te// de ni sems rtogs dbang
27a3(mdo sde): gis de 'dra'o/ / gzugs med ting nge 'dzin kyang spyod yul la// sems can rnams ni yongs su smin bya'i phyir// 'dod pa'i khams su'ang rab tu snang byed do// de dag bdag dang sems can mi gan+da
27a4(mdo sde): so/ / nam mkha' dang ni mtshungs pa'i spyod yul te// sgyu ma dang yang mtshungs shing smig rgyu 'dra// rmi lam chu zla sprin gyi mtshan nyid du// chos rnams shes nas rtag tu mnyam par bzhag/ 'gro ba kun gyi
27a5(mdo sde): shes pa'i spyod yul du/ / 'gro ba rnams la sems dang blo 'jug cing // sems rgyud la ni bsgribs pa med pa ste// rang gi sems kyi rgyud kyang rab tu shes// bsam gtan rdzu 'phrul mngon shes mkhas pa
27a6(mdo sde): yis/ / zhing rnams mang po bye bar de 'gro zhing // mi shes nyon mongs thams cad spangs pa yi// rgyal ba bsam mi khyab la mchod par byed// dbang po rnams ni dul zhing zhi ba'i yid// zhi gnas pha rol
27a7(mdo sde): phyin cing mi rtog pa/ / de ni 'gro ba rnams la zhi ba'i yid// rtag tu ye shes stobs la mnyam par bzhag/ mnyam pa nyid dang mnyam pa'ang yong med la// mnyam pa nyid ces bya ba mtshan med de// mnyam
27b1(mdo sde): nyid de la gang dag rab gnas pa/ / de dag rtag tu mnyam par gzhag pa yin// rigs kyi bu ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' shes rab nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa yin zhe na/ rigs kyi bu chos bzhi dang
27b2(mdo sde): ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ nam mkha' rnam par dag pas sems can thams cad rnam par dag
27b3(mdo sde): bapar 'jug pa dang / ye shes rnam par dag pas/ rnam par shes pa thams cad rnam par dag par 'jug pa dang / chos kyi dbyings rnam par dag pas bdag dang / sems can dang / srog dang /
27b4(mdo sde): gang zag rnam par dag par 'jug pa dang / don rnam par dag pas/ yi ge thams cad rnam par dag par rab tu rtogs pa ste/ rigs kyi bu chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na/ byang chu sems dpa' shes rab
27b5(mdo sde): nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa yin no/ / rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi shes rab yongs su dag pa ni 'di brgyad de/ brgyad gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ dge ba'i chos thams cad yang dag par
27b6(mdo sde): sgrub kyang rtag par lta bar mi sbyor ba dang / mi dge ba'i chos thams cad spong bar brtson 'grus rtsom yang chad par lta bar mi ltung ba dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba la 'jug kyang mi skye ba'i bzod pa dang
27b7(mdo sde): 'gal bar mi byed pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi shes par snang yang / nges pa'i tshig gi spobs pa la mi chags pa dang / chos kyi sdom bzhi'ang ston la mi rtag pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang /
28a1(mdo sde): bdag med pa dang / zhi ba nyid du dngos po yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba dang / las dang bya ba la 'jug pa rab tu ston kyang las med cing rnam par smin pa med pa las kyang mi g.yo ba
28a2(mdo sde): dang / spros pa med pa'i chos shes pa la gnas pa yin yang / chos thams cad kyi tshig rab tu dbye ba nges par bstan pa rab tu ston pa dang / chos thams cad kyi snang ba rab tu rnyed pa yin yang / kun nas
28a3(mdo sde): nyon mongs pa dang / rnam par byang ba'ang sems can rnams la rab tu ston pa ste/ rigs kyi bu brgyad po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi shes rab yongs su dag pa'o// yang shes rab ces bya ba 'di
28a4(mdo sde): ni rnam par rtog pa kun nas 'bar ba med pa'i phyir/ nye bar zhi ba'i tshig go// rang gi mtshan nyid kyis rnam par dag pa'i phyir 'di ni mi 'gyur ba'i tshig go// gnas med pa'i phyir 'di ni rnam par mi rtog pa'i
28a5(mdo sde): tshig go/ / yang dag pa 'di ji lta ba'i phyir 'di ni ji lta ba bzhin gyi tshig go/ 'gyur ba ma yin pa'i phyir 'di ni bden pa'i tshig go// ma rung bar mi 'gyur ba'i phyir 'di ni yang dag pa'i tshig go// bcings pa yang
28a6(mdo sde): dag par gcod pa'i phyir 'di ni yid rno ba'i tshig go/ / 'phags pa'i yon tan gyi phyir 'di ni ngoms pa'i tshig go// shin tu brtags pa'i phyir 'di ni nges par 'byed pa'i tshig go// brjod du med pa'i phyir 'di
28a7(mdo sde): ni don gyi tshig go/ / khyad par med pa'i phyir 'di ni mtshungs pa ches po// mi shigs pa'i phyir 'dzin snying po'i tshig go// mi gnas pa'i phyir 'di ni ma g.yos pa'i tshig go// rab tu 'bigs pa'i phyir 'di na rdo rje
28b1(mdo sde): tshig go/ / byed pa byas pa'i phyir 'di ni sgrol pa'i tshig go// rang bzhin gyis kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa'i phyir 'di ni rnam par dag pa'i tshig go// snang ba mi dmigs pa'i phyir/ 'di ni mun pa med pa'i tshig go
28b2(mdo sde): sgro btags pa med pa'i phyir 'di ni gnyis su med pa'i tshig go/ / shin tu zab cing byang ba'i phyir 'do ni zad pa'i tshig go// 'dus ma byas pa'i phyir 'di ni mo zad pa'i tshig go// sbyar ba med pa'i phyir 'dus ma byas kyi
28b3(mdo sde): tshig go/ / shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir/ 'di ni nam mkha'i tshig go// bsgribs med pa'i phyir 'di ni nam mkha'i tshig go// gnas pa'i gnas kyi phyir 'di ni kun nas gsal byed kyi tshig go// ngo bo nyid
28b4(mdo sde): med pa'i phyir 'di ni mi dmigs pa'i tshig go/ / rnam par shes pa dang ye shes gnyis su med pa'i phyir 'di ni ye shes kyi tshig go// gnyen po med pa'i phyir 'di ni mi brdzi ba'i tshig go// mngon par ma grub
28b5(mdo sde): pa'i phyir 'di ni lus med pa'i tshig go/ / kun tu rtog pa'i sdug bsngal gyi phyir/ 'di ni yongs su shes pa'i tshig go// sred pa'i bag la nyal yang dag par bcom pa'i phyir/ 'di ni kun 'byung spangs pa'i tshig
28b6(mdo sde): go/ rab tu ma byung ba'i phyir/ 'di ni 'gog pa'i tshig go// gnyis su med pa'i lam la rab tu 'jug pa'i phyir/ 'di ni sgom pa'i tshig go// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas pas rab tu phye ba'i tshig go// rdzogs
28b7(mdo sde): pa'i sangs rgyas pas rab tu phye ba'i phyir/ 'di ni sangs rgyas kyi tshig go// rab tu 'dod chags dang bral ba'i phyir/ 'di ni chos kyi tshig ste/ gang de lta bu'i chog la 'jug pa'i ye shes snang ba gzhan gyi
29a1(mdo sde): dring la mi 'jog pa 'di ni shes rab ces bya'o/ / gang nges par bstan pa thams cad nam mkha' dang mtshungs par bstan pa'i rjes su 'gro ste/ rjes su 'gro bas chos chung ngu la'ang mi
29a2(mdo sde): rtog rnam par mi rtog pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsungs so//
29a3(mdo sde): shes rab lta dang mun pa nyon mongs gcod// rtag tu bag chags nyon mongs rab bsal cing // rgyu dang rkyen dang byed pa nges par ston// mtha' rnams thams cad yongs su gcod par byed// bdag dang sems
29a4(mdo sde): can la yang mi gnas shing / / gang zag srog la'ang rtag tu gnas pa med// dngos dang dngos med gnyis las thar byed de// shes rab pha rol 'gro bar rab tu bstan// shes rab bdud las rgyal te nyon mongs
29a5(mdo sde): med/ / shes rab chu bo las bsgral rab tu sgrol// shes rab ye shes byed cing rnam par sbyong // shes rab thar pa bde ba'i mchog kyang ston// shes rab kyis ni sgrib pa'i rtsa ba sbyong // phung po khams
29a6(mdo sde): ni yongs su shes pa'i mtshan/ / mtshan dang mtshan gzhi mtshungs mtshan grol byed pa// shes rab thob pa srid pa gsum na mdzes// yongs su dag spyod shes rab ces bya ste// 'jig rten thams
29a7(mdo sde): cad kyis ni mi gos spyod/ / spyad pa spyod pa rab tu rtogs par spyod// shes rab dag pa'i mi ni rnam par mdzes// mig lnga dag ni yongs su dag byed cing // dbang po lnga ni rab tu snang bar byed// 'gro ba lnga/
29b1(mdo sde): rnams rab tu gcod par byed// phung po lnga ni zad phyir chos ston to// pha rol tshu rol rtag tu mi gnas shing // chos kyi dbyings gnas gnas la shin tu gnas// bar snang dang ni mtshungs mnyam 'dra
29b2(mdo sde): ba ste/ / sangs rgyas ye shes rjes su 'thun zhing 'phags// rnyed dang ma rnyed gnyis ka'i mtha' las grol// dbus la rtog pa kun rtog mi rtog pa// gang na 'phags pa thams cad song ba yi// 'chi
29b3(mdo sde): ba med pa'i lam du 'jug pa ston/ / sdug bsngal shes shing de bzhin sred pa spangs// lam rnams ston cing 'gog pa'ang rab tu 'chad// bden pa shes pas shes rab 'di 'jug ste// des ni sngon gyi mtha
29b4(mdo sde): yang rab tu bcad/ / zhing rnams thams cad zhing mtshungs zhing ma yin// chos rnams thams cad chos mtshungs rab tu dben// sems can thams cad bdag med sems can mtshungs// shes rab blo spyod
29b5(mdo sde): pas ni 'di shes so/ / rigs kyi bu de la byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bsod nams nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa gang zhe na/ rigs kyi bu sangs rgyas kyi chos ni nam mkha' dang mtshungs te/ de dag ni byang
29b6(mdo sde): chub kyi sems kyi sa bon de'ang nam mkha' dang mtshungs so/ / rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' bsod nams ji snyed mngon par 'du byed pa de rang byang chub kyi sems dang mi 'bral te/ dge ba'i rtsa ba bsags
29b7(mdo sde): pa de dag kyang thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sngo bar byed cing / de dag thams cad kyang nam mkha' dang mtshungs par tshad med par rab tu gnas so// de la byang chub sems dpas 'di ltar nam mkha' tshad med pa'i
30a1(mdo sde): phyir/ bdag gis bsod nams tshad med pa mngon par 'du bya'o snyam du sems bskyed par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshad med par brtsams pas tshad med pa'i don 'phel ba yin te/
30a2(mdo sde): de la byang chub sems dpa' bsod nams kyi tshogs tshad med pa la brtson par bya'o// rigs kyi bu tshad med pa bcu po 'di dag ni/ gang byang chub sems dpas bsod nams kyi tshogs kyis yongs su rdzogs par
30a3(mdo sde): bya ba ste/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po yongs su rdzogs pas/ lus kyi rgyan tshad med pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba dang / sems can thams cad kyi rjes su song ba'i
30a4(mdo sde): dbyangs kyi dkyil 'khor rnam par dag pas/ ngag gi rgyan tshad med pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba dang / sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi rjes su 'jug pas/ sems kyi rgyan tshad med pa yongs
30a5(mdo sde): su rdzogs par bya ba dang / spyod pa dang / ye shes dang / spyod lam tshad med pas sems can yongs su smin par bya ba tshad med pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba dang / rnam pa tshad med pa rnams kyi sangs
30a6(mdo sde): rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa tshad med yongs su rdzogs par bya ba dang / bsod nams dang sems nges par rtog pa dang / spyod pa tshad med pas/ sangs rgyas kyi spyod lam tshad med pa yongs su rdzogs par
30a7(mdo sde): khya ba dang / rgyan bkod pa thams cad dang / spyod pa thams cad kyis byang chub kyi snying po'i rgyan tshad med pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba dang / gtan pa med pa'i mchod sbyin yongs su rdzogs pas/ mdzod
30b1(mdo sde): spu yongs su byang ba tshad med pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba dang / bla ma la rim gro byed cing 'dud pa tshad med pa dang / nga rgyal bcom pa tshad med pas/ dbu'i gtsug tor spyi gtsug bltar mi mthong ba tshad//
30b2(mdo sde): med pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba dang / sgyu dang g.yo med par 'ong ba dang / 'gro ba dang 'thun par 'dzin pas don yod par rnam par gnon pa tshad med pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba ste/ rigs kyi bu tshad
30b3(mdo sde): med pa bcu po de dag ni byang chub sems dpas bsod nams kyi tshogs kyis yongs su rdzogs par bya'o/ / gzhan yang rigs kyi bu nam byang chub sems dpa' sems nam mkha' dang mtshungs par gyur
