30b4(mdo sde): pa de na/ nam mkha' tshad med pas/ de'i rtsom pa thams cad kyang tshad med pas kun tu gnas te/ de bas na bsod nams nam mkha' dang mtshungs zhes bya'o// rigs kyi bu de la ji ltar na byang chub
30b5(mdo sde): sems dpa' ye shes nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa yin zhe na/ gang sems can thams cad kyi sems la ye shes des khyab par byed cing / sems can thams cad kyi sems 'dod chags dang bcas
30b6(mdo sde): pa'i sems kyang 'dod chags dang bcas pa'i sems su yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/ / zhe sdang dang bcas pa'i sems kyang zhe sdang dang bcas pa'i sems su yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du
30b7(mdo sde): rab tu shes so/ / gti mug dang bcas pa'i sems kyang gti mug dang bcas pa'i sems su yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// nye ba'i nyon mongs pa dang bcas pa'i sems kyang des nye ba'i nyon
31a1(mdo sde): mongs pa dang bcas pa'i sems su yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/ / des bdag 'dod chags med pa'i chos kyi rang bzhin las ma g.yos par sems can gzhan rnams
31a2(mdo sde): dang gang zag gzhan dag la 'dod chags 'dul ba'i phyir chos 'chad do/ / de bdag nyid zhe sdang med pa'i chos kyi rang bzhin las ma g.yos par sems can gzhan rnams dang / gang zag gzhan dag la zhe
31a3(mdo sde): sdang 'dul ba'i phyir chos 'chad do/ / de bdag nyid gti mug med pa'i chos kyi rang bzhin las ma g.yos par sems can gzhan rnams dang / gang zag gzhan dag la gti mug 'dul ba'i phyir chos 'chad do//
31a4(mdo sde): des bdag nyid nye ba'i nyon mongs pa med pa'i chos kyi rang bzhin las ma g.yos par sems can gzhan rnams dang / gang zag gzhan dag la nyon mongs pa thams cad 'dul ba'i phyir chos 'chad do// des
31a5(mdo sde): 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug gi nyon mongs pa rnam par dag par bya ba'i phyir chos 'chad do// 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug dang / nye ba'i nyon mongs pa'i sems la dman
31a6(mdo sde): par yang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong / 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug dang / nye ba'i nyon mongs pa med pa'i sems la mchog tu yang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo // de ci'i
31a7(mdo sde): phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa de gnyis su med pa'i mtha'i sgo nas chos kyi dbyings yongs su shes te/ chos kyi dbyings gang yin pa de 'dod chags kyi dbyings/ chos kyi dbyings gang yin pa
31b1(mdo sde): de zhe sdang gi dbyings/ chos kyi dbyings gang yin pa gti mug gi dbyings/ chos kyi dbyings gang yin pa de nyon mongs pa'i dbyings so// de bas na chos thams cad chos kyi dbyings su yang dag par 'du'o//
31b2(mdo sde): zhes bya ste/ chos kyi dbyings ni gar yang 'gro ba'ang med/ mi 'gro ba'ang med do// chos thams cad ni chos kyi dbyings kyi rjes su song ste/ gang bdag gi dbyings shes pa des chos kyi dbyings
31b3(mdo sde): kyang shes so/ / de ltar na chos kyi dbyings dang bdag gi dbyings de dag mi gnyis so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ bdag rnam par dag pas chos kyi dbyings kyang rnam par dag go// de bzhin du chos thams cad
31b4(mdo sde): kyang rnam par dag pa ste/ gang rnam par dag pa de rab tu snang ba'o// gang rab tu snang ba de bla gab med pa'o// gang bla gab med pa de la mtshan ma thams cad kyi skabs med do// gang mtshan ma med pa de la gan/
31b5(mdo sde): pa gang yang med de/ mi gnas pa ni nam mkha' 'o// gang de ltar ye shes kyi rjes su 'gro zhing ye shes des chos thams cad kyi rjes su 'gro ba de ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i ye shes nam mkha' dang mtshungs
31b6(mdo sde): pa'o/ / rnga rigs kyi bu de la byang chub sems dpa'i sangs rgyas kyis gnang ba'i sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa gang zhe na/ gang tshul khrims las sangs rgyas rjes su dram zhing / zag pa med pa'i tshul khrims
31b7(mdo sde): las kyang mi nyams pa'o/ / ting nge 'dzin las sangs rgyas rjes su dran zhing / chos kyi dbyings mnyam pa thams cad las kyang mi 'gyur ba'o// shes rab las sangs rgyas rjes su dran zhing /
32a1(mdo sde): chos thams cad rgyu ba med par yang rnam par mi rtog pa'o// rnam par grol ba las sangs rgyas rjes su dran zhing / sems gnyis la'ang mi gnas pa'o// rnam par grol
32a2(mdo sde): ba ye shes mthong ba las sangs rgyas rjes su dran zhing shes pa thams cad la'ang mi chags pa'o/ / stobs las sangs rgyas rjes su dran zhing / dus gsum mtshungs pa'i ye shes las kyang mi
32a3(mdo sde): g.yo ba'o/ / mi 'jigs pa las sangs rgyas rjes su dran zhing / zag pa thams cad dang lhan cig tu'ang mi gnas pa'o// sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyang sangs rgyas rjes su dran zhing / chos kyi
32a4(mdo sde): dbyings mnyam pa nyid du'ang rnam par mi rtog pa'o/ / gzhan yang sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa ni gang / gzugs las sangs rgyas yang dag pa rjes su mi mthong la/ gzugs kyi ngo bo nyid shes pas/
32a5(mdo sde): dran pa'i ye shes kyi rjes su'ang 'gro ba'o// de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa las sangs rgyas yang dag pa rjes su mi mthong la/ rnam par shes pa'i
32a6(mdo sde): ngo bo nyid shes pas dran pa'i ye shes kyi rjes su'ang 'gro ba'o/ / phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched rnams las sangs rgyas yang dag par rjes su mi mthong la/ phung po dang / khams dang /
32a7(mdo sde): skye mched kyi ngo bo nyid shes pas/ dran pa'i ye shes kyi rjes su'ang 'gro ba'o// gang yang chos thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid shes pas/ shes rab che ba'i dran pa de ni yid la byed pa thams cad med de/
32b1(mdo sde): lta ba thams cad kun nas ldang ba med pa'o// gang de lta bu'i rnyog pa med pa'i dran pas/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa shes pa de ni/ sangs rgyas kyis gnang ba'i sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa zhes bya'o//
32b2(mdo sde): gzhan yang sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa ni/ gang spyod lam thams cad du sangs rgyas la mngon par chags par mi byed/ 'greng ba dang / 'chags pa dang / 'dug pa dang / nyal ba dang / 'gro ba
32b3(mdo sde): dang 'ong ba dang / spa ba dang / mi smra bar yang sangs rgyas la mngon par chags par mi byed do// de mngon par ma chags pas dran pa'ang dran par mi byed/ mi dran pa'ang dran par mi byed do//
32b4(mdo sde): de dran pa yid la mi byed pas/ gzugs dang / mtshan dang / chos nyid du'ang sangs rgyas rjes su mi dran no// rigs kyi bu 'di ni sangs rgyas kyis gnang ba'i sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa ste
32b5(mdo sde): gang la mtshan ma dang dmigs pa thams cad kun tu spyod pa med pa'o/ / rigs kyi bu de la byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyis gnang ba'i chos rjes su dran pa gang zhe na/ chos zhes bya
32b6(mdo sde): ba ni 'dod chags med pa'o/ / de la gang chos ci la chags kyang rung / de dag la chos rjes su dran pa gang yang med do// chos zhes bya ba ni kun gzhi med pa'o// de la gang chos gang la sbyor ba de
32b7(mdo sde): dag la chos rjes su dran pa gang yang med do/ / chos zhes bya ba ni nye bar zhi ba ste/ gang sems dang yid 'bar bar byed pa de dag la chos rjes su dran pa gang yang med do// chos zhes bya ba ni mtshan
33a1(mdo sde): ma med pa ste/ gang mtshan ma'i rjes su 'brang ba'i rnam par shes pa de dag la chos rjes su dran pa gang yang med do// chos zhes bya ba ni 'dus ma byas pa ste/ gang 'dus
33a2(mdo sde): byas su rab tu bzhag pa la gnas pa de dag la chos rjes su dran pa gang yang med do/ / yang chos rjes su dran pa ni gang gis 'du byed thams cad skye ba med par mthong ste/ yang dag pa nyid skyon med pa la
33a3(mdo sde): 'jug pa'o/ / byang chub sems dpas chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis ma skyes par rig nas/ mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa rab tu 'thob bo// gang de lta bu'i gnas ni yang dag pa'i chos kyis gnas so//
33a4(mdo sde): gang gis de ltar mngon par rtogs pa de ni/ chos thams cad mngon par rtogs pa ste/ 'di ni slob pa dang / mi slob pa dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang / yang dag par
33a5(mdo sde): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis mngon par rtogs pa'o/ / de ltar mnyam par bzhag pa ni/ 'phags pa thams cad kyi rnam par grol ba ste/ de la chos gang yang kun tu spyod pa med do// chos gang
33a6(mdo sde): yang kun tu spyod pa med pa de ni/ sangs rgyas kyis gnang ba'i chos rjes su dran pa'o// rigs kyi bu de la byang chub sems dpa'i sangs rgyas kyis gnang ba'i dge 'dun rjes su dran pa gang zhe na/ dge
33a7(mdo sde): 'dun zhes bya ba ni 'dus ma byas pa skyed de/ mngon par 'du byed pas rjes su dran par mi nus so// gang na lus kyi las dang / ngag gi las dang / yid kyi las kun tu spyod pa med pa de ni mngon par
33b1(mdo sde): 'du mi byed pa zhes bya'o/ / de la 'dus byas zhes bya ba ni gdags pa dang tha snyad do// 'dus ma byas pa ni gdags pa thams cad yang dag par 'jom pa'o// tha snyad thams cad las yang dag par 'das pa
33b2(mdo sde): ste/ rigs kyi bu 'di ni sangs rgyas kyis gnang ba'i dge 'dun rjes su dran pa'o// rigs kyi bu de la byang chub sems dpa'i sangs rgyas kyis gnang ba'i gtong ba rjes su dran pa gang zhe na/ gtong ba zhes bya
33b3(mdo sde): ba ni phung po thams cad 'dor zhing rab tu gtong ba'o/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ des chos gang yang btang ba med do// 'di ltar de la gang gtong ba'i chos gang yang snang bar mi 'gyur te/ 'di la gang chos
33b4(mdo sde): thams cad mi 'dzin pa de ni gtong ba'i mchog go/ gang 'dzin pa de ni mi gtong ngo // gang mi gtong ba de ni mi snyems so// gang mi snyems pa de ni dmigs par mi byed do// dmigs par mi byed pa
33b5(mdo sde): de la sems rgyu ba med do/ / rgyu ba med pa ni sems kyis rnam par rig pa med pa'o// gang la sems kyis rnam par rig pa med pa de ni rnam par shes pa mi gnas pa'o// rnam par shes pa mi gnas
33b6(mdo sde): pa de ni sangs rgyas gnang ba'i gtong ba rjes su dran pa'o/ / gang yang byang chub sems dpa'i gtong ba de ni thams cad mkhyen par bsngos pa ste/ gang thams cad mkhyen pa ni chos thams cad kyi mnyam pa
33b7(mdo sde): nyid do/ / gang mnyam pa nyid la gnas pa ni rab tu gtong zhing byang chub tu'angasngo ste/ de rjes su dran yang chos gang yang rjes su dran pa med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ thams cad mkhyen pa ni chos dang /
34a1(mdo sde): chos ma yin pa gnyis dang ldan pa ma yin te/ gang 'di gnyis su med pa de la yid byed pa ci'ang med do// rigs kyi bu de ltar chos shes pa la rab tu sbyor ba'i byang chub
34a2(mdo sde): sems dpa' ni sangs rgyas kyis gnang ba'i gtong ba rjes su dran pa yin no/ / rigs kyi bu de la byang chub sems dpa'i sangs rgyas kyis gnang ba'i tshul khrims rjes su dran pa gang zhe na/ tshul khrims zhes
34a3(mdo sde): bya ba ni 'dus ma byas pa ste/ zag pa med pa/ smon lam med pa/ lhun gyis grub pa/ brtul zhugs grub pa/ brtul zhugs thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa ste/ rnam par rig pa'i mtshan nyid
34a4(mdo sde): ma yin no/ / ting nge 'dzin gyi gnas te/ sems kyi dmigs pa'i gnas ma yin no// shes rab kyi rtsa ba ste/ spros pa'i mtshan nyid ma yin no// rnam par grol ba'i rgyu 'thun pa ste/ gnyis kyis
34a5(mdo sde): rab tu phye ba ma yin no/ / mkhas pas rab tu bsngags pa ste/ gzugs snang ba ma yin no// nyon mongs pa zhi ba ste/ so so rnam par rig pa'i mtshan nyid ma yin no// bde ba thams cad kyi rjes
34a6(mdo sde): su 'gro zhing gnyen pos bskyed pa ma yin te/ gang de lta bu'i tshul khrims rjes su dran zhing dran pa la rnyog pa med pa de ni rigs kyi bu gnang ba'i tshul khrims rjes su dran pa zhes bya'o// rigs kyi bu de la byang
34a7(mdo sde): chub sems dpa'i sangs rgyas kyis gnang ba'i lha rjes su dran pa gang zhe na/ lha'i ris gnyis rjes su dran par bya ste/ gnyis gang zhe na/ gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha dang / skye ba gcig gis thogs
34b1(mdo sde): pa'i byang chub sems dpa' dga' ldan gnas na 'khod pa rnams so/ / de la byang chub sems dpas gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha rnams rjes su dran no// yang skye ba gcig gis thogs pa'i byang chub
34b2(mdo sde): sems dpa' dga' ldan gnas na gang dag 'khod pa de dag ni spyi bo lta bu bcus rjes su dran te/ bcu gang zhe na/ pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad kyi nang na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa spyi bor gyur pa dang /
34b3(mdo sde): mngon par shes pa thams cad kyi nang na/ mi nyams pa'i mngon par shes pa dang / sa thams cad kyi nang na dbang bskur ba'i sa dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos thams cad kyi nang na/ yang dag pa'i lta ba
34b4(mdo sde): dang ting nge 'dzin mi nyams pa dang / so so yang dag pa'i nang na don dang / spobs pa rgyun mi 'chad pa dang / shes pa thams cad kyi nang na/ chags pa med pa'i ye shes la 'jug pa dang / dbang po tham
34b5(mdo sde): cad kyi nang na rab 'bring tha ma la 'jug pa shes pa dang / stobs dang mi 'jigs pa la snang ba'i ye shes rjes su 'gro ba dang / spyan thams cad kyi nang na/ sangs rgyas kyi spyan kun tu gzigs pa dang /
34b6(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad 'di dag gi lag mthil du song ba ltar 'dug pa dang / byang chub kyi snying po la 'dug nas sems kyi skad cig gcig dang ldan pa'i shes rab kyis mngon par rdzogs par byang chub
34b7(mdo sde): pa'o zhes spyi bo'i/ / chos rnam pa bcu po de dag gis rjes su dran no// de'i dran pa de ni lta bas ma 'khrugs/ bag la nyal dang / kun nas ldang bas ma 'khrugs/ yid la byed pas ma 'khrugs/
35a1(mdo sde): spros pas ma 'khrugs pa ste/ de lta bu'i dran pa rnyog pa med pas/ lha rjes su dran pa 'di ni rigs kyi bu sangs rgyas kyis gnang ba'i lha rjes su dran pa zhes bya'o// rigs kyi bu
35a2(mdo sde): de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' mya ngan las 'das pa dang / mnyam pa nyid thob kyang / byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa'ang spyod pa yin zhe na/ mya ngan las 'das pa zhes bya ba ni nyon mongs pa thams
35a3(mdo sde): cad rab tu zhi ba ste/ tshor ba thams cad rgyun bcad pa/ dmigs pa thams cad zhi ba/ phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched rnams kyi nying mtshams sbyor ba med pa ste/ skyes bu dam pa de mya ngan las
35a4(mdo sde): 'das pa dang mnyam pa nyid thob cing sngon gnas bcas pa'i snying rje chen po dang / thabs dang / shes rab dang / ye shes kyis ni rnam par rol/ sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis shin tu byin gyis brlabs/
35a5(mdo sde): shes rab dang ye shes ni shin tu bsgoms/ sngon gyi byin gyi rlabs kyis ni bsam pa yongs su dag pa/ sgyu mas rnam par rol pa'i ting nge 'dzin la ni gnas te/ nyon mongs pa gang gis 'khor ba rab tu bskyed
35a6(mdo sde): pa'i 'khor bar 'ching ba de dag rab tu spangs shing / ye shes gang gis mya ngan las 'das par ston pa de la dbang thob pas mi skye ba las skye zhing mi 'byung ba las 'byung ba ste/ mya ngan las 'das pa dang
35a7(mdo sde): mnyam pa nyid du yang dag par zhugs kyang / sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'ang mi 'chad do// de ni rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi phrugs su tshang ba zhes bya ba'i ye shes kyi sgo ste/ ye
35b1(mdo sde): shes kyi sgo gang la gnas pas/ byang chub sems dpa' mya ngan las 'das pa dang mnyam pa nyid thob kyang / byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'o// rigs kyi bu de la ji ltar na byang chub sems
35b2(mdo sde): dpa' sems can thams cad kyi spyod pa'i mtshan nyid dang / cho ga shes pa yin zhe na/ rigs kyi bu sems can rnams kyi spyod pa ni brgyad khri bzhi stong ste/ 'di ni sdom gyi rtsa ba'i tshig go// gang yang sems
35b3(mdo sde): can thams cad kyi spyod pa tshad med pa/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa/ brjod du med pa de sangs rgyas kyi ye shes kyis mkhyen te/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi ye shes kyis mi rig/ byang chub sems dpa'i
35b4(mdo sde): ye shes kyis mi rig pa de la/ byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs dang / rang gi shes pas sems can thams cad kyi spyod pa'i mtshan nyid kyi rjes su rab tu 'jug ste/ spyod pa de'i gang
35b5(mdo sde): ngo bo nyid dam/ gang mtshan nyid kyang rung ste/ rgyu'i mtshan nyid dam/ rkyen gyi mtshan nyid dam/ byed rgyu'i mtshan nyid dam/ tshogs pa'i mtshan nyid dam/ tha dad pa'i mtshan nyid dam/ mi 'dra
35b6(mdo sde): ba'i mtshan nyid dam/ 'dod chags kyi mtshan nyid dam/ zhe sdang gi mtshan nyid dam/ gti mug gi mtshan nyid dam/ skal ba mnyam pa'i mtshan nyid dam/ sems can dmyal ba'i mtshan
35b7(mdo sde): nying dam/ dud 'gro skye gnas kyi mtshan nyid dam/ gshin rje'i 'jig rten gyi mtshan nyid dam/ lha'i mtshan nyid dam/ mi'i mtshan nyid dam/ nyan thos kyi nges par 'gyur ba'i mtshan
36a1(mdo sde): nyid dam/ rang sangs rgyas kyi nges par 'gyur ba'i mtshan nyid dam/ sangs rgyas kyi nges par 'gyur ba'i mtshan nyid dam/ ring po'i rgyu'i mtshan nyid dam/ bar ba'i rgyu
36a2(mdo sde): mtshan nyid dam/ nye ba'i rgyu'i mtshan nyid kyang rung ste/ spyod pa de dag thams cad kyi mtshan nyid yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes te/ ye shes thams cad la kha na ma tho ba med pa yin no//
36a3(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems can thams cad kyi spyod pa'i mtshan nyid dang cho ga shes pa yin no// rigs kyi bu de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
36a4(mdo sde): bdag gi chos dkon mchog gi mdzod 'dzin pa yin zhe na/ rigs kyi bu sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bdag gi chos dkon mchog gi mdzod ni mi zad pa ste/ sems can thams cad kyi spyod pa'i mtshan
36a5(mdo sde): nyid la rab tu 'jug pa ji snyed pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi chos dkon mchog gi mdzod la gzung ba'i ye shes la 'jug pa'ang de snyed do/ / ji ltar sems can gyi spyod pa mi zad cing mtha'
36a6(mdo sde): med pa de bzhin du/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi chos dkon mchog gi mdzod kyang mi zad cing mtha' med pa'o// chos dkon mchog gi mdzod ces bya ba ni/ gang gi nub mo de bzhin gshes
36a7(mdo sde): bas byang chub brnyes pa nas/ gang gi nub mo yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa de'i bar du/ de bzhin gshegs pas bshad pa dang / 'chad pa dang / 'chad par 'gyur ba de thams cad ni de
36b1(mdo sde): bzhin no/ / ma nor ba de bzhin no// gzhan ma yin pa'o// tsa'i phyir de bzhimanas bya zhe na/ de bzhin nyid ni bra la yang dag par zhugs pas de'i phyir de bzhin zhes bya'o// tsa'i phyir nas nor pa
36b2(mdo sde): de bzhin nyid ces bya zhe na/ don dam pa'i bden pa la yang dag par zhugs pa de'i phyir ma nor ba de bzhin zhes bya'o// ci'i phyir na gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid ces bya zhe na/ de dag gi ngo bo nyid
36b3(mdo sde): ma yin par gzhan du mi btsal te/ de'i phyir gzhan ma yin pa'o// yang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi chos dkon mchog gi mdzod ni/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi
36b4(mdo sde): khams gtogs pa'i sems can rnams mang du thos pa kun dga' bo lta bur gyur kyang / de dag thams cad kyis bskal pa bye ba phrag stong du'ang yi ge khong du chud par mi nus so// yang don gcig
36b5(mdo sde): tu bstan te/ ji lta ba bzhin du bstan pa 'di lta bu ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi chos dkon mchog gi mdzod do// de byang chub sems dpa' rnams 'dzin te/ ji ltar yi ge thams
36b6(mdo sde): cad mi brjed cing / don thams cad mi nyams par sems can thams cad mgu bar byed/ sangs rgyas thams cad rab tu mnyes par byed/ bdud thams cad pham par byed/ mu stegs can
36b7(mdo sde): gzhan thams cad tshar gcod/ nyon mongs pa thams cad zhi bar byed cing de dag la chos dkon mchog rab tu klog pa de ltar 'dzin to// rigs kyi bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas
37a1(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi chos dkon mchog gi mdzod 'dzin pa yin no/ / yang rigs kyi bu chos gang gi ngo bo nyid du ngas chos rnams mngon par sangs rgyas pa de'i ngo bo nyid du/
37a2(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpas chos rnams gzung bar bya'o// yang ji lta bur de bzhin gshegs pas chos rnams mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas she na/ yongs su ma grub pa'i tshul gyis sgyu ma'i ngo bo
37a3(mdo sde): nyid dang / yul las shin tu 'das pa'i tshul gyis rmi lam gyi ngo bo nyid dang / shin tu skye ba med pa'i tshul gyis smig rgyu'i ngo bo nyid dang / mi 'pho ba'i tshul gyis migayor gyi ngo bo nyid dang / rang
37a4(mdo sde): bzhin med pa'i tshul gyis gzugs brnyan gyi ngo bo nyid dang / rag las pa'i tshul gyis stong pa'i ngo bo nyid dang / rnam par mi rtog pa'i tshul gyis mtshan ma med pa'i ngo bo nyid dang / sems
37a5(mdo sde): chags pa med pa'i tshul gyis smon pa med pa'i ngo bo nyid dang / 'dod chags thams cad dang bral ba'i tshul gyis 'dod chags pa'i ngo bo nyid dang / grangs thams cad las 'das pa'i tshul gyis 'dus
37a6(mdo sde): ma byas pa'i ngo bo nyid du/ de ltar rigs kyi bu tha snyad du gzhan gyi rnam par rig pa la brten nas/ de 'dra bar chos de ngas mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te/ gang chos de'i ngo bo nyid kyi mtshan
37a7(mdo sde): nyid de ni tshig gis brjod par mi nus so/ / de la chos rnams 'dzin par 'dod pa'i byang chub sems dpas de lta bu'i ngo bo nyid kyi chos rnams mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par byas te/ yi ge dang
37b1(mdo sde): nges pa'i tshig gos kyang sems can gzhan rnams dang / gang zag gzhan dag la bstan par bya'o// rigs kyi bu de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' thog ma nas sems can rnam par dag pas
37b2(mdo sde): sems can rnams yongs su smin par byed ce na/ rigs kyi bu sems can gyi khams ni thog ma nas rnam par dag pa ste/ de la sems can rnams kyi rtsa ba'i dngos po med de/ byang chub sems
37b3(mdo sde): dpa' chos thams cad kyi rtsa ba yongs su chad par rig nas/ sems can gang rnams yongs su smin par byed pa de la bdag tu lta bar mi 'gyur/ sems can du lta bar ma yin/ srog tu lta bar
37b4(mdo sde): ma yin/ gang zag tu lta bar yang mi 'gyur ro// de'ang 'di snyam du sems te/ sems can zhes bya ba 'di ni phyin ci log ste/ rgyur lta ba'i kun nas dkris pa dang / ma rig pa dang / srid pa dang /
37b5(mdo sde): sred pa 'dus pa dang / yang dag pa ma yin pa kun tu rtog pa las sems can zhes brjod snyam mo// de la byang chub sems dpas med pa phyin ci log las byung ba'i nyon mongs pa rab tu spang ba'i
37b6(mdo sde): phyir/ sems can rnams la chos ston te/ dngos po gang yang chud mi gzon to// sems can med cing sems can dben pas sems can rnams yongs su smin par byed de/ de ltar byang
37b7(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' thog ma nas rnam par dag pas sems can rnams yongs su smin par byed do/ / rigs kyi bu de ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' tshul bzhin la rab tu sbyor bas sangs rgyas kyi
38a1(mdo sde): chos thams cad yang dag par sgrub ce na/ tshul bzhin zhes bya ba ni rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba la 'byung ba'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rgyu dang rkyen ci 'dra ba de 'dra bar 'bras bu ma
38a2(mdo sde): par grub bo/ / sbyin pa ni longs spyod chen po'i rgyu ste/ de la byang chub sems dpa' gang gtong ba de'ang thams cad mkhyen par bsngos nas/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do//
38a3(mdo sde): tshul khrims ni lha dang mir skye ba'i rgyu ste/ lha dang mir skyes nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems can rnams tshul khrims la rab tu 'dzud de/ tshul khrims yang dag par bzung ba de'ang thams cad
38a4(mdo sde): mkhyen par bsngos nas/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do// bzod pa dang nges pa ni lus dang / ngag dang / sems kyi rgyan gyi rgyu ste/ lus dang / ngag dang /
38a5(mdo sde): sems brgyan pas/ byang chub sems dpa' bdag la phan pa dang / gzhan la phan par zhugs pa yin te/ phan par 'dod pa/ bzod pa'i gnas de'ang thams cad mkhyen par bsngos nas/
38a6(mdo sde): bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do// brtson 'grus ni sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad sdud pa'i rgyu ste/ byang chub sems dpa' brtson 'grus brtsams nas/ dge ba'i rtsa ba
38a7(mdo sde): thams cad yang dag par sgrub cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad yang dag par sgrub pa'i brtson 'grus de'ang thams cad mkhyen par bsngos nas/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par
38b1(mdo sde): byed do/ / bsam gtan ni sems dga' ba dang cang shes pa'i rgyu ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dga' ba dang cang shes pas zhi gnas kyi tshogs kun tu skong ste/ zhi gnas kyi tshogs de'ang thams
38b2(mdo sde): cad mkhyen par bsngos nas/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do// thos pa ni shes rab chen po'i rgyu ste/ byang chub sems dpa' shes rab chen po ni dmigs par lta ba mi
38b3(mdo sde): 'dzin cing / dmigs pa med pa'i thos pa de'ang thams cad mkhyen par bsngos nas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do// de bzhin du dge ba'i chos thams cad de
38b4(mdo sde): dge ba'i chos kyi rgyu gang dang gang bsags pa de dang de'i 'bras bu lhun gyis grub pas mngon par skye bar 'gyur te/ rgyu dang rkyen de ni tshul bzhin yid la byed pa zhes bya'o// gzhan yang tshul bzhin zhes bya
38b5(mdo sde): ba la chos thams cad kyi tshul bzhin ni bdag yin te/ ji ltar bdag la bdag med pa de bzhin du/ sems can thams cad la bdag med do// ji ltar bdag stong pa de bzhin du/ chos thams
38b6(mdo sde): cad stong ngo / / ji ltar bdag ming du btags pa tsam du zad pa de bzhin du/ chos thams cad kyang ming du btags pa tsam du zad do// de ltar tshul bzhin la rab tu sbyor ba'i byang chub sems dpa'
38b7(mdo sde): noni chos thams cad mnyam par sbyor ro/ / gang chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid de ni sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid de/ de ltar tshul bzhin la sbyor ba'i byang chub sems dpa' ni sangs rgyas
39a1(mdo sde): kyi chos rnams yang dag par sgrub bo/ / rigs kyi bu de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' mngon par shes pa las ma nyams shing / chos thams cad la dbang byed pa yin zhe na/
39a2(mdo sde): de la rigs kyi bu dge sbyong ngam/ bram ze 'jig tshogs la lta ba ma bcom pas mngon par shes pa bskyed pa de dag ni/ mngon par shes pa rnams las nyams par yang 'gyur ro// yang byang chub sems
39a3(mdo sde): dpa' ni 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i rtsa ba las byung ba'i lta bar gyur pa drug cu rtsa gnyis yang dag par bcom nas/ lta ba dang len pa thams cad med par mngon par shes pa skyed de/ ye shes dang ldan/
39a4(mdo sde): shes rab dang ldan/ blo dang ldan/ bzod pa dang ldan/ tshul khrims dang ldan te/ ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs shing / lus dben/ sems dben te/ 'di 'dra ba'i ye shes kyis nad
39a5(mdo sde): nye bar zhi zhing phyi rol du mi rgyu ba/ yul med pa'i yul can/ cang shes pa'i sems dang ldan pa/ dga' ba'i sems dang ldan pa/ shin tu brtags pas brtags pa/ rab tu dkar ba'i blo/
39a6(mdo sde): nyon mongs pas ma 'khrugs pa/ snang ba thob pa/ ye shes rab rib med pa/ bsod nams kyi tshogs bsags pa/ ye shes kyi tshogs bsags pa/ zhi gnas kyi tshogs bsags pa
39a7(mdo sde): lhag mthong gi tshogs bsags pa/ sbyin pas brtan pa/ tshul khrims kyis brgyan pa/ bzod pa'i go gyon pa/ brtson 'grus kyi ya lang bgos pa/ bsam gtan la gnas pa/ shes
39b1(mdo sde): rab shin tu bsgoms pa'i blo dang ldan pa/ byams pas rjes su 'thun pa/ snying rje la rab tu gnas pa/ thabs kyis mngon par bsgrubs pa de lta bu'i chos dang ldan pas mngon par shes pa skyed de/
39b2(mdo sde): byang chub kyi snying po'i bar du mngon par shes pa de dag gis shin tu 'phags shing / de mngon par shes pa de dag gis chos thams cad la dbang byed pa yin te/ gzugs thams cad mthong /
39b3(mdo sde): thams cad thos/ sems can thams cad la 'jug cing bskal pa grangs med pa rjes su dran te/ rdzu 'phrul thams cad kyis rnam par 'phrul/ zag pa zad pa'i bde ba rnyed cing yid kyi rnam par rtog
39b4(mdo sde): pa ji snyed pa la rnam par rtog pa dang / rnam par dpyod pa thams cad la dbang byed pa yin te/ des chos thams cad la de bzhin du lhun gyis grub par gnas so// rigs kyi bu de ltar na byang chub sem
39b5(mdo sde): dpa' mngon par shes pa las mi nyams shing chos thams cad la dbang byed pa yin no/ / rigs kyi bu de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi tshul zab mo la rab tu zhugs shing / nyan thos dang
39b6(mdo sde): rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis rtogs par dka' ba yin zhe na/ rigs kyi bu zab mo zhes bya ba ni rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'o// rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i tshul ni 'di lta ste/ ma rig pa'i
39b7(mdo sde): rkyen gyis 'du byed/ 'du byed kyi rkyen gyis rnam par shes pa/ rnam par shes pa'i rkyen gyis ming dang gzugs/ ming dang gzugs kyi rkyen gyis skye mched drug/ skye mched drug gi rkyen gyis
40a1(mdo sde): reg pa reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba/ tshor ba'i rkyen gyis sred pa/ sred pa'i rkyen gyis len pa/ len pa'i rkyen gyis srid pa/ srid pa'i rkyen gyis skye ba/ skye ba'i rkyen gyis
40a2(mdo sde): rga shi dang / mya ngan dang / smre sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba dang / 'khrug pa rnams 'byung bar 'gyur te/ de ltar sdug bsngal gyi phung po chen po 'di 'ba' zhig 'byung
40a3(mdo sde): bar 'gyur ro/ / sems can rnams kun nas nyon mongs par 'gyur ba'i rgyu dang rkyen gang yin pa de la byang chub sems dpa'i ye shes rab tu 'jug ste/ de ni rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba kun 'byung ba'i tshul
40a4(mdo sde): zhes bya'o/ / de la rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba 'gog pa'i tshul gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ ma rig pa 'gags pas 'du byed 'gag/ 'du byed 'gags pas rnam par shes pa 'gag/ rnam par shes pa
40a5(mdo sde): 'gags pas ming dang gzugs 'gag/ ming dang gzugs 'gags pas skye mched drug 'gag/ skye mched drug 'gags pas reg pa 'gag/ reg pa 'gags pas tshor ba 'gag/ tshor ba
40a6(mdo sde): 'gags pas sred pa 'gag/ sred pa 'gags pas len pa 'gag/ len pa 'gags pas srid pa 'gag/ srid pa 'gags pas skye ba 'gag/ skye ba 'gags pas rga shi dang / mya ngan dang
40a7(mdo sde): smre sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba dang / 'khrug pa rnams 'gag ste/ de ltar sdug bsngal gyi phung po chen po 'di 'ba' zhig 'gag par 'gyur ro// de ni rigs kyi
40b1(mdo sde): bu rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba 'gog pa'i tshul zhes bya'o/ / sems can rnams rnam par dag par 'gyur ba'i rgyu gang rkyen gang yin pa de la byang chub sems dpa'i ye shes rab tu 'jug ste/ de ni chos
40b2(mdo sde): kyi tshul zab mo la 'jug pa zhes bya ste/ gang nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis ma yin pa'o// de ci'i phyir nyin thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis ma yin zhe na/ sems can thams cad
40b3(mdo sde): kyi kun nas nyon mongs pa dang / rnam par byang ba shes pa ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi yul lo// rang gi ye shes dang / sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis byang chub sems dpa' kyang de'i
40b4(mdo sde): mtshams sbyor ba shes so/ / gzhan yang zab mo zhes bya ba ni/ 'jig tshogs dang / bdag rnam par dag pa dang / chos thams cad rnam par dag pa'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'jig tshogs ni
40b5(mdo sde): kun tu btsal kyang mi dmigs so/ / gang mi dmigs pa de ni zab mo'o// bdag ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyis kyang ma brnyes so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ bdag thog ma nas kyang rnam par dag ste/
40b6(mdo sde): ji ltar bdag rnam par dag pa de bzhin du/ chos thams cad rnam par dag go/ de ci'i phyir rnam par dag pa zhes bya zhe na/ de la chos gang yang ma skyes ma bskyed/ mi 'gag/ ma 'gags pa
40b7(mdo sde): ste/ de bas na rnam par dag pa zhes bya'o// mun pa med pa/ snang ba med pa/ kun gni med pa/ rab rib med pa/ don dam pa zab mo gang la mig med cing mig 'gog pa med pa nas/
41a1(mdo sde): yid kyi bar du med cing yid 'gog pa med ste/ de ni yul du bgrang ba ma yin no// gang yul ma yin zhing yul med pa de ni don dam pa ste/ de'i phyir zab mo zhes bya'o// de la
41a2(mdo sde): sems dang yid 'dzin pa med de/ rtogs par dka' ba/ mthong bar dka' ba/ khong du chud par dka' ba de lta bu'i chos tshul zab mo la ye shes gzhan gyi dring la mi 'jog cing / sems can
41a3(mdo sde): gzhan la'ang rab tu ston te/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa'i chos kyi tshul zab mo la rab tu zhugs pa/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis gting dpag dka' ba yin no// /
41a4(mdo sde): 'jagra pa nam ma bA mdzed kyi mdobam po gsum pa/ rigs kyi bu de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba la 'jug pa'i shes pa la mkhas te/ mtha' gnyis su lta ba
41a5(mdo sde): thams cad dang bral ba yin zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyam du sems te/ gang brten pa de ni ci'ang ma yin pa/ gang brten pa de ni dngos po med pa/ gang brten pa de ni
41a6(mdo sde): yongs su ma grub pa/ gang brten cing 'brel par 'byung ba de ni mi rtag pa/ sdug bsngal ba/ bdag med pa/ zhi ba/ gang brten pa de la ni bdag med/ sems can med/ srog med
41a7(mdo sde): gso ba med/ skyes bu med/ gang zag med/ shed las skyes med/ shed bu med/ gang brten pa de la ni yang dag par 'byung ba gang yang med/ gang brten pa de la ni ci'ang med pa/ rtsol
41b1(mdo sde): ba med pa/ stong pa/ mtshan ma med pa/ dben pa/ rgyu ba med pa/ ma spros pa/ spros pa med pa ste/ de'i phyir skye ba na chos kho na skye/ 'gag pa na chos kho na 'gag ste/ 'di la
41b2(mdo sde): bdag gam/ sems can nam/ srog gam/ gso ba 'am/ skyes bu 'am/ gang zag gam/ shed las skyes sam/ shed bu med ces bya'o// chos gang dag rten cing 'brel/
41b3(mdo sde): par 'byung ba de dag la ni skye ba ci'ang med cing bdag po med de/ de'i phyir chos thams cad ni rtswa dang / shing dang / rtsig pa dang / lam dang / mig yor lta bu zhes bya ste/ ji ltar phyi rol
41b4(mdo sde): gyi dngos po rnams skye ba na/ skyed par byed pa med/ 'gag pa na'ang 'gog par byed pa med pa de bzhin du/ nang gi chos rnams skye ba na'ang skyed par byed pa med/ 'gag pa na'ang 'gog par byed pa
41b5(mdo sde): med de/ gzhan du na rkyen rnams yod na 'byung gi/ rkyen ma tshang na 'gog go snyam du sems te/ de ltar shes pa la sbyor ba ni mthar lta ba thams cad rab tu spong ngo // de la mthar lta ba gang zhe na/
41b6(mdo sde): mtha' zhes bya ba ni chad pa dang rtag pa ste/ gang de mi skyed cing rnam par mi 'jig pa ni chad pa dang / rtag pa dang bral ba ste/ de'i phyir dag pas na mthar lta ba thams cad rnam par dag pa ste/ rigs kyi
41b7(mdo sde): khu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba la 'jug pa'i shes pa la mkhas te/ mthar lta ba thams cad dang bral yin no// rigs kyi bu de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' de
42a1(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag rgyas btab pas/ de bzhin nyid du dbyer med pa shes pa la mkhas pa yin zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag rgyas btab pa zhes bya ba la de bzhin
42a2(mdo sde): nyid dbyer med pa de ni phyag rgya ste/ bye ba med pa/ 'jug pa med pa/ mngon par zhen pa med pa/ mi bskyod pa/ bskyod par bya ba ma yin pa ste/ lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i
42a3(mdo sde): 'jig rten gyis bskyod par mi nus so/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten ni phyag rgya des btab pa nyid do// de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag rgya de ni shin tu
42a4(mdo sde): mi skye ba'i phyag rgya/ shin tu stong pa nyid kyi phyag rgya/ shin tu mtshan ma med pa'i phyag rgya/ shin tu smon pa med pa'i phyag rgya/ shin tu 'dus ma byas pa'i phyag rgya/ shin tu 'dod chags dang bral
42a5(mdo sde): ba'i phyag rgya/ shin tu de bzhin nyid kyi phyag rgya/ shin tu yang dag pa'i mtha'i phyag rgya/ shin tu nam mkha'i phyag rgya ste/ dper na nam mkha' la rgya mi snang ba de bzhin du/ de bzhin gshegs
42a6(mdo sde): pa'i phyag rgya de'ang spyan lnga mi snang ste/ rang gi mtshan nyid kyi phyag rgyas btab pa'o// de bzhin gshegs pas chos kyi tha snyad ji snyed du 'dogs pa de dag thams cad ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag rgyas
42a7(mdo sde): btab bzhin du tha snyad 'dogs so/ / de la gang dag rnam par shes pa'i spyod yul ba de dag ni chos rnam par 'jog par byed do// gang dag rnam par shes pa la mi gnas pa de dag ni chos rnam par 'jog
42b1(mdo sde): par mi byed/ chos tha dad du mi byed do// de dag de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag rgyas btab pas na/ de dag de bzhin nyid 'byed par mi byed do// de la de bzhin nyid tha dad pa gang zhe na/ gang dag
42b2(mdo sde): tha ma dang / 'bring dang / rab kyi chos rnams su rnam par rtog pa'o// gang dag chos thams cad la mi rtog cing rnam par mi rtog pa de bzhin nyid tha dad du mi byed do// gang ji snyed mang por brtags shing
42b3(mdo sde): rnam par brtags kyang de bzhin nyid dbye bar mi nus te/ dper na sems can thams cad ni nam mkha' la rnam par rgyu yang nam mkha'i khams ni 'dres par yang mi byed do// de bzhin du sems can
42b4(mdo sde): thams cad de bzhin nyid la rnam par rgyu yang de bzhin nyid ni 'dres par mi byed do/ / gang 'dir de lta bu'i chos rnams shes pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de lta bu ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag rgyas btang
42b5(mdo sde): pa yin te/ de bzhin nyid kyang 'dres par mi byed do// rigs kyi bu de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi dbyings kyi tshul la zhugs shing / chos kyi dbyings thams cad la yang dag par
42b6(mdo sde): gzhol ba yin zhe na/ chos kyi dbyings zhes bya ba ni rdul thams cad dang bral ba'i phyir/ 'dod chags dang bral ba'i dbyings so// yang dag par bsgrubs pa med pa'i phyir ma skyes pa'i dbyings
42b7(mdo sde): so/ / ma byung ba'i phyir mi 'gog pa'i dbyings so// 'gro ba med pa'i phyir mi 'gro ba'i dbyings so// rga ba med pa'i phyir 'ong ba med pa'i dbyings so// 'byung ba med pa'i phyir gnas
43a1(mdo sde): med pa'i dbyings so/ / dus gsum mnyam pa'i phyir ji lta ba bzhin gyi dbyings so// gzod ma nas rnam par dag pa'i phyir/ bdag gi dbyings so// don dam pa yin
43a2(mdo sde): ba'i phyir gang zag med pa'i dbyings so/ / gnas med pa'i phyir rnam par rig pa med pa'i dbyings so// 'dre ba med pa'i phyir kun gzhi med pa'i dbyings so// nges par gyur pa'i phyir skye ba med pa'i
43a3(mdo sde): dbyings so/ / rang bzhin gyis yongs su dag pa'i phyir nam mkha'i dbyings so// gnyen po med pa'i phyir mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings te/ 'di ni chos kyi dbyings kyi tshul la 'jug pa zhes
43a4(mdo sde): bya'o/ / rigs kyi bu chos thams cad de ltar zhugs pas de la/ byang chub sems dpa' de ltar chos kyi tshul la zhugs pa'i gang ci smra ba dang / rjod pa dang / ston pa de thams cad ni chos kyi dbyings
43a5(mdo sde): su yang dag par gzhol ba nyid do/ / chos kyi dbyings kyi tshul la zhugs pa de 'dod chags kyi khams dang / chos kyi dbyings de dag gnyis su med par rab tu shes so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/
43a6(mdo sde): 'dod chags ni chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin can no// zhe sdang gi khams dang / chos kyi dbyings de dag ni gnyis su med de/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ zhe sdang ni chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin can no//
43a7(mdo sde): gti mug gi khams dang / chos kyi dbyings de dag ni gnyis su med de/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gti mug ni chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin can no// nyon mongs pa'i khams dang / chos kyi dbyings
43b1(mdo sde): de dag ni gnyis su med de/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ nyon mongs pa ni chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin can no// 'dod pa'i khams dang / chos kyi dbyings de dag ni gnyis su med de/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/
43b2(mdo sde): 'dod pa'i khams ni chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin no// gzugs kyi khams dang / chos kyi dbyings de dag ni gnyis su med de/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gzugs kyi khams ni chos kyi dbyings
43b3(mdo sde): kyi rang bzhin can no/ / gzugs med pa'i khams dang / chos kyi dbyings de dag ni gnyis su med de/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gzugs med pa'i khams ni chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin can no//
43b4(mdo sde): mig gi khams dang / chos kyi dbyings de dag ni gnyis su med de/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ mig ni chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin can no// gzugs kyi khams dang / chos kyi dbyings de dag
43b5(mdo sde): ni gnyis su med de/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gzugs ni chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin can no// mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams dang / chos kyi dbyings de dag ni gnyis su med de
43b6(mdo sde): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ mig gi rnam par shes pa ni chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin can no// yid kyi bar gyi khams dang / chos kyi dbyings de dag gnyis su med de/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ yid kyi
43b7(mdo sde): khams ni chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin can no/ / yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams dang / chos kyi dbyings de dag ni gnyis su med de/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa ni
44a1(mdo sde): chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin can no/ / phung po'i khams dang / chos kyi dbyings de dag ni gnyis su med de/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ phung po'i khams ni chos kyi dbyings kyi
44a2(mdo sde): rang bzhin can no/ / sa'i khams dang / chu'i khams dang / me'i khams dang / rlung gi khams dang / chos kyi dbyings de dag ni gnyis su med de/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sa dang / chu dang /
44a3(mdo sde): me dang / rlung ni chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin can no// chos kyi phung po brgyad khri bzhi stong dang / spyod pa brgyad khri bzhi stong dang / chos thams cad kyi bar dang / chos kyi dbyings de dag ni gany+dza
44a4(mdo sde): su med de/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ chos thams cad ni chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin can te/ byang chub sems dpa' gang chos mnyam pa nyid 'di la zhugs pa de ni chos kyi dbyings thams cad la yang
44a5(mdo sde): dag par gzhol ba'i phyir/ chos thams cad rab tu shes pa yin te/ rigs kyi bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi dbyings kyi tshul la zhugs pa yin no// rigs kyi bu de la ji ltar na
44a6(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' bsam pa rdo rje ltar sra zhing mi phyed de/ theg pa chen po 'di la legs par gnas shing mi g.yo ba yin zhe na/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' bsam pa rdo rje ltar sra
44a7(mdo sde): zhing mi phyed pa bcu gnyis kyis na/ lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis mi phyed pa yin te/ bcu gnyis gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub kyi sems mi byed pa/ bsam pa dang lhag pa'i
44b1(mdo sde): bsam pas sbyor ba mi phyed pa dang / sbyin pa mi phyed pa dang / tshul khrims dang / bzod pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / bsam gtan dang / shes rab mi phyed pa dang / byams pa chen
44b2(mdo sde): po dang / snying rje chen po mi phyed pa dang / bsdu ba'i dngos po mi phyed pa dang / sems can yongs su smin par byed pa mi phyed pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa mi byed pa dang / 'khor
44b3(mdo sde): bas yongs su mi skyob mi phyed pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba bas mi ngoms pa mi phyed pa dang / mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po'i phyir gtan pa med pa'i mchod sbyin byed pa mi phyed pa dang / dam pa'i chos
44b4(mdo sde): yongs su gzung ba'i phyir lus dang srog 'dor ba mi phyed pa dang / sems can gzhan dang / gang zag gzhan gyi phyir dge ba'i rtsa ba bsngo ba mi phyed pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yang dag
44b5(mdo sde): par bsgrub pa mi phyed pa ste/ rigs kyi bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' chos 'di lta bu 'di dag las mi phyed pa de'i tshe/ bsam pa rdo rje ltar sra zhing mi phyed pa yin no// 'di lta ste/ dper
44b6(mdo sde): na nor bu rin po rdo rje ni nor bu rin po che thams cad 'bigs kyang bdag nyid ni mi 'bigs so/ / de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' bsam rdo rje ltar sra zhing mi phyed pa'ang sems can thams cad kyi bag
44b7(mdo sde): la nyal dang / nyon mongs pa kun nas ldang ba dang / lta bar gyur pa rnams sel kyang / bdag nyid ni theg pa chen po 'di las mi phyed do// rigs kyi bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' bsam
45a1(mdo sde): pa rdo rje ltar sra zhing mi byed de/ theg pa chen po 'di la legs par gnas shing mi g.yo ba yin no// rigs kyi bu de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas
45a2(mdo sde): kyi yul rjes su thob cing rang gi yul yongs su dag pa yin zhe na/ sangs rgyas kyi yul zhes bya ba ni yul ma yin pa/ yul med pa/ yul thams cad yongs su dag pa'o// de la byang chub
45a3(mdo sde): sems dpa' ni sangs rgyas kyi yul yongs su dag pas/ rang gi yul yongs su sbyong ste/ de 'di snyam du mig gi yul ni sangs rgyas kyi yul yin yang / sangs rgyas kyi yul ni su dang yang nye ba
45a4(mdo sde): 'am ring ba ma yin no/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sangs rgyas kyi yul ni dben pa'i yul yin pa'i phyir te/ dben pa'i yul la ni mig gi yul gang yang med do// rna ba'i yul ni
45a5(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi yul yin yang / sangs rgyas kyi yul ni su dang yang nye ba 'am ring ba ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sangs rgyas kyi yul ni dben pa'i yul yin pa'i phyir te/ dben pa'i
45a6(mdo sde): yul la ni rna ba'i yul gang yang med do/ / sna'i yul ni sangs rgyas kyi yul yin yang / sangs rgyas kyi yul ni su dang yang nye ba'am ring ba ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sangs rgyas kyi
45a7(mdo sde): yul ni dben pa'i yul yin pa'i phyir te/ dben pa'i yul la ni sna'i yul gang yang med do// lce'i yul ni sangs rgyas kyi yul yin yang / sangs rgyas kyi yul ni su dang yang nye ba'am ring
45b1(mdo sde): ba ma yin no/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sangs rgyas kyi yul ni dben pa'i yul yin pa'i phyir te/ dben pa'i yul la ni lce'i yul gang yang med do// lus kyi yul ni sangs rgyas kyi yul yin
45b2(mdo sde): yang sangs rgyas kyi yul ni su dang yang nye ba 'am ring ba ma yin no/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sangs rgyas kyi yul ni dben pa'i yul yin pa'i phyir te/ dben pa'i yul la ni lus kyi yul gang
45b3(mdo sde): yang med do/ / yid kyi yul ni sangs rgyas kyi yul yin yang / sangs rgyas kyi yul ni su dang yang nye ba'am ring ba ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sangs rgyas kyi yul ni dben pa'i yul
45b4(mdo sde): yin pa'i phyir te/ dben pa'i yul la ni yid kyi yul gang yang med do// phung po rnams dang / khams rnams dang / skye mched rnams dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba yan lag
45b5(mdo sde): bcu gnyis pa la'ang de bzhin no/ / rigs kyi bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi yul dben pa nyid kyis yul thams cad dben par 'jug go// rang gi zhing yongs su dag par sangs
45b6(mdo sde): rgyas kyi zhing la zhugs pa de ni chos gang dag de'i dbang po drug la snang bar 'gyur ba de dag thams cad la sangs rgyas kyi yul dben pas 'jug go/ / ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i yul chags pa
45b7(mdo sde): med cing thogs pa med pa de bzhin du/ de yul thams cad la'ang mi chags mi thogs te/ rigs kyi bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi yul la rjes su zhugs shing rang
46a1(mdo sde): gi yul yongs su dag pa yin no/ / rigs kyi bu de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' gzungs thob pa rtag tu mi brjed par spyod pa yin zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'di la byang chub
46a2(mdo sde): sems dpa' gzungs yongs su sbyang ba bya bas gzungs thob par 'gyur te/ de la gzungs yongs su sbyang ba byed pa gang zhe na/ rigs kyi bu sum cu rtsa gnyis po 'di dag ni gzungs yongs su sbyang
46a3(mdo sde): ba byed pa ste/ sum cu rtsa gnyis po gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ chos 'dod pa dang / chos don du gnyer ba dang / chos kyi kun dga' la dga' mos pa dang / chos la mos pa dang
46a4(mdo sde): chos la 'bab pa dang / chos la bab pa dang / mang du thos pa rnams la sten cing bsnyen la bsnyen bkur byed pa dang / slob dpon dang / mkhan po rnams la nga rgyal med cing btsun par
46a5(mdo sde): gus par byed pa dang / chos yongs su tshol bas mi ngoms pa dang / rjes su bstan pa rnams la bka' blo bde zhing 'thun par 'dzin pa dang / chos smra ba'i gang zag rnams la ston pa tsam du
46a6(mdo sde): shes shing 'khrul pa mi tshol ba dang / kun 'dzin pa dang / 'dzin pa dang / klog pa dang / ston pa la le lo med pa dang / chos la slob dpon gyi dpe mkhyud med cing zang zing med par
46a7(mdo sde): chos sbyin pa dang / shes rab kyi rtsa ba'i gnas thos pa dang / tshul bzhin gyi chos la sbyor ba dang / ji ltar thos pa'i chos la so sor brtag pa'i phyir/ mang du thos pa mu med pa byas pa dang /
46b1(mdo sde): tshangs par spyod pa la gnas pa mu med par bcas pa dang / rtag tu dben pa la sems gzhol ba dang / rjes su dran pa drug rjes su dran pa dang / yang dag par chags par 'gyur ba drug ma
46b2(mdo sde): 'dor ba dang / gus par bya ba'i gnas drug yongs su mi gtong ba dang / sems can thams cad la khong khro ba med pa'i sems kyis chos la sbyor ba dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dang
46b3(mdo sde): mi 'gal ba'i las dang bya ba la 'jug pa dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum la sems nges par rtogs pa la mi skrag pa dang / 'phags pa'i rigs dang / sbyangs pa'i yon tanas 'dzin
46b4(mdo sde): pas yongs su yi mi 'chad pa dang / dam pa'i chos yongs su gzung ba la sems zhum pa med pa dang / sems can la lta bas snying rje che ba dang / chos la lta bas lus dang srog 'dor
46b5(mdo sde): ba dang ye shes la lta bas rtag tu nga rgyal med pa dang / sems can yongs su smin par bya ba la yongs su mi skyo ba ste/ 'di ni gzungs yongs su sbyang ba byed pa zhes bya'o// rigs/
46b6(mdo sde): kyi bu de la gzungs gang zhe na/ gang kun bzung ba'i chos rnams mi brjed pa dang / ji ltar thos pa'i chos rnams mi brjed pa dang / dran pa rjes su dran pa dang / rtogs par khong du chud
46b7(mdo sde): pa dang / blo gros 'dod pa dang / yi ge mi zad pa dang / nges pa'i tshig dang skad la 'jug pa shes pa dang / spobs pa bstan pa thogs pa med cing rgyun mi 'chad pa dang / nges pa'i
47a1(mdo sde): don gyi mdo sde rtogs pa la 'jug pa shes pa dang / drang ba'i don gyi mdo sde rtogs pa la 'jug pa shes pa dang / kun rdzob mi zad pa bstan pa shes pa dang / rngon
47a2(mdo sde): dam pa dbyer med pa'i de kho na bstan pa shes pa dang / bden pa la 'jug pa nges par shes pa dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa'i rjes su 'jug pa shes pa dang / yang dag par spong ba'i bco
47a3(mdo sde): 'grus mi 'gong ba shes pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pas rnam par rol pa shes pa dang / dbang po'i rim pa shes pa dang / stobs la gnas pa mi bskyod par shes pa dang / byang chub kyi
47a4(mdo sde): yan lag rtogs pa dang 'thun pa shes pa dang / lam la 'jug pa'i gnas shes pa dang / zhi gnas kyis sems gnas par shes pa dang / lhag mthong gis chos sgrol bar shes pa dang /
47a5(mdo sde): rig pa dang rnam par grol ba'i rjes su 'thun pa shes pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa la 'jug pa shes pa dang / mngon par shes pa'i ye shes skyed pa shes pa dang / pha rol tu phyin pa
47a6(mdo sde): drug la 'jug pa shes pa dang / bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi so so ci rigs par shes pa dang / sgra skad dang ngag gi lam la 'jug pa shes pa dang / chos kyi brda ston pa shes pa dang / don dbyer
47a7(mdo sde): med par shes pa dang / tshig 'bru mi zad par shes pa dang / sems can thams cad tshim par bya ba shes pa dang / so so ci rigs par chos ston pa shes pa dang / sangs rgyas thams
47b1(mdo sde): cad kyis gsungs pa dran pas 'dzin pa shes pa dang / tshig dang yi ge thams cad mtshams sbyar ba'i nges pa'i tshig la 'jug pa shes pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa dang / rnam par byang
47b2(mdo sde): ba yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rtogs pa shes pa dang / rgyu dang bya ba la 'jug pa shes pa dang / chos thams cad la snang ba rab rib med par shes pa ste/ 'di ni gzungs zhes bya'o//
47b3(mdo sde): lus dang / ngag dang / sems dang 'dra ba'i chos kun tu 'dzin pa gang yin pa de ni mi zad pa ste/ chos kyi char 'bebs pa dang / nyon mongs pa'i gdung ba rab tu zhi bar byed pa dang /
47b4(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad rnam par skyed pa 'di yin te/ gzungs thob pa sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la mi brjed par spyod pa zhes bya'o// rigs kyi bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa'
47b5(mdo sde): gzungs thob pa rtag tu mi brjed par spyod pa yin no/ / rigs kyi bu de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' spobs pa thogs pa med cing rgyun mi 'chad la/ rtag tu sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi
47b6(mdo sde): rlabs kyis byin gyis brlabs pa yin zhe na/ rigs kyi bu nyi shu rtsa bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spobs pa yin ste/ nyi shu rtsa bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/
47b7(mdo sde): spobs pa myur ba dang / spobs pa mgyogs pa dang / spobs pa thogs pa med pa dang / spobs pa rgyun mi 'chad pa dang / shin tu nges pa'i tshig la spobs pa dang / zab mo la spong
48a1(mdo sde): pa dang / sna tshogs la spobs pa dang / legs par brgyan pa'i spobs pa dang / zhum pa med pa'i spobs pa dang / 'jigs pa med pa'i spobs pa dang / tshogs
48a2(mdo sde): su bcad pa sna tshogs bstan pa'i tshig la spobs pa dang / mdo dang rtogs pa brjod pa dang / sngon byung ba la spobs pa dang / mi 'thun pa'i spobs pa dang / tshig rab tu dbye ba bstan pa mi
48a3(mdo sde): zad pa la spobs pa dang / spobs pa shin tu gsal zhing shin tu mdzes pa dang / tshig btsun zhing gzung ba'i spobs pa dang / chos ston pa 'bras bu yod pa'i spobs pa dang / lha'i 'khor
48a4(mdo sde): gyi rgyan gyi spobs pa dang / the tsom thams cad gcod pa'i spobs pa dang / 'jig rten pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos la spobs pa dang / 'khrul pa med pa'i spobs pa dang
48a5(mdo sde): 'khor la byams pa dang / snying rje dang / dga' ba dang / btang snyoms kyi spobs pa dang / skye ba dran pa mngon par shes pa'i spobs pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis byin gyis
48a6(mdo sde): brlabs pa'i spobs pa yin te/ rigs kyi bu nyi shu rtsa bzhi po de dag ni/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spobs pa yin no// de dag kyang yongs su sbyang ba bya ba nyi shu rtsa bzhis 'grub ste/
48a7(mdo sde): nyi shu rtsa bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ bla ma'i ngag mi gcog pas myur ba'i spobs par 'gyur ro// tshur shog ces bya ba dang / song zhes bya ba la g.yo med pas spobs pa mgyogs par
48b1(mdo sde): 'gyur ro/ / nyon mongs pa thams cad la chags pa med pas spobs pa med par 'gyur ro// de la ma chags par gnas pas spobs pa rgyun mi 'chad par 'gyur ro// phra ma'i tshig med pas shin
48b2(mdo sde): tu nges pa'i tshig la spobs par 'gyur ro/ / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba rtogs pas zab mo la spobs par 'gyur ro// sbyin pa sna tshogs bsags pas sna tshogs la spobs par 'gyur ro//
48b3(mdo sde): chung ma legs par brgyan te/ rab tu byin pas legs par brgyan pa'i spobs par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems las mi nyams pa'i zhum pa med pa'i spobs par 'gyur ro// tshul khrims kyi phung
48b4(mdo sde): po legs par kun tu gsungs pas 'jigs pa med pa'i spobs par 'gyur ro/ / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / dril bu sna tshogs byin pas tshogs su bcad pa sna tshogs
48b5(mdo sde): bstan pa'i nges pa'i chog la spobs par 'gyur ro/ / sbyin pa dang ldan pa dang / rim gro byed pa dang / bsnyen bkur byed pa sngon du 'gro bas mdo dang rtogs pa brjod pa dang / sngon byung ba la
48b6(mdo sde): spobs par 'gyur ro/ / sdug bsngal ba dang / dbul ba dang / mgon med pa la mi brnyas pas mi thul ba'i spobs par 'gyur ro// gter mi zad pa sbyin pa dang / pha rol chos la sbyor bas
48b7(mdo sde): tshig rab tu dbye ba mi zad pa la spobs par 'gyur ro/ / tshig bden pa dang / tha ba med pa dang / ngag rtsub po med pa'i ngag gi las dang ldan pas spobs pa shin tu gsal zhing mdzes par 'gyur ro//
49a1(mdo sde): bla ma'i tshig khyad du mi gsod pa dang / gzhan gyi tshig mi gcog pas tshig btsun zhing gzung ba'i spobs par 'gyur ro// rang gi yon tan gyi chos sgrub pas chos bsten pa
49a2(mdo sde): 'bras bu yod pa'i spobs par 'gyur ro/ / bdag la mi stod pa dang / gzhan la mi smod pa dang / 'phangs pa'i dngos po yongs su gtong bas lha'i 'khor gyi rgyan gyi spobs par 'gyur ro//
49a3(mdo sde): chos la slob dpon gyi dpe mkhyud med pa dang / chos ji ltar thos pa bzhin du ston pas the tsom thams cad gcod pa'i spobs par 'gyur ro// bstan chos thams cad shes pa dang / gzhan
49a4(mdo sde): la mi gnod pa dang / nad pa rnams kyi nad g.yog byed pa dang / sman rab tu sbyin pas 'jig rten pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos thams cad la spobs par 'gyur ro// pha rol
49a5(mdo sde): la 'khrul pa'i skabs mi tshol ba dang / gzhan dag gi ltung ba mi gleng ba dang / 'khrul pa la mi rtogs pas 'khrul pa med pa'i spobs par 'gyur ro// sems can thams cad la sems snyoms
49a6(mdo sde): ba dang sems can thams cad la mtshungs par sbyor ba dang / mya ngan las 'das pa'i lam la 'god pa dang / rnyed pa dang / bkur sti dang / tshigs su bcad pa thams cad don du mi
49a7(mdo sde): gnyer bas/ 'khor la byams pa dang / snying rje dang / dga' ba dang / btang snyoms kyi spobs par 'gyur ro// dka' blo bde ba dang / nges pa dang / ji skad smras pa de bzhin byed pa dang /
49b1(mdo sde): sems dga' ba dang / gzhan gyi rgyud 'khrug par mi byed pas/ skye ba dran pa'i mngon par shes pa'i spobs par 'gyur ro// theg pa chen po las mi nyams pa dang / theg pa dman pa mi 'dod
49b2(mdo sde): pa dang / sems can la snying rje ba dang / thams cad nan tan la 'god pas sangs rgyas kyis byin gyis brlabs pa'i spobs par 'gyur ro// sems can gzhan la go bar byed pas de'i phyir spobs pa zhes
49b3(mdo sde): bya'o/ / sems can gzhan la nan tan du bya ba ston pas de'i phyir spobs pa zhes bya'o// gzhan gyi sems kyi rgyud tshim par byed pas/ de'i phyir spobs pa zhes bya'o// sems can gzhan
49b4(mdo sde): gyi sems dang 'thun par ston pas de'i phyir spobs pa zhes bya'o/ / rigs kyi bu chos dang / yon tan dang / ye shes de lta bu dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni spobs pa thogs pa med cing
49b5(mdo sde): rgyun mi 'chad la/ rtag tu sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis byin gyis brlabs pa yin no// rigs kyi bu de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' skye ba dang / 'chi 'pho dang / 'byung ba rnams
49b6(mdo sde): la dbang thob pa zhe na/ rigs kyi bu chos bcu gnyis dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' skye ba dang / 'chi 'pho dang / 'byung ba rnams la dbang thob pa yin te/ bcu gnyis gang zhe na/
49b7(mdo sde): 'di lta ste/ sdig pa'i grogs po yongs su spangs shing rtag tu dge ba'i bshes gnyen la sten pa dang / lta ba shin tu yongs su dag pa dang / sangs rgyas kyis gnang ba'i tshul khrims
50a1(mdo sde): kyi phung po yongs su dag pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / snyoms par 'jug pa dang / ldang ba shes pa dang / shes rab dang / thabs zung du 'brel ba dang /
50a2(mdo sde): mngon par shes pa ma nyams pa 'thob pa dang / ma skyes pa dang / ma byung bar so sor rtogs pa dang / bsams bzhin du skye ba dang / smon lam yongs su rdzogs pa dang / sems can
50a3(mdo sde): la lta ba'i byams pa la sbyor ba dang / snying rje chen po la'ang nges par sems pa dang / chos la sgyu ma lta bur rtog pa dang / 'chi 'pho med par 'pho zhing skye ba dang / chos kyi mtshan nyid rmi lam
50a4(mdo sde): gyi ngo bo nyid kyi chos la 'jug pa dang / phyin ci log gi chos la yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rtog pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis byin gyis brlabs nas skye ste/ 'pho zhing
50a5(mdo sde): 'byung la skye ba dang / 'pho ba dang 'byung bar yang mi sems pa'o// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' gang dang gang du skyes nas/ sems can gyi don byed pa'i skyes pa'i rabs bstan
50a6(mdo sde): pa tshad med pa'i skyes pa'i rabs de dag thams cad ni rtsa ba gnyis la gnas pa ste/ 'di lta ste/ mngon par shes pa'i ye shes la gnas pa dang / snying rje chen po'i rtsa ba la gnas pa'o//
50a7(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' skye ba dang / 'chi 'pho dang / 'byung ba rnams la dbang thob pa yin no// rigs kyi bu de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' bdud bzhi'i lam las
50b1(mdo sde): yang dag par 'das shing bdud dang phyir rgol ba thams cad yang dag par bcom pa yin zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' chos thams cad sgyu ma lta bur shes shing rtogs pas
50b2(mdo sde): phung po'i bdud las yang dag par 'da' 'o/ / ji ltar thos pa'i chos la tshul bzhin so sor rtogs pas nyon mongs pa'i bdud las yang dag par 'da' 'o// rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba rtogs/
50b3(mdo sde): pas 'chi bdag gi bdud las yang dag par 'da' 'o// byang chub kyi sems las mi nyams pas lha'i bu'i bdud las yang dag par 'da' 'o// yang des bdud kyi las rnams bcom pa yin/
50b4(mdo sde): te/ des bdud kyi las rnams bcom pa gang zhe na/ gang dag gis byang chub sems dpa' la bdud kyis glags mi rnyed pa ste/ theg pa dman pa 'dod pa bdud kyi las dang / byang chub
50b5(mdo sde): kyi sems mi srung ba bdud kyi las dang / sems can tha dad par sbyin pa bdud kyi las dang / skye ba la gnas pa'i tshul khrims bdud kyi las dang / de bzhin du sbyar te/ gzugs su
50b6(mdo sde): bsngos pa'i bzod pa dang / 'jig rten gyi bya ba la brtson pa'i brtson 'grus dang / de la chags shing ro myang ba'i bsam gtan dang / shes rab kyis chos ngan pa la spong pa bdud kyi las
50b7(mdo sde): dang 'khor bas yongs su skyo ba bdud kyi las dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su mi sngo ba bdud kyi las dang / nyon mongs pa la smod pa bdud kyi las dang / ltung ba 'chab pa bdud kyi las
51a1(mdo sde): dang byang chub sems dpa' la sdang ba bdud kyi las dang / dam pa'i chos spong ba bdud kyi las dang / byas pa rgyun gcod pa bdud kyi las dang / pha rol tu phyin pa
51a2(mdo sde): rnams yongs su mi tshol ba bdud kyi las dang / dam pa'i chos mnyan par mi 'dod pa bdud kyi las dang / chos la slob dpon gyi dpe mkhyud byed pa bdud kyi las dang / zang zing dang 'brel
51a3(mdo sde): bar chos ston pa bdud kyi las dang / thabs dang bral bas sems can yongs su smin par byed pa bdud kyi las dang / bsdu ba'i dngos po 'dor ba bdud kyi las dang / tshul khrims 'chal
51a4(mdo sde): pa rnams la khong khro ba bdud kyi las dang / tshul khrims dang ldan pa rnams la mi gus pa bdud kyi las dang / nyan thos kyi bslab pa'i rjes su 'thun pa bdud kyi las dang / rang sangs rgyas
51a5(mdo sde): kyi theg pa can gyi rjes su 'jug pa bdud kyi las dang / dus ma yin par sgrub 'dod pa bdud kyi las dang / snying rje chen po bor nas rigs la rtogs pa bdud kyi las dang / 'dus ma byas 'dod
51a6(mdo sde): pa bdud kyi las dang / 'dus byas la smod pa bdud kyi las dang / sems can gyi ci bya'o cog la g.yel ba bdud kyi las dang / nga rgyal la gnas shing mi 'dud pa dang / lce gnyis smra ba
51a7(mdo sde): dang g.yo sgyu dang ldan pa dang / bcos ma la dga' ba dang / mi drang ba dang / rtsub cing ba rlang ba dang / sdig pa la mi smod pa dang / chos kyi drungs 'byin pa dang / thos pa cung zad
51b1(mdo sde): tsam gyis chog par 'dzin pa dang / chos ma yin pa don du gnyer ba dang / chos ma yin pa 'dod pa dang / slob pa dang / chod pa dang / kun nas ldang ba rnam par mi gnod pa bdud
51b2(mdo sde): kyi las dang / sems kyi dri ma mi rtog pa bdud kyi las dang / dge sbyong gi dri la mi mjed pa bdud kyi las te/ rigs kyi bu ji tsam du mi dge ba'i chos la 'jug pa dang / dge ba'i
51b3(mdo sde): chos 'dor ba de thams cad ni bdud kyi las so/ / chos bzhis ni bdud kyi las 'di dag las shin tu 'da' ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub kyi sems ma brjed pa'i pha rol
51b4(mdo sde): tu phyin pa drug po dag dang / dad pa dang / brtson 'grus la gnas pa'i bag yod pa dang / thabs mkhas pa la gnas te/ sems can yongs su smin par byed pa dang / chos kyi
51b5(mdo sde): tshul zab mo la gnas te/ dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pas so// rigs kyi bu de ltar chos la sbyor ba'i byang chub sems dpa' ni bdud bzhi'i lam las yang dag par 'das shing
51b6(mdo sde): bdud dang phyir rgol ba thams cad bcom pa yin no/ / rigs kyi bu de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' bsod nams tshad med pa bsags shing sems can thams cad 'tsho bar gyur
51b7(mdo sde): pa yin zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' ni sems can rnams la byams pas gnas pa yin/ 'byung po rnams la snying rje bar gnas pa yin/ bsam gtan
52a1(mdo sde): rnams la de la ma chags par gnas pa yin/ spong ba rnams la bdog pa thams cad yongs su gtong ba yin/ bsod nams ngag gis longs spyod mi zad pa yin
52a2(mdo sde): bsam pa dag pas lag na rin po che yin/ mtho dman gyi yid med pas sems dang mtshungs pa yin/ tshul khrims yongs su dag pas bsam pa 'byor pa yin/ mchod sbyin thams
52a3(mdo sde): cad sgrub pas sems grol zhing sgo bsgribs pa med pa yin/ chos rnam par 'byed pas gzungs dang spobs pa phun sum tshogs pa yin/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing tshad med par 'gro bas mngon par
52a4(mdo sde): shes pa'i ye shes la gnas pa yin no/ / ji ltar phyi rol gyi 'byung ba chen po bzhi po 'di dag sems can thams cad kyi 'tsho bar gyur pa de bzhin du/ bdag gi nang gi 'byung ba chen po 'di dag
52a5(mdo sde): kyang sems can thams cad kyi 'tsho bar gyur cig/ bdag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba dang / chos shes pa la mkhas pa gang yin pa de sems can thams cad kyi 'tsho ba ma yin par ma gyur cig ces de ltar
52a6(mdo sde): dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams kyang yongs su bsngo ste/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' bsod nams tshad med pa bsags shing / sems can thams cad kyi 'tsho bar gyur pa yin no// rigs kyi bu de la
52a7(mdo sde): ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas rnams ma byung yang sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pas sems can rnams la nye bar gnas pa yin zhe na/ rig kyi bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' ni gnas dang
52b1(mdo sde): gnas ma yin pa'i bya ba shes pas stobs bcu yongs su sbyang bar bya ba tshar phyin pa yin/ zag pa zad pa'i bya ba shes pas mi 'jigs pa bzhi yongs su sbyang bar bya ba tshar phyin pa yin/ dus
52b2(mdo sde): gsum la chags pa med pa'i ye shes kyi bya ba shes pas sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad yongs su sbyang bar bya ba tshar phyin pa yin/ sangs rgyas kyi spyan snang ba thob pas/ spyan lnga
52b3(mdo sde): yongs su sbyang bar bya ba tshar phyin pa yin/ byang chub kyi snying por 'gro ba thob pas/ mngon par shes pa thams cad yongs su sbyang bar bya ba tshar phyin pa yin/ nyon mongs pa'i bag chags yang
52b4(mdo sde): dag par bcad pas/ dge ba'i chos thams cad yongs su bskang ba tshar phyin pa yin/ bsod nams kyi tshogs thams cad bsags pas lus dang / ngag dang / sems dang / mtshan dang
52b5(mdo sde): dpe byad bzang po'i rgyan yongs su sbyang bar bya ba tshar phyin pa yin/ dbang bskur ba thob pas sa bcu yongs su sbyang bar bya ba tshar phyin pa yin/ ye shes kyi tshogs bsags pas sangs rgyas kyi chos
52b6(mdo sde): thams cad yongs su sbyang bar bya ba tshar phyin te/ rigs kyi bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas rnams ma 'byung yang sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pas sems can rnams la nye bar gnas pa yin no//
52b7(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtsho'i phyag rgya'i ting nge 'dzin thob cing sems can thams cad kyi sems dang spyod pa la mi chags pa yin zhe na/ rigs bu 'di lta ste/ dper na
53a1(mdo sde): 'dzam bu'i gling na sems can rnams kyi gzugs snang ba ji snyed pa de dag thams cad dang 'dra ba'i phyag rgya rgya mtsho chen po la yod de/ de'i phyir rgya mtsho chen po zhes bya'o// de bzhin
53a2(mdo sde): du sems can thams cad kyi sems su snang ba 'am/ gzugs su snang ba 'am/ sgrar snang ba ji snyed pa de dag thams cad rgya mtsho'i phyag rgya'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i sems
53a3(mdo sde): kyi snang ba gcig la snang bar 'gyur te/ de'i phyir rgya mtsho'i phyag rgya'i ting nge 'dzin ces bya'o// 'di lta ste/ dper na rgya mtsho chen po ni ro gcig pa yin no// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang chos
53a4(mdo sde): la rnam par grol ba'i ror shes pas ro gcig pa yin no/ / 'di lta ste/ dper na rgya mtsho chen po ni dus las mi yol ba yin no// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang dus dang dus ma yin pa la so sor
53a5(mdo sde): rtog pas/ byang chub kyi snying po'i dus las mi yol lo// 'di lta ste/ dper na rgya mtsho chen po ni shi ba'i ro dang lhan cig mi gnas so// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang bag chags kyi nyon mongs pa
53a6(mdo sde): thams cad dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sems can thams cad dang lhan cig mi gnas so// 'di lta ste/ dper na rgya mtsho chen po ni chu thams cad zad pas bri ba 'am/ gang ba med do//
53a7(mdo sde): de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang chos thams cad zad pas chos kyi dbyings bri ba'am gang bar mi byed do// 'di lta ste/ dper na rgya mtsho chen po ni kha tshon tshad med do// de bzhin du byang chub sem
53b1(mdo sde): dpa' yang shes rab kyis tshad med do/ / 'di lta ste/ dper na rgya mtsho chen po ni zab cing gting dpag dka' ba yin no// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang zab cing nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas
53b2(mdo sde): thams cad kyis gting dpag dka' ba yin no/ / 'di lta ste/ dper na rgya mtsho chen po ni sems can tshad med pa'i gnas yin no// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems can yongs su smin par bya ba
53b3(mdo sde): tshad med pa'i gnas yin no/ / 'di ni rgya mtsho'i phyag rgya'i ting nge 'dzin la 'jug pa yin te/ rigs kyi bu de ltar zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni sems can thams cad kyi sems dang po spyod pa la
53b4(mdo sde): mi chags pa yin no/ / rigs kyi bu de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' chags pa thams cad las yang dag par 'das pa yin zhe na/ chags pa zhes bya ba ni gang chos rnams la lta ba kun nas ldang
53b5(mdo sde): ba'o/ / byang chub sems dpa' ni lta ba kun nas ldang ba thams cad dang bral bas chags pa thams cad las yang dag par 'das pa yin no// 'di lta ste/ dper na rlung dmar ni nam mkha'i dkyil la ma
53b6(mdo sde): chags so/ / de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' rlung dmar lta bu'i sems dang ldan pa'ang sems can thams cad la mi chags so// yang skyes bu dam pa de dag ni spyad pa dang / cho ga'i tshul shes
53b7(mdo sde): pa yin te/ de la cho ga ni dran pa'o// spyad pa ni rnam par mi g.yeng ba'o// de dag ni mun pa dang bral zhing snang ba thob pa'ang yin te/ de la mun pa zhes bya ba ni gang chos rnams la mi shes pa'o//
54a1(mdo sde): snang ba zhes bya ba ni gang chos rnams la ye shes thogs pa med pa ste/ de'i phyir de dag mun pa dang bral zhing snang ba thob pa zhes bya'o// skyes bu dam pa de dag ni ye shes gzhan
54a2(mdo sde): gyi dring la mi 'jog cing rang gis ye shes thob pa yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de dag rang byung gi ye shes la mngon par gnas shing sems can gzhan ye shes 'dod par byed pa yin no// gang gi tshe
54a3(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' chos gtan la 'bebs pa'i ye shes bstan pa 'di la gzhan gyi dring la mi 'jog cing rang gis ye shes thob par gyur pa de'i tshe/ myur du thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes thob par
54a4(mdo sde): 'gyur ro/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsungs so// gang zhig lta ba kun las sems dben zhing // mkhas pa bsod nams tshogs ni rab byed la// mtshan
54a5(mdo sde): ma ldang ba yongs su spangs nas su/ / byang chub phyir bsngos de ni zad mi 'gyur// nga rgyal las kyang nga rgyal kun spangs nas// de ni ye shes tshogs rnams tshol bar byed// mtha' yas blo ldan nam mkha'i
54a6(mdo sde): ngo bo nyid/ / kun mkhyen ye shes yongs su rdzogs par byed// rgyal ba'i sras de sangs rgyas rjes dran pa// gzugs dang mtshan gyis chos su ma yin te// nang na sems dang yid ni mi rgyu ba//
54a7(mdo sde): de ni 'thun par sangs rgyas rjes su dran// chos ni 'dod chags bral zhing rang bzhin dben// zhi zhing rab zhi rtag tu mtshan ma med// gang zhig dmigs pa thams cad 'gyur pa// de 'dir chos ni
54b1(mdo sde): rjes su dran pa yin/ / 'phags pa'i dge 'dun shin tu 'dus ma byas// stong pa mtshan med smon lam rnam par grol// de la sems med dra na dang 'jug pa med// de ni dge 'dun rjes su dran pa
54b2(mdo sde): yin/ phung po yongs su gtang ba thams cad gtong // nyon mongs dngos po thams cad legs par 'dor// snyems pa med cing rtogs dang rnam rtog dag/ 'di ni gtong ba legs par rjes su
54b3(mdo sde): dran/ / tshul khrims zag pa med cing 'dus ma byas// lus dang ngag dang yid kyis 'jug pa med// 'byung ba med cing sring gsum mi gnas pa// de ni tshul khrims rjes su dran pa yin//
54b4(mdo sde): / lhagang dag cing dri med nyon mongs med// dga' ldan gnas pa dbang bskur thob myur ba// sems can dag pa de dag 'dir dran zhing // bdag kyang myur du de 'drar 'gyur snyam sems// de
54b5(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs kyi dam chos 'dzin pa ni/ / nyon mongs dngos po thams cad 'dzin mi byed// chos dang chos min gnyis las rnam par grol// de 'dra de ni rgyal ba'i chos 'dzin yin// rgyal
54b6(mdo sde): bas byang chub mtshan nyid gang brnyes pa/ / chos kyi mtshan nyid de ni yongs 'dzin cing // gang gis rdul med mtha' 'di rab shes pa// de ni sangs rgyas kun gyi chos 'dzin yin// bdag ni/
54b7(mdo sde): rab tu dag pas sems can dag/ chos kun dag par mkhas pa sus rtog pa// de ni sems dag rang bzhin 'od gsal te// sems can gdon phyir rtag tu yongs smin byed// sems
55a1(mdo sde): can khams rnams ma rung mi byed cing / / de ni bri zhing gang bar mthong ba med// lta ba nor pa rab spang bar ston// de 'dra de ni sems can mang po sbyong // 'jig
55a2(mdo sde): rten yul kun rab tu gang ston pa/ / des ni sangs rgyas yul yang rab tu bstan// sangs rgyas yul ni nam mkha' mtshungs pa ste/ de bzhin 'jig rten yul yang rab tu shes// sgra skad
55a3(mdo sde): dbyangs dang yi ge thams cad ni/ / brag cha 'dra ba de yis rab mthong zhing // de la nyan pa'ang shin tu yod min par// de ltar rab tu shes pa gzungs 'thob bo// kun tu 'dzin dang 'dzin cing klog
55a4(mdo sde): pa dang / / chos rnams bstan pa'i rnam par rab bshad kyang // bdag dang sems can chos su rlom sems med// de ni gzungs la rab tu gnas pa yin// rgyal ba kun gyis gsungs pa 'dzin
55a5(mdo sde): byed cing / / legs par gsungs pas sems can tshom byed pa// dran dang ting nge 'dzin dang bral mi 'gyur// gzungs la nges pa'i yon tan 'di dag go// chos ni rnam pa kun tu bsags med pas//
55a6(mdo sde): chos la mi 'phro 'phros pa med pa'ang min// dper na klu ni char rgyun 'bebs pa ltar// de ltar de yang chos kyi char pa 'bebs// yon tan 'byung gnas rnams kyi spobs pa ni// thogs med rgyun chags
55a7(mdo sde): rgyun chad mi 'gyur bar/ / mdo sde stong phrag bye ba rab tu 'chad// sems can dbang por sems can 'du shes med// sangs rgyas mthu yis bskal pa bye stong du// rgyun mi 'chang par chos ni rab
55b1(mdo sde): ston cing / / bsam pa ji bzhin sems can tshim par byed// spobs pa'i tshul gyis sangs rgyas yon tan gnas// chos 'di thams cad nam mkha' 'dra ba zhes// gang gis chos rnams
55b2(mdo sde): kun gyi tshul shes la/ / sems can srog dang gang zag mi 'dzin pa// de ni rgyal ba rnams kyi dam chos 'dzin// sems can thams cad shin tu mya ngan 'das// de dag de ltar kun tu skye ba med//
55b3(mdo sde): su yi bzod 'di dri med 'od gsal ba// de ni bstan pa 'di la bag yod yin// phung po yang dag sgyu ma lta bur mthong // chos dbyings ci 'dra de bzhin khams rnams shes// dbang po drug ni grong
55b4(mdo sde): stong 'drar mthong ba/ / de ni phung po'i bdud las yang dag 'da'// sprin brtsegs phung po lta bur nyon mongs rnams// bag yod tshul bzhin rab tu rtog byed cing // chos la mi rtog rnam par mi
55b5(mdo sde): rtog pa/ / de ni nyon mongs bdud las yang dag 'da'// gang zhig skye ba rtag tu skye med shes// 'di la gang yang 'pho med 'gro ba med// chos rnams 'ongs med song ba med shes pa// de ni 'chi/
55b6(mdo sde): bdag bdud kyi dbang mi 'gro// gang zhig g.yo dang rlom sems mi byed cing // byang chub gnas kyang byang chub 'du shes med// bdag dang sems can med kyang snying rje 'jug/ de ni dpung dang bcas
55b7(mdo sde): pa'i bdud 'dul lo/ / rnam shes ye shes gnyis ni mnyam par mthong // 'dus byas mi gnas 'dus ma byas la min// 'gro ba'i sems ni sgyu ma 'drar mthong ba// de ni sems pa'i rdzi ba
56a1(mdo sde): med pa yin/ / pha rol tshu rol gang la'ang mi chags la// chos ldan gru ni yang dag su sbyor zhing // sems can sgrol yang sems can 'du shes med// mnyam pa zhes bya byang chub
56a2(mdo sde): sems dpa' de/ / srid pa gsum po 'brog dgon 'dra ba dang // stong pa 'gyur ba med par rab shes shing // lam gyi rim gyis rtag tu sems can sgrol// de ni ded dpon bdud rtsi lam ston pa//
56a3(mdo sde): mdzangs pa de ni tshul dang tshul mi mkhas// chos rnams 'dod nas stong par rab tu shes// tshul dang rigs pas mya ngan 'das la 'dzud// byang chub sems dpa' de ni 'dren ces bya// sems
56a4(mdo sde): kyi rgyud ni gzhan dang gzhan du 'gyur/ / sems ni sems la rnams kyang mtshams mi sbyor// 'gro ba'i sems rgyud de dag rab shes pa// byang chub sems dpa' yongs su 'dren ces bya// nam
56a5(mdo sde): mkha'i ngo bo nyid dang chu zla ltar/ / chos rnams thams cad dag cing rnam dag ces// nyon mongs kun dang 'dre bar mi byed pa// sems can dag pa de ni ma smad pa// gang zhig chos gcig gis ni
56a6(mdo sde): chos rnams kun/ / sgyu ma smig rgyu 'dra bar gzung med dang // gsog dang brdzun dang rtag pa med par shes// de ni byang chub snying por myur du 'gro// chos gtan la 'bebs pa bstan pa 'di bshad
56a7(mdo sde): pa na/ / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po'i srog chags khrag khrig phrag bdun cu rtsa gnyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do//
56b1(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' sum khri nyis stong ni mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur to// stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di'ang rnam pa drug tu rab tu g.yos so// snang ba chen pos
56b2(mdo sde): kyang 'jig rten gyi khams khyab par gyur to/ / lha brgya stong dag kyang me tog gi char rab tu 'bebs shing sil snyan dag kyang dkrol nas 'di skad ces gang dag bstan pa 'di thos mos pa dang / 'dzin pa dang /
56b3(mdo sde): nan tan byed pa'i sems can de dag ni sangs rgyas kyi yul du rjes su dong ba yin no// gang du sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams byung ba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di thams cad mkhas pa rnams kyis rgyan
56b4(mdo sde): gyis legs par brgyan pa byas te phyag bya'o/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sangs rgyas byung bar gyur na/ chos 'di lta bu 'di rab tu ston par 'gyur ro// skyes bu dam pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i chos dang
56b5(mdo sde): ldan pa 'di dag kyang mthong bar 'gyur ro zhes ched brjod pa ched du brjod do/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis zhus pa lung bstan pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha' mdzod
56b6(mdo sde): mngon du rangs par mdzad pas mu tig gi dra ba 'od dri ma med cing rnam par dag pa stong gsum yongs su gang ba ri ba bcom ldan 'das kyi sku la mngon par gsol nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces
56b7(mdo sde): gsol to/ / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi ye shes ni chag pa mi mngal zhing sgrib pa mi mnga' ba/ bstan pa ni rgyun mi 'chad pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni sems can thams cad kyi sem
57a1(mdo sde): la gzigs shing / dbang po mchog dang mchog ma yin pa mkhyen pa'i ye shes la mkhas pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di 'dra ba'i chos kyi tshul gyi rnam pa bstan pa des 'khor
57a2(mdo sde): thams cad kyi sems tshim par gyur to/ / theg pa chen po 'di'ang rgyas par brjod pa mdzad par gyur to// phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams nas 'dus pa'i byang chub sems dpa' 'di dag la'ang
57a3(mdo sde): chos kyi snang ba chen pos rgyas par mdzad par gyur to/ / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pas bdag la'ang chos 'byung ba'i sgo bstan pas chos 'byung ba'i sgo des chos 'byung ba'i sgo tshad ma mchis pa
57a4(mdo sde): bstan par bgyi'o/ / / 'phag pa nam ma mdzod kyi mngosas po bzhi pa/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po myur bar spobs pa zhes bya ba de 'khor de nyid du 'dus par gyur
57a5(mdo sde): te 'dug pa des/ byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' mdzod la 'di skad ces smras so// rigs kyi bu gang khyod kyi ming nam mkha' mdzod ces bya ba de/ ci nam mkha' khyod kyi mdzod dam/ smras pa/
57a6(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu de bzhin te/ nam mkha' ni kho bo'i mdzod do// myur bar spobs pas smras pa/ rigs kyi bu nam mkha'i mdzod kyi bye brag bdag cag gis kyang blta'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das
57a7(mdo sde): kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha'i mdzod la bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu khyod kyis nam mkha' mdzod kyi khyad par ston cig/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha'i mdzod kyis/
57b1(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' myur bar spobs pa la 'di skad ces smras so// rigs kyi bu khyod kyi ying la gang 'dod pa de kho bos nam mkha' las char dbab bo// de nas byang chub sems dpa' myur bar/
57b2(mdo sde): spongs pa 'di snyam du sems te/ de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che ut+pala'i dpal gyi 'jig rten gyi khams pad+ma bkod pa zhes bya ba na/ 'od thams cad rnam par snang ba zhes bya ba'i pad+ma rgya ni rgyang grang
57b3(mdo sde): kyi tshad/ 'dab ma bye ba stong phrag mang po 'jam zhing gzhon pa/ gos ka tsa yin di ka ltar reg na bde ba/ dris ni sangs rgyas kyi zhing khyab pa/ kha dog mang po brgya stong dang ldan pa/ mthong
57b4(mdo sde): na yid du 'ong zhing chog mi shes pa/ pad+ma de mthong ba dang dri bsnams pas byang chub sems dpa' de dag ting nge 'dzin thob par 'gyur ba de dag gis mthong ste/ 'khor 'dir de 'dra ba'i pad+ma'i
57b5(mdo sde): char phob cig snyam pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' myur bar spobs pas bsams ma thag tu/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' mdzod kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis nam mkha'i ngos las
57b6(mdo sde): de 'dra ba'i pad+ma'i char mngon par phab ste/ de na 'khor de dag thams cad pad+ma de dag gi dri tshor zhing mthong bas dga' ba'i zas zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so// 'khor
57b7(mdo sde): de thams cad ting nge 'dzin las langs te/ byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha'i mdzod la phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad ces 'dzer to// skyes bu dam pa'i byin gyi rlabs dang / ye shes kyi
58a1(mdo sde): stobs legs so legs so/ / sems can thams cad kyang 'di 'dra ba'i byin gyi rlabs thob par gyur cig/ de na byang chub sems dpa' rin chen bkod ces bya ba 'du bar
58a2(mdo sde): gyur te 'dug pa des/ byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' mdzod la 'di skad ces smras so// rigs kyi bu khyod kyis nam mkha' las gser phyi'i char phob cig/ byang chub sems dpa' rin
58a3(mdo sde): chen bkod kyis tshig de skad ces smras ma thag tu/ de'i mod la nam mkha' las gser phye'i char mngon par phab bo// de nas yang byang chub sems dpa' rin chen bkod kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' nam
58a4(mdo sde): mkha' mdzod la 'di skad ces smras so/ / rigs kyi bu khyod kyis nam mkha' las rin po che thams cad kyi char phob cig/ tshig de skad ces smras ma thag tu/ de'i mod la phyogs bcu na ji tsam rin po che
58a5(mdo sde): grangs med dpag tu med pa ming tha dad pa la dog tha dad pa yod pa de dag gi char chen po mngon par phab pa 'di lta ste/ gser dang / dngul dang / shel dang / bai DUR+Ya dang / rdo'i snying po dang / mu tig dmar po
58a6(mdo sde): dang spug dang / dpal gyi snying po'i ze ba can dang / dri med dang / rin chen bu ru dang / zla ba'i 'od dang / me shel dang / snang byed dang / 'od mchog dang / 'dzam gling 'od dang
58a7(mdo sde): me 'od dang / dung dang / man shel dang / bu ru dang / an+da rnyil dang / yon tan 'byung gnas dang / rab tu zhi ba'i 'od dang / chu 'od dang / chu mdog dang / chu dang bar byed dang / sa'i 'od dang
58b1(mdo sde): mi phyed pa'i gnas dang / mig mi bzod pa dang / brgya byin thogs pa dang / rgyal ba dang / cher rgyal ba dang / gzi brjid 'bar dang / dpal gyi snying po'i rgyal po dang / rdo rje'i ze ba can
58b2(mdo sde): dang 'jig rten snang byed dang / skar ma dga' dang / 'od 'dzin dang / zla gam dang / 'dzam bu'i chu 'od dang / 'dzam bu'i gling gi 'od dang / 'od stong ldan dang / skar mda'i sgo dang // me'i
58b3(mdo sde): 'od dang / rgyal bas brgyan pa dang / tsha bzhi byed dang / gdung ba med pa dang / nad sel ba dang / mig sbyong dang / rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid sbyong dang / yan lag
58b4(mdo sde): rnam par snang ba dang / rnam par snang ba'i 'od dang / 'od sngon po dang / 'od ser po dang / dkar po dang / shel gyi kha dog dang / rin po che'i dra ba dang / rin po che thams cad yang dag par
