58b5(mdo sde): bsdus pa dang / ming de lta bu dang / ming de ma yin pa'i rin po che'i char rab tu bab ste/ nor bu rin po che de dag gi ming bskal par yang zad par sla ba ma yin no// de nas byang chub sems dpa' dus
58b6(mdo sde): kyi rgyal po zhes bya ba des/ byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' mdzod la 'di skad ces smras so// rigs kyi bu mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na sems can sdug bsngal zhing dbul ba zas dang
58b7(mdo sde): skom med pa/ gcer bu gos med pa/ gos ral po gyon pa dang / yi dgas rnams bkres shing skom pas yongs su zin pa/ gcer bu rang gi sgras yog pa/ mchil ma dang / ngar snabs dang /
59a1(mdo sde): khrag dang / rnag pa 'dod pa de lta bu'i sems can de dag bskyab pa'i phyir/ zas dang / skom dang / gos kyi char khyod kyis phob cig/ de nas de ma thag tu byang chub sems
59a2(mdo sde): dpa' nam mkha' mdzod kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis/ bza' ba dang / bca' ba dang / myang ba dang / bldag pa sna tshogs kyi char rab tu phab ste/ ro brgya dang ldan pa'i khu ba dang btung ba thams cad kyi
59a3(mdo sde): char gyi rgyun shing rta'i srog shing tsam gyi char mngon par phab bo/ / gos kha dog du ma dang / kha dog tha dad pa dang / kha dog brgya stong du ma dang / phra zhing 'jam pa ka tsa lin di ka ltar reg na bde ba'i
59a4(mdo sde): char rab tu bab ste/ de nas stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na bkren pa dang / dbul po thams cad dang / yi dgas thams cad kun tshim par byas so// de nas byang chub sems
59a5(mdo sde): dpa' sman pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba des/ byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha'i mdzod la 'di skad ces smras so// rigs kyi bu sems can na ba g.yog med/ nang du mas reg pa yod pa de dag gi
59a6(mdo sde): don du/ sman chen po'i char gang gis na ba de dag thams cad nad las yongs su thar par 'gyur ba phob cig/ de nas de ma thag tu bar snang las bdud rtsi'i sman gyi char mngon par rab tu phab ste/ des
59a7(mdo sde): nad thams cad las yongs su thar par gyur to/ / de nas byang chub sems dpa' ngan song spong zhes bya ba des/ byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' mdzod la 'di skad ces smras so// rigs kyi bu
59b1(mdo sde): khyod kyis ngan song gsum zhi bar gyis shig/ de nas de ma thag tu bar snang las 'od rab tu btang ste/ sems can dmyal ba pa dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas pa dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten pa'i
59b2(mdo sde): sems can rnams 'od des reg pa de dag thams cad bde ba dang rab tu ldan par gyur te/ ngan song gsum po thams cad rab tu zhi bar gyur te/ 'di ltar sbyin pa yongs su gtong ba la rab tu sbyor ba'i bar
59b3(mdo sde): du me tog dang / 'phreng ba dang / spos dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / chos gos dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan la sogs pa dang / rol mo sna lnga dang ldan pa dang /
59b4(mdo sde): glu'i dmangs dang / bran po dang / bran mo dang / chung ma dang / khye'u dang / bu mo dang / slas dang / rta dang / bal glang dang / shing rta dang / dpung bu chung dang / bzhon pa dang
59b5(mdo sde): khyim dang / grong dang / grong khyer dang / grong rdal dang / ljongs dang / yul 'khor dang / rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor dang / skyed mos tshal dang / yang thog dang / khang pa brtsegs pa dang /
59b6(mdo sde): khang bzangs dang / rta babs dang / skar khung dang / zla ba kham pa lta bu dang / khri dang / khyogs dang / glang bzhi pa dang / glang bcu drug pa nas/ rtswa cang shes stong gis drang ba dang ldan
59b7(mdo sde): pa'i shing rta'i bar gyi char bar snang las mngon par rab tu bab bo/ / de nas byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' mdzod kyis de lta bur byin gyis brlabs nas byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs chen po la smras
60a1(mdo sde): @pa/ rigs kyi bu dag 'di dag long la byin cig/ yongs su gtong bar gyis te/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par gyis shig/ de nas byang chub sems dpa'/
60a2(mdo sde): tshul khrims kyi rgyan ces bya ba des/ byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' mdzod la 'di skad ces smras so// rigs kyi bu khyod kyis sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i char ni phab na/ de'ang tshul khrims kyi
60a3(mdo sde): pha rol tu phyin pa'i char pob cig/ des tshig de skad ces smras ma thag tu/ phyogs bcu na sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams tshul khrims kyi yon tan gyi rgyan gyi bsngags pa ji snyed brjod pa de snyed
60a4(mdo sde): kyi tshul khrims kyi yon tan dang bsngags pa'i sgra bar snang las byung ngo / / de bzhin du bzod pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / bsam gtan dang / shes rab kyi yon tan gyi sgra yang ji tsam phyogs bcu
60a5(mdo sde): na sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams yi ge dang / nges pa'i tshig dang / brda dag gis chos kyi sgo brgya stong ston pa'i chos kyi sgra de dag thams cad ma chad ma lhag khyad ma zhugs par bar sna
60a6(mdo sde): las ma lus par rdzogs par byung ngo / / chos kyi sgra des stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad go bar byas so// de na tshad med grangs med pa'i sems can theg pa gsum la yongs
60a7(mdo sde): su smin par byas par gyur to/ / de nas byang chub sems dpa' kun tu snang ba zhes bya ba de 'di snyam du sems so// byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' mdzod kyis bkod pa 'jig rten 'di 'ba' zhig na
60b1(mdo sde): 'am 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan dag na'ang yod snyam pa dang / de nas byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' mdzod kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu snang ba'i sems kyi kun tu rtog pa sems kyis shes so//
60b2(mdo sde): shes nas kyang byang chub sems dpa' kun tu snang la 'di skad ces smras so// rigs kyi bu khyod shin tu dri ma med cing shin tu rnam par dag pa'i lha'i mig rnyed na/ rigs kyi bu khyod kyis phyogs bcu'i 'jig
60b3(mdo sde): rten gyi khams rnams su ci mthong ltos shig/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' kun tu snang bas lha'i mig gis phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams rnams su bltas na/ des phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi
60b4(mdo sde): zhing grangs med dpag tu med pa dag na/ ji ltar 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir rin po che thams cad kyi char rab tu phab pa dang / chos kyi sgra thams cad grag pa de bzhin du/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag na'ang ma
60b5(mdo sde): tshad ma lhag khyad ma zhugs par 'di lta bu'i bya ba rnams rab tu 'byung bar mthong ngo / / de nas byang chub sems dpa' kun tu snang ba ngo mtshar du gyur nas/ byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' mdzod kyi
60b6(mdo sde): smon lam gyi byin gyi rlabs pa de ni bsam gyis mi khyab ste/ ga lar yang cog car sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du skyes bu dam pas 'di 'dra ba'i char sngon par rab tu phab po zhes ched du brjod pa 'di ched du
60b7(mdo sde): brjod do/ / de nas sangs rgyas kyi mthu dang / byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' mdzod kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor des gang du rin po che'i char dang / chos kyi char rab tu 'bab
61a1(mdo sde): pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag mthong ngo / / yang byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' mdzod kyis/ rin po che'i char dang / chos kyi char gyi cho 'phrul 'di bstan pas bgrang ba las/
61a2(mdo sde): 'das pa'i sems can rnams byang chub tu sems skyes so// de nas rgyal po'i khab nas bud med yugs mo lnga brgya byung nas/ byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' mdzod ga la ba der dong ste lhags
61a3(mdo sde): nas byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' mdzod la 'di skad ces smras so/ / skyes bu dam pa khyod sems can thams cad kyi 'dod pa rdzogs par mdzad na/ bdag cag la'ang khyo stsol cig/
61a4(mdo sde): de nas de ma thag tu byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' mdzod kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis bud med de dag gi sngon gyi khyo nyid kha dog dang / mtshan ma dang / dbyibs ci 'dra ba de lta bu'i skyes pa lnga brgya nam
61a5(mdo sde): mkha' las babs nas/ byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' mdzod kyi mdun na 'khod do// de nas byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' mdzod kyis/ bud med de dag la 'di skad ces smras so//
61a6(mdo sde): sring mo dag bdag bdag gi khyo ji lta ba bzhin du khri cig/ de nas bud med de dag gis ji lta bur rang rang gi khyo gang yin pa khrid nas dga' mgu rangs shing rab tu dga' ste/ yid bde ba skyes nas rang
61a7(mdo sde): rang gi khyim du dong ngo / / de nas sprul pa'i skyes bu de dag gis zhag bdun du bud med de dag ji ltar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog pa de lta de ltar smin par byas so//
61b1(mdo sde): de nas yang bud med lnga brgya po de dag byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' mdzod kyi thad du lhags nas tshigs su bcad pa 'di skad ces smras so// chos kyi rang bzhin stong pa sgyu ma 'dra// chos kyi mtshan/
61b2(mdo sde): nyid de ni sngon ma 'tshal// de phyir khyod kyis sprul pa'i khyo stsal te// bdag cag theg pa'i mchog la des smin bgyis// chos 'di thams cad yang dag sprul pa ste// g.yo ba med cing byed med snga nas
61b3(mdo sde): stong zag med ye shes dag gis rab rtogs te/ / slan chad nyon mongs dbang du mi mchi'o// byang chub mchog gi sems ni bskyed par bgyi// sems can thams cad mgron du gnyer bar bgyi//
61b4(mdo sde): sems can rgya chen khyod kyis phab pa bzhin// bdag cag gis kyang chos mchog char pa dbab// 'dren mchog thub pas de dag lung bstan pa// khyed cag ma 'ongs dus na 'gyur ba ni// sdud
61b5(mdo sde): pa spyar nas rgyal ba'i dbang po dag/ shin tu dul zhes bya ba'i bde gshegs 'gyur// yang de'i tshe na mo lnga brgya gsad par chad de gsad du khrid pa las/ de dag gis bar snang las sems can
61b6(mdo sde): rnams byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' mdzod ces bya ba gang 'jigs pa'i sems can rnams la mi 'jigs pa sbyin pa zhig yod kyis/ de la khyed cag phyag tshol cig dang / gsad pa 'di las thar
61b7(mdo sde): par 'gyur ro zhes sgra zhig thos so/ / de nas de dag thams cad shi bas 'jigs skrag pas sgra skad gcig tu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha' mdzod la phyag 'tshal/
62a1(mdo sde): lo zhes tshig de skad smras so// tshig de skad ces smras ma thag tu/ skad cig de nyid la bar snang las mi lnga brgya babs te der lhags nas/ gshed ma mi de dag la 'di skad
62a2(mdo sde): ces smras so/ / khyed cag gis mi dbul po 'di dag gsad de ci rung / nged cag gi gos dang rgyan rnams khyer la/ nged cag gi srog chod de mi 'di dag khye zhig/ de dag chags pas non pa'i
62a3(mdo sde): phyir/ gsad par chad pa'i mi lnga brgya po de dag btang ste/ sprul pa'i skyes bu de dag gsad do// de nas mi gsad pa las btang ba de dag gsad pas 'jigs shing skrag pa las dbugs 'byin pa
62a4(mdo sde): rnyed pas/ byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' mdzod ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la'ang mgo bos phyag 'tshal lo// byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' mdzod
62a5(mdo sde): la'ang thal mo sbyar te phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad ces gsol to/ / skyes bu dam pa khyod kyis bdag gi srog dang / dbugs 'byin pa rnyed par bgyis na bdag cag chos gang la nan tan du bgyis pas
62a6(mdo sde): bdag la sman pa dang / gzhan la sman pa la zhugs par 'gyur ba'i chos bstan pa bdag cag la stsal du gsol/ byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' mdzod kyis smras pa/ rigs kyi bu khyed
62a7(mdo sde): cag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems skyed cig dang / 'di ltar khyed rnams bdag la phan pa dang / gzhan la phan par zhugs par 'gyur ro// de dag la de skad ces
62b1(mdo sde): smras pa dang / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do// de dag la byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' mdzod kyis brgya stong ro ba'i ras bcos bu zung gcig byin te
62b2(mdo sde): grogs po dag ras bcos bu zung 'di de bzhin gshegs pa la gsol cig/ de dag thams cad kyis ras bcos bu zung de de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku la mngon par gsol te/ de dag thams cad
62b3(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis bskal pa bgrang ba las 'das pa na byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams yang dag par bsgrubs nas mi 'jigs pa sbyin pa zhes bya ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa 'jig rten du 'byung ngo/ zhes lung bstan to/
62b4(mdo sde): / de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus/ byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha'i ma dzod la 'di skad ces smras so// rigs kyi bu khyod kyis gang mi skam mi zad mi dengs
62b5(mdo sde): pa'i nam mkha' la mdzod bzhag nas ji srid lon/ nam mkha' mdzod kyis smras pa/ btsun pa shA ri'i bu 'di ji snyam du sems ci nam mkha' skam pa'am/ zad pa yod dam/
62b6(mdo sde): dengs par 'gyur ram// smras pa/ rigs kyi bu de lta ma yin no// smras pa/ btsun pa shA ri'i bu de bzhin du/ byang chub de ni nam mkha'i ngo bo nyid kyi mtshan nyid de/ de la bdag
62b7(mdo sde): gi dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams der bsngos pas/ de bas na nam mkha' la mdzod mi skams mi zad mi dengs so// yang khyod kyis nam mkha' la mdzod bzhag nas ji srid lon zhes zer ba ni/
63a1(mdo sde): kho bos byang chub tu sems bskyed nas ji srid lon pa de srid do// smras pa/ rigs kyi bu khyod kyis byang chub tu sems bskyed nas ji srid lon/ smras pa/ bcom ldan
63a2(mdo sde): 'das kyis mkhyen pas mkhyen to/ / de nas gnas brtan shA ri'i bus/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' mdzod kyis
63a3(mdo sde): byang chub sems bskyed nas ji srid lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu gal te de bzhin gshegs pas gnas 'di bstan na lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten rnams myos
63a4(mdo sde): par 'gyur ro/ / gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'khor 'di na sems can gang rnams rtog pa mang zhing dad par 'gyur ba dag mchis kyis bshad du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal
63a5(mdo sde): pa shA ri'i bu 'di lta ste/ dper na gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams na/ pad+ma'i klung gi bye ma snyed pa de snyed kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyis yongs su gang bar
63a6(mdo sde): gyur te/ rdul phra rab kyi rdul de dag ji snyed yod pa de snyed kyi bskal pa brgya stong zhing rdul phra mo gcig bzhag la/ de lta bur bgrang ba dang mtshan mar bzhag pas de skad kyi rdul phra mo thams cad ni
63a7(mdo sde): zad par 'gyur gyi/ ji srid nas byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' mdzod kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa'i bskal pa grangs med pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya
63b1(mdo sde): stong de dag la zad pa gang yang med do/ / shA ri'i bus gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das gang gi thad nas byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' mdzod kyis dang po byang chub tu sems bskyed pa de bzhin
63b2(mdo sde): gshegs pa de mtshan ci zhes bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ yang shA ri'i bu de'i tshe de'i dus na/ rin po che bkod pa zhes bya ba'i bskal pa la sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad
63b3(mdo sde): ston pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams su de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa
63b4(mdo sde): skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/ bla na med pa/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das smon lam thams cad las shin tu byung ba/ rin po che'i gzi brjid 'phags pa'i rgyal po
63b5(mdo sde): zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/ yang shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa de'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa yod pa de dag gi tshe'i tshad bskal par gnas kyang bshad par sla ba ma yin no//
63b6(mdo sde): shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa de'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor ni 'jig rten gyi khams stong gi tshad du gyur te/ byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun ni bgrang ba las 'dra ba zhig byung ngo // shA ri'i bu
63b7(mdo sde): de'i dus na/ 'jig rten gyi khams de na stong gsum gyi 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po lha thams cad kyis dbang bskur ba zhes bya ba zhig byung ste/ rin po che'i mdzod bsam gyis mi khyab bo//
64a1(mdo sde): de'i bu rdzus te skyes pa rang gi gzi brjid kyis mngon par grub pa sum khri drug stong yod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na bud med kyi ming yang med do//
64a2(mdo sde): shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa de'i tshe'i tshad kyang bskal pa stong phrag brgya thub bo// de nas rgyal po lha thams cad kyis dbang bskur bas/ bar gyi bskal pa bzhi bcur bcom ldan 'das de la bsnyen/
64a3(mdo sde): bkur dang rim gro byas te/ nyin gcig la 'god pa yang ri rab bye ba stong snyed kyi rin po che'i phung po zad par gyur pa de lta bus bsnyen bkur dang rim gro byas te// de nas rgyal po de bsod nams kyis
64a4(mdo sde): brtan pas bu'i tshogs dang / grong gi mi rnams dang / 'khor rnams dang bcas te bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do// shA ri'i bu de'i tshe de'i dus na/ 'khor los
64a5(mdo sde): skur ba'i rgyal po lha thams cad kyis dbang bskur ba zhes bya ba de gzhan zhig yin pa snyam du khyod sems na/ de de ltar mi blta'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' mdzod
64a6(mdo sde): de'i tshe de'i dus na/ stong gsum gyi 'khor lo sgyur ba'i rgyal po lha thams cad kyis dbang bskur ba zhes bya bar gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bus 'di skad ces
64a7(mdo sde): gsol to/ / kye ma byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' mdzod 'dis bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i go cha bgos te/ bcom ldan 'das de srid nas theg pa la rab tu zhugs pa ngo mtshar to//
64b1(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das de 'dra ba'i spyod pas 'di 'dra ba'i chos kyi mthu chen po rnyed par nus so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' mdzod 'di gad+hA'i
64b2(mdo sde): klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la rim gro dang bsti stang byas te/ byang chub kyi sems yongs su sbyangs so// gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi byang chub kyi sems yongs su dge bas
64b3(mdo sde): bsam pa yongs su sbyangs te/ gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi bsam pa yongs su dag pas sbyor ba yongs su sbyangs/ gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sbyor ba yongs su dag pas lhag pa'i bsam pa yongs su sbyangs
64b4(mdo sde): gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi lhag pa'i ba sem pa yongs su dag pas sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su spangs/ gang+gA'i klang gi bye ma snyed kyi sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pas tshul khrims kyi pha
64b5(mdo sde): rol tu phyin pa yongs su sbyangs/ gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag blo/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su sbyangs/ gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa
64b6(mdo sde): yongs su dag pas brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su sbyangs/ gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pas/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su sbyangs
64b7(mdo sde): gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su sbyangs/ gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag
65a1(mdo sde): pas thabs kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su sbyangs/ pad+ma'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi thabs kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pas/ sems can thams cad la khong khro ba med
65a2(mdo sde): nga'i sems dang / thogs pa med pa'i 'od zer yongs su sbyangs/ gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sems can thams cad la khong khro ba med pa'i sems dang thogs pa med pa'i 'od zer yongs su dag
65a3(mdo sde): pas/ byams pa chen po yongs su sbyangs pa nas/ snying rje chen po dang / dga' ba chen po dang / btang snyoms cheno dang / mngon par shes pa chen po'i ye shes kyi bar du yongs su sbyangs
65a4(mdo sde): so/ / de bzhin du lus yongs su dag pa dang / ngag yongs su dag pa dang / sems yongs su dag pa ste/ pad+ma'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sems yongs su dag pas/ skyes bu chen po'i
65a5(mdo sde): mtshan gcig yongs su sbyangs so/ / de bzhin du sbyar te/ skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis thams cad nas/ skyes bu chen po'i mtshan thams cad yongs su dag pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba'i
65a6(mdo sde): bar bar du des gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed las 'das pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams yongs su dag pas/ nam mkha'i mdzod 'di yongs su dag par byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' mdzod 'dis yongs su
65a7(mdo sde): sbyangs so/ / shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' mdzod 'dis nam mkha' las byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa thams cad ston te/ shA ri'i bu ji ltar nam mkha' la zad pa med pa de bzhin//
65b1(mdo sde): du/ rigs kyi bu 'di'i smon lam dang spyod pa thams cad yongs su dag pas gang la'ang zad pa med do// des na 'di nam mkha'i mdzod ces bya'o// bstan pa 'di bshad pa na/ byang chub/
65b2(mdo sde): sems dpa' khri longs spyod mi zad pa dang / lag na rin po che dang / nam mkha' mdzod kyi smon lam yongs su bskang ba'i bzod pa skyes so// de nas byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi rgyal
65b3(mdo sde): po zhes bya ba des/ byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' mdzod la 'di skad ces smras so// rigs kyi bu bdag cag gis nam mkha' las chos bsgrag pa'i mdzod mnyan to// nam mkha' mdzod
65b4(mdo sde): kyis smras pa/ de'i phyir rigs kyi bu gus pa dang bcas shing zhes dang bcas par 'dug la/ nam mkha' 'di la ston par 'du shes skyed cig dang / chos mnyan pa'i mdzod thos so// de nas
65b5(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi rgyal po dang 'khor de dag thams cad thal mo sbyar nas nam mkha' la phyag 'tshal te 'khod do/ / de nas byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha'i mdzod kyi byin gyi rlabs
65b6(mdo sde): kyi bar snang las tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag byung ngo / / nam mkha' 'dra ba'i yid rnams kyis// thams cad chos kyi tshul gang yin// de la 'jug par rab bstan gyis// khyed cag
65b7(mdo sde): mthar gyis mnyan par gyis/ / nam mkha' la ni mtho ba med// dma' ba'ang yod pa ma yin te// gang gis chos nyid mtho dman med// de la 'dud pa ga la yod// nam mkha' la ni
66a1(mdo sde): skye ba med/ 'gog pa dag kyang mi dmigs so// ma skyes pa yi chos rnams la// de la rnam par 'jig pa med// nam mkha' la ni 'bri ba med// gang ba dag/
66a2(mdo sde): kyang mi dmigs so// chos rnams gang med 'bri med de// nam mkha' dang ni mtshungs mnyam mo// nam mkha' la ni mun pa med// de ni de yis snyon mi mongs// sems kyi rang bzhin
66a3(mdo sde): 'od gsal bas/ de bas nams kyang nyon mongs me// nyi zla yi ni 'od zer gyis// nam mkha' dga' bar mi 'gyur te// nam mkha' 'dra ba'i sems rnams kyang // gang la'ang dga'
66a4(mdo sde): bar 'gyur ba med/ / mdung thung rtse gnyis 'bab pas kyang // nam mkha' la ni rnon mongs med// de bzhin sdug bsngal sgo kun gyis// rgyal ba'i sras ni nyon mi mongs// bdud rtsi dus
66a5(mdo sde): kyi char pa yis/ / nam mkha' la ni dga' 'gyur med// rnyed dang bsti stang thams cad kyis// byang chub sems dpa' dga' mi byed// bstod pa dang ni smad pa la// nam mkha' yongs su
66a6(mdo sde): mi rtog ste/ / de bzhin bde dang sdug bsngal la// byang chub sems dpa' brtan mi g.yo// sa dag g.yos par gyur kyang ni// nam mkha' nam yang g.yo ba med// 'jig rten 'di dag g.yo/
66a7(mdo sde): 'khrug kyang // byang chub sems dpa' 'khrug pa med// bsreg pa'i bskal pa 'byung ba na// ji ltar nam mkha' mi 'tshig pa// de bzhin nyon mongs thams cad kyis// byang chub sem/
66b1(mdo sde): dpa' brtan mi gdung // skye ba med cing 'dul ba'ang med// ji ltar nam mkha' gnas pa bzhin// chos rnams 'od med 'gro ba'ang med// chos kyi dbyings la de dag gnas/
66b2(mdo sde): gzugs su snang ba ji snyed pa// nam mkha' las ni thams cad 'byung // chos su snang ba ji snyed pa// de dag chos kyi dbyings las 'byung // mtshan ma med cing gzugs med pa/
66b3(mdo sde): nam mkha' ltar yong ma yin te// de myur sem sa rnams rab shes na// nAm mkha'i ring ni ma tshungs ma rnam mo// ming tsam pa ni nam mkha'iH// de la kha dog dbyangs kyang med/
66b4(mdo sde): sems dang yid dang rnam shes kyang // ming gis yongs su bstan pa'o// ji ltar nam mkha' mtha' med cing // thams cad du yang gzung du med// de bzhin ye shes mthu chen kyang // nam
66b5(mdo sde): mkha' dang ni mnyam nyid mtshungs/ / sems can nam mkha' 'gro mod kyi// de la 'gro ba'i rjes kyang med// sems can byang chub phyir spyod kyang // de ni spyod pa'i mtshan ma min// ji ltar sngon
66b6(mdo sde): gyi mtha' yi lus/ / nam mkha' dang ni mtshungs 'dra ba// de bzhin phung po'i ngo bo nyid// nam mkha' dang ni mnyam zhing mtshungs// khams bzhi dag kyang nam mkha' dang // mtshus
66b7(mdo sde): shing 'dra ba rab tu gsungs/ / 'di ltar bsreg pa'i bskal pa la'ang // nam mkha' dang ni khams 'di mtshungs// ji ltar sems can thams cad kyis// rnams kyang yongs su yang mi nus/
67a1(mdo sde): de bzhin yul rnams kun gyis kyang // sems kyi rgyud ni mi gang ngo // tshig chen seng ge'i sgra dag gis// 'jig rten mgon gyis gsungs pa ni// 'jig rten 'das pa'i/
67a2(mdo sde): shes rab gang // de dag bstan pa 'di la ngoms// ji ltar nam mkha' rgya che bas// mtha' ma dmigs par mi 'gyur te// de bzhin sangs rgyas chos rnams kyang // mtha' ma
67a3(mdo sde): dmigs par mi 'gyur ro/ / chos rnams thams cad sangs rgyas chos// gang gis yang dag nyid shes na// de dag dngos po mi 'jig cing // dngos po dag la'ang mi gnas so//
67a4(mdo sde): dngos dang dngos med rnam shes shing // yang dag mtha' la gang gnas pa// dngos po dang ni dngos med par// lta ba mkhas pas mi 'dzin to// stong pa nyid ni sgra yis bsgrags//
67a5(mdo sde): sgra stong pa ring me re// de ni sgra med brjod pa med// de phyir stong pa nyid ces bya// sangs rgyas kun gyis bshad kyang ni// stong pa nyid ni brjod du med// gang de stong zhes bya ba yang /
67a6(mdo sde): de yi don ni brjod du med// sgyu ma smig rgya rmi lam dang // mig yor dang ni brag cha rnams// de la sogs pa bshad pa yis// 'dren pa rnams ni chos ston to// sems can rnams ni drag
67a7(mdo sde): ba'i phyir/ / dpe rnams shin tu kun bstan te// rab tu zhi ba'i chos rnams la// gnyen po rnams ni mi dmigs so// mtshan nyid med pa'i chos kun kyang // mtshan nyid du ni rab tu bstan/
67b1(mdo sde): maman gnamatshan gzhime pa dang // chos kyi dbyings lam dmigs so// mtshan kazha nam mkha'i mtshan nyid de// nam mkha' mtshan nyid med pa yin// gang gis tshul 'di rab rtogs pa/
67b2(mdo sde): de dag byang chub sems dpa' yin// chags pa med cing bcings pa med// shin tu cung zad med pa ste// spros med spros dang bral ba de// byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya'o// sems can las
67b3(mdo sde): ni de ma grol/ / sems can la yang mi gnas shing // sems can rang bzhin ye shes kyis// byang chub sems dpa' zhes de bya// sems can rab tu mya ngan 'das// thos nas dngang bar
67b4(mdo sde): mi byed de/ / gang de byang chub rab zhugs pa// dpa' bo dag gi go cha 'di// sgyu ma byed pa sems can dag/ mang du sprul nas der gsad kyang // de la gsad pa gang yang med// sems can
67b5(mdo sde): mtshan nyid de bzhin no/ / sgyu ma dang ni sems can dang // mya ngan 'das dang sangs rgyas kun// rnam pa kun tu rang bzhin gcig/ rang bzhin rang bzhin med par rtogs// nam mkha' las ni nam
67b6(mdo sde): mkha'i mdzod/ / mi zad pa yi mdzod grub ste// sems can thams cad mgu byed cing // mdzod de zad par mi 'gyur ro// tshad med bsod nams chu bos ni// mdzod 'di rnam par sbyangs pa ste/
67b7(mdo sde): chos rnams la yang 'pho med par// chos rnams chos nyid blta bar bya// rgyu la brten te byung ba yi// chos rnams thams cad rab shes na// de yi mdzod ni mi zad de// chos kyi mdzod ni bsam
68a1(mdo sde): mi khyab/ / chos bzhi 'di dag mi zad bar// 'jig rten mgon pos rab gsungs te// sems can nam mkha' byang chub sems// de bzhin sangs rgyas chos rnams so//
68a2(mdo sde): deste de dag rdzas yin na// de dag yongs su zad 'gyur gyi// de dag med pas mi zad ces// de bas de ni mi zad gsungs// chos ni rab tu skad cig pa// zad pa chos ni mo zad de/
68a3(mdo sde): mi zad de la zad pa med// de phyir mi zad pa zhes bya// byang chub sems dpa' gang zhig gis// chos bstan 'di ni rab shes na// des ni byang chub rnyed mi dka'// byang chub nyid la yang
68a4(mdo sde): dag zhugs/ / tshigs su bcad pa bstan pa 'di byung ba na/ byang chub sems dpa' brgya stong ni mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob bo// lha'i bu nam mkha'i dkyil na 'khod pa khri nyis stong ni bla na
68a5(mdo sde): med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu ses sa bskyed do/ / de nas 'khor de nyid du byang chub sems dpa' ltad mo can zhe bya ba 'dus par gyur te/ 'dug pa des bcom ldan
68a6(mdo sde): 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ / bcom ldan 'das sgra 'di ga las byung snyam du bdag ngo mtshar du gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems
68a7(mdo sde): dpa' nam mkha' mdzod la dris shig dang / 'dis khyod la lan ldon no// de nas byang chub sems dpa' ljang mo can gyis/ byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' mdzod la 'di skad ces smras so//
68b1(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu sgra 'di ga las bya snyam du bdag ltad mor 'dzin par gyur to// nam mkha' mdzod kyis smras pa/ rigs kyi bu 'di ji snyam du sems/ brag cha'i sgra ga las byung / smras pa/ rigs
68b2(mdo sde): kyi bu pha rol gyi sgra'i rnam par rig byed las brag cha'i sgra 'byung ngo / / smras pa/ rigs kyi bu brag cha la lus sam/ sems sam/ gzugs sam/ kha dog gam/ dbyibs gang yang yod dam/
68b3(mdo sde): smras pa/ rigs kyi bu de ni med do// smras pa/ rigs kyi bu de de bzhin no// ji ltar brag cha yongs su ma grub kyang sgra skad go bar byed pa de bzhin du/ nam mkha' yongs su ma grub ste/ sgra dang skad go//
68b4(mdo sde): bar byed par 'gyur ro// smras pa/ rigs kyi bu sgra 'di go bar byed pa su gang nas dbyangs 'di 'byung / smras pa/ rigs kyi bu ye shes kyi so sor rnam par rig pa bsam gyis mi khyab ste/ kho bos yid
68b5(mdo sde): kyi sems pas gang bsam pa de bar snang 'di las byung yang / sems de der 'gro ba'ang med/ de 'dir 'ong ba'ang med mod kyi/ sgra'i sgra brnyan yang 'byung ngo // rigs kyi bu rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba
68b6(mdo sde): ji tsam du zab pa la ltos/ gang rgyu las 'bras bu 'byung yang / rgyu 'bras bu 'grub pa mi 'pho la/ rgyu med pa las kyang 'bras bu 'byung ba ma yin no// 'di lta ste/ rgyu dang rkyen las 'bras bu mngon par
68b7(mdo sde): 'grub pa'i chos 'di gnyis ka la'ang g.yo ba med cing byed pa med do/ / gang de lta bu'i 'du shes pa de dag ni bral ba ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang gang kun nas nyon mongs pa shes pa de
69a1(mdo sde): nyid de'i rnam par byang ba zhes gsungs so/ / kun nas nyon mongs pa bsal bas rnam par byang ba ma yin te/ gang kun nas nyon mongs pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi mtshan nyid de ni rnam par byang/
69a2(mdo sde): bya'o// 'di lta ste/ kun nas nyon mongs pa dang / rnam par byang ba zhes bya ba 'di gnyis ka yang brda'i tshig go// don dam pa'i mtha' la kun nas nyon mongs pa dang / rnam par byang ba'ang dmigs
69a3(mdo sde): su med do/ / don dam pa'i mtha' ni mtha' ma yin te/ gang 'di mtha' ma yin pa ni yang dag pa'i mtha' zhes bya'o// gang yang dag pa'i mtha' de stong pa nyid kyi mtha' 'o// gang stong pa nyid kyi mtha' de
69a4(mdo sde): bdag gi mtha' 'o/ / gang bdag gi mtha' de ni chos thams cad kyi mtha' 'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ chos thams cad ni de'i mtha'/ stong pa nyid kyi mtha'/ nye bar zhi ba'i mtha' ste/ gang mtha' de
69a5(mdo sde): gsum gyi sgo la mi chags pa de ni chos thams cad la mi chags pa'i ye shes rnyed do/ / de nas gnas brtan shA ri'i bus/ byang chub sems dpa' ltad mod can la 'di skad ces smras so// rigs kyi bu
69a6(mdo sde): khyod ltad mo can zhes ming sus btags/ smras pa/ btsun pa shA ri'i bu khyod gang dang gang du chos la 'dun pa dang / brtson pa de dang der ltad mor mi 'gyur ram/ smras pa/ rigs kyi bu de de
69a7(mdo sde): bzhin no/ / smras pa/ btsun pa shA ri'i bu de bzhin du kho bo chos thams cad la 'dun cing brtson pa de dang der kho bos nam sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur snyam du ltad mo
69b1(mdo sde): dang ldan te/ de'i phyir kho bo ltad mo can zhes bya'o// byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa thams cad la kho bo ltad mor gyur te/ sems can thams cad kyi sems dang spyod pa la 'jug pa shes pa la kho bo/
69b2(mdo sde): ltang mor gyur te/ de'i phyir kho bo ltad mo can zhes bya'o// gang la kho bo ltang sor mi 'gyur ba'i ye shes de gang yang med/ 'jug pa de gang yang med pas/ de'i phyir kho bo ltad mo can zhes bya'o// gang
69b3(mdo sde): du kho bo ltad mor gyur pa der nyon mongs pa thams cad dang / bdud kyi las thams cad kyi skabs med/ de'i phyir na kho bo ltad mo can zhes bya'o// de nas bcon ldan 'das la/ gnas brtan shA ri'i
69b4(mdo sde): bus 'di skad ces gsol to/ / bcom ldan 'das skyes bu dam pa'i ming 'di nyid las sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yongs su brjod de/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad ston kyang gang la'ang mi chags te/
69b5(mdo sde): chags pa ma mchis par sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyang ston pa ni ngo mtshar to// de nas 'khor de nyid du byang chub sems dpa' rin chen dpal zhes bya ba 'dus par gyur te 'dug pa des/ byang chub
69b6(mdo sde): sems dpa' nam mkha' mdzod la 'di skad ces smras so/ / rigs kyi bu khyod kyis ting nge 'dzin rab tu bstan pa las brtsams te/ gang ci 'dra bar ting nge 'dzin yongs su sbyang ba bya ba la spobs par gyis
69b7(mdo sde): shig/ de skad ces smras pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' mdzod kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' rin chen dpal la 'di skad ces smras so// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams
70a1(mdo sde): kyi ting nge 'dzin byang chub kyi snying por thogs pa med par 'gro ba bsam pa dag pa zhes bya ba yod do/ / rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ting nge 'dzin sems can thams cad
70a2(mdo sde): la khro ba med pa'i 'od zer ces bya ba yod de/ de dag dang gzhan bsrung ba'i phyir/ gzhan gyi gnod pa thams cad las yang dag par 'da' bar 'gyur ro// dri ma med ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni sem
70a3(mdo sde): yongs su dag par 'gyur ro/ / rnam par snang mdzad ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni dge ba'i chos thams cad rnam par 'phel bar 'gyur ro// dge ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni rnyog pa med par
70a4(mdo sde): 'gyur ro/ / mngon par 'phags zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni spyi gtsug bltar mi mthong bar 'gyur ro// rnam par sel ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni nyon mongs pa thams cad 'dul bar 'gyur ro//
70a5(mdo sde): 'khyil pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni g.yas phyogs kyi lam yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// zlog pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni rgyu dang lta ba las rnam par zlog par 'gyur ro// dga' byed ces bya
70a6(mdo sde): ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni chos kyi kun dga' la dga' zhing mos par 'gyur ro/ / skar ma'i rjes su song ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni sbyin gnas yongs su dag par 'gyur ro// mthu drag po zhes bya ba'i
70a7(mdo sde): ting nge 'dzin ni sems mi 'dzum par 'gyur ro/ / mtshungs par mnyam pa nyid la 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni sems can thams cad la sems mnyam par 'gyur ro// byed pa la 'jug pa
70b1(mdo sde): zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni las rnam par smin pa la 'jug par 'gyur ro/ / seng ge'i rtog ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni 'jigs pa dang spu zing zhes byed pa med par 'gyur ro// sems dpa' zhes
70b2(mdo sde): bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni nyon mongs pa'i bdud thams cad skrag par 'gyur ro/ / pad+ma dkar po zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni 'jig rten thams cad kyis mi gos par 'gyur ro// pad+ma bkod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge/
70b3(mdo sde): 'dzin ni sems kyi rgyan du 'gyur ro// 'od bkod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi zhing snang bar 'gyur ro// bya ba byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni rjes su chags pa dang khong khro ba spong
70b4(mdo sde): bar 'gyur ro/ / rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo'i dpung rgyan zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos la snang bar 'gyur ro// skar mda' ldan zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni bag chags thams cad 'dzin
70b5(mdo sde): par 'gyur ro/ / nyi ma'i sgron ma zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni mun pa mun nag med par 'gyur ro// nyi ma 'khyil ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni sems can thams cad kyi sems la rnam par lta bar 'gyur ro//
70b6(mdo sde): yon tan gyi 'byung gnas zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni yon tan gyi chos thams cad kyi rjes su 'gro bar 'gyur ro// sred med kyi bu zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni pha rol rgol ba thams cad 'joms par 'gyur ro//
70b7(mdo sde): snying po'i rjes su song ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni rdo rje'i lus mi byed par 'gyur ro// snying po dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni dam bcas pa thams cad nyams 'og tu chud par 'gyur ro// rdo rje
71a1(mdo sde): dkyil 'khor zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni mngon par shes pa las mi nyams par 'gyur ro/ / rdo rje snying po zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin ni byang chub kyi snying por 'gro bar 'gyur ro//
71a2(mdo sde): rdo rje lta bu zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin no chos thams cad rab tu rtogs par 'gyur ro// spyod pa dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni sems can thams cad kyi sems dang spyod pa la 'jug pa'i ye shes
71a3(mdo sde): su 'gyur ro/ / sa 'dzin ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni chags pa dang zhe sdang med par 'gyur ro// bdud kyi dkyil 'khor 'joms pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni bdud bzhi las yang dag par 'da' bar
71a4(mdo sde): 'gyur ro/ / lus rnam par 'jigs pa zhes bya ba'i tong nge 'dzin ni gzugs thams cad rnam par 'jog par 'gyur ro// mi 'dzums pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni rtse gcig tu 'gyur ro// rnam pa la
71a5(mdo sde): 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni dmigs pa thams cad yongs su dag par 'gyur ro/ / nyon mongs pa med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni dmigs pa thams cad las yang dag par 'da' bar 'gyur
71a6(mdo sde): ro/ / 'khor lo dri ma med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni chos kyi 'khor lo yongs su dag par 'gyur ro// glog 'od ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni sems kyi skad cig 'jig pa la rnam par lta bar 'gyur ro// /
71a7(mdo sde): legs par byas pas rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni dge ba'i chos thams cad yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// rnam par sbyong ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni mi dge ba'i chos thams cad
71b1(mdo sde): spong bar 'gyur ro/ / lus kyi rgyan ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// ngag gi rgyan ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni tshangs pa'i sgra skad bsgrags pas/
71b2(mdo sde): sems can thams cad kyi sems mgu bar 'gyur ro// sems kyi rgyan ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni ting nge 'dzin las mi nyams par 'gyur ro// brtan pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni phyir mi ldog par 'gyur
71b3(mdo sde): ro/ mtshungs par gtong ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni sems can tha dad med par 'gyur ro// tshul khrims bsags pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni smon laM thams cad yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro//
71b4(mdo sde): bzod pa'i go bgos pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni lus dang srog la mi lta bar 'gyur ro// brtson 'grus brtan pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni mngon par shes pa myur bar 'gyur ro// tshad med pa'i
71b5(mdo sde): rnam par zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni tshangs pa la dbang byed par 'gyur ro/ / ci'ang med pa zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin ni gzugs med pa'i khams yongs su sbyong bar 'gyur ro// lhun po'i rgyal mtshan
71b6(mdo sde): zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni sems can thams cad zil gyis gnon par 'gyur ro/ / lhun po'i sgron ma zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni phyogs bcur rnam par lta bar 'gyur ro// shes rab kyi skar mnga' zhes
71b7(mdo sde): bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni sgrib pa dang / chod pa dang / kun nas ldang ba thams cad rnam par sel bar 'gyur ro// rgya mtsho'i phyag rgya zhes bya'i ting nge 'dzin ni las dang bya ba sna tshogs la 'jug par 'gyur/
72a1(mdo sde): ro// mtha' yas 'khyil ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni lta ba thams cad yongs su gcod par 'gyur ro// stong pa nyid ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni mo dmigs pa dang lta ba tham/
72a2(mdo sde): cad spong bar 'gyur ro// mtshan ma med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni rtog pa dang / rnam par rtog pa dang / yongs su rtog pa thams cad spong bar 'gyur ro// smon pa med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge
72a3(mdo sde): 'dzin ni smon lam thams cad yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ / mi g.yo ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni g.yo ba dang sems pa thams cad 'joms par 'gyur ro// sgra dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge
72a4(mdo sde): 'dzin ni spobs pa thogs pa med par 'gyur ro/ / kun 'dzin pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni thos pa thams cad 'dzin par 'gyur ro// dran pa rnam par dag pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni tshad med pa'i snod
72a5(mdo sde): kyis sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad tshol bar 'gyur ro/ / mi zad pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni sems can thams cad mgu bar 'gyur ro// rin chen bkod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni lag na rin po
72a6(mdo sde): rab tu rnyed par 'gyur ro/ / rjes su 'gro ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni sems can thams cad kyi sems shes par 'gyur ro// 'gro ba la 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni 'gro ba thams cad rtogs par
72a7(mdo sde): 'gyur ro/ / blo gros la 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni sems dang yid rnam par dag par 'gyur ro// sprin dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni mos pa ji lta ba bzhin du chos kyi char rab tu 'bebs
72b1(mdo sde): par 'gyur ro/ / sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni bdud rtsi'i chos rnyed par 'gyur ro// chos rjes su dran pa bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni 'dod chags dang bral ba'i chos mngon sum du/
72b2(mdo sde): byed par 'gyur ro// dge 'dun rjes su dran pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni sangs rgyas kyi chos las mi ldog par 'gyur ro// gtong ba rjes su dran pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni phung po thams cad
72b3(mdo sde): rab tu 'dor bar 'gyur ro/ / tshul khrims rjes su dran pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos kyi rtsa ba la rab tu 'god par 'gyur ro// lha rjes su dran pa zhes bya ba'i ting
72b4(mdo sde): nge 'dzin ni rnam par dag pa'i chos la kha na ma tho ba med par 'gyur ro/ / chos kyi dbyings la 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni chos thams cad la yang dag par gzhol bar 'gyur ro// nam mkha'i ngo
72b5(mdo sde): bo nyid ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni chos thams cad la chags pa med par 'gyur ro/ / rang bzhin gyis ma skyes pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par 'gyur ro// rgyud chags
72b6(mdo sde): pa dang rgyud ma yin pa'i rjes su rtog pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni yi ge thams cad dang tshig rab tu dbye ba shes pa la mkhas pa 'dzin par 'gyur ro/ / shin tu sbyangs pa'i dri ma med pa'i phyag rgya zhes bya
72b7(mdo sde): ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni ting nge 'dzin gang dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' de sems kyi skad cig gcig dang ldan pa'i shes rab kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par
73a1(mdo sde): 'tshang rgya'o/ / rigs kyi bu de dag ni ting 'dzin gyi sgo brgyad cu ste/ ting nge 'dzin de re re la'ang 'khor ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo lnga brgya lnga brgya yod do// de dag thams cad bsdoms/
73a2(mdo sde): na ting nge 'dzin bzhi khrir 'gyur te/ de dag kun nas nyon mongs pa dang rnam par byang bas ting nge 'dzin brgyad khrir 'gyur ro// de dag sngon gyi mtha' dang / phyi ma'i mtha' dang / da ltar byung ba mi zad pa
73a3(mdo sde): ye shes kyis ting nge 'dzin brgyad khri bzhi stong du 'gyur ro/ / ting nge 'dzin ji snyed pa chos kyi sgo mo'ang de snyed/ chos kyi phung po'ang de snyed/ de'i phyir sems can gyi spyod pa brgyad khri bzhi stong la rab tu 'jug
73a4(mdo sde): pa'i phyir chos kyi phung po brgyad khri bzhi stong de bzhin gshegs pas bshad ces bya'o/ / rigs kyi bu 'di ni sangs rgyas kyi ye shes dang spyod pa la 'jug pa sems can rnams shes par bya ba'i phyir chos kyi
73a5(mdo sde): mdo'o/ / gang sangs rgyas kyi ye shes mtha' dag dang / sems can gyi spyod pa mtha' dag bshad la 'jug pa de ni tshad med bsam gyis mi khyab ste/ bskal pa brgya stong gyi mthar 'dug kyang bshad par
73a6(mdo sde): slab ma yin no/ / sangs rgyas kyi ye shes 'di yongs su bstan cing ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo 'di dag bshad pa na/ byang chub sems dpa' khri drug stong ni ting nge 'dzin dang ye shes kyis mngon par bsgrubs pas/
73a7(mdo sde): mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur to// lha'i bu brgyad khri bzhi stong ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems skyes so// bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha'
73b1(mdo sde): mdzod la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ skyes bu dam pa khyod kyis ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo 'di bstan pa ni legs par smras te/ lus mngon sum pas gzhan gyi dring la mi 'jog pa'i chos rnams la ji lta ba bzhin
73b2(mdo sde): dutede bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes yongs su brjod pa 'di shin tu yongs su bstan pa ni legs so legs so/ / // 'phags pa nam ma bA mdzod kyi mdo bam po lnga pa/ de nas bcom ldan
73b3(mdo sde): 'das la/ byang chub sems dpa' rin chen dpal gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa gang gi thad du/ byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' mdzod kyis thog mar nam mkha'
73b4(mdo sde): 'di las rin po che thams cad kyi char rab tu phab pa/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' rin chen dpal la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu sngon
73b5(mdo sde): byung ba 'das pa'i dus na/ bskal pa bgrang ba las 'das pa'i pha rol gyi yang ches pha rol tu gyur pa de'i tshe de'i dus na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig/
73b6(mdo sde): pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/ bla na med pa/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dri ma med pa'i 'od
73b7(mdo sde): mtha' yas 'od zer gyi rgyal po zhes bya ba/ ska rags zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams su yon tan gyi 'od ces bya ba'i bskal pa la 'jig rten du byung ste/ yang rigs kyi bu ska rags zhes bya ba'i 'jig/
74a1(mdo sde): rten gyi khams de'ang 'byor pa/ bde ba/ lo legs pa/ rgyas pa/ skye bo mang po dang mis gang ba/ rin po che sna bdun gyis brgyan pa/ 'jam zhing mnyen pa/ gos ka tsa lin
74a2(mdo sde): di ka ltar reg na bde ba/ 'dzam bu chu bo'i gser gyi pad+ma bkram pa/ rin po che gsal ba sna tshogs kyis rnam par smras pa/ mig mangs ris su bres pa/ lag mthil ltar mnyam ste/ 'jig rten
74a3(mdo sde): gyi khams de 'di lta ste/ dper na gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams kyi longs spong dang kun spyod pa ltar 'dug go// mi de dag thams cad kyang gzhal med khang dang khang pa brtsegs pa na gnas par gyur
74a4(mdo sde): cing bsams pas zas skom rab tu 'byor to/ / de'ang rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa dri ma med pa'i 'od mtha' yas 'od zer gyi rgyal po'i byang chub sems dpa' khrag khrig phrag drug cu'i byang chub sems
74a5(mdo sde): dpa'i dge 'dun chen po byung ngo / / yang rigs kyi bu de'i tshe de'i dus na/ 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po bsod nams kyis brgyan pa zhes bya ba rin po che sna bdun dang ldan pa zhig byung ste/ yang rigs
74a6(mdo sde): kyi bu rgyal po bsod nams kyis brgyan pa de'i khang pa 'dzam bu'i gling gi dbus su brtsigs par gyur te/ shar phyogs su'ang dpag tshad ba ni/ nub phyogs dang / lho phyogs dang / byang
74a7(mdo sde): phyogs su'ang dpag tshad bzhi bzhi pa bkra ba/ blta na sdug pa/ rin po che sna bdun las byas pa/ skyed mos tshal lnga brgyas rab tu brgyan pa'o// yang rigs kyi bu rgyal po bsod
74b1(mdo sde): nams kyis brgyan pa'i btsun mo brgyad khri bzhi stong yod de/ thams cad kyang yul gyi bzang mo sha stag go// khye'u brgyad khri bzhi stong yod de/ thams cad kyang tshan chen po'i stobs dang
74b2(mdo sde): drag shul 'chang ba sha stag go/ / yang rigs kyi bu rgyal po bsod nams kyis brgyan pa la btsun mo rin po che gnyis yod de/ gcig gi ming ni dpal gyi gzi brjid/ gcig gi ming ni
74b3(mdo sde): dpal gyi 'od do/ / rgyal po bsod nams kyis brgyan pa de dga' ba bkod pa zhes bya ba'i skyed mos tshal du zhugs te/ btsun mo'i nang na 'dug pa'i tshe lha mo de gnyis kyi pang pa nas khye'u gnyis
74b4(mdo sde): byung ste/ rdzus te skyes pa/ sngon gyi sbyor ba phun sum tshogs pa/ smon lam rdzogs pa/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par zhugs pa ste/ gcig gi ming ni sed
74b5(mdo sde): go zhes bya/ gcig gi ming ni seng ge'i rtsal gyis 'gro ba zhes bya ste/ de gnyis byung ma thag tu sgra skad dbyangs gcig tu/ pha bsod nams kyis brgyan pa la tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras
74b6(mdo sde): so/ / sngon byas dge dang mi dge chud mi za// de bzhin gshegs la mchod byas chud mi za// bsams pa byang chub sems kyang chud mi za// sgrub pa gtsor byed thos pa chud mi za// sbyin
74b7(mdo sde): dang dul dang sdom pa chud mi za/ / bzod dang nges pa rnams kyang chud mi za// byas pa gzo zhing dge ba'i las bya'i phyir// brtson 'grus brtsams pa de yang chud mi za// rtse gcig bsam/
75a1(mdo sde): gtan dang ni rnam thar sems// nges par rtogs dang shes rab sems mi nyams// ye shes las byas rtag tu mi 'khrugs te// mi 'khrugs chos las byang chub
75a2(mdo sde): rnyed mi dka'/ / de ni nyon mongs pa yis mi gos te// de ni slar yang mngal du mi gnas shing // de ni pad+ma'i snying por rdzus te skye// mi gos pa ni pad+ma chu las ltar// shar phyogs
75a3(mdo sde): logs kyi rgyal ba sman pa'i rgyal/ / dus gsum mi chags ye shes dam pa yis// bde gshegs dri med 'od kyi gan nas su// chos 'dod phyir ni de nas bdag cag 'ongs// u dum wa/
75a4(mdo sde): ra'i me tog ji lta bar// de bzhin gshegs pa 'byung ba rnyed par dka'// de la bsnyen bkur bgyi dang blta slad du// bde gshegs thad du yab kyang bzhud par bgyi// rgyal pos rjes su
75a5(mdo sde): bstan pa 'di thos nas/ / bu dang btsun mo 'khor dang lhan cig tu// srog chags bye ba stong gis yongs bskor te// rgyal ba de yi gan du nye bar dong // me tog dri zhim byug pas bcas pa yis//
75a6(mdo sde): de la tshul dang 'dra ba'i mchod byas nas// zhabs la phyag 'tshal rab tu bskor byas te// thal mo sbyar ba byas nas spyan sngar 'dug/ seng ge dang ni seng ge'i rtsal 'gro yang // de bzhin gshegs
75a7(mdo sde): pa'i zhabs la bzung nas su/ / gtugs nas chos dang don ldan mkhas pa yi// 'phags pa des ni tshigs bcad 'di dag smras// khyod ni skyabs dang mgon dang dpung gnyen te// 'jig
75b1(mdo sde): rten ldongs pa rnams kyi sgron mar gyur/ / sems can rnams kyi bsam spyod gyur la mkhas// ji ltar mos pa de bzhin gnas par mdzad// rgyal po 'di ni phyug cing skyid pas myos// gzugs dang
75b2(mdo sde): sgra dang dri dang bcas pas bcig/ / nam yang ston pa la ni mchod phyir yang // nye bar mi mtsho chos ldag la nyan// mgon pos thugs rje rab tu skyed mdzod la// ji ltar de kun lhan cig thos nas su//
75b3(mdo sde): theg pa mchog las ldog par mi 'gyur ba// byang chub lam mchog de ni legs par ston// bcom ldan mgon po ta la brgyad cu srid// nam mkhar 'phags bzhugs mi dbang de la gsungs//
75b4(mdo sde): nga yi chos mchog rgyal po khyod nyon pa// thos nas de la tshul bzhin nan tan gyis// 'dod pa mi rtag de bzhin rgyal srid srog/ srog ni rtsa yi zil pa'i thigs pa 'dra// rtse ba de bzhin 'dod/
75b5(mdo sde): de rmi lam 'dra// mkhas pa su zhig 'di la dga' ba bskyed// sems can gang yang 'dod pas ngoms med de// phyir yang de bzhin 'dod pas skom zhing rgyug/ byis pa ngoms mi shes shing yul
75b6(mdo sde): la gnas/ / shes rab gang ngoms de dag shin tu ngoms// sgyu ma slu zhing snying po med pa ltar// de bzhin phung po lnga yang sgyu ma 'dra// khams rnams 'di dag sprul gdug bzhin du bstan//
75b7(mdo sde): dbang po drug ni stong pa'i grong dang 'dra// bu dang chung ma rgyal srid yul 'khor yang // 'chi bar gnas pa'i grogs su 'gyur ba med// sbyin dul kun sdom tshul khrims phung po ni// de dag pha rol 'gro
76a1(mdo sde): ba'i grogs yin no/ / nga yi gzugs dang yon tan spobs pa rdzogs// rdzu 'phrul dag kyang ci 'dra rab ltos la// gal te 'di 'dra bar yang 'gyur 'dod na// byang chub dam pa
76a2(mdo sde): 'di phyir sems skyed cig/ rgyal po bal glang des ni chos thos nas// srog chags bye ba stong phrag bdun cu dang // sras dang btsun mo stobs bcas grong mi rnams// byang chub dam pa 'di phyir sems
76a3(mdo sde): bskyed de/ / bdag cag mchog gi sems ni bskyed par bgyi// sems can thams cad mgron du gnyer bar bgyi// byang chub spyod mchog yid 'ong spyad par bgyi// 'gro ba bla med sangs rgyas 'gyur/
76a4(mdo sde): par bgyi// rigs kyi bu de ltar rgyal po bsod nams kyis brgyan pa des/ bcom ldan 'das 'khor dang bcas pa la lo brgyad khri bzhi stong gi bar du rung ba yid du 'ong ba kha na ma tho ba med pa'i bde ba'i
76a5(mdo sde): yo byad dang / yongs su longs spyad pa thams cad kyis rim gro byas so// khye'u seng ge'i rtsal gyis 'gro ba de gnyis/ bcom ldan 'das de'i bstan pa la khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung ngo //
76a6(mdo sde): de dag rab tu byung bas rgyal bu phyi ma nyi khri'ang khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung ngo // de nas seng ge dang seng ge'i rtsal gyis 'gro ba'i dge slong byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos dang / yo byad bsnyungs pa dang /
76a7(mdo sde): dben par spyod pa la sbyor zhing brtson pas ring po ma lon par mngon par shes pa lnga bskyed do// de dag mngon par shes pa rnyed nas 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du rang gi rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs dang /
76b1(mdo sde): smon lam gyi stobs kyis chos bshad nas de gnyis kyis sems can tshad med grangs med pa yongs su smin par byas te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la rab tu bkod par gyur/
76b2(mdo sde): to// rigs kyi bu 'di ltar lo brgyad khri bzhi stong 'das nas/ rgyal po bsod nams kyis brgyan pa de bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dri ma med pa'i 'od mtha' yas 'od zer gyi
76b3(mdo sde): rgyal po ga la ba der song ba dang / des khye'u de gnyis rab tu byung bar mthong ngo // mthong nas kyang ngas ni lo brgyad khri bzhi stong gi bar du de bzhin gshegs pa la bde ba'i yo byad thams
76b4(mdo sde): cad kyis bsnyen bkur byas nas/ 'di gnyis rab tu byung nas ngas ma byas snyam/ ci zhig byas snyam du brnyas pa'i sems skyes so// rigs kyi bu de nas yang de bzhin gshegs pa dri
76b5(mdo sde): ma med pa'i 'od mtha' yas 'od zer gyi rgyal pos/ rgyal po bsod nams kyis brgyan pa de lta bur sems pa mkhyen nas/ byang chub sems dpa' seng ge'i rtsal gyis 'gro ba la 'di
76b6(mdo sde): skad ces bka' stsal to/ / rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab dang / mngon par shes pa dang / bsod nams dang / ye shes kyi stobs ston la 'khor thams cad dga' bar gyis shig/
76b7(mdo sde): bdud kyi gnas thams cad mogo mog por gyis shig/ byang chub kyi lam 'bar bar gyis shig/ sems can thams cad tshim par gyis shig/ phas kyi rgol ba thams cad tshar chod cig/
77a1(mdo sde): chos kyi sgron ma 'bar bar gyis shig/ nyon mongs pa thams cad zhi bar gyis shig/ byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par rol pa ston cig/ de nas de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa'
77a2(mdo sde): seng ge'i rtsal gyis 'gro bas de'i dus na/ nam mkha' la lag pas byugs nas/ des nam mkha' la lag pas byugs pa dang / stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams rnam pa drug
77a3(mdo sde): tu rab tu g.yos so/ / des yang nam mkha' la lag pas byugs pa dang / de nas de'i tshe bar snang las sil snyan bye ba khrag khrig brgyad stong ma dkrol bar sgra byung ngo // des yang nam mkha'
77a4(mdo sde): la lag pas byugs pa dang / de nas bar snang las sngon ma mthong ma thos pa dri zhim zhing 'jam pa ka tsa lin di ka ltar reg na bde ba'i me tog rnams kyi char bab bo// des yang nam mkha' la lag pas byugs
77a5(mdo sde): pa dang / de nas de ma thag tu bar snang las rin po che thams cad kyi char rab tu mngon par bab/ longs spyod kun spyod pa thams cad kyi char rab tu bab bo// ji lta bur stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig
77a6(mdo sde): rten gyi khams der yod byad thams cad kyi char mngon par rab tu 'bab pa de de lta bu'i zas dang / skom dang / bro'i tsher mngon par rab tu bab bo// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dri ma med pa'i 'od
77a7(mdo sde): mtha' yas 'od zer gyi rgyal pos/ rgyal po bsod nams kyis brgyan pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rgyal po chen po khyod kyis sbyin pa yongs su btang ba dang / rin po che'i char 'bab pa 'di
77b1(mdo sde): gang mang / gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das rin po che'i char 'di ni dper bgyi ba'ang sla ba ma lags te/ de tsam du tshad ma mchis so// bka' stsal pa/ rgyal po chen po byang chub sems dpa' seng /
77b2(mdo sde): ge'i rtsal gyis 'gro ba 'di mngon par shes pa'i ye shes kyi stobs kyi 'dod na/ gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams su 'di 'dra ba'i rin po che'i char mngon par 'bebs so// gang 'jig rten/
77b3(mdo sde): gyi khams de dag gi sems can de dag la ji lta bur 'dod pa bzhin du ngoms shing tshim par byed do// rigs kyi bu 'di ltar de'i tshe de'i dus na/ gang sa bla'i lha rnams kyis ma la 'di sems bskyed ma
77b4(mdo sde): thag tu nam mkha' las rin po che thams cad kyi char mngon par rab tu 'bab pa las na/ byang chub sems dpa' 'di ni nam mkha' mdzod du 'gyur ba snyam zhes sgra byung ngo // ji ltar sa bla'i lha rnams
77b5(mdo sde): kyis sgra byung ba de bzhin du/ bar snang dang / rgyal chen bzhi'i ris dang / sum cu rtsa gsum dang / 'thab bral dang / dga' ldan dang / 'phrul dga' nas/ 'og min gyi bar gyi lha rnams kyis kyang
77b6(mdo sde): ma la 'di sems bskyed ma thag tu 'di 'dra ba'i rin po che'i char rab tu 'bab pa las na/ kye ma byang chub sems dpa' 'di ni nam mkha'i mdzod du 'gyur ba snyam zhes sgra byung bas/ ming de la bcom
77b7(mdo sde): ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dri ma med pa'i 'od mtha' yas 'od zer gyi rgyal po de rjes su yi rang ngo / / gang la des rjes su yi rang ba de la gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
78a1(mdo sde): rnams kyang rjes su yi rang ngo / / rigs kyi bu 'di ltar rgyal po bsod nams kyis brgyan pa des byang chub sems dpa' seng ge'i rtsal gyis 'gro ba'i mngon par shes pa dang /
78a2(mdo sde): bsod nams dang / ye shes kyi stobs de mthong nas/ khye'u rgyal ba'i blo gros zhes bya ba rgyal por bcug ste/ dad pas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung nas/ sbyin pa 'di ni sems kun tu chas
78a3(mdo sde): pa'o/ / rab tu byung ba ni sems yongs su dag pa'o// sbyin pa 'di ni lus dang ngag gi bgegs so// rab tu byung ba'i ni lus dang ngag yongs su sbyong ba'o// sbyin pa 'di ni bgegs chen po'o//
78a4(mdo sde): rab tu byung ba ni bgegs thams cad nye bar zhi ba'o// sbyin pa 'di ni rtsa ba dang lo ma'o// rab tu byung ba ni snying po dang 'bras bur 'grub pa'o// sbyin pa 'di ni nga'i ba dang bcas shing yongs su 'dzin pa
78a5(mdo sde): dang bcas pa'o/ / rab tu byung ba ni yongs su 'dzin pa thams cad 'dor ba'o// sbyin pa 'di ni 'jig tshogs la lta ba las ma bskyod pa'o// rab tu byung ba ni lta ba thams cad yongs su sbyong ba'o//
78a6(mdo sde): sbyin pa 'di ni byis pa'i rtsed mo'i sbyor ba'o// rab tu byung ba ni dul ba dang / zhi ba dang / cang shes pa'i sa'o snyam du de de ltar tshul bzhin rab tu sbyor zhing / sems 'di lta bu dang bsam pa de lta bu
78a7(mdo sde): de ltar rab tu byung ste/ gcig pu mi 'dre ba/ bag yod pa/ brtson pa/ rab tu dben par gnas pas ring po ma thogs par mngon par shes pa lnga bskyed do// rigs kyi bu de'i tshe de'i dus na/
78b1(mdo sde): rgyal po bsod nams kyis brgyan par gyur pa de gzhan zhig yin pa snyam du khyod sems na de de ltar mi blta'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'khor ba 'jig de de'i tshe de'i dus na 'khor
78b2(mdo sde): los sgyur ba'i rgyal po bsod nams kyis brgyan ces bya bar gyur to/ / byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' mdzod 'di ni de'i tshe de'i dus na byang chub sems dpa' seng ge'i rtsal gyis 'gro ba zhes bya bar
78b3(mdo sde): gyur te/ des thog mar nam mkha'i mdzod las rin po che'i char phab bo// de tshun chad bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong dpag tu med grangs med par nam mkha' yang nam mkha' mdzod las rin po/
78b4(mdo sde): che'i char 'bebs pa'i mngon par shes pa las ma nyams so// rigs kyi bu nga ni de'i tshe de'i dus na byang chub sems dpa' seng ge zhes bya bar gyur to// byang chub sems dpa' byams pa ni de'i tshe
78b5(mdo sde): de'i dus na rgyal bu rgyal ba'i blo gros zhes bya bar gyur te/ gang rgyal po bsod nams kyis brgyan pas rgyal por bcug pa'o// rigs kyi bu de'i gsung rab kyang 'di ltar dga' zhing yongs su
78b6(mdo sde): dag par 'gyur te/ dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa'i sems can gyi gnas su gyur to// sems can ji snyed kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa de dag thams cad kyang bla
78b7(mdo sde): na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par gyur to/ / sngon byung ba dang ldan pa'i gtam 'di bstan pa na/ srog chags khro nyis stong bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang
79a1(mdo sde): chub tu sems bskyed do/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' mdzod kyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems
79a2(mdo sde): dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi 'jig rten las 'das pa'i lam gang lags/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' mdzod la 'di skad ces
79a3(mdo sde): bka' stsal to/ / rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi lam zhes bya ba ni pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun dang / zhi gnas dang / lhag mthong dang /
79a4(mdo sde): bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi dang / bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / mngon par shes pa lnga rnams te/ rigs kyi bu 'di
79a5(mdo sde): ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi 'jig rten las 'das pa'i lam zhes bya'o/ / 'jig rten zhes bya ba ni phung po lnga'o// de la byang chub sems dpa' gzugs mi rtag par rig nas sbyin pa
79a6(mdo sde): sbyin no/ / gzugs sdug bsngal bar rig nas sbyin pa sbyin no// gzugs bdag med par rig/ gzugs zhi bar rig/ gzugs stong par rig/ gzugs mtshan ma med par rig/ gzus
79a7(mdo sde): smon pa med par rig/ gzugs mngon par 'du mi byed par rig/ gzugs ma skyes par rig/ gzugs ma byung bar rig/ gzugs rten cing 'brel par 'byung bar rig/ gzugs dben
79b1(mdo sde): par rig/ gzugs gzung ba med par rig/ gzugs kun gzhi med par rig/ gzugs 'byung ba med par rig/ gzugs sgyu ma lta bur rig/ gzugs rmi lam lta bur rig/ gzugs
79b2(mdo sde): smig rgyu lta bur rig/ gzugs chu zla lta bur rig/ gzugs brag cha lta bur rig/ gzugs mig yor lta bur rig/ gzugs gzugs brnyan lta bur rig/ gzugs rtswa dang / shing dang
79b3(mdo sde): rtsig pa dang / lam lta bur rig nas sbyin pa sbyin te/ de gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid kyis sbyin pa'i de bzhin nyid la 'jug go// sbyin pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis bsngo ba'i de bzhin nyid rjes su shes so//
79b4(mdo sde): bsngo ba'i de bzhin nyid kyis/ byang chub kyi de bzhin nyid dang / byang chub kyi de bzhin nyid kyis/ sems can gyi de bzhin nyid dang / sems can gyi de bzhin nyid kyis/ bdag gi de
79b5(mdo sde): bzhin nyid dang / bdag gi de bzhin nyid kyis/ chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid rjes su shes so// gang chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid de ni de bzhin nyid med de/ ma nor ba de bzhin//
79b6(mdo sde): nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid do// de bzhin nyid rjes su shes pas sbyin pa de sbyin pa 'di ni/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa'i 'jig rten las 'das pa'i lam mo// de bzhin
79b7(mdo sde): du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa mi rtag par rig nas sbyin pa sbyin no// rnam par shes pa sdug bsngal ba dang / bdag med par rig/ rnam par shes pa
80a1(mdo sde): zhi bar rig/ rnam par shes pa stong par rig/ rnam par shes pa mtshan ma med par rig/ rnam par shes pa smon pa med par rig/ rnam par shes pa mngon par 'ju
80a2(mdo sde): mi byed par rig/ rnam par shes pa ma skyes par rig/ rnam par shes pa ma byung bar rig/ rnam par shes pa rten cing 'brel par 'byung bar rig nas sbyin pa sbyin no// rnam par shes pa dben/
80a3(mdo sde): par rig/ rnam par shes pa gzung ba med par rig/ rnam par shes pa kun gzhi med par rig/ rnam par shes pa mi 'byung bar rig/ rnam par shes pa sgyu ma lta bur rig/ rnam par shes
80a4(mdo sde): pa rmi lam lta bur rig/ rnam par shes pa smig rgyu lta bur rig/ rnam par shes pa chu zla lta bur rig/ rnam par shes pa brag cha lta bur rig/ rnam par shes pa mig yor lta bur rig/ rnam
80a5(mdo sde): par shes pa gzugs brnyan lta bur rig/ rnam par shes pa rnam par rig pa med pa'i mtshan nyid du rig nas sbyin pa sbyin te/ de rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis/ sbyin pa'i de bzhin nyid
80a6(mdo sde): rjes su shes so/ / sbyin pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis/ bsngo ba'i de bzhin nyid dang / bsngo ba'i de bzhin nyid kyis/ byang chub kyi de bzhin nyid dang / byang chub kyi de bzhin nyid kyis/ sems can
80a7(mdo sde): gyi de bzhin nyid dang / sems can gyi de bzhin nyid kyis/ bdag gi de bzhin nyid dang / bdag gi de bzhin nyid kyis/ chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid rjes su shes so// gang chos
80b1(mdo sde): thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid de ni de bzhin nyid do/ / ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid// de bzhin nyid rjes su shes pas sbyin pa de sbyin pa 'di ni/ rigs kyi bu brang
80b2(mdo sde): chub sems dpa'i 'jig rten las 'das pa'i lam mo/ / gzhan yang rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' gzugs mi rtag par rig nas/ tshul khrims bsrung ba nas/ gzugs rtswa dang /
80b3(mdo sde): shing dang / rtsig pa dang / lam dang / gzugs brnyan lta bu'i bar du rig nas tshul khrims srung ngo // de gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid kyis/ tshul khrims kyi de bzhin nyid rjes su shes so// /
80b4(mdo sde): tshul khrims kyi de bzhin nyid kyis/ sngo ba'i de bzhin nyid dang / sngo ba'i de bzhin nyid kyis/ byang chub kyi de bzhin nyid dang / byang chub kyi de bzhin nyid kyis/ sems can gyi de bzhin nyid dang /
80b5(mdo sde): sems can gyi de bzhin nyid kyis/ bdag gi de bzhin nyid dang / bdag gi de bzhin nyid kyis/ chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid rjes su shes so// gang chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid de ni
80b6(mdo sde): de bzhin nyid med de/ ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid do// de bzhin nyid rjes su shes pas tshul khrims de srung ba 'di ni/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa'i
80b7(mdo sde): 'jig rten las 'das pa'i lam mo/ / de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa mi rtag par rig nas/ tshul khrims bsrung ba nas/ rnam par shes
81a1(mdo sde): pa rnam par rig pa med pa'i mtshan nyid kyi bar du rig nas/ tshul khrims srung ste/ de rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis/ tshul khrims kyi de bzhin nyid rjes su shes so//
81a2(mdo sde): tshul khrims kyi de bzhin nyid kyis/ bsngo ba'i de bzhin nyid dang / bsngo ba'i de bzhin nyid kyis/ byang chub kyi de bzhin nyid dang / byang chub kyi de bzhin nyid kyis/ sems can gyi de bzhin nyid dang /
81a3(mdo sde): sems can gyi de bzhin nyid kyis/ bdag gi de bzhin nyid dang / bdag gi de bzhin nyid kyis/ chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid rjes su shes so// gang chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid de ni de bzhin
81a4(mdo sde): nyid med de/ ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / de bzhin nyid rjes su shes pas/ tshul khrims de srung ba 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten
81a5(mdo sde): las 'das pa'i lam mo/ / gzhan yang rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' gzugs mi rtag par rig nas/ bzod pa bsgom pa nas/ de bzhin du sbyar te/ rjes su shes pa 'di lta bus
81a6(mdo sde): brtson 'grus rtsom mo/ / bsam gtan mnyam par 'jog go// shes rab rnam par dpyod ngo do// des gzugs mi rtag par rig nas/ shes rab rnam par dpyod pa nas/ gzugs
81a7(mdo sde): rtswa dang / shing dang / rtsig pa dang / lam dang / mig yor lta bu'i bar du rig nas/ shes rab rnam par dpyod do// de gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid kyis/ shes rab kyi de bzhin/
81b1(mdo sde): nyid rjes su shes so// shes rab kyi de bzhin nyid kyis/ bsngo ba'i de bzhin nyid dang / bsngo ba'i de bzhin nyid kyis/ byang chub kyi de bzhin nyid dang / byang chub kyi de bzhin nyid kyis
81b2(mdo sde): sems can gyi de bzhin nyid dang / sems can de bzhin nyid kyis/ bdag gi de bzhin nyid dang / bdag gi de bzhin nyid kyis/ chos thams kyi de bzhin nyid rjes su shes so// gang chos//
81b3(mdo sde): thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid de ni de bzhin nyid med de/ ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid do// de bzhin nyid rjes su shes pas/ shes rab rnam par spyod pa 'di
81b4(mdo sde): ni byang chub sems dpa'i 'jig rten las 'das pa'i lam zhes bya'o/ / de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa mi rtag par rig nas/ shes
81b5(mdo sde): rab rnam par dpyod pa nas/ rnam par shes pa rnam par rig pa med pa'i mtshan nyid rig nas/ shes rab rnam par dpyod do// de rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis/ shes rab kyi
81b6(mdo sde): de bzhin nyid rjes su shes so/ / shes rab kyi de bzhin nyid kyis/ bsngo ba'i de bzhin nyid dang / bsngo ba'i de bzhin nyid kyis/ byang chub kyi de bzhin nyid dang / byang chub kyi de bzhin nyid
81b7(mdo sde): kyis sems can gyi de bzhin nyid dang / sems can gyi de bzhin nyid kyis/ bdag gi de bzhin nyid dang / bdag gi de bzhin nyid kyis/ chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid rjes su shes
82a1(mdo sde): so/ / gang chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid de ni de bzhin nyid med de/ ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid do// de bzhin nyid rjes su shes pas
82a2(mdo sde): shes rab rnam par dpyod pa 'di'ang rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa'i 'jig rten las 'das pa'i lam mo/ / gzhan yang rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpas gzugs mi rtag par rig nas
82a3(mdo sde): lus la lus kyi rjes su lta zhing dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bsgom pa nas/ gzugs rtsa dang / shing dang / rtsig pa dang / lam dang / mig yor lta bu'i bar du rig nas/ lus la lus
82a4(mdo sde): kyi rjes su lta zhing dran pa nye bar gzhag pa sgom mo/ / gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid kyis/ lus kyi de bzhin nyid rjes su shes so// lus kyi de bzhin nyid rjes su shes pa nas/ chos thams cad
82a5(mdo sde): kyi de bzhin nyid kyi bar du rjes su shes so/ / gang chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid de ni de bzhin nyid med de/ ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid do// de bzhin nyid
82a6(mdo sde): rjes su shes pas/ lus la lus kyi rjes su lta zhing dran pa nye bar gzhag pa sgom ste/ lus dang ldan pa'i rnam par rtog pas rnam par mi rtog pa 'di ni/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa'i
82a7(mdo sde): 'jig rten las 'das pa'i lam mo/ / de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa mi rtag par rig pa nas/ rgya cher de bzhin du sbyin pa sbyin pa'i
82b1(mdo sde): bar dang / de bzhin du tshor ba dang / sems dang / chos rnams kyang rgyas par byas te/ gzugs mi rtag par rig pa nas/ chos la chos kyi rjes su lta zhing dran pa nye bar gzhag pa
82b2(mdo sde): bsgom pa nas/ rtswa dang / shing dang / rtsig pa dang / lam dang / mig yor lta bu'i bar du rig pa nas/ chos la chos kyi rjes su lta zhing dran pa nye bar gzhag pa sgom mo//
82b3(mdo sde): de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa mi rtag par rig pa nas/ chos la chos kyi rjes su lta zhing dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bsgom pa nas/
82b4(mdo sde): rnam par shes pa rnam par rig pa med pa'i mtshan nyid kyi bar du rig nas/ chos la chos kyi rjes su lta zhing dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bsgom mo// de ltar phung po'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dran pa
82b5(mdo sde): nye bar gzhag pa'i de bzhin nyid do/ / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de bsngo ba'i de bzhin nyid do// bsngo ba'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de byang chub kyi de bzhin nyid do// byang
82b6(mdo sde): chub kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de sems can gyi de bzhin nyid do/ / sems can gyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de bdag gi de bzhin nyid do// bdag gi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de chos thams cad kyi
82b7(mdo sde): de bzhin nyid do/ / chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de de bzhin nyid med de/ ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid do// de bzhin nyid rjes su shes pas
83a1(mdo sde): chos la chos kyi rjes su lta zhing dra pa nye bar gzhag pa sgom yang chos dang ldan pa'i rnam par rtog pas rnam par mi rtog ste/ gang de ltar rjes su shes pas 'di ni byang chub
83a2(mdo sde): sems dpa'i 'jig rten las 'das pa'i lam zhes bya'o/ / de bzhin du sbyar te/ de ltar dran pa nye bar gzhag pa la ji lta ba de bzhin du/ yang dag par spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang
83a3(mdo sde): pa dang dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / lam dang / zhi gnas dang / lhag mthong dang / bsdu ba'i dngos po dang / bsam gtan pan
83a4(mdo sde): dang tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / mngon par shes pa lnga'ang de bzhin du rgyas par bya ste/ des gzugs mi rtag par rig nas mngon
83a5(mdo sde): par shes pa'i ye shes sgrub par byed do/ / gzugs sdug bsngal ba dang / gzugs bdag med pa dang / gzugs zhi ba dang / gzugs stong pa dang / gzugs mtshan ma med
83a6(mdo sde): pa dang / gzugs smon pa med par rig/ gzugs mngon par 'du mi byed par rig/ ma skyes pa dang / ma byung ba dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dang / dben pa dang //
83a7(mdo sde): gzung ba med pa dang / kun gzhi med pa dang / mi 'byung ba dang / sgyu ma lta bu dang / smig rgyu lta bu dang / chu zla lta bu dang / brag cha lta bu dang / mig yor lta bu dang
83b1(mdo sde): gzugs brnyan lta bu dang / gzugs rtswa dang / shing dang / rtsig pa dang / lam dang / mig yor lta bur rig nas/ mngon par shes pa'i ye shes mngon par grub go/
83b2(mdo sde): de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa dang / lam dang / mi rtag par rig nas/ mngon par shes pa'i ye shes mngon par grub ste/
83b3(mdo sde): rnam par shes pa sdug bsngal bar rig/ rnam par shes pa bdag med pa dang / rnam par shes pa zhi ba dang / rnam par shes pa stong pa dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang
83b4(mdo sde): mngon par 'du mi byed pa dang / ma skyes pa dang / ma 'byung ba dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dang / dben pa dang gzung du med pa dang / kun gzhi med pa dang / mi
83b5(mdo sde): 'byung ba dang / sgyu ma lta bu dang / rmi lam lta bu dang / smig rgyu lta bu dang / chu zla lta bu dang / brag cha lta bu dang / mig yor lta bu dang / gzugs brnyan lta bu dang / rnam par
83b6(mdo sde): shes pa rnam par rig pa med pa'i mtshan nyid du rig nas/ mngon par shes pa'i ye shes mngon par sgrub bo// 'di lta ste/ phung po'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de mngon par shes pa'i de
83b7(mdo sde): bzhin nyid do/ / mngon par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de bsngo ba'i de bzhin nyid do// bsngo ba'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de byang chub kyi de bzhin nyid do// byang chub kyi de bzhin nyid
84a1(mdo sde): gang yin pa de sems can gyi de bzhin nyid do/ / sems can gyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de bdag gi de bzhin nyid do// bdag gi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de chos thams
84a2(mdo sde): cad kyi de bzhin nyid do/ / chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid med de/ ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid do// de bzhin nyid rjes su
84a3(mdo sde): shes pas mngon par shes pa'i ye shes rab tu sgrub ste/ gang de ltar rjes su shes pa de ni byang chub sems dpa'i 'jig rten las 'das pa'i lam zhes bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'jig
84a4(mdo sde): rten las 'das pa'i lam de ni gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid rjes su shes pa ste/ gzugs 'jig pa ma yin/ chad pa ma yin/ rtag pa ma yin/ rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba rang bzhin
84a5(mdo sde): gyis ma skyes pa'o/ / de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid rjes su shes pa ste/ rnam par shes pa 'jig pa ma yin//
84a6(mdo sde): chad pa ma yin/ rtag pa ma yin/ rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba rang bzhin gyis ma skyes pa'o// gang phung po'i 'jig rten las rgal ba de ni/ 'dod pa dang / gzugs dang / gzugs
84a7(mdo sde): med pa'i 'jig rten la'ang mi chags te/ de mi chags pas 'gro ba lngar skyes pa'i sems can rnams la 'jig rten las bzla ba'i phyir chos ston te/ gang 'jig rten 'jig par mi byed pa de ltar
84b1(mdo sde): chos ston to/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'jig rten mi rtag pa'i mtshan nyid de/ de 'jig par mi byed do// 'jig rten ni sdug bsngal gyi mtshan nyid/ bdag med pa'i mtshan nyid/ zhi ba'i
84b2(mdo sde): mtshan nyid/ stong pa'i mtshan nyid/ mtshan ma med pa'i mtshan nyid/ smon pa med pa'i mtshan nyid/ mngon par 'du mi byed pa'i mtshan nyid nas/ de bzhin nyid kyi mtshan nyid kyi bar du
84b3(mdo sde): ste/ 'jig rten de 'jig par mi byed pa 'di ni rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa'i 'jig rten las 'das pa'i lam yongs su dag pa'o// gang lam yongs su dag pa la rab tu gnas pa'i
84b4(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' lam log pa la gnas pa'i sems can rnams la chos kyi snang ba chen po byed do/ / de dag snang ba rnyed nas/ 'jig rten las 'das pa'i lam de nyid la rab tu gnas so//
84b5(mdo sde): byang chub kyi snying po 'thob par byed pa'i phyir/ lam 'di ni rab kyi mchog go// mi dge ba thams cad kyi sems med pa'i phyir/ lam 'di ni mchog go/ sangs rgyas kyi ye shes kyi rtse mo rnyed
84b6(mdo sde): pa'i phyir/ lam 'di ni dam pa'o// chu bo thams cad las sgrol ba'i phyir/ lam 'di ni bla na med pa'o// nye tshe ba'i lam thams cad las 'das pa'i phyir/ lam 'di ni gong na med pa'o//
84b7(mdo sde): gnyen po mi dmigs pa'i phyir/ lam 'di ni mnyam pa med pa'o// sngon gyi sangs rgyas kyi lam du yang dag par 'gro ba'i phyir/ lam 'di ni mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o// bdud dang phyir
85a1(mdo sde): rgol ba thams cad bcom pa'i phyir/ lam 'di ni bde bar 'gro ba'o// mngon par shes pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa'i ye shes kyis rnam par rol pa'i phyir/
85a2(mdo sde): lam 'di ni mi thogs par 'gro ba'o// shes rab kyis snang ba'i 'od rnam par dag pa'i phyir/ lam 'di ni mun pa mun nag med pa'o// sgyu dang g.yo med pa'i phyir/ lam 'di ni drang ba'o//
85a3(mdo sde): sems gya gyu med pa'i phyir/ lam 'di ni gsal ba'o// sems can thams cad la sems mnyam pa'i phyir/ lam 'di ni mnyam pa'o// sems can thams cad la go 'byed pa'i phyir/ lam 'di
85a4(mdo sde): ni rgya che ba'o/ / phan tshun du gnod par mi 'gyur bas/ lam 'di ni yangs pa'o// yongs su mi skyo bar 'gro bas lam 'di ni rnal du 'gro'o// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas lam 'di ni bsod nams
85a5(mdo sde): kyis brtan pa'o/ / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pas lam 'di ni gdung ba med pa'o// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas lam 'di ni 'jigs pa med pa'o// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pas lam 'di
85a6(mdo sde): ni mi zlog pa'o/ / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pas lam 'di ni rdul thams cad dang bral ba'o// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas lam 'di ni nam mkha' dang mnyam par 'gro ba'o// nga rgyal med pas
85a7(mdo sde): lam 'di ni ye shes kyi rjes su 'gro ba'o/ / dge ba'i chos thams cad yang dag par bsgrubs pas lam 'di ni sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yongs su sgom pa'i rjes su sgom pa'i rjes su 'gro ba'o//
85b1(mdo sde): sngon thos pa mi slu ba'i phyir lam 'don chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu skor ba'i rjes su 'gro ba ste/ rigs kyi bu de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi 'jig rten las 'das pa'i lam yongs su dag pa ste/
85b2(mdo sde): lam yongasu dag pa gang la gnas nas/ byang chub sems dpa' go cha chen po bgos te/ theg pa chen po de la zhugs nas byang chub kyi snying po ga la ba der 'gro ba'o// de la 'di ni byang chub sems
85b3(mdo sde): dpa' rnams kyi go cha ste/ gru chen po yang dag par sbyor bas ma rgal ba sgrol ba'i go cha'o// nyon mongs pa dang / lta ba'i bcings pa thams cad las yongs su 'grol bas ma grol ba 'grol ba'i
85b4(mdo sde): go cha'o/ / yongs su 'dzin pa'i 'jigs pa thams cad 'dor bas dbugs ma phyin pa rnams dbugs 'byin pa'i go cha'o// med pa la phyin ci log tu gyur pa mnyam pa nyid du ston pas yongs su mya ngan
85b5(mdo sde): las ma 'das pa mya ngan las bzla ba'i go cha'o/ / bdag dang / sems can dang / srog dang / gang zag mi dmigs pas sems can thams cad yongs su dgrol ba'i go cha'o// lus dang srog la
85b6(mdo sde): mi lta bas dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa'i go cha'o/ / dge ba'i rtsa ba'i tshogs sogs pas ngoms mi myongs pas sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su sbyor ba'i go cha'o// sbyin pa'i tshogs sna tshogs
85b7(mdo sde): sogs pas/ mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po lus kyi rgyan gyi go cha'o// mngon par shes pa thob pas bdud dang pas kyi nga rgol ba thams cad 'dul ba'i go cha'o// so so yang dag par rig pa'i ye
86a1(mdo sde): shes kyis sems can thams cad shin tu tshim par byed pa'i go cha'o/ / gzungs kyi ye shes kyis sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad nyan pa dang tshol ba'i go cha'o// mngon
86a2(mdo sde): par shes pa'i ye shes kyis sems can thams cad kyi sems la lta ba'i go cha'o/ / shes rab kyi ye shes kyis sems can thams cad kyi dbang po mchog dang mchog ma yin pa shes pa'i go cha'o//
86a3(mdo sde): shes rab dang ye shes kyi stobs yang dag par sgrub pas stobs bcu yongs su skong ba'i go cha'o// thams cad du sems gong ba med pas mi 'jigs pa thob pa'i go cha'o// mi dge ba'i
86a4(mdo sde): chos thams cad spangs shing dge ba'i chos thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed pas/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad yongs su skong ba'i go cha'o// chos thams cad sgyu ma dang /
86a5(mdo sde): rmi lam dang / mig yor dang / brag cha dang / chu zla lta bur thos kyang / mi skrag/ ming dang / dngang bar mi 'gyur ba de ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi mi skrag pa'i go cha'o//
86a6(mdo sde): sems can thams cad rang bzhin gyis yongs su mya ngan las 'das par shes kyang sems can yongs su mi gtong bar gnas pa de ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi snying rje chen po'i ko cha'o//
86a7(mdo sde): chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par 'du mi byed pa dang / ma skyes pa dang / ma 'byung bar thos kyang tshe dang
86b1(mdo sde): 'chi 'pho dang / skye ba kun tu ston pa de ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi thabs la mkhas pa'i go cha'o// chos thams cad nges par gyur pa la zhugs pa'i mtshan nyid du shes shing /
86b2(mdo sde): 'du byed thams cad skye ba med par rig kyang 'gog par mi ltung zhing 'bras bu mngon sum du'ang mi byed pa de ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sngon gyi byin gyi rlabs mi 'khrugs pa'i go cha'o//
86b3(mdo sde): go cha chen po nyi shu po de dag bgos nas/ de theg pa chen po la mngon par zhugs pa yin no// theg pa chen po da ni bsdu ba'i dngos pos phang lo bzhi dang legs par ldan par byas pa/ bsams
86b4(mdo sde): pas dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su bsngos pas rtsibs shin tu sbyar ba/ rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i ye shes lhag par che bas lte ba zab cing legs par byas pa/ sems can thams cad kyi
86b5(mdo sde): khur skya ba'i srog shing dang ldan zhing shin tu bzung ba/ byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen pos yang dag par zin pas/ shing rta'i mda' brtan par sbyar ba/ chos rin po che thams cad kyis
