115b4(mdo sde): yang med do/ / de bzhin du phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched ni las dang nyon mongs pa la gnas so// de la las dang nyon mongs pa ni tshul banin ma yin pa yid la byed pa la gnas so//
115b5(mdo sde): tshul bzhin ma yin pa yid la byed pa ni rang bzhin yongs su dag pa la gnas te/ de'i phyir sems rang bzhin 'od gsal ba de glo bur gyi nyon mongs pas nye bar nyon mongs zhes bya'o// de la gang tshul
115b6(mdo sde): bzhin ma yin pa yid la byed pa dang / gang las dang / nyon mongs pa dang / gang phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched thams cad kyang rgyu dang rkyen gyis yang dag par zin na ni skye/ rgyu dang
115b7(mdo sde): rkyen mtshogs na 'gag ste/ gang de'i rang bzhin de la ni rgyu yang med/ rkyen yang med/ tshogs pa'ang med/ skye ba'ang med/ 'gag pa'ang med do// de la nam mkha'i khams ji lta bar
116a1(mdo sde): rang bzhin yang de bzhin no/ / tshul bzhin ma yin pa yid la byed pa ji lta bar rlung yang de bzhin no// las dang nyon mongs pa ji lta bar chu'ang de bzhin no// phung po dang / khams
116a2(mdo sde): dang skye mched rnams ji ltar sa'i khams kyang de bzhin te/ de'i phyir chos thams cad ni rtsa ba yongs su chad pa zhes bya ste/ snying po med pa'i rtsa ba/ mi gnas pa'i rtsa ba/ dag pa'i rtsa ba
116a3(mdo sde): rtsa ba med pa'i rtsa ba'o/ / kye grogs po dag de ni rang bzhin rnam par dag pa'i sgo zhes bya ba'i chos snang ba'i sgo ste/ sgo gang la brten nas byang chub sems dpa' rnams nyon mongs pa thams cad kyi sgo la
116a4(mdo sde): mi chags shing rnam par dag pa'i sgo thams cad kyang mi snyems pa'o/ / de dag thams cad snyems pa yang dag par bcom pas tshul dang 'dra bar 'gro ba'i lam du chud de/ bdud kyi yul las yang
116a5(mdo sde): dag par 'da' bar 'gyur ro/ / de dag bdud kyi yul las yang dag par 'das pas sangs rgyas kyi yul la rab tu gnas par 'gyur ro// de dag sangs rgyas kyi yul la rab tu gnas pas sems
116a6(mdo sde): can thams cad kyi yul la 'jug par 'gyur ro/ / sems cad thams cad kyi yul la zhugs pas/ chos kyi dbyings kyi yul 'khrug par mi byed par 'gyur ro// de dag chos kyi dbyings kyi rjes
116a7(mdo sde): su song ste/ mnyam pa bye brag med pa thob pas thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes rjes su thob par 'gyur ro// bstan pa 'di bshad pa na/ byang chub sems dpa' mang po zhig las dang / nyon mongs
116b1(mdo sde): pa dang chos kyi sgrib pa kun nas ldang ba dang / 'gyod pa kun nas ldang ba thams cad dang bral te/ mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur to// / bam pa
116b2(mdo sde): brgyad pa/ de nas dge bsnyen dpal sbrus zhes bya bas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la phyag 'tshal nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom
116b3(mdo sde): ldan 'das chos rnam grol ba'i sgo chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag gi slad du bshad do/ / de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das bdag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsad
116b4(mdo sde): pa'i slad du brtul zhugs kyis bstan par bgyis te/ bshos kyang dug dang bsres pa sbyar ba des/ bcom ldan 'das las bdag gis chos mang du thos kyang 'gyod pa rab tu bsal bar nus kyi
116b5(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das bdag gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos nas/ 'gyod pa de thams cad ma mchis par gyur te/ chos thams cad la snang ba'ang skyes so// bcom ldan 'das bdag ni 'gyod
116b6(mdo sde): pa ma mchis/ the tsom ma mchis te/ snang ba thob pas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed par bgyi ste/ bcom ldan 'das dper na bdud sdig can ltar
116b7(mdo sde): bdag kyang khyad par du mchi bar 'gyur ro/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ khyim bdag legs so legs so// ngas bshad pa'i don khyod kyis khong du chud de/ ngas
117a1(mdo sde): khyim bdag khyod lung bstan gyis/ sems dang sdug pa'i bsam pa 'dis bslal pa bzang po'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad la bsti stang du byas/ bla mar
117a2(mdo sde): byas ri mor byas te mchod nas de dag gi thad nas tshangs par spyad pa spyod par 'gyur/ de dag gi dam pa'i chos kyang yongs su 'dzin par 'gyur ro// 'di'i 'og tu sangs rgyas bcom ldan
117a3(mdo sde): 'das bgrang ba las 'das pa ji snyed cig mnyes par byas te/ bskal pa grangs med pa bdun brgyan shin tu dri ma med pa'i bskal pa la/ de bzhin gshegs pa kun nas ldang ba thams cad
117a4(mdo sde): rnam par sel ba zhes bya bar 'jig rten du 'byung ste/ rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa zhes bya ba nas/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das zhes bya ba'i bar du 'gyur ro// de nas dge bsnyen dpal sras
117a5(mdo sde): kyis bcom ldan 'das las bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan pa thos nas tshim zhing mgu la yi rangs te/ rab tu dga' nas dga' ba dang yid bde ba skyes te/
117a6(mdo sde): rgyan ci thogs pa bcom ldan 'das kyi sku la gsol nas/ tshig 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag gi khyim na gter chen po bzhi mchis te/ rin po che mang po dang / gser
117a7(mdo sde): gyis yongs su gang ba'o/ / de dag las gter chen po gcig ni khyim bu smad dang / bran po dang / bran mo dang / las bgyid pa rnams la stsal to// gter chen po gcig ni dbul po spong ba thams
117b1(mdo sde): cad la skul to/ / gter chen po gcig ni dge slong phyogs bani nas lhags pa'i phyogs bzhi'i dge slong gi dge 'dun la dbul lo// gter chen po gcig ni sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong
117b2(mdo sde): gi dge 'dun rnams la dbul lo/ / bcom ldan 'das bdag ni yang bar gyur te/ nga'i ba mchis/ yongs su 'dzin pa'ang ma mchis na/ bcom ldan 'das bdag legs par bshas
117b3(mdo sde): pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu byung ste/ bsnyen par rdzogs shing dge slong gi tshul thob par bgyir gsol/ dge bsnyen dpal sbas legs par bshad pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu byung ste/
117b4(mdo sde): bsnyen par rdzogs nas dge slong gi tshul thob bo// de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' mdzod kyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
117b5(mdo sde): gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das na/ bskal pa grangs ma mchis pa bye ba yang dag par bsgrubs pa'i byang chub 'di su 'dzin par 'gyur// de nas 'khor de nas byang chub
117b6(mdo sde): sems dpa' bye ba phrag drug cu langs nas/ de dag thams cad thal mo sbyar te/ bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal nas/ sgra skad dbyangs gcig tu tshogs su bcad pa 'di dag
117b7(mdo sde): gsol to/ / bcom ldan rkang gnyis dam pa ni// mya ngan 'das slad bdag cag rnams// lus dang srog tu bcas btang ste// dam pa'i chos ni gzung bar spro// rnyed dang bkur sti spangs
118a1(mdo sde): nas su/ / sten pa kun kyang rab spangs te// sangs rgyas ye shes bstan pa yi// chos 'di rjes su mi gtang ngo // dam pa'i chos ni gzung slad du// ka she dang mi
118a2(mdo sde): snyan mchi ba dang / / ngan du smra ba'i tshig rnams kyang // bzod pas de dag dang du blang // tshul 'di rab tu bzung nas su// co 'dri ba dang bsdig pa dang // mi bsngags pa dang mi snyan pa// de dag
118a3(mdo sde): thams cad bzod par bgyi/ / dmigs pa dag la rab gnas pa// bdud kyi pho nya bdud kyi phyogs// dam pa'i chos la skur 'debs pa'i// dge slong dag ni 'byung bar 'gyur// tshul khrims
118a4(mdo sde): 'chal pa sdig chos can/ / khyim pa dang ni sten cing gnas// bkur sti dag dang rnyed la brkam// chos 'di tshol bar mi bgyid do// 'jig rten rgyang 'phan rnams dang 'dra// bdag la rab
118a5(mdo sde): tu stod bgyid cing / / rab tu nges pa rnams la smod// mi mkhas nga rgyal can dag 'byung // dkon pa'i gnas ni spangs nas su// rtag tu 'du 'dzirnams la dga'// 'jig rten gsang
118a6(mdo sde): tshig rnams la brtson/ / 'jig tshogs la ni rab tu gnas// mi mkhas pa dag dge 'dun las// zhal ta byed la rtag tu brtson// bsam gtan bsam gtan byed spangs te/
118a7(mdo sde): dkon mchog gsum dang 'dre mi bgyid// thos dang khrims kyis ma lags kyi// tshogs kyi nang nas rnyed pa tshol// sbyin pa dag la phyir sbyin brtson// rtog pa bcas shing mya ngan
118b1(mdo sde): bcas/ / nga yir 'du shes bzung nas su// mdzas slong ster khyim la dga'// de dag der ni rab 'jug cing // 'jig rten pa yi gtam rnams bgyid/ zhing gi don dang khyim gyi
118b2(mdo sde): don/ / de dag nyon tshong bgyid la gnas// thong gshol shal ba rnams ldan yang // bdag cag dge slong yin zhes 'dzer// dmigs pa yi ni rab tu 'gyod// lta ba tha dad kun/
118b3(mdo sde): tu gnas// stong pa nyid kyi chos thos nas// de dag g.yang sa bzhin du 'gyur// 'jig rten pha rol mi spyod cing // las kyi rnam par smin pa 'dor// brdzun du smra dang rab tu ldan//
118b4(mdo sde): chos ma lags la chos su 'dzin// dge slong rgyal po rab 'khrug cing // de ltar rab tu ma rungs pa// rnam par 'jig tshe sems can phyir// bdag cag dam chos gzung bar bgyi/
118b5(mdo sde): mdo sde rnams kyang phan tshun du// 'thun par dpyod par mi bgyid de// rang rang gi ni smra rnams la// de dag rtag tu mos par bgyid// mdo sde gang dag rab zab cing // rnam grol
118b6(mdo sde): 'bras bu ldan pa rnams/ / rab tu 'dzin par mi bgyid de// de dag sna tshogs gtam rnams bgyid// 'di 'dra ba yi dus 'di na// don bcas chog 'brur ldan pa yi// legs par
118b7(mdo sde): gsungs pa'o chos rnams ni/ / rab tu rnam par 'jig par 'gyur// de yi tshe na sems can yang // rab tu rnam par 'jig par 'gyur// rgyal po'i las kyis bsngags pa na// 'jigs shing
119a1(mdo sde): skra ga nas 'bros par 'gyur/ / 'jig dus rab tu mi bzad pa// sdig pa'i dus ni 'di 'dra ste// sangs rgyas kyis ni gang bshad pa// chos 'di bdag cag gzung
119a2(mdo sde): bar bgyi/ / tshul 'di rab tu bzung nas su// gang dag chos la mi gnas pa'i// sems can rnams la byams par bgyi// de dag la ni snying rje'ang bgyi// sems can rnyed dang 'dod kan+da
119a3(mdo sde): pa/ / tshul khrims 'chal pa mthong nas su// de yi 'gro ba cir 'gyur zhes// mchi ma'ang rab tu dbyung bar bgyi// dam pa'i chos la skur 'debs pa// de dag 'phral thug mthong na yang //
119a4(mdo sde): dag gshe bar mi 'gyur bar// ring nas byams pa btsal bar bgyi// rab tu bsdams nas ngag gi las// nyams kyis ci nus bsrung bar bgyi// sdig pa la ni rab gnas pa// de la glo bur
119a5(mdo sde): gtam mi bgyi/ / nor sbyin de bzhin bsti stang gis// mi rnams yongs su smin bgyis nas// yang dag sdig med spyod yul gyis// slad kyis de dag bskul bar bgyi// khyim dang sten pa kun
119a6(mdo sde): spangs te/ / don nyung ba dang bgyid nyung ba// bas mtha'i dgon pa'i spyod yul ba// ri dgas bzhin du 'gyur bar bgyi// 'phags pa'i rigs la dga' ba dang // sbyangs pa'i tshul khrims
119a7(mdo sde): gnas pa dang / / mnyam bzhag shes rab ldan pa dang // g.yel po ma mchis 'gyur bar bgyi// dul ba dang ni zhi ba dang // grol nas gong du zhugs nas kyang // sems can gang dag chos
119b1(mdo sde): tshol ba/ / de la bdag cag chos bstan to// chos 'dod par ni rtogs nas su// shin tu ring du'ang mchi bar bgyi// chos la dga' zhing mos rnyed nas// sems can rnams kyi don yang
119b2(mdo sde): bgyi/ / sems can rnams kyi 'khrul mang po// de dag mngon par mthong nas kyang // chos dang nges par rab gnas nas// bdag la rtag tu brtags par bgyi// bsti stang bgyis dang ma
119b3(mdo sde): bgyis la/ / ri rab lta bur gyur nas su// 'jig rten gyis ni mo gos pa// 'jig rten 'dren par 'gyur bar bgyi// dge slong tshul las nyams rnams kyis// mi snyan pa dag rtogs
119b4(mdo sde): nas kyang / / las ni bdag gir bya bar bgyi// de dag las ni smin ma 'gyur// chos rnams la ni gnas pa la// nged la de 'dra'i chos rnams ni// ji lta bu yang yod med ces// gshe
119b5(mdo sde): ma dag ni 'gyed par 'gyur/ / bdag cag ming gi dge sbyong ste// dge sbyong yon tan med do zhes// yang dag bskul ba thos pa dang // mdo sde 'di ni spong bar 'gyur// sna dang sna chad de
119b6(mdo sde): dag ni/ / me long dga' bar mi 'gyur ltar// yang dag bsgral ba thos pa dang // de dag dam chos spong bar 'gyur// dge slong gang dag dam pa'i chos// rab tu 'dzin pa 'byung 'gyur
119b7(mdo sde): te/ / de dag bzhin du tshul 'chos kyang // gang yang chos 'di ma nyan to// rgyal po rnams kyang slu bar bgyid// skye bo chen po 'byed 'gyur yang // sangs rgyas kyis ni byin rlabs kyis//
120a1(mdo sde): sems can de dag chos nyan 'gyur// dus ngan de tshe bdag cag rnams// sems can dag la phan slad du// lus dang srog kyang rab btang ste// dam pa'i chos ni
120a2(mdo sde): gzung bar bgyi/ / 'jigs pa chen po'i dus de na// tshig tsam du ni ma lags kyi// sgrub pa snying por bgyid par yang // mgon pos bdag cag bsam pa mkhyen// dam chos 'di na
120a3(mdo sde): yongs bzung na/ / bsod nams tshogs ni ji tsam mchis// chos kyi rgyalo 'od mdzad pa// 'jig rten snang bar mdzad la zhu// de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha'
120a4(mdo sde): mdzod la bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dper na shar phyogs kyi stong sum cu'i 'jig rten gyi khams re re'ang rdul phra rab kyi char rdul phra rab kyi rdul du bshig la/ de bzhin du lho dang nub
120a5(mdo sde): dang byang dang / steng dang / 'og dang / phyogs bcu kun tu stong sum cu'i 'jig rten gyi khams re re'ang rdul phra rab kyi char rdul phra rab kyi rdul du bshig ste/ de nas rdul phra rab de dag thams
120a6(mdo sde): cad ji snyed par shar phyogs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing de snyed 'das shing rdul phra rab kyi rdul gcig bzhag la/ tshul de lta bur shar phyogs su rdul phra rab de dag thams cad zad zad du bzhag kyang /
120a7(mdo sde): shar phyogs kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi mthar thug pa gang yang med do// shar phyogs su ji lta ba bzhin du phyogs bcu kun gyi phyogs re re'ang sangs rgyas kyi zhing de snyed do// rigs kyi bu 'di ji snyam
120b1(mdo sde): du sems/ phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag gi rdul phra rab rnams tshul de lta bus phyogs bzhag pa la tshad dam mtha' rtogs par nus sam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma
120b2(mdo sde): nus so/ / gzhan du na de bzhin gshegs pas sangs rgyas kyi ye shes chags pa mi mnga' bas mkhyen pa ni ma gtogs so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu
120b3(mdo sde): ltar sangs rgyas kyi zhing ji snyed pa de dag las gang du rdul phra rab de dag bzhag par gyur pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag thams cad grong khyer gcig tu gyur te rtsig pas bskor nas/ 'og gi chu'i
120b4(mdo sde): phung po nas bzung ste/ srid pa'i rtse mo'i bar gyi grong khyer de dag yungs 'bru mi rtsub pa 'ba' zhig gis yongs su gang bar gyur na/ rigs kyi bu 'di ji snyam du sems// yungs 'bru de dag
120b5(mdo sde): mang ngam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pas ji ltar dpe 'di btsal ba ngo mtshar to// bcom ldan 'das gang dpe 'di thos nas dad par 'gyur ba'i sems can de dag
120b6(mdo sde): kyang ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i chos dang ldan par 'gyur ro/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pas ni yungs 'bru de dag brgya phrag 'di snyed cig ce'am/
120b7(mdo sde): stong phrag 'di snyed cig tsa 'am/ brgya stong phrag 'di snyed cig ce 'am/ dkrigs pa dang / gtams pa dang / khyad phyin dang / mi 'khrugs pa phrag 'di snyed cig ce 'am/ sangs rgyas
121a1(mdo sde): kyi zhing 'di snyed cig ce 'am/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing brgya phrag 'di snyed cig ce 'am/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing stong phrag 'di snyed cig ce'am/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing brgya stong phrag
121a2(mdo sde): 'di snyed cig yod do zhes rab tu mkhyen to/ / rigs kyi bu byang chub 'dod pa la la zhig gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing de snyed rin po che sna bdun gyis rab tu bkang ste sbyin pa byin pa bas// ji ltar skyes bu
121a3(mdo sde): dam pa dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa gang yon tan gyi chos 'di lta bu la gnas pa de dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa gcig gi dam pa'i chos yongs su bzung na/ 'di de bas bsod nams ches
121a4(mdo sde): mang du skyed do/ / yungs 'bru ji snyed pa de snyed kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams gang la la zhig gis bsti stang du byas/ bla mar byas/ ri mor byas te/ gang mchod pa byas//
121a5(mdo sde): gang zab mo'i chos la bzod pa thob pa de ni/ de bas bsod nams ches mang du skyed do// yungs 'bru ji snyed pa de snyed kyi gtan pa med pa'i mchod sbyin byin pa bas/ gang gzhan zhig sems
121a6(mdo sde): can thams cad la khong khro ba med pa'i sems kyis chos la rab tu dga' zhing bzod pas gom pa bdun bor na/ de bas de bsod nams ches mang du skyed do// yungs 'bru de dag ji
121a7(mdo sde): snyed pa de snyed du/ brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po dang / byang chub sems dpa' snyed pa bas/ gzhan gang gis 'dus byas thams cad mi
121b1(mdo sde): rtag pa dang / sdug bsngal bar rig cing chos thams cad la bdag med par rig la/ mya ngan 'das bzhi par rig nas/ sems can rnams la snying rje chen po bskyed de/ dkon
121b2(mdo sde): mchog gsum gyi rigs rgyun mi gcad pa'i phyir/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed na/ de ni de bas ches bsod nams mang du skyed do// de nas bco
121b3(mdo sde): ldan 'das la/ byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' mdzod kyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das slad ma'i tshe slad ma'i dus na/ ci nas chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'dzam bu'i/
121b4(mdo sde): gling du spyod cing / rgyas par yang 'gyur bar de bzhin gshegs pas chos kyi rnam grangs 'di byin gyis brlab tu gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu de'i phyir
121b5(mdo sde): rgyal po chen po bzhi dgug pa'i tshig bshad par bya ste/ dgug pa'i chog de dag gis rgyal po chen po bzhi 'ongs nas/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di yun ring du gnas par bya ba dang / rgya cher rnam par
121b6(mdo sde): dbye zhing rab tu bstan par phyir brtson par 'gyur ro/ / de la 'di dag ni dgug pa'i tshig go/ 'di lta ste/ d+hu d+hu re/ d+hi d+hi re/ d+ha dz+wa la ti/ d+hA dzA lang kA re/ A brta ni/ sha mo sha ma pa ti/
121b7(mdo sde): shAn ti mu khe/ ni gr-i ha ba ra bka k+sha/ a no dA ra/ A no dA/ u dA ra bi ga ma/ sa ma pa thA/ pa tha shud d+hi/ pai thAM nug mai/ pathA san d+hi/ prad dz+nyA mu khe
122a1(mdo sde): Ar+ya ko'u le/ b+h+yo'u ta rak+She/ A me sa tsa/ me mes tsa/ ta ma sa tsa/ ta ta ma sa tsa/ bud d+hA pA dA/ d+harmA nu san d+hi/ Ar+ya ga NA nug ma/ a nAr+yA nir b+hA ta/
122a2(mdo sde): ni/ ruSh+Ta pra sA da naM/ i shwa ra pA da lo ka tsid tI kr-i ta/ a nu ra ka yan tu/ i mAna?/ d+harma san d+hi/ bi b+ha dzan du ni rug ti nir de shaM/ pra ti rak+Shan tu/ d+harma d+ha rA Na/ rigs kyi
122a3(mdo sde): bu 'di dag ni rgyal po chen po bzhi dgug pa'i tshig go/ / de nas rgyal po chen po bzhi 'jigs shing skrag ste/ spu zing zhes byed nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der lhags te/ bcom ldan 'das
122a4(mdo sde): kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag rgyal po chen po bzhi chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bsrung ba dang / bskyab
122a5(mdo sde): pa dang / sba ba dang / yun ring du gnas par bgyi ba dang / rjes su gzung ba'i slad du gnas par bgyi'o// gang na chos kyi rnam grangs 'di spyod pa der/ lha dang / klu dang / gnod/
122a6(mdo sde): sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci gang dag chos ma lags par 'tshal bar 'gyur ba de dag shin tu tshar gcad par bgyi'o// gang dag chos
122a7(mdo sde): 'tshal bar 'gyur ba de dag gi sems rab tu dga' bar 'gyur ro/ / chos smras pa de'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor yang yongs su legs par gzhag par bgyi'o// tshig gi mtshams su tshogs ni
122b1(mdo sde): mtshams sbyar bar bgyi'o/ / spobs pa'ang stsal bar 'gyi'o// dran pa dang / blo gros dang / rtogs pa dang / dga' ba'ang 'phel bar bgyi'o// de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom
122b2(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyis/ rgyal po chen po de bzhi la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// grogs po dag 'di lta ste/ khyed ni nga'i bu chos las chos kyis byung ba ste/ khyed rnams nga'i dam pa'i chos
122b3(mdo sde): yongs su gzung ba'i phyir spro ba ston pa ni legs so legs so/ / khyed rnams chos kyi rgyu 'thun pa 'dis/ 'jig rten du 'jig rten gyi bdag por 'gyur te/ 'jig rten thams
122b4(mdo sde): cad las yang dag par 'das nas/ 'phags pa mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ro// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis/ byang chub sems dpa'
122b5(mdo sde): nam mkha' mdzod la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ / rigs kyi bu lha'i dbang po brgya byin dgug pa'i tshig bshad par bya ste/ rig pa'i gsang sngags kyi tshig de dag gis lha'i dbang po brgya byin
122b6(mdo sde): chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bsrung ba dang / yun ring du gnas par bya ba'i phyir gnas par 'gyur ro// de la tshig ni 'di rnams so// 'di lta ste/ shru b+he/ shu d+ha ma ti/ shu d+ha byung
122b7(mdo sde): da da re/ da ri Te/ tu ra Ne/ da me/ sha me/ u pa sha me/ khu be/ ug khu re/ a so mu khe/ d+ha ra ni/ A ra De/ shu shru'u ShaM/ sa hi te/ a b+ha de/ b+he da san d+hi sa me/ sa ma
123a1(mdo sde): ba ti/ sa ma rash+mi/ a she/ hu hu/ he he/ khu ru khu re/ an ti kra me/ de ba rak+ka sa hi te/ bahA bab+hA sa pra me/ A gad tsha tu/ sha kro de ba nA min tra/ da sha ta na ya na/ thar ma ku Ta d+ha ra i
123a2(mdo sde): shwa ro ma rung b+ha ba na ni bA si/ rigs kyi bu 'di dag ni lha'i dbang po brgya byin dgug pa'i tshig gang gis lha'i dbang po brgya byin bkug nas chos kyi rnam grangs 'di yun ring du gnas par bya ba'i phyir gnas pa'o//
123a3(mdo sde): de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin chos kyi shugs kyis dga' ba skyes nas/ sum cu rtsa gsum gnas kyi khang pa thams cad rab tu g.yos par byas te/ g.yog lha brgya stong mang po dang / bcom ldan 'das ga la ba
123a4(mdo sde): der dong nas lhags te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan padas bdag ni lha'i dbang po brgya byin te/ sum cu ru
123a5(mdo sde): gsum pa'i lha la dbang bgyid de/ g.yog lha'i tshogs dang / chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'dzam bu'i gling du rgyas par bgyi ba'i slad du nan tan du bgyi'o// chos smra ba de dag dang / mdo sde 'di 'chang ba de dag
123a6(mdo sde): la ji ltar mi gnod pa dang / dga' ba dang / mchog tu dga' ba dang / mos pa rnyed cing chos kyi rgyan gyis brgyan te/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di grong dang / grong khyer dang / grong rdal dang / yul
123a7(mdo sde): 'khor dang / rgyal po'i pho brang du zhugs nas rab tu 'chad par 'gyur ba de ltar chos kyis bsrung ba dang / bskyab pa dang / sba bar bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag chos gnyan pa'i slad du chos
123b1(mdo sde): smra ba de dag gi gan du mchi bar bgyi'o/ / khro zhing gshe'ang dang du blang bar bgyi'o// bdud par chad 'gyid pa'i gnod pa thams cad las kyang bsrung ba dang / bskyab pa dang / sba bar bgyi'o//
123b2(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ko'u shi ka ji lta bur khyod lha'i dbang po thob pas chos kyi dbang por zhugs nas/ nga dang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi dam pa'i chos yongs su gzung ba'i phyir/
123b3(mdo sde): seng ge'i sgra sgrogs pa legs so legs so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ko'u shi ka de bzhin gshegs pa gcig gi dam pa'i chos yongs su bzung na/ 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i
123b4(mdo sde): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi dam pa'i chos yongs su bzung ba yin no/ / de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis yang byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' mdzod la bka' stsal pa/ de la rigs kyi bu
123b5(mdo sde): mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa dgug pa'i tshig bshad kyis/ dgug pa'i tshig gang gis mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa chen po chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bsrung ba'i phyir gnas par 'gyur ba nyon cig/ de dag
123b6(mdo sde): la dgug pa'i tshig 'di rnams so/ / 'di lta ste/ me trI/ shu b+h+ra mai d+hI/ d+harma mai trI/ mai d+h+ya nu sa hi te/ sa ma me tri/ san d+hi mai tri/ a nug ma me tri/ a nur kra mai tri/ a nud d+hu ra mai tri/ sad t+ya mai tri/
123b7(mdo sde): d+harma mai tri/ a nu gra ha mai tri/ a bi pra tri sA ra me tri/ u pa lo ka na me tri/ bi lo ka na maM tri/ bo d+ha nu ga na mai tri/ bo d+ha nu ga na me tri/ bud d+ha a d+hiSh+ThA na me tri/ a nu rak+Sha mai tri/ d+harma pra ti sA ran me tri/ mo k+Sha
124a1(mdo sde): me trI/ an nu ro d+ha bi ro d+ha me tri/ a ta mo ma tri/ bra h+ma ba tha me tri/ d+hA nA lang kA ra me tri/ ta s+ya a nu san d+hi kA ru na me tri/ ta s+ya nu san d+hi mu di ta me tri/ ta s+ya a nu san d+hi u pek+Sha me/
124a2(mdo sde): tri/ brah+ma pa tha a nu ga ma na me tri/ tsid ta o'ud bi la l+ya maM tri/ a nu sA ra nA me tri/ nisti ra Na ma tri/ sarba trA nu ga ma na me tri/ a gang tsha tu/ brah+ma srad sid dz+ya/ d+han sa khan b+h+yad tiSh+Tha/ swa sa mA d+h+ye/
124a3(mdo sde): nisgra ma ma hA bi mA nad/ bya ba lo ka ya/ dza ma pU dwI pan/ ku ru shwa d+harma rak+Shan/ mA ti kra ma bud d+ha d+hiSh+ThA nAn/ nam mkha' mdzod 'di dag ni mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa dgug pa'i tshig go/ de nas mi
124a4(mdo sde): mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa tshangs pa'i 'jig rten na 'dug pa/ sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis brlabs pa'i rig pa'i gsang sngags byams pa'i tshig 'di dag sangs rgyas kyi mthus/ lha'i rna ba'i khams kyis thos
124a5(mdo sde): te/ thos nas kyang tshangs pa brgya stong phrag drug cu rtsa brgyad dang lhan cig tu bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu
124a6(mdo sde): 'dug go/ / phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas/ mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag de bzhin gshegs
124a7(mdo sde): pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyis byin gyis brlabs pas/ bdag cag byams pa dang snying rjer ldan te/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bsrung ba'i slad du nan tan du bgyi'o// gang chos smra ba de dag 'di lta bu'i
124b1(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi chos sdud cing mdo sde 'di 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / 'chad pa dang / tha na glegs bam du bris te 'chang ba de dag dgon par mchis sam/ lam gol bar mchis sam/
124b2(mdo sde): grong dang grong khyer ram/ grong rdal du mchis sam/ yul 'khor tam/ rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor du mchis kyang rung / chos kyi gtam bgyid kyang rung ste/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di rgya cher 'chang na bsam par
124b3(mdo sde): bgyi'o/ / bsrung ba dang / bskyab pa dang / sba bar bgyi'o// de dag la spro ba stsal bar bgyi'o// stobs yongs su rdzogs par bgyi'o// dran pa bsgrub par bgyi'o// blo gros yongs su gzung bar
124b4(mdo sde): bgyi'o/ / rtogs pa'i rjes su 'jug par bgyi'o// spobs pa stsal bar bgyi'o// ma dad pa rnams dad par bgyi'o// dad pa rnams bsgral bar bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das ji ltar de bzhin
124b5(mdo sde): gshegs pa'i chos kyi tshul bdag cag gis yongs su bzung ste/ rgya cher 'gyur ba de ltar bgyi'o// de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis/ mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa la 'di skad
124b6(mdo sde): ces bka' stsal to/ / legs so legs so// tshangs pa dam pa'i chos yongs su bzung bas de bzhin gshegs pa khyod la rjes su yi rang ngo // ji ltar ngas da ltar bskor ba bzhin du tshangs pa khyod kyis
124b7(mdo sde): kyang ring por mi thogs par chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu skor bar 'gyur ro/ / ji ltar khyod kyis da ltar nga'i dam pa'i chos yongs su bzung ba de bzhin du/ tshangs pa gzhan dag gis khyod kyi dam pa'i chos 'dzin
125a1(mdo sde): par 'gyur ro/ / de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa la bka' stsal pa/ byams pa ji tsam du gzung ba dang / bcang ba dang
125a2(mdo sde): bklag pa dang / gzhan dag la'ang rgya cher yang dag par rab tu bstan par bya ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa la byas pa gzo zhing byas pa shes pa bskyed pa dang / bdag gis bsam pa yongs su rdzogs pa
125a3(mdo sde): bya ba dang / sems can rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba rnam par dag par bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams chos snang ba thob par bya ba dang / bdud thams cad tshar gcad pa dang / mu steg
125a4(mdo sde): can thams cad gzhom pa dang / dam pa'i chos yongs su gzung ba dang / dkon mchog gsum gyi rigs mi 'chad par bya ba'i phyir bskal pa bye ba phrag grangs med par yang dag par bsgrubs pa'i bla na
125a5(mdo sde): med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'di khyod la yongs su gtad do/ / de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la/ byang chub sems dpa' byams pas 'di skad
125a6(mdo sde): ces gsol to/ / bcom ldan 'das bdag de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i slad du/ bla na med pa'i dkon mchog gi mdzod 'di bsrung bar bgyi'o// de ci'i slad du zhe na/
125a7(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das 'di ni bdag dang / 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi dam pa'i chos lags so// bcom ldan 'das bdag dga'
125b1(mdo sde): ldan gnas na mchis te/ 'di lta bu'i mdo sde dag kun tu bsrung ba dang / yongs su gzung ba dang / yun ring du gnas par bgyi ba'i slad du nan tan du bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das slang ma'i tshe slad ma'i
125b2(mdo sde): dus na/ 'di lta bu'i mdo sde rnams su'i rna bar grag par 'gyur ba dang / thos nas 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / gzhan dag la'ang rgya cher rab tu ston cing bdag nyid kyang sbyor bar
125b3(mdo sde): bgyid pa de ni/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' byams pa'i byin gyi rlabs su rig par bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das de'i tshe bdud kyi phyogs kyang g.yos par 'gyur te/ 'on kyang dge ba'i rtsa ba
125b4(mdo sde): gang gis bdag gi spu'i khung bu re re grub pa de la/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can de dag thams cad bdud sdig can du gyur kyang / de dag bdag gi spu'i bu ga gcig
125b5(mdo sde): gis yongs su gzung ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba'i brgya'i char yang nye bar mi mchi ba nas/ dpe'i bar du nye bar mi mchi'o// bcom ldan 'das bdag gi bsod nams kyi stobs dang / ye shes kyi stobs kyis
125b6(mdo sde): bdud kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad rab tu pham par bgyis la/ de bzhin gshegs pas bskal pa bye ba grangs ma mchis par yang dag par bsgrubs pa'i byang chub 'di bsrung bar bgyi'o// bcom ldan
125b7(mdo sde): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ byams pa legs so legs so// byams pa bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa'i las te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ bdud dang nyon mongs pa thams cad tshar
126a1(mdo sde): gcad pa dang / phas kyi rgol ba thams cad chos dang 'thun pas zil gyis gnan pa dang / sems can yongs su smin par bya ba dang / dam pa'i chos yongs su gzung ba ste/ @
126a2(mdo sde): pa bzhi po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa'i las so/ / las bzhi po dag kyang las gcig gis yongs su bsdus so// gcig po gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa'o// de'i tshe
126a3(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis gnas brtan 'od srungs chen po dang / tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ 'od srungs dang kun dga' bo ji tsam du gzung ba dang / bcang ba dang / bklag
126a4(mdo sde): pa dang / gzhan dag la'ang rgya cher yang dag par rab tu bstan par bya ba'i phyir/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'di yongs su gtad do// 'od srungs chen pos gsol pa/ bcom
126a5(mdo sde): ldan 'das bdag gi mthu dang / stobs dang / nus pa ji lta ba bzhin du/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i byang chub 'di yongs su gzung bar bgyi'o// kun dga' bos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das chos
126a6(mdo sde): kyi rnam grangs 'di bdag gis gzung lags te/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyis bdag gis yangs shing rgyas par bgyi'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ byang chub sems dpa' sems
126a7(mdo sde): dpa' chen po bsod nams kyis brgyan pas 'di skad ces gsol to/ / bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang 'di lta bu'i mdo sde de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa zab mor snang ba/
126b1(mdo sde): rgyu ba chad pa/ nges pa'i don mthong bar dka' ba/ rtogs par dka' ba/ don dam pa stong pa nyid dang ldan pa/ tshul khrims kyi rgyan gyis brgyan pa/ dran pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / nges
126b2(mdo sde): par rtog pa dang / yid rab tu dga' bar byed pa/ shes rab kyi 'od snang bar byed pa/ rnam par grol ba nges par ston pa/ zhi ba/ ma gos pa/ mkhas shing rtogs pa rnams kyis rig par bya ba/
126b3(mdo sde): sangs rgyas thams cad kyis bstod cing bsngags pa/ gzungs dang mdo sde'i rgyal po'i phyag rgyas btab pa/ thogs pa med pa'i spobs pa 'dzin pa/ dran pa dang / blo gros dang / rtogs pa
126b4(mdo sde): dang mos pa rnam par 'phel ba/ bdud dang phyir rgol ba rnams bcom pa/ phas kyi rgol ba thams cad kyis zil gyis mi non pa/ tshul khrims 'chal pa rnams spa 'gong ba/ sbyangs pa'i
126b5(mdo sde): yon tan dang / yo byad bsnyungs pa dang / sdom pa tshar phyin pa/ gtong ba'i yon tan gyi chos rab tu gnas pa/ yon tan gyi chos mtha' yas pa las nges par byung ba/ sangs rgyas
126b6(mdo sde): thams cad kyi chos dang ye shes 'di 'dzin tam/ len tama?/ 'chang ngam/ klog gam/ kun chub par byed dam/ gzhan dag la yang dag par rab tu ston tam/ yi ger 'dri
126b7(mdo sde): 'am/ yi ger 'drir 'jug gam/ tshig tu 'don tam/ sems sam/ rtog gam/ tshul bzhin nges sam/ nan tan la gnas pa de dag bsod nams ji tsam zhig skyed par 'gyur/
127a1(mdo sde): de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' bsod nams kyis brgyan pa la slar tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsungs so// phyogs
127a2(mdo sde): bcu'i rgya chen dpag tu med pa yi/ / zhing rnams sangs rgyas spyan gyis gang gzigs pa// de dag thams cad rin chen rab bkang ste// byang chub sems dpas sbyin pa byin pa bas// ga
127a3(mdo sde): gis sangs rgyas mang pos bshad pa yi/ / mdo 'di 'dra ba rab bzang ma gos pa// 'chang ngam klog gam gzhan la ston byed pa// de yi bsod nams de ni ches mchog go/ me tog dri zhim byug
127a4(mdo sde): ba gdugs rnams dang / / ba dan rgyal mtshan lnga ldi gos rnams kyis// zhing de thams cad yongs su gang byas nas// byang chub sems dpas sangs rgyas mchod pa bas// bde gshegs bstan pa
127a5(mdo sde): dam chos rab 'jig cing / / 'gag pa'i tshe na gang zhig bag yod par// dam pa'i chos ni yongs su 'dzin byed pa// de yi bsod nams de ni ches mchog go// phyogs bcu dag na rgya mtsho gang yod pa//
127a6(mdo sde): de dag 'bru mar dri zhim rab bkang ste// snying po ri rab tshad tsam byas nas su// rgyal ba'i mchod rten ma mar bus pa bas// gang gis chos sgron 'di ni rab 'jig tshe// 'jig rten 'di dag
127a7(mdo sde): mun pas bsgribs shes nas/ / rgyal bas gsungs pa'i chos sgron 'dzin byed pa// de yi bsod nams de ni chas mchog go// sangs rgyas kyi ni byang chub mchog tshol zhing // zhing rnams bye bar dzin
127b1(mdo sde): pa gang mthong ba/ / de dag la ni bskal pa bye mang du// lha rdzas 'du byed yid 'ong mchod pa bas// gang zhig sangs rgyas byas pa gzo ba dang // dkon mchog gsum ni rjes su gzung ba dang // cho
127b2(mdo sde): bdi la ni sems can gzung ba'i phyir/ / dam chos 'dzin pa de ni ches mchog go/ ji ltar mgon po rnams kyi chos 'dzin ltar// sems can gang ngas sangs rgyas spyan gyis gzigs// de dag
127b3(mdo sde): gang gis tshangs pa brgya byin bkod/ / de yi bsod nams de snyed mi 'phel lo// sems can de kun dgra bcom bkod pa dang // rang rgyal theg par rab tu bkod pa bas// gang zhig byang chub tu ni
127b4(mdo sde): sems bskyed nas/ / dam chos 'dzin pa de ni khyad par 'phags// gal te bsod nams de la gzugs yod na// phyogs bcu'i zhing rnams thams cad gang bar 'gyur// skyes bu khyu mchog ye shes ma gtogs
127b5(mdo sde): par/ / bsod nams de yi snod ni yod ma yin// ji ltar bskal pa bye ba stong brjod kyang // sangs rgyas ye shes mtha' yod ma yin ltar// de bzhin gshegs kyi dam chos 'dzin pa yi// bsod
127b6(mdo sde): nams de yang tshad yod ma yin no/ / de nas byang chub sems dpa' bsod nams kyis brgyan pas bcom ldan 'das las dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa'i bsod nams bshad pa 'di thos nas
127b7(mdo sde): tshim zhing mgu la yi rangs te/ rab tu dga' nas dga' ba dang yid bde ba skyes te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' gang dag dam pa'i
128a1(mdo sde): chos yongs su 'dzin pa la brtson par mi bgyid pa de dag ni bdud kyis byin gyis brlabs pa lags so/ / bcom ldan 'das gang dag dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa dang bral ba'i
128a2(mdo sde): dge ba'i rtsa ba gzhan thams cad ni bdag la yungs 'bru tsam du gda' 'o/ / dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba ni/ phyogs bcu'i nam mkha'i khams ji lta ba bzhin du bdag 'du shes
128a3(mdo sde): gnas par gyur to/ / bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar bdag sems can thams cad la bde bar 'tshal ba'i slad du/ lus dang srog kyang bor te/ bde ba thams cad mi btsal bar dam pa'i chos yongs
128a4(mdo sde): su gzung ba'i slad du go cha bgo bar bgyi'o/ / chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad pa na/ byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' mdzod kyi bsod nams kyi rnam par smin pa'i rgyu 'thun pas/ phyogs bcu'i
128a5(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi zhing dpag tu med pa nas byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' mdzod dang blo mnyam pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir/ nam mkha'i dkyil nas
128a6(mdo sde): me tog gi char mngon par rab tu phab bo/ / bar snang las kyang sgra 'di skad ces byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha' mdzod kyis 'dus pa'i le'u 'di brgyad de/ yongs su bzung ba'i bar
128a7(mdo sde): du sangs rgyas kyi bya ba byas so/ / byang chub kyi sems dang ma bral ba'i sems can gang dag chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'dzin par 'gyur ba de dag kyang de bzhin du dam pa'i chos brgyan par 'gyur ro//
128b1(mdo sde): de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe sku las 'di lta bu'i 'od rab tu btang bas/ 'od des phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad rgyas par gang bar gyur to// chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i
128b2(mdo sde): thog ma dang / bar ma dang / tha ma bshad pa na/ sems can dpag tu med grangs med pa ni byang chub tu sems skyes so// sems can dpag tu med grangs med pa dag ni bzod pa thob par gyur to//
128b3(mdo sde): sems can la la dag ni sems rnam par grol lo// la la dag ni chos kyi mig rnam par dag go// la la dag ni 'dod chags bral ba rnyed do// la la dag ni lha dang mi'i phun sum tshogs pa yongs su
128b4(mdo sde): bzung bar gyur te/ sangs rgyas gzhan dag la'ang blta ba'i phyir/ rgyu bsags par yang gyur to// de thams cad la'ang bcom ldan 'das rjes su thugs rang ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad
128b5(mdo sde): ces bka' stsal nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha' mdzod dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' ltad mo can dang /
128b6(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' lag na rin po che dang / byang chub sems dpa' rin chen dpal dang / byang chub sems dpa' yon tan rgyal po'i 'od dang / byang chub sems dpa' bsod nams kyis brgyan pa dang
128b7(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' ngan song spong ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi rgyal po dang / tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu dang / tshe dang ldan pa 'od srungs chen po dang / tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang
129a1(mdo sde): mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa dang / lha'i dbang po brgya byin dang / rgyal po chen po bzhi dang / dge slong de dag dang / byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang / thams cad dang ldan
129a2(mdo sde): pa'i 'khor de dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// 'dus pa chen po'i le'u las
129a3(mdo sde): 'phags pa nam mkha' mdzod kyis zhus pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so/ / / rgya gar gyi mkhan po bi dza ya shI la dang / shI len dra bo d+he dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsa ba ban/
129a4(mdo sde): d+he ye shes sdes bsgyur cing nus te/ skad gsar bcad kyis kyang bcos nas gtan la phab pa// / rgya gar skad du/ ar+ya na gar a ba laM bi kA nA ma
129a5(mdo sde): ma hA yA na sU tra/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa grong khyer gyis 'tsho ba zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo// sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa
129a6(mdo sde): dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na/ lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha'
129a7(mdo sde): lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba dang / rgyal po dang / blon po dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang / dge slong dang / dge slong
129b1(mdo sde): ma dang / dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma rnams kyis bkur stir byas/ bla mar byas/ mchod cing rjed de/ pad+ma chus ma gos pa bzhin du bzhugs so// de nas de'i tshe rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis de
129b2(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa'i phyir sngon zla tha chung zla ba nya ba'i tshes bco lnga la 'bru mar gyis zangs po che stong bkang ste dngar nas/ mar me sbar ba'i 'od kyis kho ra khor yug tu dpag tshad bzhir snang bas khyab
129b3(mdo sde): par byas so/ / de nas yang de'i tshe mnyan yod kyi grong khyer chen po na dga' byed ma zhes bya ba grong khyer gyis 'tsho ba zhig 'dug go/ des 'bru mar sran gre'u dang sbyar ba nyos nas/ zhag bzhi kha 'tshes te
129b4(mdo sde): nyam chung bar gyur to/ / de nas 'bru mar de khyer te/ rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal du song nas/ khyams kyi nang logs su mar me sbyar te bzhag nas 'di ltar sems bskyed de/ bcom ldan 'das
129b5(mdo sde): bdag dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis ma 'ongs pa'i dus na/ ji ltar da ltar gyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ji lta ba bzhin du bdag kyang ma 'ongs pa'i dus na ston
129b6(mdo sde): par gyur te/ chos ston par gyur cig/ dge 'dun yang sdud par gyur cig ces byas so// 'di ltar yang sems bskyed de/ gal te bdag ma 'ongs pa'i dus na/ sangs rgyas su 'gyur ba zhig
129b7(mdo sde): na mar me 'di bdag phyir ma 'ongs kyi bar du 'bar bar gyur cig ces byas nas/ mar me de sbar te grong khyer du song na/ mar me de'i 'od kyis 'dzam bu'i gling thams cad snang bar gyur te/
130a1(mdo sde): nam nangs kyi bar du'ang mar me de ma shi'o// de nas tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen pos chos gos kyi mtha' mas mar me de bsad par byas na gsad par ma nus so//
130a2(mdo sde): de nas tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen pos rnam par 'thor rlung gis bsad par byas kyang gsad par ma nus so// de nas tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen pos tshangs pa'i 'jig rten du 'dug nas
130a3(mdo sde): stong gsum 'dir shing rta'i srog shing tsam gyi char gyi rgyan dbab par byin gyis brlabs te/ mar me de'i steng du btang yang gsad par ma nus so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
130a4(mdo sde): mo'u 'gal gyi bu thong zhig/ mar me 'di ni byang chub kyi sems kyis sbar ba yin la/ byang chub kyi sems ni nyan thos kyis zil gyis mnan par mi nus so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ thams cad
130a5(mdo sde): mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems ni nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis zil gyis mnan du med pa'i phyir ro/ / de nas re zhig na bud med de nyi ma shar te grong khyer nas phyir 'ongs nas/ des mar me de
130a6(mdo sde): shin tu 'bar ba mthong ba dang / de mchog tu dga' ba chen po rgyas par gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe 'dzum pa mdzad do// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi chos nyid ni 'di
130a7(mdo sde): bin te/ gang gi tshe sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'dzum pa mdzad pa de'i tshe/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi zhal gyi sgo nas 'od zer kha dog sna tshogs kha dog du ma 'di lta ste/ sngon po dang
130b1(mdo sde): ser po dang / dmar po dang / dkar po dang / btsong kha dang / shel dang / dngul gyi kha dog lta bu dag 'byung bar 'gyur te/ 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas mu med pa dag snang bas khyab par byas
130b2(mdo sde): nas/ tshangs pa'i 'jig rten gyi bar du song ste/ zla ba dang nyi ma'i 'od kyang zil gyis mnan nas yang slar log ste/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu'i/
130b3(mdo sde): gtsug tor du nub par gyur to// de nas 'od zer de dag gis bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu'i gtsug tor du mi snang bar gyur to// de nas
130b4(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das la/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos tshigs su bcad de gsol pa/ rgyal mchog rnam par 'dren pa gang zag mchog/ rgyu med par ni 'dzum pa mi mdzad na// ci yi
130b5(mdo sde): rkyen gyis zhal ni 'dzum mdzad pa/ / 'jig rten phan pa thugs brtses bdag la gsungs// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo grong khyer gyis 'tsho ba 'di bskal pa
130b6(mdo sde): nyi shu rtsa brgyad kyi bar du ngan 'gro log par ltung bar 'gro bar mi 'gyur te/ rtag tu lha dang mi'i phun sum tshogs pa dag nyams su myong nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
130b7(mdo sde): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun tu snang ba zhes bya bar 'gyur ro/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to// stobs bcu ldan pa mchod phyir zangs chen phrag
131a1(mdo sde): stong gsal rgyal gyis/ / mar me bzang po spar bas dpag tshad bzhir ni kun tu snang // grong khyer 'tsho ba'i 'bru mar sran mgre'u sbyar ba sbar ba yis// 'dzam gling snang
131a2(mdo sde): bas khya gyur de ni byang chub sems kyi mthus/ / mo'u 'gal gyis ni mar me gsad 'dod rdzu 'phrul rgya chen byas// rnam par 'thor ba'i rlung gi shugs btang gsad par yongs ma nus// tshangs
131a3(mdo sde): paba'i 'jig rten 'dug nas chu rgyun shing rta'i srog shing tsam/ / phab kyang gsad par ma nus mar me nyi ma'i 'od bzhin snang // de ni zhag bzhi kha 'tshos rgyal byed dga' ba'i tshal du 'ongs// dga'
131a4(mdo sde): ba'i sems kyis bde gshegs zhabs la phyag byas thal sbyar 'dug/ mnyam med 'dzum pa mdzad pas kun dga' bo yang rab dga' nas// gzi brjid mtha' yas 'dzum mdzad 'di yi 'bras bu
131a5(mdo sde): ci 'dra gsungs/ / dga' byed 'di ni bskal pa nyi shu brgyad na rgyal bar 'gyur// rang byung kun snang zhes bya 'od kyis stong chen bzhi snang byed// ma 'ongs dus na bde bar gshegs pa bye ba mchod
131a6(mdo sde): pabar 'gyur/ / de ni kun tu 'khor los gyur 'gyur rgyal rnams bkur sti byed// sangs rgyas rtogs pa brjod pa'i ming ni dad rnams rab dga' byed// skye bo mkhas pa dag gis de thos sems
131a7(mdo sde): kyang rab tu dga'/ / de ltar rgyal ba bsam yas stobs bcu'i chos kyang bsam mi khyab// dga' ba bskyed na rnam smin mtshungs med bsam gyis mi khyab 'gyur// bcom ldan 'das
131b1(mdo sde): kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang / grong khyer gyis 'tshe ba de dang / byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang / dge slong de dag dang / lha dang / mi dang /
131b2(mdo sde): lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// 'phags pa grong khyer gyis 'tsho ba zhes bya ba theg pa chen
131b3(mdo sde): po'i mdo rdzogs so/ / / rgya gar gyi mkhan po dz+nyA na gar+b+ha dang / lo ts+tsha ba ban d+he klu'i dbang pos bsgyur/ rgya gar gyi mkhan po bid d+ya kar sing ha dang / zhu chen gyi lo ts+tsha
131b4(mdo sde): ba ban d+he de ba tsan dras zhus te gtan la phab pa/ / // rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya brah+ma pa ri bring tsha nA ma ma hA yA na sU tA/ bod skad du/ 'phag
131b5(mdo sde): ba tshangs pas zhus pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/ / sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das
131b6(mdo sde): grong khyer yangs par tshal chen po'i khang pa brtsegs pa'i gnas na/ dge slong khri nyis stong gi dge 'dun chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rab tu mang po dang thabs cig
131b7(mdo sde): tu bzhugs te/ de na bcom ldan 'das mi nyal tsam nam gyi gung thun la skyil mo krung bcas nas/ dran pa mngon du bzhag ste/ rtog pa dang bcas pa/ dpyod pa dang bcas pa/ ting
132a1(mdo sde): nge 'dzin las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang bde ba can bsam gtan dang po la snyoms par zhugs so/ / bcom ldan 'das de las bzhengs nas/ rtog pa med pa/ dpyod/
132a2(mdo sde): pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang bde ba can bsam gtan gnyis pa la snyoms par zhugs so// bcom ldan 'das de las kyang bzhengs nas dga' ba'i 'dod chags dang
132a3(mdo sde): bral ba btang snyoms pa/ dran pa dang ldan pa/ bde bar gnas pa/ bsam gtan gsum pa la snyoms par zhugs so// bcom ldan 'das de las kyang bzhengs nas/ bde
132a4(mdo sde): ba'ang spangs te/ snga nas sdug bsngal yang spangs shing / yid bde ba dang / yid mi bde ba'ang nub pas/ phyir sdug bsngal yang med pa/ bde ba'ang med pa/ btang snyoms
132a5(mdo sde): dang dran pa yongs su dag pa/ bsam gtan bzhi pa la snyoms par zhugs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das bsam gtan bzhi pa las bzhengs nas/ bsam gtan gsum pa la zhugs
132a6(mdo sde): so/ / bsam gtan gsum pa las bzhengs nas/ bsam gtan gnyis pa la zhugs so// bsam gtan gnyis pa las bzhengs nas/ bsam gtan dang po la zhugs so// bsam
132a7(mdo sde): gtan dang po las bzhengs nas/ gdul bya ji lta ba bzhin du sems can la gzugs kyi lus kun tu ston pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so// bcom ldan 'das gdul bya ji lta
132b1(mdo sde): ba bzhin du/ sems can la gzugs kyi lus kun tu ston pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu/ de nas skad cig de la bcom ldan 'das shin tu lham me lhan ne lhang nger bzhugs te
132b2(mdo sde): mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa tshangs pa'i gnas na 'dug bzhin du/ bcom ldan 'das shin tu lham me lhan ne lhang nge ba dang / skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis legs par brgyan
132b3(mdo sde): ba mthong ngo / / mthong nas kyang tshangs pa'i 'jig rten nas mi snang bar gyur nas/ thams cad dang ldan pa'i tshal chen po 'od kyis snang bar byas te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar ha cang
132b4(mdo sde): yang mi ring ba zhig tu 'dug go/ / de nas mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pas 'di snyam du bsams te/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni bsnyen par dka' ba/ rnam par shes par dka'
132b5(mdo sde): ba yin na/ bcom ldan 'das ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs pa la bdag gis lud pa bsal ba'i sgra'am/ smra ba tsam gyis bzhengs par gsol ba ni bdag gi cha ma yin gyis/ bdag gis
132b6(mdo sde): tshigs su bcad pa dag gis bcom ldan 'das bzhengs par gsol gor ma chag snyam ste/ de nas mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pas bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas 'dug bzhin du/ bcom
132b7(mdo sde): ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de mgo btud nas/ bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa dag gis bzhengs par gsol to// ma gos dri ma ma mchis rnam par dag/
133a1(mdo sde): lha dang mi mchog rnams dang dri za dang // klu dang lha min rnams kyis legs mchod pa// sems can sman slad mgon po khyod la mchod// dper na ri ni rab tu mi g.yos dang
133a2(mdo sde): ji ltar rgya mtsho gting ni mi dpogs ltar/ / bdud rnams thams cad kyis kyang mi g.yos la// thub pa skyes bu mchog ni bsam gtan mdzad// zang zing mi mnga' mtshan ma mi mnga' zhing //
133a3(mdo sde): tha dad mi mnga' rten pa mi mnga' la// gnas mi mnga' zhing snang ba mi mnga' ba// thub pa skyes bu dam pa bsam gtan mdzad// rtog ge rnams kyi yul ni ma lags shing // byis pa rnams
133a4(mdo sde): kyi spyod yul ma lags la/ / sems dang sems las byung la sa rab 'das pa// bsam gtan pha rol gshegs pa bsam gtan mdzad// mgon po seng ge bzhin du gsung yang sgrog/ thub
133a5(mdo sde): pa 'brug bzhin sgrog pa rab tu mdzad/ / dpa' bo zla ba bzhin du rab tu mdzes// sems can dkon mchog khyed la phyag 'tshal lo// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs
133a6(mdo sde): pas bskul ba'i tshigs su bcad pa 'di lta bu dag gis bskul bar thugs su chud nas/ ji ltar skyil mo krung bcas pa de nyid kyis/ ting nge 'dzin de las bzhengs so// bzhengs nas
133a7(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa la sbran pa'i phyir/ mgur bsal ba'i sgra mdzad pa dang / mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pas/ bcom ldan 'das ting nge 'dzin de las bzhengs te/
133b1(mdo sde): ji ltar skyil mo krung bcas pa de nyid kyis bzhugs par mthong ngo // mthong nas kyang bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas te/ bcom
133b2(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/ / phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad gsol to//
133b3(mdo sde): gal te zhus nas zhu ba lung bstan pa'i slad du/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la skabs dbye bar snang na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la bdag
133b4(mdo sde): phyogs 'ga' zhig zhu lags so/ / de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis/ mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// tshangs pa zhu ba lung
133b5(mdo sde): bstan pa'i phyir/ de bzhin gshegs pas rtag tu khyod la skabs phyes/ tshangs pa khyod ci dang ci 'dod pa de bzhin gshegs pa la zhus shig dang / zhus pa de dang de nyid kyi lung bstan
133b6(mdo sde): pas/ ngas khyod kyi sems rangs par bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis skabs phye bas/ mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom
133b7(mdo sde): ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag chos du dang ldan na/ myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya lags/ de skad
134a1(mdo sde): ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis/ mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// tshangs pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
134a2(mdo sde): po dag chos gcig dang ldan na/ myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// chos gcig gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ lus kyi rjes su song ba'i dran
134a3(mdo sde): pa'o/ / tshangs pa byang chub sems dpa'i lus kyi rjes su song ba'i dran pa ji lta bu yin zhe na/ tshangs pa 'di la byang chub sems dpa' ni 'gro'o snyam pa'i dran pa dang ldan pa yin zhing / yang dag pa ji
134a4(mdo sde): lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/ / ldog go snyam du dran pa dang ldan pa yin zhing / yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// nyal lo snyam pa dang / ldang ngo snyam pa dang / 'chag go snyam pa
134a5(mdo sde): dang / 'dug go snyam du dran pa dang ldan pa yin zhing yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// de gcig pu dben par 'dug ste/ nang du yang dag bzhag nas 'khrug pa med pa'i yid kyis lus
134a6(mdo sde): 'di nyid la 'di lta ste/ kye ma lus 'di ni mi brtan pa/ mi rtag pa/ rang bzhin gyis nyam chung ba/ snying po med pa/ ther zug ma yin pa/ rnam par 'thor ba'i chos can/ rnam par 'jig
134a7(mdo sde): ba'i chos can/ rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba/ sgyu ma dang 'dra ba/ zil pa'i thigs pa dang 'dra ba/ g.yo ba/ mi gnas pa/ mi gtsang ba/ rnag gi dri nga ba can/ rlung dang nyi mas mthar
134b1(mdo sde): gtugs pa/ mthar 'drul pa/ mthar rdul du 'gyur ba ngan skyugs kyi mthar thug pa/ nad mang ba/ gnod pa can/ 'go ba'i nad mang ba/ na ba/ 'jig pa'i ngang can/ rus pa bsogs
134b2(mdo sde): pa/ dri nga ba 'dzag pa can/ bsgrims te rim gro bya dgos pa yin par yang dag pa'i dran pas yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du so sor rtog go/ de de ltar yang dag pa'i dran pas lus kyi skyon rnams yang
134b3(mdo sde): dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes pas/ lus la chags pa dang / lus la kun tu 'dod chags dang / lus la bdag gi nyid yin pa mi skyed do// de lus la mi lta bas srog la chags pa dang /
134b4(mdo sde): srog la kun tu 'dod chags dang / srog la bdag gi nyid yin pa mi skyed do// de lus dang srog la mi lta bas/ chos gos ngan ngon dang / kha zas ngan ngon dang / mal cha dang / stan ngan ngon dang /
134b5(mdo sde): na ba'i gsos sman dang / yo byad ngan ngon tsam dag gis chog par 'dzin pa yin no// de tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa rnams kyi bya ba gang dag yin pa don dang ldan pa rnams sam/ dge ba dang ldan pa
134b6(mdo sde): rnams kyang de dag la gtong bar byed de/ yongs su mi skyo zhing / yongs su yi chad pa med la/ yongs su skyo ba'i sems mi skyed do// de mkhan po dang slob dpon gyi gan du 'gro na dran pa dang ldan zhing /
134b7(mdo sde): 'di snyam du sems te/ mkhan po dag ni bsnyen par dka' ba/ slob dpon dag ni bsnyen par dka' ba ste/ bdag der song ba na/ sdig pa mi dge ba kun tu spyod pa 'ga' zhig gis bdag la glengs shing dran
135a1(mdo sde): par byas na mi rung ngo snyam nas/ de rgyu de dang / rkyen de dang / gzhi des bslab pa rnams la gus par byed par 'gyur te/ rtun par byed pa dang / legs par bya ba byed pa dang / zhi ba/
135a2(mdo sde): rnal du byed pa dang / shin tu yongs su mthar thug par byed pa can du 'gyur ro// de bslab pa rnams la gus par byed pa nyid dang / rtun par byed pa nyid dang / legs par bya ba byed pa nyid dang / zhi ba rnal du
135a3(mdo sde): byed pa nyid dang / shin tu yongs su mthar thug par byed pa nyid kyis mkhan po dang / slob dpon gyi gan du 'gro ba na/ bag tsha ba med pa dang / bag 'khums pa med par 'gro zhing mi 'jigs pa dang /
135a4(mdo sde): lhan cig tu byung ba'i rgod pa'ang mi sten te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gus pa dang bcas shing / zhe sa dang bcas pa yin la/ rigs kyi bag ma bzhin du 'dzem pa dang ldan pa'i phyir ro// de 'dzem pa dang ldan
135a5(mdo sde): pas lus kyi skyon dang / lus kyi nyes par spyod pa gang dag yin pa de dag thams cad kyi thams cad du yongs su spong ngo // tshangs pa byang chub sems dpa'i lus kyi skyon dang / lus kyi nyes par spyod pa
135a6(mdo sde): de dag gang zhe na/ tshangs pa srog gcod pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i lus kyi skyon dang / lus kyi nyes par spyod pa yin no// tshangs pa ma byin par len pa dang / mi tshangs par spyod pa ni/ byang chub sems
135a7(mdo sde): dpa'i lus kyi skyon dang / lus kyi nyes par spyod pa yin no// tshangs pa byang chub sems dpa' ji ltar na srog gcod pa spong ba yin zhe na/ tshangs pa 'di la byang chub sems dpa' ni 'dod chags kyi dbang
135b1(mdo sde): gis srog chags kyi srog gcod par mi byed/ zhe sdang gi dbang dang / gti mug gi dbang gis srog gcod par mi byed do// de sems can gzhan dag dang / gang zag gzhan rnams la bdag tsam du 'du
135b2(mdo sde): shes par byed cing / sdug pa bu tsam du 'du shes par byed do// bdag nyid kyis sems can gzhan dag dang / gang zag gzhan rnams kyi srog gcod par mi byed do// gzhan dag kyang srog gcod du
135b3(mdo sde): mi 'jug go/ / gzhan dag srog gcod pa la'ang rjes su yi rang bar mi byed do// bdag gis kyang mi gcod do// gzhan dag kyang gcod du mi 'jug go// gzhan dag gcod pa la'ang rjes su yi rang
135b4(mdo sde): bar mi byed do/ / bdag kyang mi rdeg go// gzhan dag kyang rdeg tu mi 'jug go// gzhan dag rdeg par byed pa la'ang rjes su yi rang bar mi byed do// ji ltar na ma byin par len pa spong ba yin zhe na
135b5(mdo sde): tshangs pa 'di la byang chub sems dpa' ni sems can rnams kyi 'tsho ba'i yo byad gang dag yin pa 'di lta ste/ gser dang / nor bu dang / mu tig dang / bai DUR+Ya dang / dung dang / man shel
135b6(mdo sde): dang / byu ru dang / sa le sbram dang / dngul la sogs pa dang / gos dang rgyan gyi rnam pa dag dang / nor dang / 'bru dang / mdzod dang / bang ba'i rnam pa de dag la chags pa mi skyed
135b7(mdo sde): de dag la rnam par rtog par mi byed cing / rku 'phrog mi byed do// rku 'phrog byed du mi 'jug go// rku 'phrog byed pa rnams la rjes su yi rang bar mi byed do// de grong na yod pa 'am/ dgon pa na
136a1(mdo sde): yod pa ma yin zhing / ma gnang bcwa'i 'dab ma tsam yang len par mi byed do// ji ltar na mi tshangs par spyod pa spong ba yin zhe na/ tshangs pa 'di la byang chub sems dpa'
136a2(mdo sde): dbang po rnams kyi sgo legs par bsrungs shing gnas pa yin/ legs par bsdams pa yin/ 'thun pa'i gnas su rgyu ba yin/ shin tu bsrungs pa'i dran pa dang ldan pa yin/ rtag tu bsrungs
136a3(mdo sde): pa'i dran pa dang ldan pa yin/ de dran pas yid kun tu bsrungs pa yin/ lus dang ngag shin tu bsdams pa yin no// 'thun pa'i gnas su rgyu la dran pa dang ldan pa yin zhing / 'di snyam du'ang
136a4(mdo sde): sems bskrad de/ mi zhig gis bye ma zhib mo shin tu bsregs pa lag pa gnyis kyi snyim par blangs te mig gnyis bkang ba ni bla'i/ chags pa'i sems kyis yul gyi bzang mo la lta ba ni de lta ma yin
136a5(mdo sde): no/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ bdag yul gyi bzang mo la bltas pas/ yun ring por phung zhing bcom la ma rung bar gyur pa'i phyir ro snyam mo// de de ltar lus la lus kyi rjes su lta zhing bza' ba
136a6(mdo sde): dang / btung ba dang / gnas dang / mal cha dang / stan rnams la dran pa legs par gnas pa yin te/ de dag la spyod pa na/ ro myang bar mi byed cing chags pa'i sems med pa yin no//
136a7(mdo sde): gal te de yongs su spyod pa na bde ba skye ba lta na/ des de la 'di ltar nye bar brtag par bya ste/ bde bar snang ba 'di ni/ bzlog pa'i sgo nas sdug bsngal yin te/ khams gsum pa 'di na 'dus byas
136b1(mdo sde): kyi dngos po bde ba gang yang med do/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'dus byas mi rtag pa'i phyir ro// mkhas pa'i rang bzhin can dag dngos po mi rtag pa rnams la bde ba'i 'du shes ji ltar skyed snyam du brtag/
136b2(mdo sde): par bya'o// tshangs pa gal te byang chub sems dpa' yongs su spyod pa na/ sdug bsngal kho na skye'i/ bde ba ni ma yin te/ sdug bsngal des kyang yongs su gnon cing nyon mongs na/ des de la sems 'di
136b3(mdo sde): ltar nye bar gzhag par bya ste/ lus 'di ni bsgrims te yongs su bskyang dgos pa/ gsug gis bsgrub dgos pa ste/ 'di ni sdug bsngal rtsom pas gzung bar mi nus kyi/ bde ba rtsom pas gzung bar bya ba
136b4(mdo sde): yin/ de la bdag gi lus brtan zhing 'tsho ba 'dis dge ba'i chos rnams bsgrub par bya'o// dper na rnyed pa 'dod pa'i tshong pa khur khal rnams stod bran byed/ bcos legs byed pa ni khur khal rnams brgyan
136b5(mdo sde): pa'i phyir ma yin/ bde bar bya ba'i phyir ma yin gyi/ gzhan du na ji tsam du khal bkal ba bskur ba'i phyir ro// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' kha zas za ba'ang lus brgyan pa'i phyir zas za ba ma yin/
136b6(mdo sde): lus bde bar bya ba'i phyir ma yin te/ gzhan du na ji tsam du lus dang 'brel ba'i dge ba'i phyogs bsgral pa'i phyir ro snyam du sems nye bar gzhag par bya'o// tshangs pa gal te byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin
136b7(mdo sde): gshegs pas gsungs pa'i gnyen pos sems shes par byed mi nus na/ des 'di snyam du bsam par bya ste/ sems zhes bya ba 'di ni mthar phyin par dka' ba/ mi mthun pa 'dzin pa/ 'khor ba la
137a1(mdo sde): mngon du phyogs pa/ dge ba'i phyogs la mi phyogs pa/ yul la mngon du phyogs pa/ dben pa la mi phyogs pa/ bde ba la mngon du phyogs pa/ sdug bsngal la mi phyogs pa
137a2(mdo sde): smra ba la dga' ba la mngon du phyogs pa/ spros pa la mngon du phyogs pa/ de kho na la rnam par lta ba la mi phyogs pa/ mi gtsang ba la mngon du phyogs pa/ gtsang ba la mi phyogs pa/ gdul dka' ba/
137a3(mdo sde): gzung dka' ba/ gnas med pa/ rten med pa/ gsog/ gsob/ skad cig pa/ rgyu dang rkyen tshogs pa las byung ba yin na/ mkhas pa'i rang bzhin can su zhig 'di lta bu'i rang bzhin can gyi
137a4(mdo sde): sems kyi dbang du 'gro zhing / rjes su 'jug snyam du bsam mo// de de ltar sems la dran pa nye bar gnas pas sems gdul ba'i phyir nan tan byed do// de ser sna'i sems gdul ba'i phyir sbyin pa sbyin
137a5(mdo sde): par byed do/ / tha na kham gcig tsam mam/ rgya shug tsam mam/ mon sran gre'u tsam mam/ til 'bru tsam yang rung / de'ang thams cad la sbyin par byed kyi/ sdug pa rnams la ma yin/ 'dris
137a6(mdo sde): pa rnams la ma yin no/ / de 'chal pa'i tshul khrims kyi sems gdul ba'i phyir tshul khrims srung ste/ lus dang / ngag dang / yid kyis skyon med par byed pa yin/ 'dren mar mi byed pa yin/
137a7(mdo sde): nag nog can du mi byed pa yin te/ tshul khrims des bdag la stod par mi byed/ gzhan la smod par mi byed do// de gnod sems kyi sems gdul ba'i phyir bzod pa sgom ste/ de grong ngam/ grong rdal du
137b1(mdo sde): zhugs pa na/ gshe'ang ci mi snyam par byed do// brgyad kyang rung / bdeg sdang rud+hA/ bsdigs kyang rung / rnam par 'joms yang rung / srod kyang rus/ tsami snum par bya'o// kyem dge slong /
137b2(mdo sde): 'di ni mgo reg ngan pa'o// kye ma dge sbyong 'di ni mgo reg mi sdug pa ngan pa'o zhes 'jig rten gyis dpyas kyang ci mi snyam par byed do// yang dag pa ma yin pas skur kyang bzod par byed cing dang du len la
137b3(mdo sde): las bdag gir bya ba nyid la rton te/ bzod pa des kyang bdag la stod par mi byed/ gzhan la smod par mi byed do// de la lo'i sems gdul ba'i phyir dang / byang chub kyi phyogs pa'i chos ma thob pa rnams
137b4(mdo sde): thob par bya ba'i phyir dang / thob pa rnams 'phel bar bya ba'i phyir dang / 'phel ba rnams yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir dang / yongs su smin pa rnams yang dag par gzung bar bya ba'i phyir dang / yang dag par
137b5(mdo sde): gzung ba rnams rnam par dbye ba'i phyir brtson 'grus rtsom mo/ / de sems can gyi ched rnams dang / sems can gyi bya ba rnams la yongs su mi skyo zhing / yongs su yi mi chad de/ yongs su skyo ba'i
137b6(mdo sde): sems mi skyed do/ / de gdol pa la phan gdags kyang rung / rgyal po la phan gdags kyang rung / shin tu lam ring por yang 'gro ste/ tha dad par mi dmigs shing / rgyun mi gcod pa yin no//
137b7(mdo sde): gal te byang chub sems dpa' sdug bsngal zhing bkren pa'i sems can gyi dngos po tha chad ngan pa zhig gis bstabs sam/ 'byor cing nor che ba gang yang rung ba zhig gis dngos po bzang po mchog gya nom pa
138a1(mdo sde): zhig bstabs kyang / de la byang chub sems dpa' snying brtse ba'i sems bzhag la/ gus par bstod cing / yang dag par gzengs bstod la/ yang dag par 'dzin du gzhug
138a2(mdo sde): cing dngos po ngan pa de blang bar bya'o/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sdug bsngal ba'i sbyin pa 'di ni sbyin pa bya dka' ba yin pa'i phyir ro// de rnam par g.yeng ba'i sems gdul ba'i phyir/ bas
138a3(mdo sde): gtan la bsam gtan byed de/ ji ltar bsam gtan byed ce na/ tshangs pa 'di la byang chub sems dpa' ni thog ma kho nar lus legs par bsdams pa yin no// lus dben par gnas pa yin no//
138a4(mdo sde): lus kyi 'du 'dzi rnams kyang yongs su spong ngo // lus la lhag par chags pa'ang 'dor ro// lus lci 'am yang ba'ang shes so// lus dang 'thun pa dang / lus 'tsho ba dang / lus kyi stobs
138a5(mdo sde): kyang rab tu shes so/ / ngag legs par bsdams pa yin te/ smra ba nyung zhing brjod pa nyung ngo // don smra ba yin zhing / rigs par smra ba yin te/ bre mo gtam la dga' ba yongs su spangs
138a6(mdo sde): pa yin no/ / de yid legs par bsdams pa yin te/ mi dge ba'i rnam par rtog pa thams cad yongs su spangs so// de de ltar gnas gsum yongs su dag pas/ sngon po dang / ser po
138a7(mdo sde): dang / dmar po dang / dkar po'i gzugs rnams mi snang bar bya ba'i phyir nan tan byed de/ de dag la mtshan mar mi 'dzin/ mngon par rtags su mi 'dzin to// rgyan dang gos kyi rnam pa sna
138b1(mdo sde): tshogs dag la'ang mtshan mar mi 'dzin cing / mngon rtags su mi 'dzin pa yin no// gzugs dang / sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg pa sna tshogs dag la'ang mtshan mar mi 'dzin cing /
138b2(mdo sde): mngon rtags su mi 'dzin pa yin no// skyes pa dang / bud med dang / khye'u dang / bu mo rnams la'ang mtshan mar mi 'dzin cing / mngon rtags su mi 'dzin pa yin no// de gcig pu dben
138b3(mdo sde): par 'dug nas/ nang du yang dag 'jog cing sems gnas par bya ba'i phyir nan tan byed de/ mi sdug pa la dmigs pa 'am/ byams pa la dmigs pa'am/ snying rje la dmigs pa 'am
138b4(mdo sde): yid 'byung bar 'gyur ba gang yang rung bas ji ltar lus khengs par mi 'gyur ba de ltar dmigs par byed de/ dbugs rngub pa dang 'byung ba mi 'gag go// rgyun rnams kyang mi 'chad do// rlung 'khrug
138b5(mdo sde): par mi 'gyur ro/ / sems log par rnam par g.yeng bar mi 'gyur ro// de 'chag gam/ nyal lam/ 'greng ngam/ 'dug kyang dmigs pa de nyid kyis 'dug go// de nyid la sems gtong
138b6(mdo sde): ngo / / tshangs pa gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' dmigs pa la sems brtan par gyur pa de'i tshe/ sems la sems mnyam par 'jog ste/ sems kyis sems kyang mi dmigs so// gang gis
138b7(mdo sde): mnyam par 'jog pa de'ang mi dmigs so/ / gang gi phyir mnyam par 'jog pa de'ang mi dmigs so// de 'di snyam du sems te/ kye ma byis pa so so'i skye bo 'di dag ni gsog gi chos rnams dang /
139a1(mdo sde): gsob kyi chos rnams la mngon par zhen to snyam du sems te/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i lhag mthong zhes bya'o// de ltar rnam par mthong bas nyon mongs pa rnams kun
139a2(mdo sde): tu mi 'byung zhing mi 'jug pa de ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i zhi gnas zhes bya'o// tshangs pa gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' gcig pu dben par 'dug ste/ nang du yang dag bzhag nas ming dang
139a3(mdo sde): yi ge ji ltar thos pa rnams nges pa'i tshig gis gdags pas/ yang dag par 'jog cing / yi ge de dag la nye bar rtog ste/ de de ltar nye bar rtog pa na yi ge rnams gsog dang gsob tu mthong ngo //
139a4(mdo sde): de yi ge rnams gsog dang gsob tu mthong nas/ ming rnams kyang gsog dang gsob tu mthong ngo // gang la ming de 'dogs pa de'ang gsog dang gsob tu mthong ngo // de la gzugs gang dang gang
139a5(mdo sde): snang ba de dang de'ang gsog dang gsob tu snang ngo / / des gsog dang gsob tu snang bas yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du yongs su shes par 'gyur ro// yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du yongs su shes pas
139a6(mdo sde): de la 'dus byas rmi lam dang 'dra bar snang ngo / / de la byang chub sems dpa' so sor brtags nas/ sems can la lta bas snying rje chen po'i sems nye bar bzhag nas gnas so// de 'chal pa'i shes
139a7(mdo sde): rab kyi sems gdul ba'i phyir shes rab sgom par byed do/ / ji ltar sgom par byed ce na/ de kun rdzob kyi tshul du bshad pa 'am/ don dam pa'i tshul du bshad pa'i mdo sde gang dag yin pa de dag brjod pa
139b1(mdo sde): gsal zhing / zur phyin pa dag gis mngon par 'dzin to// ma nor bar chos ston pa las bzung nas kyang / ma nor ba'i bsam pas sems par byed do// bsgom pa'i rnal 'byor la'ang brtson par byed/
139b2(mdo sde): do// de ye shes kyi stobs dang shes rab kyi bye brag gis sems can mi dmigs/ srog mi dmigs/ gso ba mi dmigs/ skye ba mi dmigs/ gang zag mi dmigs/ shed las skyes pa
139b3(mdo sde): mi dmigs/ shed bu mi dmigs te/ thams cad kyi thams cad du chad par lta bar yang mi ltung ngo // btags pa'i tha snyad rnams la'ang legs par bslabs pa yin no// de zin pa'i sa'i khams
139b4(mdo sde): dang / ma zin pa'i sa'i khams la yang dag pa'i shes rab kyis tshul gcig tu so sor rtog go// zin pa'i chu'i khams dang / me'i khams dang / rlung gi khams dang / ma zin pa la'ang yang dag
139b5(mdo sde): pa'i shes rab kyis tshul gcig tu so sor rtog ste/ de gnyis ka'ang gsog nyid dang gsob nyid du mthong zhing / bems po nyid dang / snying po med pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid du mthong ngo // des de ltar
139b6(mdo sde): mthong bas/ de ltar phyi rol gyi khams rnams la mngon par chags pa med pa de ltar nang gi rnams la'ang ngo // mig gi rnam par shes pa dang / gzugs rnams la'ang yang dag pa'i shes rab kyis tshul
139b7(mdo sde): gcig tu so sor rtog go/ / rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dang / sgra rnams dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa dang / dri rnams dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa dang / ro rnams dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa
140a1(mdo sde): dang / reg bya rnams la'ang yang dag pa'i shes rab kyis tshul gcig tu so sor rtog go// de sa'i khams la ni sra ba nyid du'ang rab tu shes la/ gsher ba nyid dang / tsha ba nyid dang /
140a2(mdo sde): khong stong nyid du'ang rab tu shes so// chu'i khams la gsher ba nyid du rab tu shes la/ sra ba nyid dang / tsha ba nyid dang / khong stong nyid du'ang rab tu shes so// me'i khams la tsha ba nyid du'ang rab
140a3(mdo sde): tu shes la/ sra ba nyid dang / gsher ba nyid dang / khong stong nyid du'ang rab tu shes so// rlung gi khams la g.yo ba nyid du'ang rab tu shes la/ yang zhing g.yo ba nyid du'ang rab tu shes so//
140a4(mdo sde): nam mkha'i khams la khong stong nyid du'ang rab tu shes la/ thams cad du song ba nyid du'ang rab tu shes so// rnam par shes pa'i khams la sgyu ma lta bu nyid du'ang rab tu shes la/ phyin ci log nyid
140a5(mdo sde): du'ang rab tu shes/ phyin ci ma log pa nyid du'ang rab tu shes so// de mig gi rnam par shes pa la stong pa nyid dang / gzugs la mi rtag pa nyid du'ang rab tu shes so// rna ba'i rnam par shes pa la
140a6(mdo sde): stong pa nyid dang / sgra la mi rtag pa nyid dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa la stong pa nyid dang / dri la mi rtag pa nyid dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa la stong pa nyid dang / ro la mi rtag pa nyid dang / lus kyi
140a7(mdo sde): rnam par shes pa la stong pa nyid dang / reg bya la mi rtag pa nyid du'ang rab tu shes so// de de ltar shes rab la mkhas pas/ shin tu rtogs pa'i shes rab dang ldan zhing / shes rab rno ba dang ldan te/
140b1(mdo sde): mi dge ba'i chos rnams kyang rab tu shes/ dge ba'i chos rnams kyang rab tu shes/ nyan thos yang dag par 'grub par byed pa'i chos rnams kyang rab tu shes/ rang sangs rgyas yang dag par 'grub par byed
140b2(mdo sde): pa'i chos rnams dang / byang chub sems dpa' yang dag par 'grub par byed pa'i chos rnams dang / sangs rgyas nyid yang dag par 'grub par byed pa'i chos rnams kyang rab tu shes so// de mi dge ba'i
140b3(mdo sde): chos rnams kyis rnam par smin pa chung ngu dang / 'bring dang / chen po sems can dmyal ba rnams dang / dud 'gro rnams dang / yi dgas rnams su skye ba'ang rab tu shes so// der skyes pa rnams kyi
140b4(mdo sde): tshor ba chung ngu dang / 'bring dang / chen po'ang rab tu shes so// dge ba'i chos rnams kyi rnam par smin pa chung ngu dang / 'bring dang / chen po lha rnams kyi nang du 'am/ mi rnams kyi nang du smin pa'ang
140b5(mdo sde): rab tu shes so/ / der skyes pa rnams kyi 'bras bu chung ngu dang / 'bring dang / chen po'ang rab tu shes so// nyan thos yang dag par 'grub par byed pa'i chos rnams kyi rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon
140b6(mdo sde): du bya ba dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mngon du bya ba dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mngon du bya ba dang / dgra bcom pa nyid kyi 'bras bu mngon du bya ba'i rnam pa'ang rab tu shes so// shes
140b7(mdo sde): rab kyis rnam par grol ba nyid dang / gnyis ka'i cha las rnam par grol ba'ang rab tu shes so// rang sangs rgyas yang dag par 'grub par byed pa'i chos rnams kyi yang dag par 'grub pa'ang rab tu
141a1(mdo sde): shes so/ / 'bras bu dang zhi ba nyid kyang rab tu shes so// byang chub sems dpa' yang dag par 'grub par byed pa'i chos rnams kyi tshogs kyi lam yang rab tu shes so//
141a2(mdo sde): ye shes kyi lam yang rab tu shes so// shes nas kyang tshogs kyi lam dang ye shes kyi lam la brtson par byed do// sangs rgyas nyid yang dag par 'grub par byed pa'i chos rnams kyi rdzu 'phrul che
141a3(mdo sde): ba nyid kyang rab tu shes so/ / mthu che ba nyid dang / dam pa nyid dang / rab mchog nyid dang / phul du byung ba nyid dang / che ba nyid dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems//
141a4(mdo sde): dpa' thams cad dang thun mong ba'ang ma yin na/ gzhan sems can lta smos kyang ci dgos pa'i thun mong ma yin pa nyid kyang rab tu shes so// de de ltar chos rnams la chos kyi rjes su lta zhing / dran pa
141a5(mdo sde): legs par nye bar gnas la/ sdig pa'i chos thams cad dang ni bral/ dge pa'i chos ni yang dag par thob/ lus kyi gnod pa ni med/ rnam par shes pas 'phangs pa ni med/ sems kyis
141a6(mdo sde): 'phangs pa ni med la/ chos rnams kyi rgyu'i tshogs dang / 'bras bu yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du shes pas/ dper na rgya mtsho'i rlabs bzhin du dge ba'i chos rnams kyis rnam par 'phel te/
141a7(mdo sde): ji ltar rgya mtsho'i rlabs 'bri zhing / yang 'byung ba ltar byang chub sems dpa' ni chos rnams las de lta ma yin no// de dper na zla ba'i yar gyi ngo'i zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dang 'dra bar/ dge ba'i
141b1(mdo sde): chos rnams kyis mngon par 'phel te/ ji ltar mar gyi ngo la zla ba'i dkyil 'khor 'bri ba'i chos can yin pa ltar/ byang chub sems dpa' ni chos rnams las de lta ma yin no// de dper na dbyar gyi
141b2(mdo sde): dus kyi phu chu brug pa ltar/ dge ba'i chos rnams kyis mngon par 'phel te/ ji ltar phu chu brug pa dbyar gyis dus zad pa 'bri ba'i chos can yin pa ltar/ byang chub sems dpa' ni chos rnams las de/
141b3(mdo sde): lha ma yin no// tshangs pa de ltar bslabs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis
141b4(mdo sde): tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to/ / lus kyi skyon rnams rab shes na// lus yod skyon rnams mi sten to// lus la dran pa legs gnas na// skyon med zhi ba'i gnas 'thob bo//
141b5(mdo sde): lus kyi skyon rnams mi shes na// lus la yod pa'i skyon mi rtogs// lus la dran pa mi gnas na// sdug bsngal bzod dka' gnas 'thob bo// sems kyi skyon rnams rab shes na/
141b6(mdo sde): sems yod skyon rnams mi sten to// sems la dran pa legs gnas na// skyon med zhi ba'i gnas 'thob bo// sems kyi skyon rnams mi shes na// sems la yod pa'i skyon mi rtogs//
141b7(mdo sde): sems la dran pa mi gnas na// sdug bsngal bzod dka' gnas 'thob bo// dge ba'i chos rnams sten byed cing // mi dge chos rnams mi sten pa// chos rnams la ni mkhas pa'i mi/
142a1(mdo sde): skyon med zhi ba'i gnas 'thob bo// dge ba'i chos rnams mi sten cing // mi dge chos rnams sten byed pa// chos rnams la ni mi mkhas mi// sdug bsngal bzod dka'
142a2(mdo sde): gnas 'thob bo/ / de nas mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pas/ lha'i me tog man+da ra ba dag mngon par sprul te/ bcom ldan 'das la mngon par gtor to// mngon par gtor nas kyang bcom ldan
142a3(mdo sde): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa la mngon par dga' zhing rjes su yi reng nas/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi thad nas song ngo // de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis
142a4(mdo sde): nam nangs par mkhyen nas/ dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi gung la gdan bshams pa la bzhugs so// bzhugs nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/
142a5(mdo sde): dge slong dag mdangs 'dir mi nyal tsam gyi nam gyi gung thun la nga gcig pu dben par 'dug ste/ nang du yang dag bzhag na/ mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pas thams cad dang ldan pa'i tshal chen po 'od
142a6(mdo sde): kyis snang bar byas nas/ ngag la ba der 'ongs te phyin nas/ nga la mngon par bstod de/ lan gsum bskor ba byas nas/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug go// phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas/ mi
142a7(mdo sde): mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pas/ nga la 'di skad ces gsol to// gal te zhus nas zhu ba lung bstan pa'i slad du/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la skabs dbye bar gnang na/ bcom ldan 'das
142b1(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la bdag phyogs 'ga' zhig zhu lags so/ / dge slong dag de skad ces gsol pa dang / ngas mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa la 'di
142b2(mdo sde): skad ces bka' stsal to/ / tshangs pa zhu ba lung bstan pa'i phyir/ de bzhin gshegs pas rtag tu khyod la skabs phyes/ tshangs pa khyod ci dang ci 'dod pa zhus shig dang / zhus pa de dang de nyid kyi lung
142b3(mdo sde): bstan pas/ ngas khyod kyi sems rangs par bya'o// de nas skabs phye bas mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pas/ nga la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
142b4(mdo sde): po dag chos du dang ldan na/ myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya lags/ dge slong dag de skad ces gsol pa dang / ngas mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa la
142b5(mdo sde): 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ / tshangs pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag chos gcig dang ldan na/ myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o//
142b6(mdo sde): chos gcig gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ lus kyi rjes su song ba'i dran pa'o// dge slong dag ngas mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa de la lus kyi rjes su song ba'i dran pa'i rgyu dang / las dang 'bras bu'ang bstan to//
142b7(mdo sde): de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos 'di skad ces gsol to// legs so legs so// bcom ldan 'das kyis mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa la gang bstan pa de/ skye bo mang po la
143a1(mdo sde): sman pa dang / skye bo mang po la bde ba dang / lha dang mi rnams kyi don dang / sman pa dang / bde bar bgyi ba'i slad du bshad du gsol/ dge slong gsar pa gsar pa rnams dang /
143a2(mdo sde): chos 'dul ba 'di la rab tu byung nas/ ring po ma lags shing mchis nas/ ring po ma lags pa rnams dang / theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa'i skyes bu dam pa 'di dag gis thos na dga' ba dang /
143a3(mdo sde): dad pa thob par 'gyur/ bslab pa de la'ang sbyor bar brtson par gnas par 'gyur lags so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa la gang bshad pa de/ dge slong de dag la'ang
143a4(mdo sde): bshad do/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das legs par bka' stsal to// bde bar gshegs pa legs par bka' stsal to//
143a5(mdo sde): mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa mdo sde 'di lta bu dag yongs su zhu ba'i slad du/ bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du mchis nas/ zhus pa'ang legs par smras pa legs so// bcom ldan 'das mi mjed kyi bdag
143a6(mdo sde): po tshangs pas gal te dge ba'i rtsa ba gzhan ma mchis na'ang / zhu ba zhus pa'i mod las skyes pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba 'di kho nas myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya
143a7(mdo sde): lags so/ / de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das dge ba'i rtsa ba 'di'i mtha' dang mu ni/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis rtogs par rngo mi thogs pa'i slad du'o// de ci'i slad du zhe na/
143b1(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pas zhu ba 'di/ sems can thams cad kyi spyi'i don du zhus pa'i slad du'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo de de bzhin te/
143b2(mdo sde): de de bzhin no// de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i ming ci lags/ 'di ji ltar gzung bar bgyi/ bcom
143b3(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo de'i phyir khyod kyis 'di tshangs pas zhus pa zhes bya bar zung zhig/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa'i tshul bstan pa zhes bya bar yang zung zhig/ bag yod pa'i tshul
143b4(mdo sde): bstan pa zhes bya bar yang zung zhig/ bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang / dge slong de dag dang / byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang /
143b5(mdo sde): thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// 'phags pa
143b6(mdo sde): tshangs pas zhus pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so/ / / rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang / zhu chen gyi lo ts+tsha ba ban d+he ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa//
143b7(mdo sde): rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya rat+na ko Ti ri nA ma ma hA yA na su tra/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa rin po che'i mtha' zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/
