260a7(mdo sde): gnyis dang / dge slong stong phrag lnga dang / dge slong ma sum brgya dang / dge bsnyen brgyad brgya dang / dge bsnyen ma brgyad brgya de dag thams cad kyis 'jam dpal gyis bstan pa 'di thos nas mi skye
260b1(mdo sde): pa'i chos la bzod pa rab tu thob ste/ tshig kyang 'di skad du 'jam dpal de de bzhin no// ji skad smras pa de bzhin te/ thos pa med pa ni chos thos pa'o zhes 'dzer to// de nas tshang
260b2(mdo sde): pa khyad par sems kyis/ bzod pa rab tu thob pa'i byang chub sems de dag la 'di skad ces smras so// khyed kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos sam/ smras pa/ tshangs pa thos pa med pa'i tshul
260b3(mdo sde): gyis thos so/ / smras pa/ khyed kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ji lta bur shes/ smras pa/ ji ltar shes pa med pa dang / rnam par shes pa med pa de ltar ro// smras pa/ khyed kyis
260b4(mdo sde): chos gang rab tu thob pas bzod pa rab tu thob par 'gyur/ smras pa/ chos thams cad rab tu thob pa med pa'i phyir ro// smras pa/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ji ltar rtogs par bya/ smras pa/
260b5(mdo sde): rtogs par bya ba med pa'i tshul gyis so// smras pa/ chos bstan pa 'di khyed kyis mngon sum yin nam/ smras pa/ tshangs pa chos thams cad bdag dang gzhan med pa'i phyir mngon sum yin no//
260b6(mdo sde): denas 'khor de nyid du lha'i bu dri ma med pa'i rtog ces bya ba 'dus par gyur pa des tshangs pa khyad par sems la 'di skad ces smras so// tshangs pa gang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di las chung
260b7(mdo sde): dun nyan par 'gyur ba de dag gal te de bzhin gshegs pas lung ma bstan kyang kho bos de dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan to/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na
261a1(mdo sde): tshangs pa chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni 'bras bu dang sa bon chung mi gzon pa'o/ / 'phags pa yang dag par zhugs pa thams cad kyis yongs su gzung ba'o// dge
261a2(mdo sde): ba'i rtsa ba thams cad yang dag par skyed pa'o/ / bdud dang phyir rgol ba tshar gcod pa'o// bar du gcod pa thams cad dang bral ba'o// dang bskyed par byed pa'o// dad pa dang ldan
261a3(mdo sde): pa rnams dga' zhing mgu bar byed pa'o/ / sangs rgyas thams cad kyis shin tu yongs su gzung ba'o// chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis legs par bsrungs
261a4(mdo sde): pa'o/ / chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni gcig tu nges pa ste phyir mi ldog pa'o// chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni byang chub kyi snying po la mi slu ba'o// chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni sangs rgyas
261a5(mdo sde): kyi chos rnams kyi bden pa'i 'byung gnas so/ / chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni chos kyi 'khor lo skor ba'o// chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni 'gyod pa'i rnams sel bar byed pa'o// chos
261a6(mdo sde): kyi rnam grangs 'di ni 'phags pa'i lam rnam par sbyong ba'o/ / chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni thar par 'dod pa rnams kyis legs par thos pa'o// chos kyi rnams grangs 'di ni gzungs
261a7(mdo sde): 'dod pa rnams kyis legs par gzung ba'o/ / chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni bsod nams 'dod pa rnams kyis legs par rab tu bstan pa'o// chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni chos
261b1(mdo sde): 'dod pa rnams kyis legs par srung ba'o/ / chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni mya ngan las 'das par 'gro ba'i phyir grangs med pa'o// chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni pha rol rgol ba
261b2(mdo sde): dmigs pa can gyis mi 'phrogs pa'o/ / chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni sbyin par 'os pa rnams dang 'thun pa'o// chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni mkhas pa rnams dga' bar byed pa'o//
261b3(mdo sde): chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni lta ba ngan pa dang bral bas shes rab skyed pa'o// chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni gti mug 'joms par byed pas ye shes skyed pa'o// chos kyis rnam grangs
261b4(mdo sde): 'di ni yi ge'i tshig nges pa'i shin tu nges pa'i tshig go/ / chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni 'bru 'brel bas legs par bstan pa'o// chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni don dam pa yang dag par ston
261b5(mdo sde): pas don yang dag par skyed pa'o/ / chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni chos brjod pa rnams kyis yongs su ma btang ba'o// chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni shes pa dang ldan pa rnams kyis ma
261b6(mdo sde): bor ba'o/ / chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni nor 'dod pa rnams kyis gter ro// chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni kun tu gdungs pa rnams yongs su gdung ba med par byed pa'o// chos kyi
261b7(mdo sde): rnam grangs 'di ni byams pa la gnas pa rnams kyis mnyam pa nyid skyed pa'o/ / chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni le lo can rnams kyi brtson 'grus spyad pa'o// chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni brjed
262a1(mdo sde): nges pa rnams kyis bsam gtan skyed pa'o/ / chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni shes rab 'chal pa rnams la snang bar byed pa'o// tshangs pa chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la ni sangs
262a2(mdo sde): rgyas kyi chos thams cad shin tu legs par gnas so/ / de nas lha'i bu des chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i bsngags pa bstan pa na/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rnam
262a3(mdo sde): pa drug tu g.yos so/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang lha'i bu la legs so zhes bya ba byin no// de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ tshangs pa khyad par sems kyis 'di skad ces gsol to//
262a4(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das lha'i bu 'dis sngon gyi yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dag las chos kyi rnam grangs sngon thos sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ tshangs pa lha'i bu 'dis sangs
262a5(mdo sde): rgyas bye ba khrag khrig phrag drug cu rtsa bzhi las chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos te/ tshangs pa lha'i bu dri ma med pa'i tog 'di bskal pa brgya stong phrag bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis na/ 'jig rten gyi khams rin
262a6(mdo sde): chen ldan du de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che bkod pa zhes bya bar 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ / gang yang de'i bar du sangs rgyas 'byung ba de dag thams cad la'ang mnyes par byed par
262a7(mdo sde): 'gyur/ bkur stir byed par 'gyur te/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag las chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'ang thos par 'gyur ro// tshangs pa dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang
262b1(mdo sde): dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma dang / lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za gang dag gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la bzod pa rab tu thob pa de dag thams cad de bzhin gshes
262b2(mdo sde): pa rin po che bkod pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi khams rin chen ldan du skye bar 'gyur ro/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ lha'i bu dri ma med pa'i tog gis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom
262b3(mdo sde): ldan 'das gang bdag ni byang chub mi 'tshal/ mi smon/ mngon par mi dge'/ mngon par ma chags/ mi dmigs/ mi sems/ mi rtog/ rnam par mi rtog na/ ci'i slad du bcom ldan
262b4(mdo sde): 'das kyis bdag la lung bstan/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ lha'i bu 'di ltar skyes bu la la zhig gis rtswa dang / shing dang / yal ga dang / lo ma dang / 'dab ma dag mer bcug
262b5(mdo sde): nas 'di skad du rtswa dang / shing dang / yal ga dang / lo ma dang / 'dab ma dag ma tshig cig ces smras na/ de de'i dbang gis mi 'tshig pa ma yin no// lha'i bu de bzhin du 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa
262b6(mdo sde): byang chub la mngon par mi dga'/ mngon par ma chags/ mi dmigs/ mi 'dod/ mi smon/ mi sems/ rnam par mi rtog kyang sangs rgyas thams cad lung ston te/ lha'i bu 'on kyang byang chub
262b7(mdo sde): sems dpa' gang byang chub la mngon par mi dga'/ mngon par ma chags/ mi dmigs/ mi 'dod/ mi smon/ mi sems/ rnam par mi rtog pa de la de bzhin gshegs pa rnams lung ston to//
263a1(mdo sde): de nas 'khor der lha'i bu lnga brgya tsam gyis/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag kyang byang chub la mngon par mi dga'/ mngon par ma chags/ mi
263a2(mdo sde): dmigs/ mi 'tshal/ mi smon/ mi rtog/ rnam par mi rtog na/ ci'i slad du bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag cag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung mi bstan to// de nas sangs rgyas kyi mthus steng gi
263a3(mdo sde): babar snang la sangs rgyas stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi mthong ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis de dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan to// de nas bcom ldan 'das la// lha'i bu de
263a4(mdo sde): dag gis 'di skad ces gsol to/ / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pas 'di skad du byang chub sems dpa' gang byang chub la mngon par mi dga'/ mngon par ma chags/ mi dmigs/ mi 'dod/ mi smon/
263a5(mdo sde): mi sems// mi rtog/ rnam par mi rtog pa de byang chub tu lung bstan par 'gyur ro zhes legs par gsungs pa de ni ngo mtshar te/ bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gis steng gi phyogs na/ sangs rgyas stong phrag brgyad
263a6(mdo sde): cu rtsa bzhi mthong ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad bdag cag la bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung ston to// de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad
263a7(mdo sde): ces gsol to/ / bcom ldan 'das gang slad ma'i dus lnga brgya pa tha ma la 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir chos kyi rnam grangs 'di rab tu spod pa dang / yun ring du gnas par 'gyur ba dang / rigs kyi bu dang / rigs
263b1(mdo sde): kyi bu mo gang dag go cha chen po bgos pa dag gi rna lam du gda' bar 'gyur ba dang / rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag bdud kyi las skyes shing byung ba rnams kyi dbang du mi mchi ba dang /
263b2(mdo sde): de dag la bdud dam/ bdud kyi ris kyi lha dag gis glags rnyed par mi 'gyur ba dang / chos kyi rnam grangs 'di yongs su gzung zhing go cha chen po bgos te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
263b3(mdo sde): byang chub yongs su mi nyams par byin gyis brlab par gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal de bas na chos kyi rnam grangs 'di byin gyis brlab pa dang / yun ring du gnas pa
263b4(mdo sde): bya ba'i phyir/ lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / grul bum 'bebs pa zhes bya ba'i rig pa dang /
263b5(mdo sde): sngags kyi tshig 'di bshad kyis nyon cig/ rig pa dang sngags kyi tshig de bcangs pas rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo chos smra ba de lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam
263b6(mdo sde): mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / grul bum rnams kyis yongs su bsrung ba rab tu thob ste/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de dag lam mam/ lam log par song ngam/
263b7(mdo sde): gtsug lag khang du song ngam/ gnas khang du song ngam/ 'chag pa la zhugs sam/ 'khor gyi nang du song yang rung ste/ srung bar byed do// spobs pa skyed par byed/ dran pa dang / blo gros dang /
264a1(mdo sde): rtogs pa'i stobs bskyed pa nye bar sbyor te/ de la pha rol gyi rgol ba'am/ phas kyi dgra grags tshol ba dag gis glags kyang rnyed par mi 'gyur ro// de dran zhing shes bzhin/
264a2(mdo sde): du ldang bar 'gyur/ 'chag par 'gyur/ 'dug par 'gyur/ nyal bar 'gyur ro// 'jam dpal de la rig pa dang sngags kyi tshig de dag gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ ud d+hu re d+hu d+hu re/ man+da taTe/
264a3(mdo sde): nr-i ti go Tu re shi la li/ hi li mi le/ thi la thi mi li/ hu lu hu lu hu lu/ e bad She/ be ta te/ kha kha re/ tha re/ kha ra ke/ A sAn ne/ gti ma hi le/ mA na sha ta ne mA na se bar gan d+he/ sarba ru Ne
264a4(mdo sde): ra bA ba ga te/ sin d+hu le na mo bud d+he b+hA/ tsA ring tra/ na mo d+harmA ya/ narga ta ni/ na maHsa g+hA ya/ bA hi ta pA pe/ byA pa shAn tA ni/ sarba pA pA ne mai tri me/ sarba b+hu te bya/ sad t+ya ni rde sho brah+ma ba tho/ ma
264a5(mdo sde): / hA ri Shi b+hi/ pra shasta/ tad tra tiSh+ThAn te sarba b+hu ta gra ha/ na maHsarba bud d+he b+h+yaH/ sid d+hun tu me man tra pa dA swA hA/ 'jam dpal rig pa dang sngags kyi tshig 'di byang chub sems dpa' gang dag chos kyi rnam
264a6(mdo sde): grangs 'di la brtson pa/ rtag tu shes bzhin dang ldan pa/ mi rgod pa/ khengs pa med pa/ sems mi g.yengs pa/ kun tu spyod pa gtsang ba/ sogs pa dang bral ba/ chog shes pa/ bas
264a7(mdo sde): mtha'i gnas mal la mngon par dga' ba/ 'du 'dzi nyung ba/ lus dang sems dben pa/ byams pa dang snying rje la mngon par dga' ba/ chos la dga' zhing mos pa/ bden pa'i tshig la rab tu
264b1(mdo sde): / gnas pa/ mi slu ba/ nang du yang dag 'jog la mngon par dga' ba/ tshul bzhin yid la byed pa la brtson pa/ tshul bzhin ma yin pa yid la byed pa dang bral ba/ sbyangs pa'i yon tan dang yo byad
264b2(mdo sde): bsnyungs pa la mngon par dga' ba/ rnyed pa dang ma rnyed pa la sems mnyam pa/ mya ngan las 'das pa la mngon du phyogs pa/ 'khor bas 'jigs shing skrag pa/ sdug pa dang mi sdug pa la sems
264b3(mdo sde): mnyam pa/ 'du shes sna tshogs dang bral ba/ lus dang srog 'dor ba dngos po thams cad la mi blta ba/ spyod pa dang cho ga phun sum tshogs pa/ tshul khrims dang sdom pa la mngon par dga' ba/
264b4(mdo sde): bzod pa dang nges pa mang ba/ ngan du zer ba bzod pa'i rang bzhin can/ brtson 'grus brtsams pa/ sems can thams cad kyi bya ba ci yod ces bya ba la brtson pa/ bzhin 'dzum pa khro gnyer dang
264b5(mdo sde): bral ba/ gsong por smra ba/ nga rgyal bcom pa// des pa/ 'grogs na bde ba/ de lta bu'i spyod pa la rab tu gnas pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mos 'jam dpal sngags kyi tshig
264b6(mdo sde): 'di rab tu gdon par bya'o/ / 'jam dpal de ltar na chos smra ba de tshe 'di nyid la stobs skyed pa bcu rab tu 'thob bo// bcu gang zhe na/ mi brjed pa'i chos nyid pas dran pa'i stobs skyed pa dang /
264b7(mdo sde): chos rab tu 'byed pa la mkhas pas blo gros kyi stobs skyed pa dang / mdo sde'i tshul khong du chud pas rtogs pa'i stobs skyed pa dang sdom pa dang spod pa mi gtong bas dang pa'i stobs skyed pa dang / bdag dang gzhan
265a1(mdo sde): srung bas ngo tsha shes shing khrel yod pa'i stobs skyed pa dang / shes rab yongs su rdzogs pas thos pa'i stobs skyed pa dang / thos pa thams cad yongs su 'dzin pas gzungs kyi
265a2(mdo sde): stobs skyed pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis yongs su bzung bas spobs pa'i stobs skyed pa dang / mngon par shes pa lnga rab tu thob pas zab mo'i stobs skyed pa dang / myur du thams cad mkhyen
265a3(mdo sde): pa'i ye shes yongs su rdzogs pas mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa skyed pa ste/ 'jam dpal spyod pa la zhugs pa'i chos smra ba gang rig pa dang / sngags kyi tshig 'di rab tu 'don pa de ni stobs skyed pa de ba
265a4(mdo sde): rab tu thob par 'gyur ro/ / rig pa dang sngags kyi tshig bstan pa 'di bcom ldan 'das kyis bshad pa'i tshe/ rgyal po chen po bzhi skrag cing ba spu langs par gyur te/ g.yog brgya stong phrag du ma dang / bcom
265a5(mdo sde): ldan 'das ga la ba der dong nas phyin pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ thal mo sbyar nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das
265a6(mdo sde): bdag cag rgyal po chen po bzhi po 'di dag ni rgyun du zhugs pa/ / de bzhin gshegs pa'i bka' sgrub par bgyid pa ste/ gnyen bshes dang bcas/ 'khor dang bcas pas rigs kyi bu dang / rigs
265a7(mdo sde): kyi bu mo chos smra ba dang / chos ston pa dang / mdo sde 'di lta bu 'chang ba dang / klog pa de dag le bcom ldan 'das bdag cag rgyal po chen po bzhis bsrung ba dang / bskyab pa dang / sba bar bgyi'o//
265b1(mdo sde): de dag grong ngam/ grong khyer ram/ ljongs sam/ ljongs kyi phyogs gang na gnas kyang rung / khyim pa 'am/ rab tu byung ba'ang rung ste/ bcom ldan 'das bdag cag rgyal po bzhi stobs dang
265b2(mdo sde): bcas/ 'khor dang bcas pas/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de dag gi rim gro bgyi bar bdag cag spro'o// bsrung ba dang / bskyab pa dang / spro ba dang / spobs pa dang / gzhan gyis
265b3(mdo sde): gnod par mi bgyi zhing mi gtse bar bgyi ba'i slad du bdag cag spro'o/ / bcom ldan 'das sa phyogs gang na chos kyi rnam grangs 'di rab tu spyod par 'gyur ba'i sa phyogs der dpag tshad brgya khor
265b4(mdo sde): khor yug tu lha 'am/ klu 'am/ gnod sbyin nam/ grul bum gyis glags mi rnyed do// de nas rgyal po chen po 'phags skyes pos tshigs su bcad pa 'di skad ces gsol to// bdag la bu
265b5(mdo sde): dang gnyen bshes dang / / bran dang 'khor rnams ci mchis pa// de dang bdag cag grogs bcas pas// bdag po de dag rim gro bgyid// de nas rgyal po chen po mig mi bzang gis tshigs su bcad
265b6(mdo sde): pa 'di skad ces gsol to/ / bdag ni chos kyi rgyal po'i sras// chos las skyes pa chos kyi sprul// khyod kyi sras gang byang chub tu// zhugs pa de dag rim gro bgyid// de nas rgyal po chen
265b7(mdo sde): po yul 'khor srung gis tshigs su bcad pa 'di skad ces gsol to/ / sangs rgyas gsungs pa'i mdo sde 'di// gang dag 'dzin par 'gyur ba rnams// de dag phyogs bcu rnams su yang/
266a1(mdo sde): bdag gis kun tu bsrung bar bgyi// de nas rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bus tshigs su bcad pa 'di skad ces gsol to// gang dag byang chub phyir brtson pa// de la ci 'dra
266a2(mdo sde): 'os pa yi/ / de 'dra'i mchod pa bgyid par ni// sems can kun gyis mi nus so// de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu bden pa'i zla ba zhes bya ba des rin po che sna bdun
266a3(mdo sde): las byas pa'i gdugs gsol nas/ tshigs su bcad pa 'di skad ces gsol to// de bzhin gshegs las bdag nyid kyis// chos kyi rnam grangs gzung bar bgyi// pha rol la yang bstan par bgyi//
266a4(mdo sde): bdag gi bsam pa de 'dra'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag sems dang // sngon gyi spyad pa ci 'dra mkhyen// ji ltar bdag gis sems 'dud pa// bdag ni 'jig rten rnam 'dren 'gyur// sangs
266a5(mdo sde): rgyas dpag med skyob pa la/ / bdag gis gdugs 'di phul ba yis// bdag ni thub po khyod 'dra bar// spyi gtsug pa ltar yang mi gdar 'gyur// sangs rgyas skyes bu dam pa yang // bdag gis
266a6(mdo sde): byams pas bltas pa yis/ / yongs su dag pa'i mig thob ste// rgyal ba ma pham blta bar bgyi// ye shes pha rol phyin pa yi// ston pas de nas lung bstan te// khyod ni 'di nas phyi dus na// dga'
266a7(mdo sde): ldan du yang skye bar 'gyur/ / dga' ldan nas ni shi 'phos nas// rgyal ba byams pa mthong bar 'gyur// bskal pa stong phrag nyi shur ni// mchod pa byas nas 'byung bar 'gyur// khyod ni rab tu byung nas
266b1(mdo sde): kyang / / tshangs par spyod pa rab spyad de// bskal pa bzang 'dir gang byung ba// bdag po de dag mthong bar 'gyur// thams cad la yang mchod byas te// tshangs par spyod pa spyad nas ni// bskal pa
266b2(mdo sde): bye ba drug cu na/ / de nas khyod ni sangs rgyas 'gyur// sangs rgyas zhing ni legs brgyan pa// rin chen gdugs zhes bya bar ni// byang chub sems dpa' sha stag la// khyod ni chos rnams ston par
266b3(mdo sde): 'gyur/ / tshe yi tshad ni bskal par 'gyur// sems can rnams la phan pa'i phyir// mya ngan las 'das pa'i dam chos kyang // ma 'dres bskal pa phyed du gnas// de nas bcom ldan 'das la//
266b4(mdo sde): lci'i dbang po brgya byin gyis g.yog brgya stong phrag du ma dang bcas pas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag gis kyang chos smra ba mdo sde 'di 'chang ba de dag bsrung ba dang / yongs
266b5(mdo sde): su gzung bar bgyi'o/ / bsnyen bkur dang rim gror yang bgyi'o// gang na chos kyi rnam grangs 'di yi ger 'dri ba 'am// klog pa der ci nas kyang chos smra ba de'i stobs dang / mthu dang / chos kyi
266b6(mdo sde): mtshams sbyor ba spobs par 'gyur bar bdag 'khor dang bcas te chos nyan du mchi'o/ / de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyi bu sbed byed ces bya ba des// do shal rin po che thams cad kyis spras pa de/
266b7(mdo sde): bzhin gshogs pa la phul nas tshogs su bcad pa 'di dag gsol to// thub pa bdag 'dir mngon sum ste// ji ltar khyod kyis sngon spyad pa// de bzhin bdag kyang sangs rgyas kyi//
267a1(mdo sde): shes tshol bar bsgrub par bgyi// khyod kyis sngan chad ma stsal bar// yongs su ma btang ci ma mchis// bdog pa thams cad gtong ba yi// bdag kyang rjes su bslas
267a2(mdo sde): par bgyi/ / khyod kyis mdo sde 'di yang ni// 'jig rten mgon las mngon du blangs// yang dang yang du bshad par bgyi// bdag po khyed la bgyis pagazo// mdo sde 'di la su dga' ba// de dag
267a3(mdo sde): bdag gi ston pa 'dra/ / bdag ni sangs rgyas chos 'tshal bas// de la rtag tu rim gro bgyid// dam pa'i chos rnams yongs srung ba// mgon po nyan thos mi nus te// phyi dus 'jigs pa
267a4(mdo sde): chen po'i tshe/ / bdag gis yongs su bsrung bar bgyi// mgon po bdag kyang dbugs dbyung gsol// lha rnams the tsom gcad du gsol// thub pa khyu mchog khyod 'dra ba// ji srid yun gyis
267a5(mdo sde): 'grub par 'gyur/ / kun mkhyen ye shes mkhas pa yi// bde bar gshegs pas de lung bstan// nga ni ci 'dra de 'dra bar// khyod kyang rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'gyur// bskal pa bye ba phrag
267a6(mdo sde): stong dang / / bskal pa bye ba brgya yi tshe// 'jig rten du ni sangs rgyas 'gyur// ming ni ye shes 'byung zhes bya// byang chub zhi pa thob nas kyang // bdud rnams rab tu btul nas ni// sems can bye
267a7(mdo sde): ba phrag stong rnams/ / byang chub la yang 'god par 'gyur// de nas mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag bsam gtan
267b1(mdo sde): la gnas pa'ang btang ste/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di yang dag par ston pa de la chos nyan du mchi'o// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ brgya byin dang tshangs pa ni 'di
267b2(mdo sde): las skyes te/ bcom ldan 'das bdag rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de dag la bsnyen bkur dang rim gro bgyi bar spro'o// de dag ni lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis rim gro bgyi ba dang
267b3(mdo sde): mchod par 'os pa lags so/ / de nas tshangs pa mi mjed kyi bdag pos/ bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pas 'di skad ces gsol to// dge slong dang ni dge slong ma// dge bsnyen dang
267b4(mdo sde): ni dge bsnyen ma/ / gang rnams mdo sde 'di 'dzin pa// skye bo kun gyi mchod rten de// gal te mdo sde 'di la ni// sems can gcig 'ga' btsud na yang // 'gro ba'i mgon po bdag spro ba//
267b5(mdo sde): chos smra ba ni de dag la// khri stan gang la de mchis te// mdo sde 'di ni rab ston par// tshangs pa'i 'jig rten man chad du// me tog dgram par bdag spro'o// gang gi lag nas mdo sde 'di// phyi ma'i dus
267b6(mdo sde): na thos 'gyur ba/ / de la a la la zhes ni// legs smras legs zhes brjod par bgyi// gang na mdo sde 'di mchis par// me yi phung pos gang ba yi// bye ba snyed kyi zhing brgal nas// skyo mi 'tshal
267b7(mdo sde): bar mchi bar bgyi/ / rin chen phung po ri rab tsam// dga' bzhin du ni phul nas kyang // sangs rgyas kyi yang lam sbyong ba// mdo sde 'di yang mnyan par bgyi// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i
268a1(mdo sde): tshe rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du bya ba 'di lta bu mdzad de/ rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du bya ba ji lta bu mngon par 'du byas pas/ bdud sdig can dpung gi stobs bzhi dang / bcom ldan 'das
268a2(mdo sde): ga la ba der dong ste lhags pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyi zha bra la mgo bro phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag dpung dang bcas/ g.yog dang bcas pa 'di dag de bzhin
268a3(mdo sde): gshegs pa'i spyan sngar dam bcas te/ gang na chos kyi rnam grangs 'di rab tu spyod par 'gyur ba'i ljongs kyi phyogs der chos nyan pa dang / chos smra ba dag la bdud kyi las mi bgyi ba'i steng du bsrung
268a4(mdo sde): ba dang / bskyab po dang / sba bar yang bgyi'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'od zer gser gyi kha dog lta bus sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di khyab par mdzad de/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la
268a5(mdo sde): 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ / 'jam dpal 'di lta ste/ skyes bu dam pa dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa de dag gis dam pa'i chos yongs su gzung bar bya ba'i phyir/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di de
268a6(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pas byin gyis brlabs so/ / 'jam dpal chos kyi rnam grangs 'di yun ji srid du 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir spyod par 'gyur ba yun de srid du dam pa'i chos nub par mi 'gyur ro// de nas
268a7(mdo sde): 'khor de dag thams cad dga' mgu yi rangs/ rab tu dga' rangs/ yid bde bar gyur nas spos thams cad dang / 'phreng ba thams cad dang / byug pa thams cad dang / me tog thams cad dang /
268b1(mdo sde): phye ma thams cad kyis de bzhin gshegs pa la mngon par gtor nas/ tshig kyang 'di skad ces e ma ho chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'dzam bu'i gling na yun ring du gnas pa dang / rgyas par gyur cig
268b2(mdo sde): ces 'dzer to/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo khyod kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di gzung ngam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das
268b3(mdo sde): bdag gis gzung ngo / / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo de lta bas na chos kyi rnam grangs 'di gzung ba dang / bcang ba dang / bklag pa dang / yang dag par rab tu bsten pa'i
268b4(mdo sde): phyir/ khyod la yongs su gtad do// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das gang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'dzin tam/ 'chang ngam/ klog gam/ gzhan dag la ston tam/ yi ger bris pa la mchod pa bgyid
268b5(mdo sde): na/ de bsod nams ji tsam zhig skyed par 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ yi ge dang nges pa'i tshig ji snyed kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bstan pa de snyed kyi de bzhin gshegs
268b6(mdo sde): pa dge slong gi dge 'dun dang bcos pa la bde ba'i yo byad thams cad kyis bsnyen bkur byas pa bas/ gang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'dzin pa dang / bzung nas kyang gzhan la ston pa dang //
268b7(mdo sde): klog pa de ni de bas kyang bsod nams ches mang du skyed do// kun dga' bo gang gis dam pa'i chos yun ring du gnas par bya ba'i phyir/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di glegs bam du bris te mchod
269a1(mdo sde): na de'i tshe 'di nyid la gter 'thob pa bcu thob bo/ / bcu gang zhe na/ sangs rgyas kyi spyan rab tu thob pas sangs rgyas mthong ba'i gter dang / lha'i rna bas rab tu thos pas
269a2(mdo sde): chos nyan pa'i gter dang / phyir mi ldog pa'i dge 'dun rab tu thob pas/ dge 'dun mthong ba'i gter dang / rin po che'i lag pa rab tu thob pas zad mi shes pa'i longs spyod kyi gter dang /
269a3(mdo sde): mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po yongs su rdzogs pas gzugs kyi gter dang / g.yog mi phyeng bas g.yog gi gter dang / gzungs rab tu thob pas thos pa'i gter dang / spobs pa rab
269a4(mdo sde): tu thob pas dran pa'i gter dang / pha rol gyi rgol ba cher gcod pas mi 'jigs pa'i gter dang / sems can thams cad nye bar 'tsho bas bsod nams kyi gter ro// yang bcom ldan
269a5(mdo sde): 'das kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bstan pa na/ byang chub sems dpa' sa ya khrag khrig phrag 'dun cu rtsa gnyis mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa rab tu thob par gyur to// sems can dpag tu med pa
269a6(mdo sde): byang chub la rab tu zhugs so/ / sems can tshad med pa'ang len pa med par rnam par grol lo// de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom
269a7(mdo sde): ldan 'das chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i ming ci lags/ 'di ji ltar gzung bar bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dge' bo de'i phyir khyod kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i ming
269b1(mdo sde): chos thams cad yang dag par 'du ba zhes bya bar zung zhig/ sangs rgyas kyi rgyan bkod pa zhes bya bar zung zhig/ tshangs pa khyad par sems kyis kun dris pa zhes bya bar zung zhig/ 'jam
269b2(mdo sde): dpal gyis bstan pa zhes bya bar zung zhig/ bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dang / tshangs pa khyad par sems dang / bram ze shing sA la chen po lta
269b3(mdo sde): bu'i bu mnyam pa nyid la gnas pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' dra ba can gyi 'od dang / gnas brtan 'od srungs chen po dang / tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang / phyogs bcu nas 'dus pa'i byang chub
269b4(mdo sde): sems dpa' de dag dang / nyan thos chen po de dag dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la yi rangs te mngon par bstod do// /
269b5(mdo sde): 'phags pa tshangs pa khyad par sems kyis zhus pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so// / rgya gar gyi mkhan po shAkya pra b+ha dang / d+harma pA la dang / dzi na mi tra dang /
269b6(mdo sde): zhu chen gyi lo ts+tsha ba ban d+he d+harmA tA shI la dang / bar zhus kyi lo ts+tsha ba ban d+he de ben drA shI la dang / ku ma ra shI la la sogs pas zhus te gtan la phab pa//
269b7(mdo sde): rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya dru ma kin na rA dza pa ri brid tsha nA ma ma hA yA na sU tre/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa mi 'am ci'i rgyal po ljon pas zhus pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/ sangs rgyas dang
270a1(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ / 'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab na/ bya rgod kyi phung pobar la dge slong
270a2(mdo sde): drug khri nyis stong gi dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phal cher phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan nas 'dus pa bdun khri nyis stong thams cad kyang mdo
270a3(mdo sde): par shes pa/ gzungs thob pa/ spobs pa chags pa med pa/ ting nge 'dzin thob pa/ dran pa dang / blo gros dang / rtogs pa dang / mos pa dang / ngo tsha shes pa dang / khrel yod pa/ phun sum
270a4(mdo sde): tshogs pa/ bsam pa rdo rje ltar brtan zhing mi phyed pa/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la sbyor ba phun sum tshogs pa dang / lhag pa'i bsam pa khyad par du 'phags pa la zhugs pa/ bdag
270a5(mdo sde): nyid byang chub kyi sems mi 'dor ba/ sems can gzhan byang chub kyi sems yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug pa/ sbyin pa dang / dul ba dang / yang dag par sdom pa dang / bzod pa dang / nges pa dang /
270a6(mdo sde): 'phangs pa'i dngos po thams cad yongs su gtong ba/ yongs su bsngo ba'i cho ga shes pa/ lus dang / ngag dang / sems tshul khrims kyi rgyan gyis legs par brgyan pa/ sems can thams
270a7(mdo sde): cad la sems snyoms pa dang / bzod pa dang / nges pa'i stobs kyis go cha shin tu bgos pa/ bskal pa grangs med pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du brtson 'grus shin tu brtsams pa// bsam gtan
270b1(mdo sde): dang / rnam par thar pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / snyoms par 'jug pa dang / mngon par shes pa'i ye rishes kyis rnam par rtsen pa/ tshig thams cad rab tu dbye ba la spobs pa chags pa med pa'i
270b2(mdo sde): shes rab dang ye shes la mkhas pa/ lhun po'i ri ltar sems g.yo ba med pa/ sa dang / chu dang / me dang / rlung dang / ri ltar rjes su chags pa dang / khong khro ba dang bral ba/ byams pa chen po la
270b3(mdo sde): gnas te/ 'od zer thogs pa med pa/ snying rje chen po la gnas te/ rtag tu sems can la blta bar brtson pa/ dga' ba chen po la gnas te/ chos kyi kun dga' la dga' ba dang ldan pa/
270b4(mdo sde): btang snyoms chen po la gnas te/ gnyis su med pa shes pa thob pa/ 'jig rten gyi chos brgyad po rnyed pa dang / ma rnyed pa dang / grags pa dang / ma grags pa dang / bstod pa dang / smad pa dang /
270b5(mdo sde): bde ba dang / sdug bsngal las rab tu 'das pa/ phas kyi rgol ba ngan pa'i tshogs can gyi tshogs thams cad kun tu rab tu 'joms pa/ bdud da nyon mongs pa'i rgol ba bcom pa/ u du ma
270b6(mdo sde): wa ra'i me tog mthong ba ltar shin tu 'byung bar dka' ba/ gsol ba ma btab par sems can thams cad la dge ba'i bshes gnyen byed pa/ yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i bar du
270b7(mdo sde): gtan du mdza' ba/ seng ge'i sgra chen po sgrogs pa/ sangs rgyas kyi chos zab mo dang mi 'jigs pa sgrogs pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag rgyas btab pa/ mi 'khrugs par phyin par/
271a1(mdo sde): lung bstan pa/ ji ltar smras pa de bzhin byed pa/ de kho na'i chos kyi tshul la brtson pa/ 'od kyis nyi ma dang zla ba mog mog por byed pa/ phyogs bcur sgra bsgrags pa
271a2(mdo sde): sangs rgyas thams cad kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis shin tu byin gyis brlabs pa/ chos dkon mchog gi mdzod yang dag par 'dzin pa/ dkon mchog gsum gyi rigs mi gcod par yid la byed pa
271a3(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi zhing mtha' yas par 'gro ba la mkhas pa/ shin tu rnam par phye ba rnam par 'byed pa la gnas pa'i blo dang ldan pa// mthong ba dang thos pa don yod pas rnam par gnon pa/ rtag par
271a4(mdo sde): rgyun du sems can yongs su smin par byed pa la brtson pa/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang thabs la mkhas pa'i pha rol tu son pa/ sems can thams cad kyi dbang po mchog dang mchog ma
271a5(mdo sde): yin pa shes pas ci rigs par chos ston pa/ / sems can thams cad kyi spyod pa'i mtshan nyid kyi bya ba la mkhas pas/ sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi 'jug pa dang btags pa la bde
271a6(mdo sde): blag tu mkhas pa/ mi 'jigs pa chen pos 'jigs pa med pa dang / rko ba dang / na ba dang / 'chi ba dang / nyon mongs pa rab tu zhi bar byed pa/ sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong dpag tu med
271a7(mdo sde): pa la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pas/ / mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po yongs su rdzogs pa'i bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs bsags pa/ stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i chos
271b1(mdo sde): thams cad la mos pa/ rnam par grol ba// smon lam shin tu btab pa// sems can dang / chos thams cad sgyu ma dang / smig rgyu dang / rmi lam dang / chu zla dang / mig yor dang / brag cha dang /
271b2(mdo sde): nam mkha' dang mtshungs par mos pa/ sgra skad thams cad nges pa'i tshig gis ston pa'i ye shes la mkhas nga// chos dang / don dang / nges pa'i tshig dang / spobs pa so so yang dag par rig pa thob pa/
271b3(mdo sde): 'jig rten las 'das pa'i shes rab kyi dbang po la rtog pa rtogs par khong du chud pa/ shugs chen po 'dzin pa'i stobs bcu la nye bar gyur da// sha'i mig dang / lha'i mig dang / shes rab
271b4(mdo sde): kyi mig dang / chos kyi mig dang / sangs rgyas spun gyi snang ba thob pa/ lam gyi yan lag gi tshogs kyi shin tu bsags pa'i lam thams cad la 'jug pa'i ye shes la mkhas pa/ byang chub
271b5(mdo sde): sems dpa'i sde snod snang ba la 'jug pa'i cho ga shes pa/ phyir mi ldog pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba/ mtshan nyid kyi phyag rgya'i ting nge 'dzin thob pa/ rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor gyi ting nge 'dzin la
271b6(mdo sde): 'jug pa'i shes pa la mkhas pa/ / chos thams cad la dbang byed pa'i ting nge 'dzin mngon sum du gyur pa/ chos dkon mchog gi sgron ma 'dzin pa// sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi rgyud la
271b7(mdo sde): rnam par blta ba/ sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa la rnam par lta ba shes pa la mkhas pa/ sangs rgyas kyi ye shes la nye bar gyur pa/ sems can thams cad la sangs rgyas kyi ye shes
272a1(mdo sde): kyi bya ba so sor nye bar gnas pa/ rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa'i yon tan rin po che thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ bskal pa thams cad du bsngags pa yongs su rjod
272a2(mdo sde): kyang mthar mi phyin pa sha stag la 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dga' byed dang / dga' 'byung dang / lag na rin po che dang / rin po che me tog dang / rin po che'i tog dang /
272a3(mdo sde): mthong dga' dang / dga' ba'i blo gros dang / mig gis mthong dga' dang / sa 'dzin dang / dga' zhing mchog tu dgo' byed dang / spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang / mthu chen thob dang / dpal
272a4(mdo sde): chen dang / bdud thul dang / me tog man+da ra ba'i dri dang / rlung lha dang / bden dga' dang / mnyam lta dang / mnyam mi mnyam lta dang / kha lo sgyur dang / gsol ba ma btab par sems can kun
272a5(mdo sde): gyi bshes gnyen dang / byams pa dang / 'brug sgra dang / lhun po'i rtse mo 'dzin dang / lhun po brtsegs pa dang / lhun po'i mchog dang / 'od kyi tog dang / 'od dpal dang / sgron ma'i
272a6(mdo sde): rgyal po dang / mngon sum blo gros dang / 'od kyis yang dag brgyan dang / sna tshogs cod pan dang / lha'i cod pan dang / lha yul ba'i cod pan dang / mdzes pa'i mig gis lta ba dang / lag
272a7(mdo sde): bzangs dang / legs par bsams pa sems pa dang / 'khor lo rab gnas pa dang / mi g.yo rkang pas rnam par gnon dang / rdo rje rkang pas rnam par gnon dang / rkang pas 'jig rten
272b1(mdo sde): gsum rnam par gnon dang / dga' spobs dang / spobs myur dang / spobs pa mi 'chang pa dang / spobs pa byin gyi rlabs dang / 'jam sgra dang / sems can thams cad tshims
272b2(mdo sde): byed dang / dra ba can gyi 'od dang / rgyal ba'i blo gros dang / skye bar tshims byed dang / 'gro 'dzin dang / b+ha'i rgyal pos mchod dang / mchog gi blo gros dang / thogs med sems dang
272b3(mdo sde): skya reng blo gros dang / mi bskyod pa dang / dpag med rin chen mdzod dang / byang chub blo gros dang / sna tshogs me tog dang / lha'i me tog rgyal po dang / tshangs dbyangs dang / bzang
272b4(mdo sde): skyong dang / dkon mchog 'byung gnas dang / ded dpon bzang po dang / mis byin dang / chu lha dang / 'jam dbyangs dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jam dpal
272b5(mdo sde): gzhon nur gyur pa la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' bdun khri nyis stong dang thabs cig tu bzhugs so/ / gang stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di'i brgya byin dang /
272b6(mdo sde): tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba dang / de las gzhan pa lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen
272b7(mdo sde): po dang / mi 'am mi ma yin pa rnams bcom ldan 'das la blta ba dang / phyag bya ba dang / bsnyen bkur bya ba dang / chos mnyan pa'i phyir 'khor de nyid du 'dus par gyur
273a1(mdo sde): te 'dug go/ / de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lha'i cod pan zhes bya ba 'khor de nyid du 'dus pa des/ byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor
273a2(mdo sde): chen po de 'dus par rig nas/ stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba
273a3(mdo sde): byas nas/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btung nas/ bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon par
273a4(mdo sde): bstod do/ / 'jig rten 'das pa 'jig rten sgron ma mdzad// khyod ni 'jig rten don mdzad blo gros ldan// snang ba brnyes shing nyon mongs dri bsal ba// 'jig rten snang mdzad khyod la phyag
273a5(mdo sde): 'tshal lo/ / sbyin la dgyes shing stobs bcu'i mchog mnga' ba// dul ba btul ba gdul bya'i pha rol phyin// bcom ldan lha dang mi dang klas mchod pa// gdul ba mthar phyin khyod la phyag 'tshal lo//
273a6(mdo sde): mtshan mchog 'gro ba mang po'i don mdzad pa// 'dom gang 'od ni gser gyi kha dog 'dra// dge ba'i mtshan gyis dam pa'i gzugs mnga' ba// srid gsum mtshungs med khyod la phyag 'tshal lo//
273a7(mdo sde): pha rol gshegs pa gzhan gyi tshogs 'joms shing // phas kyi rgol ba'i rgol 'joms mi g.yo ba// sems can gzhan gyi sems kyi spod la mkhas// thugs rje mchog ldan khyod la phyag 'tshal lo//
273b1(mdo sde): dgra bcom rgyal po nyon mongs rdul bsal ba// 'tsho ba dag cing brtul zhugs tshul khrims gnas// lha yi lha mchog dri med dri ma bral// pha rol tshogs 'joms khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// bde
273b2(mdo sde): gshegs rin chen mchog tu dga' mdzad pa/ / dgon par rtag gnas rtag tu dgon par dges// rdul skyon gti mug rnyog pa mi mnga' ba// nam mkha' mnyam thugs khyod la phyag 'tshal lo//
273b3(mdo sde): chu bo bzhi rga la bden bzhi bka' mchid gsung // mig sbyin bdud rtsi chos kyi bka' mchid can// 'gro ba'i don mdzad 'jig rten gsum rgyu ba// 'khor lo zhabs mnga' khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// lha dang
273b4(mdo sde): mi yis mchod pa'i mthu bo che/ / mgon po lha yi dbang po bdud 'joms pa// mi dang lha klu tshogs kyis mchod pa yi// mi mchod dam pa khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// rtag tu bden sdud dam pa'i chos la
273b5(mdo sde): dgyes/ / mnyam thugs 'gro ba kun la byams pa'i thugs// chos la mnyam gnas mi rnams kha lo sgyur// yon tan mthar phyin khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// snyan pa'i sgra dbyangs rnam par dag
273b6(mdo sde): dang ldan/ / tshangs pa'i sgra dbyangs lta bur 'jam pa'i gsung // dbyangs kyi yan lag rab tshul kun rdzogs pa// bden pa snyan gsung khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// stong pa mtshan ma med cing smon dang bral/
273b7(mdo sde): zab mo lta dka' shin tu rtogs par dka'// thar la 'jug par mkhas pa blo gros ldan// thar pa'i lam nges khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// rgyu la rten pa mkhas pa'i bcom ldan 'das// mtha' gnyis lta ba
274a1(mdo sde): rtag tu mi mnga' ba/ / las rnams rnam smin kho na'i 'bras bu gsung // lta ba'i mun bral khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// gang nas ma byon gang du'ang gshegs ma lags/
274a2(mdo sde): rtag tu bden pa'i chos rnams rab gsung ba// smig rgyu sgyu bzhin nga yir mi mnga' ba// dge ba'i chos tshul khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// skye ba mi skye gang du'ang skye ma lags// skye dang 'jig dang
274a3(mdo sde): gang du'ang mi bas pa/ / chos kyi gnas nyid ji lta'i gnas la gnas// gnas la mi gnas rgyal la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin kho na de bzhin yang dag gsung // rtag tu mig yo de bzhin nyid la zhugs/
274a4(mdo sde): lhun po'i rgyal mtshan rdo rje 'dra ba'i sku// mi g.yo ri rab mtshungs la phyag 'tshal lo// sku ni dben zhing mnyam thugs blo ldan pa// grags se mtha' yas 'jig rten gsum du grags// skyes bu
274a5(mdo sde): mchog la zhu ba zhus pa rnams/ / 'jig rten zla bas myur du skabs dbyer gsol// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lnga'i cod pan gyis tshul dang 'dra ba'i tshigs su bcad pa
274a6(mdo sde): 'di dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod nas/ 'di skad ces gsol to// gal te zhus nas zhu ba lung bstan pa'i slad du/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la skabs phye na/ de bzhin
274a7(mdo sde): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la bdag phyogs 'ga' zhig zhu'o/ / de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems
274b1(mdo sde): dpa' chen po lha'i cod pan la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ / rigs kyi bu khyod de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la ci dang ci 'dod pa dris shig dang / ngas
274b2(mdo sde): dri ba dris pa de dang de'i lung bstan pas/ khyod kyi sems rangs par bya'o// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lha'i cod pan gyis/ bcom ldan 'das
274b3(mdo sde): la legs so zhes gsol te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar nyan cing / bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' spobs pa sna
274b4(mdo sde): tshogs kyi rgyan dang ldan pa rnams lags/ ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' chos zab mo rnam par nges pa la 'jug pa shes pa la mkhas pa rnams lags/ ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems
274b5(mdo sde): can thams cad kyi dbang po mchog dang / mchog ma lags pa shes pa la mkhas pa rnams lags/ ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' so so ci rigs par chos ston pa la mkhas pa rnams lags
274b6(mdo sde): ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi spyod pa shes pa la 'jug pa la mkhas pa rnams lags/ ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' rgyu dang / bya ba dang / las
274b7(mdo sde): kyi rnam par smin pa la 'jug pa shes pa la brjed pa ma mchis par spyod pa rnams lags/ ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sbyin pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa rnams lags/ ji ltar na byang chub
275a1(mdo sde): sems dpa' tshul khrims kyi rgyan gyis brgyan pa rnams lags/ ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' bzod pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa rnams lags/ ji ltar na byang chub
275a2(mdo sde): sems dpa' brtson 'grus kyi rgyan gyis brgyan pa rnams lags/ ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' bsam gtan gyi rgyan gyis brgyan pa rnams lags/ ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' shes
275a3(mdo sde): rab kyi rgyan gyis brgyan pa rnams lags/ ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' tshangs pa'i lam la mkhas pa rnams lags/ ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' mngon par shes pa la mi nyams pa
275a4(mdo sde): rnams lags/ ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' g.yul las rnam par rgyal ba rnams lags/ ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' brgal nas pha rol thang la gnas pa rnams lags/ ji ltar
275a5(mdo sde): na byang chub sems dpa' nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang / sems can thams cad kyi spyod lam yang ston la/ ma brtags pa'i kun tu spyod pa dang yang ldan pa rnams
275a6(mdo sde): lags/ ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' 'khor ba la'ang blta la/ mya ngan las 'das pa la'ang mi gnas pa rnams lags/ ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' khams sna tshogs
275a7(mdo sde): la'ang rnam par blta la/ chos kyi dbyings las kyang mi g.yo ba rnams lags/ ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' don yang mi 'dor la/ gnod par yang kun tu dga' ba rnams lags
275b1(mdo sde): ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sod nams kyi nor dang ldan la thabs kyi nor med pa rnams lags/ ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' a zhes bgyi ba'i sgos rnam par ma mchis pa'i sgor 'jug pa rnams
275b2(mdo sde): lags/ ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad mngon sum du gyur pa rnams lags/ ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' chos gtan la dbab pa rnams la rnam par phye ba shin/
275b3(mdo sde): tu rnam par 'byed pa rnams lags/ ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten gyi bya ba dang 'thun par zhugs kyang nyon mongs pa thams cad kyis mi gos pa rnams lags/ ji ltar na byang chub
275b4(mdo sde): sems dpa' gzhan dag gis bltar mi mthong ba'i chos kyi dbang phyug rnams lags/ ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa rnams mthong ba dang mi 'bral ba rnams lags/ ji ltar
275b5(mdo sde): na byang chub sems dpa' shin tu dul zhing mi 'khrugs pa'i chos can rnams lags/ ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' chos rnams blangs pa ma mchis pa'i slob dpon rnams lags/ ji ltar na byang
275b6(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' sems can thams cad kyi ston par gyur pa rnams lags/ ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos kyi 'khor lo rjes su bskor ba rnams lags/ ji ltar na
275b7(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la dbang bskur ba thob pa rnams lags/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lha'i
276a1(mdo sde): cod pan la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ rigs kyi bu legs so legs so// rigs kyi bu khyod skye bo mang po la phan pa dang / skye bo mang po la bde ba dang / 'jig rten la u0f7f b
276a2(mdo sde): rtse ba dang / skye bo phal po che'i don dang / lha dang mi rnams la phan pa dang / bde ba'i phyir zhugs pa dang / rigs kyi bu khyod da ltar gyi dang / ma 'ongs po'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams rjes su
276a3(mdo sde): gzung ba dang / theg pa chen po 'di yun ring du gnas par bya ba'i phyir/ rigs kyi bu khyod de bzhin gshegs pa la gang don 'di 'dri bar yongs su sems pa ni legs so// rigs kyi bu de'i phyir rab
276a4(mdo sde): tu legs par nyon la yid la zung zhig dang / ngas khyod la bshad do// bcom ldan 'das legs so zhes gsol nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lha'i cod pan bcom ldan
276a5(mdo sde): 'das kyi ltar nyan pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis/ de la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na/ spobs pa sna tshogs kyi rgyan dang
276a6(mdo sde): ldan pa rnams yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sems can thams cad la 'od zer thogs pa med pa rnams yin/ rin po che dang 'phangs pa'i dngos po thams cad yongs su gtong
276a7(mdo sde): zhing yang 'gyod pa med pa rnams yin/ chos smra ba la gzhan dag gis bshad pa mi zlog cing rjes su yi rang ste dga' ba dang / mgu ba dang / dang ba dang / mchog tu dag rab thob nas legs
276b1(mdo sde): zhes bya ba byin pa dang / chos mnyan pa dang / chos 'gro ba 'am/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten gyi phyir ram/ mtshan mo 'dug par skul na mchog tu dga' ba dang ldan pa dang / byang chub
276b2(mdo sde): kyi sems kyi lhag pa'i bsam pa dang / zang zing med pa'i sems kyis chos kyi sbyin pa sbyin pa ste/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po 'di dag dang ldan na// spobs pa sna
276b3(mdo sde): tshogs kyi rgyan dang ldan pa rnams yin no/ / rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na/ chos zab mo rnam par nges pa la 'jug pa shes pa la mkhas pa rnams yin te/ @
276b4(mdo sde): gang zhe na/ rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dang rjes su 'thun pa dang / bdag gi rang bzhin ltar sems can thams cad kyi rang bzhin rtogs pa dang / 'du byed thams cad gar yang mi 'gro/
276b5(mdo sde): gang nas kyang ma 'ongs par rab tu shes pa dang / chos thams cad nam mkha'i phyag rgyas btab par mos pa ste/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po 'di dag dang ldan na/ chos
276b6(mdo sde): zab mo rnam par nges pa la 'jug pa shes pa la mkhas pa rnams yin no/ / rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na/ sems can thams cad kyi dbang po mchog dang mchog ma
276b7(mdo sde): yin pa shes pa la mkhas pa rnams yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ chos kyi dbyings kyi sgo shin tu sbyangs pa dang / sgrib pa med pa'i sgo mngon sum du gyur pa dang / mngon par shes pas rnam
277a1(mdo sde): par rtse ba shes pa dang / sems las su rung zhing ting nge 'dzin phun sum tshogs pa ste/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po 'di dag dang ldanan/
277a2(mdo sde): sems can thams cad kyi dbang po'i mchog dang mchog ma yin pa shes pa la mkhas pa rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na// so so ci rigs
277a3(mdo sde): papar chos ston pa la mkhas pa rnams yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ so so yang dag par rig pa shes pa dang / sems can gzud par shes pa dang / chos rab tu rnam par 'byed pa shes pa dang
277a4(mdo sde): bdag gi sems sbyangs pas sems can thams cad kyi sems sbyangs par rab tu shes pa ste/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na/ so so ci rigs par
277a5(mdo sde): chos ston pa la mkhas pa rnams yin no/ / rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na/ sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi spyod pa shes pa la 'jug pa la mkhas pa rnams
277a6(mdo sde): yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ shes rab kyi 'dzud pa dang / ye shes chags pa med pa dang / thabs la mkhas pa la zhugs pas sgrib pa thams cad rgyun chad pa dang / blo shin tu sbyangs pa ste/ rigs kyi bu
277a7(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po 'di dag dang ldan na/ sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi spong ba shes pa la 'jug par mkhas pa rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' chos
277b1(mdo sde): bzhi dang ldan na/ rgyu dang / bya ba dang / las kyi rnam par smin pa la 'jug pa shes pa la brjed pa med par spyod pa rnams yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ chad par smra ba ma yin pa dang / rtag par smra ba ma
277b2(mdo sde): yin pa dang / rgyu dang / bya ba dang / las kyi 'bras bu la yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du 'jug pa dang / chos la chos nyid du byed cing chos la chos su smra'i/ 'di be nga bdag gis mi smra ba ste/ de ltar
277b3(mdo sde): bya ba la 'jug pas rgyu dang / bya ba dang / las kyi 'bras bu chung mi gzon pa ste/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po 'di dag dang ldan na/ bya ba dang / las kyi rnam
277b4(mdo sde): par smin pa la 'jug pa shes pa la brjed pa med par spyod pa rnams yin no/ / rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' ches bzhi dang ldan na/ sbyin pa'i papa brgyan pa rnams yin te/ bzhi
277b5(mdo sde): gang zhe na/ mtshan gyis legs par brgyan pa rnams yin// dpe byad bzang pos rnam par spras pa rnams yin/ gzugs blta bas mi ngoms pa rnams yin/ lag na rin po che theb pas
277b6(mdo sde): longs spyod mi zad pa yin te/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po 'di dag dang ldan na/ sbyin pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa'
277b7(mdo sde): chos bzhi dang ldan na/ tshul khrims kyi rgyan gyis brgyan pa rnams yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'khor lo sbyor ba'i rgyal por 'gyur zhing / byang chub kyi sems kyis brgyan pa dang / lha'i
278a1(mdo sde): dbang po brgya byin du 'gyur zhing / byang chub kyi sems kyis brgyan pa dang / mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs par 'gyur zhing / byang chub kyi sems kyis brgyan pa dang /
278a2(mdo sde): ngan 'gro thams cad yang dag par bcad nas lha dang mir skye ba yongs su bzung bar gyur cing / byang chub kyi sems kyis brgyan pa yin te// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po de
278a3(mdo sde): dag dang ldan na/ tshul khrims kyi rgyan gyis brgyan pa rnams su rig par bya'o// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na/ bzod pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa rnams yin te/
278a4(mdo sde): bzhi gang zhe na/ tshangs pa'i skad dang sgra dbyangs lta bu dang ldan pa rnams yin/ ka la bing+ka'i sgra dang rnga sgra lta bu dang ldan pa rnams yin/ skye bo mang pos mthong na dga' ba dang sdug cing yid du//
278a5(mdo sde): 'ong ba rnams yin/ dge ba'i chos rnams la yi dam la brtan pa rnams yin te/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po 'di dag dang ldan na/ bzod pa'i rgyan gyis brgyar
278a6(mdo sde): rnams su rig par bya'o/ / rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na/ brtson 'grus kyi rgyan gyis brgyan pa rnams yin te// bzhi gang zhe na/ dam bcas pa nyams reg//
278a7(mdo sde): tu chud par bya ba'i cho ga shes pas dge ba'i chos rnams la yi dam brtan pa rnams yin/ pha rol gyis mnan pa med pas rdo rje'i lus rab tu thob pa rnams yin/ bya ba ci yod ces
278b1(mdo sde): bya ba la mos pas gsol ba ma btab par sems can thams cad la dge ba'i bshes gnyen byed pa rnams yin/ thos pa'i tshogs bsags pas mi ngoms pa'i phyir/ yid yongs
278b2(mdo sde): su mi skyo ba rnams yin te/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po 'di dag dang ldan na/ brtson 'grus kyi rgyan gyis brgyan pa rnams su rig par bya'o// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems
278b3(mdo sde): dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na/ bsam gtan gyi rgyan gyis brgyan pa rnams yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ mi rgod pa rnams yin/ ma khengs pa rnams yin/ mu cor smra ba med pa rnams yin
278b4(mdo sde): cang shes kyi sems mi 'dor ba rnams yin te/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po 'di dag dang ldan na/ bsam gtan gyi rgyan gyis brgyan pa rnams su rig par bya'o/
278b5(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na/ shes rab kyi rgyan gyis brgyan pa rnams yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ bdag dang / sems can dang / srog dang /
278b6(mdo sde): gso ba dang / skyes bu dang / gang zag tu smra ba med pa rnams yin/ spobs pa chags pa med pa rnams yin/ tshig thams cad rab tu dbye ba bstan pa shes pa la mkhas pa rnams
278b7(mdo sde): yin/ chos thams cad la som nyi med cing the tsom dang bral ba rnams yin te/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po 'di dag dang ldan na/ shes rab kyi rgyan gyis brgyar pa
279a1(mdo sde): rnams yin no/ / rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na/ tshangs pa'i lam la mkhas pa rnams yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta/
279a2(mdo sde): sems can thams cad kyi dpung gnyen bya ba'i phyir/ mngon par bsgrubs pa'i byams pa dang / sems can thams cad yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir/ mngon par bsgrubs pa'i snying rje chen
279a3(mdo sde): po dang / chos thams cad la dga' bas mngon par bsgrubs pa'i dga' ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes kyi phyir mngon par bsgrubs pa'i btang snyoms te/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems
279a4(mdo sde): dpa' chos bzhi po 'di dag dang ldan na/ tshangs pa'i lam la mkhas pa rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na/ mngon par shes pa las mi nyams pa rnams
279a5(mdo sde): yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ bsam gtan bzhi sdud pa'i shes pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi pasgrub pa'i thabs shes pa dang / rang gi sems la dbang sgyur ba'i chos
279a6(mdo sde): shes pa dang / sangs rgyas la blta ba'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi zhing mtha' yas par 'gro ba ste/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po 'di dag dang ldan na/ mngon par shes pa las mi nyams
279a7(mdo sde): pab rnams yin no/ / rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na/ g.yul las rnam par rgyal ba rnams yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ nang nye bar zhi ba dang / pha rol tu mi
279b1(mdo sde): rgyu ba dang / chos thams cad la sgyu ma lta bur rab tu rtog pa'i shes pa dang / ye shes kyi stobs can yin gyi/ nyon mongs pa'i spobs can ma yin pa ste/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa'
279b2(mdo sde): bzhi po 'di dag dang ldan na/ / g.yul las rnam par rgyal ba rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' tshes bzhi dang ldan na/ brgal nas pha rol thang la gnas pa rnams yin te/ bzhi
279b3(mdo sde): gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ 'dod pa'i chu bo'ang rab tu shes la/ 'dod chags dang bral ba'ang mngon sum du mi byed pa dang / srid pa'i chu bo'ang rab tu shes la/ bsams bzhin du'ang skye ba dang /
279b4(mdo sde): lta ba'i chu bo'ang rab tu shes la/ lta ba'i bcing bas bcings pa'ang mi 'dor ba dang / ma rig pa'i chu bo'ang rab tu shes la/ rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i rjes su 'thun par yang byed pa ste/
279b5(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po 'di dag dang ldan na/ brgal nas pha rol thang la gnas pa rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na//
279b6(mdo sde): nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang / sems can thams cad kyi spyod lam yang ston la/ ma brtags pa'i kun tu spyod pa dang yang ldan pa rnams yin te/ bzhi ga zhen
279b7(mdo sde): 'di lta ste/ sgyu ma lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin shin tu yongs su bsgrubs pa dang / chos thams cad rnam par bsgrubs pas so sor nye bar gnas pa'i mtshan nyid du shin tu brtags pa da ba
280a1(mdo sde): par shes pa lngas rnam par rtse ba shes pa dang ldan pa dang / yid kyi lus mngon par bsgrub pa la mkhas pa ste/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' chos
280a2(mdo sde): bzhi po 'di dag dang ldan na/ / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang / sems can thams cad kyi spyod lam yang ston la/ ma brtags pa'i kun tu spyod pa dang yang ldan pa rnams
280a3(mdo sde): yin no/ / rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na/ 'khor ba la'ang lta la/ mya ngan las 'das pa la'ang mi gnas pa rnams yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/
280a4(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs dang / snying rje chen po'i sems dang / thabs la mkhas pa dang / sngon gyi yi dag mi 'dor ba ste/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po 'di dag dang ldan na
280a5(mdo sde): 'khor ba la'ang lta la/ mya ngan las 'das pa la'ang mi gnas pa rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na/ khams sna tshogs la'ang rnam par lta la/ chos
280a6(mdo sde): kyi dbyings las kyang mi g.yo ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sems can rang bzhin med pas chos rang bzhin med par rtogs pa dang / chos rang bzhin med pas sems can rang bzhin med
280a7(mdo sde): par rtogs pa dang / sems can rang bzhin med pas sangs rgyas kyi chos rang bzhin med par mos pa dang / sems can rang bzhin med pa la som nyi med cing the tshom dang bral ba yin te/ rigs
280b1(mdo sde): kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po 'di dag dang ldan na/ khams sna tshogs pa la'ang rnam par lta la// chos kyi dbyings las kyang mi g.yo'o// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' chos
280b2(mdo sde): bzhi dang ldan na/ don yang mi mngon la/ gnod par yang kun tu snang ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ bsam pa mya ngan las 'das pa la gnas pa rnams yin/ sbyor ba 'khor ba la gnas
280b3(mdo sde): pa rnams yin/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yongs su bskang bar bsam pa gnas pa rnams yin// nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi yul la'ang kun tu snang ba rnams yin te/ rigs kyi
280b4(mdo sde): bu byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po 'di dag dang ldan na/ don yang mi 'dor la/ gnod par yang kun tu snang ngo // rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' tshes bzhi dang ldan na/ bsod
280b5(mdo sde): nams kyis nor dang ldan la/ thabs kyi nor med pa rnams yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ rgya chen po la mos pa'i sems can gdul ba'i phyir/ bsod nams kyis 'khor lo sgyur
280b6(mdo sde): ba dang / brgya byin dang tshangs pa'i bsod nams kyang nye bar ston pa dang / 'gro ba bal pa 'dul ba'i phyir/ dbul zhing dman par yang nye bar ston pa dang / slong ba mthong na bdog pa thams cad
280b7(mdo sde): yongs su gtong zhing nor med par yang 'gyur ba dang / nor chen po dang ldan pa mthong na bsod nams kyis longs spyod zad mi shes par yang nye bar ston pa ste/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa'
281a1(mdo sde): chos bzhi po 'di dag dang ldan na/ bsod nams kyis nor dang ldan pa yin la/ thabs kyis nor med pa rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan
281a2(mdo sde): na a zhes bya ba'i sgos rnam pa med pa'i sgo la 'jug pa rnams yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ 'du byed thams cad mi rtag par shes pa sbyong ba dang / 'du byed thams cad gzod ma nas sdug
281a3(mdo sde): bsngal lo zhes byang chub rab tu rnyed pa dang / chos thams cad bdag med do zhes lta bar gyur pa yongs su sbyong ba dang / mya ngan las 'das pa ni gzod ma nas zhi ba zhes ye shes la 'jug pa ste// rigs
281a4(mdo sde): kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po 'di dag dang ldan na/ a zhes bya ba'i sgos rnam pa med pa'i sgo lo 'jug pa rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na/
281a5(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad mngon sum du 'gyur ba rnams yin no// bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi mig shin tu rnam par dag pa rnams yin/ chos kyi mig gis snang ba thob pa rnams
281a6(mdo sde): yin/ sangs rgyas kyi spyan mngon sum du gyur pa rnams yin/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la dbang bskur ba thob pa rnams yin te/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po 'di dag dang
281a7(mdo sde): ldan na/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad mngon sum du gyur pa rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na/ chos gtan la dbab pa rnams la rnam par phye ba shin
281b1(mdo sde): tu rnam par 'byed pa rnams yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ so so yang dag par rig pa shes pa sgrib pa med pa dang / bden pa bzhi rnam par dgod pa shes pa dang / rton pa la gnas su
281b2(mdo sde): shes pa dang / gzungs la g.yeng ba med par shes pa ste/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po 'di dag dang ldan na// chos gtan la dbab pa rnams la rnam par phye ba shin tu
281b3(mdo sde): rnam par 'byed pa rnams yin no/ / rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na/ 'jig rten gyi bya ba dang 'thun par zhugs kyang nyon mongs pa thams cad kyis mi gos pa rnams
281b4(mdo sde): yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ 'jig rten gyi chos mngon sum du gyur pa dang / 'jig rten las sems can yang dag par sgrol ba dang / rjes su chags pa dang / khong khro ba spong ba dang /
281b5(mdo sde): gzod ma nas rnam par dag cing 'od gsal bas rang bzhin gyis kun nas nyon mongs pa can ma yin pa ste/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po 'di dag dang ldan na/ 'jig rten gyi bya/
281b6(mdo sde): ba dang 'thun par zhugs kyang nyon mongs pa thams cad kyis mi gos pa rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na/ gzhan dag gis bltar mi mthong ba'i chos
281b7(mdo sde): kyi dbang phyug rnams yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sems kyi dbang phyug dang / shes rab kyi dbang phyug dang / ye shes kyi dbang phyug dang / thabs kyi dbang phyug ste/
282a1(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po 'di dag dang ldan na/ gzhan dag gi bltar mi mthong ba'i chos kyi dbang phyug rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu byang
282a2(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na/ de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ba dang mi 'bral ba rnams yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sems can rnams sangs rgyas la lta ba yang dag
282a3(mdo sde): par 'dzin du 'jug pa dang / sems can rnams chos nyan pa yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug pa dang / sems can rnams byang chub kyi sems yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug pa dang / sangs
282a4(mdo sde): rgyas rjes su dran pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang mi 'bral ba yin te/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po 'di dag dang ldan na// de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ba dang mi 'bral ba rnams yin
282a5(mdo sde): no/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na/ shin tu dul zhing mi 'khrugs pa'i chos can rnams yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ 'phags pa 'jig rten las
282a6(mdo sde): 'das pa'i shes rab kyis rnam par grol ba ye shes mthong ba mngon sum du gyur pa dang / bden pa la nye bar brtags pas chos thams cad ji lta ba bzhin dang / bag chags kyis mtshams sbyor
282a7(mdo sde): ba thams cad yang dag par 'joms pa la mkhas par gyur pa dang / / nyon mongs pas mi 'khrugs pa'i chos can yin te/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po 'di dag dang ldan
282b1(mdo sde): rna shin tu dul zhing mi 'khrugs pa'i chos can rnams yin no/ / rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan chos rnams blangs pa med par slob dpon rnams yin te/ bzhi gang/
282b2(mdo sde): zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sems can thams cad la phan pa'i dngos po phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin/ sems can yongs su smon par bya ba la brtan zhing bsam pa rgya che ba rnams yin/ bdag gi bde ba la
282b3(mdo sde): mi chags pa rnams yin/ gang ye shes yongs su tshol ba de sems can thams cad kyi ched du yin gyi/ bdag 'ba' zhig gi phyir ma yin pa ste/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' ches bzhi po 'di dag
282b4(mdo sde): dang ldan na/ chos rnams blangs pa med par slob dpon rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na/ sems can thams cad kyi ston par gyur pa rnams yin te/ bzhi gang
282b5(mdo sde): zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ bdag gi don btang zhing gzhan gyi don byed pa rnams yin/ bdag gi bde ba thams cad gtong zhing sems can rnams la chos kyi bde ba sbyin pa rnams yin/ ji ltar thos pa'i chos ston pa
282b6(mdo sde): la ngal ba med pa rnams yin/ chos kyi 'tsho bas 'tsho'i/ zang zing gi 'tsho ba ma yin pa ste/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po 'di dag dang ldan na/ sems can thams cad kyi sten par gyur
282b7(mdo sde): pa rnams yin no/ / rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos kyi 'khor lo rjes su bskor ba rnams yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ gzungs
283a1(mdo sde): rab tu 'thob pa dang / spobs pa rgyun mi 'chad pa dang / sems can gyi bsam pa la shes pa 'jug pa dang / mya ngan las 'das pa'i lam du khrid cing mi byed pa'i chos
283a2(mdo sde): ston pa yin te/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po 'di dag dang ldan na/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems
283a3(mdo sde): dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la dbang bskur ba thob pa rnams yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lnga ste/ spod pa thams cad las rab tu 'das pa rnams yin/
283a4(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa las phyir mi ldog cing mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob pa rnams yin te/ bsams bzhin du tshe dang / 'chi 'pho dang / skye ba'ang ston la/ phyir mi ldog pa'i
283a5(mdo sde): phyag rgyas kyang btab pa rnams yin/ de bzhin gshegaso pa'i phyag rgya la yang dag par gzhol zhings bcus nges par byung nas/ sa nas sar 'phar ba la mkhas pa rnams yin te/ rigs kyi bu
283a6(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po 'di dag dang ldan na/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la dbang bskur ba thob pa rnams yin no// bcom ldan 'das kyis bzhi pa sgrub pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs
283a7(mdo sde): 'di bshad pa na/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rnam pa drug tu g.yos nas/ snang ba chen pos kyang 'jig rten gyi khams khyab par gyur to// steng gi bar snang las
283b1(mdo sde): lha bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong gis lha'i glu dbyangs blangs te/ lha'i me tog man+da ra ba'i char rab tu phab nas/ 'di skad ces kye ma bcom ldan 'das kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
283b2(mdo sde): byang chub bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong grangs med par bsgrubs pa gang lags pa de bcom ldan 'das kyis bzhi pa sgrub pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di skad cing bshad de rab tu bstan to/ /
283b3(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das gang bzhi pa sgrub pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di nyen pa dang / thos nas kyang mos pa dang / mos nas kyang 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par bgyid
283b4(mdo sde): pa dang / gzhan dag la'ang ston pa dang / byang chub kyi sems dang mi 'bral ba'i sems can de dag ni dge ba'i rtsa ba ngan ngon dang ldan pa ma lags te/ de dag ni ji ltar de bzhin gshegs
283b5(mdo sde): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas da ltar seng ge'i sgra sgrog pa bzhin du lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyi mdun du seng ge'i sgra sgrogs par
283b6(mdo sde): 'gyur ro/ / bcom ldan 'das bdag cag kyang bzhi pa sgrub pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos pas rnyed pa legs par rnyed do zhes ched du rjed pa ched du brjod do// bcom ldan 'das kyis bzhi pa sgrub
283b7(mdo sde): pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad pa na/ lha dang mi'i srog chags brgyad khri bzhi stong ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems skyes so// byang chub sems dpa' khri
284a1(mdo sde): nyis stong ni mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur to/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lha'i cod pan gyis
284a2(mdo sde): 'di skad ces gsol to/ / bcom ldan 'das gang dag de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i mdo sde 'di lta bu 'di 'dzin pa dang / gzhan dag la'ang rgya cher rab tu ston pa'i
284a3(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' de dag chos du dang ldan par 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu gang dag de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i mdo sde 'di lta bu
284a4(mdo sde): 'dzin pa dang / gzhan dag la'ang rgya cher yang dag par ston pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de dag ni chos brgyad dang ldan par 'gyur ro// brgyad gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ de dag yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
284a5(mdo sde): byang chub la bsam pa nges te/ bsam pa phun sum tshogs par 'gyur pa dang / sems can thams cad la zhe 'gras pa'i sems med de/ shin tu byams pa sgom pa dang sgoms par 'gyur ba dang /
284a6(mdo sde): sems can thams cad yongs su smin par bya ba la gnas te/ snying rje chen po la gnas par 'gyur ba dang / chos 'dod de/ chos don du gnyer bar 'gyur ba dang / thos pa tshol bas mi ngoms
284a7(mdo sde): te mtsho chen rgya mtsho lta bur 'gyur ba dang / lus dang srog 'dor zhing / dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin par 'gyur ba dang / bsod nams kyi tshogs bsags te/ dge ba'i rtsa bas
284b1(mdo sde): bstan par 'gyur ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis brlabs te/ smon lam gyis yang dag par byung bar 'gyur ba dang / 'khor gyi nang du 'jigs pa med pas bdud dang phyir rgol ba
284b2(mdo sde): bcom par 'gyur ba ste/ rigs kyi bu gang de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i mdo sde 'di lta bu 'di 'dzin pa dang / gzhan dag la'ang rgya cher ston pa'i byang chub sems
284b3(mdo sde): dpa' de dag ni chos brgyad po 'di dag dang ldan par 'gyur ro/ / de nas de'i tshe sangs rgyas kyi mthus stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rnam pa drug tu g.yos par gyur to//
284b4(mdo sde): stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na gang dgas phyogs mtho dman can dang / ri nag po dang / chu mig dang / mtsho dang / mtshe'u dang / lteng ka dang / rgya mtsho chen po de
284b5(mdo sde): dag thams cad mi snang bar gyur to/ / sa chen po 'di dag thams cad kyang lag mthil ltar mnyam par gnas par gyur to// chu na gnas pa'i sems can rnams la gnod pa med par gyur to//
284b6(mdo sde): stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na shing skam gang dag lo brgya lon pa de dag thams cad las kyang me tog dang / 'bras bu sna tshogs skyes par gyur nas/ bcom ldan
284b7(mdo sde): 'das ga la ba der logs su btud/ mngon par btud nas phyag 'tshal bar gyur to// de ma yin pa shing gzhan thams cad las kyang me tog dang / 'bras bu sna tshogs skyes nas bcom
285a1(mdo sde): ldan 'das ga la ba der logs su btud/ mngon par btud nas phyag 'tshal bar gyur to// sa chen po las kyang pad+ma tshad shing rta'i 'phang lo tsam sna
285a2(mdo sde): tshogs blta na sdug pa kha dog dang ldan pa/ dri dang ldan pa yid du 'ong ba dag mngon par 'thon to// snang ba chen pos kyang stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di khyab par
285a3(mdo sde): gyur to/ / mi snang zhing ma dkrol bar yang steng gi bar snang las lha'i sil snyan dang glu dbyangs kyi sgra byung ste grag par gyur to// ri'i rgyal po gangs dang / ri'i rgyal po spos kyi ngad ldang
285a4(mdo sde): las kyang lha'i me tog sna tshogs sngon dri mi mnam pa rnams kyang mchog gi dri ngang byung ste/ dri des stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir dri zhim po mnam par gyur to//
285a5(mdo sde): ri'i rgyal po gangs dang / ri'i rgyal po spos kyi ngang ldang de las me tog gi char chen po bab ste/ de dag bcom ldan 'das kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor gang na ba der mngon par bab nas/ sa chen po
285a6(mdo sde): 'dir me tog gi char de dag gis pus nub tsam du gyur to/ / me tog gi shing de dag las lha'i me tog sna tshogs kyi char rab tu 'bab cing sil snyan dang glu dbyangs sna tshogs kyi sgra dag
285a7(mdo sde): kyang byung ngo / / steng gi bar snang la rin po che sna tshogs kyi gdugs dpag tshad brgya stong phrag drug cu'i tshad tsam kun tu gnas par gyur to// rin po che'i gdugs de las mu tig gi/
285b1(mdo sde): rgyan 'phreng dang / rin po che'i dril bu g.yer ka'i dril bu sna tshogs kyi dra ba 'phyang bar gyur to// dril bu g.yer ka'i sgra yid du 'ong ba/ yid dga' bar byed pa/ chags par byed pa
285b2(mdo sde): des stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di go bar byas par gyur to/ / de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan
285b3(mdo sde): 'das dga' bar bgyid pa/ mgu bar bgyid pa'i mtshan ma rgya chen po 'di lta bu 'di dang / stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan par gyur pa
285b4(mdo sde): gda' ba 'di su'i snga ltas lags/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu 'di ni mi 'am ci'i rgyal po ljon pA ri'i rgyal po spos dang ldang nas 'khor mi 'am ci stong phrag du ma dang
285b5(mdo sde): 'khor stong phrag du ma dang / 'khor lha stong phrag du ma dang bcas 'ong ba de'i snga ltas so// de skad gsungs ma thag tu de nas skad cig de la mi 'am ci'i rgyal po ljon pa sil snyan dang / glu dbyangs
285b6(mdo sde): len pa brgyad khri bzhi stong dang / 'khor brgya stong du mas bskor nas/ steng gi bar snang la me tog gi chun po'i char 'bebs shing / bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der 'ongs te phyin nas 'khor dang bcas pas
285b7(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi sman sngar 'dug go/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar mi 'am
286a1(mdo sde): ci'i rgyal po sdong po bdag nyid kyis pi wang gi khog pa bai DUR+Ya las byas pa/ 'dzam bu chu bo'i gser gyi bsam le'u can// sa le sbrum dang / nor bu dang / rin po
286a2(mdo sde): che du mas smras pa/ sngon gyi las kyi rnam par smin pas yongs su sbyangs pa blangs te/ sil snyan brgyad khri bani stong po de dag dang lhan cig tu grags par byed do// mi 'am ci'i rgyal po sdong
286a3(mdo sde): bos pi wang de blangs ma thag tu de nas pi wang gi sgra des stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams dbyangs kyis go bar gyur to/ / pi wang gi sgra des 'dod pa na spyod pa'i rgyud kyi sgra dang /
286a4(mdo sde): glu'i sgra dang / lha'i glu dbyangs kyi sgra rnams zil gyis gnan te mi gsal bar gyur to// de nas pi wang gi sgra des bskul bas 'dod pa na sprod pa'i lha'i bu de dag gis lha'i rol mo bor te/
286a5(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der lhags so// mi 'am ci'i rgyal po sdong pos pi wang gang de blangs ma thag tu/ de nas stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di shing dang /
286a6(mdo sde): ri'i rgyal po ri rab dang / gangs can dang / spos kyi ngad ldang dang / btang bzung dang / btang bzung chen po dang / de ma yin pa gzhan ri nag po rnams dang / rtswa dang / shing gel ba
286a7(mdo sde): dang sman dang / nags tshal ji snyed pa de dag thams cad ldeg rab tu ldeg/ kun tu rab tu ldeg go// g.yo rab tu g.yo/ kun tu rab tu g.yo/ 'gul rab tu 'gul/ kun tu rab tu 'gul to//
286b1(mdo sde): 'di lta ste/ dper na chang gis ra ro ba'i mi 'byor/ rab tu 'byor/ kun tu rab tu 'byor pa de bzhin du/ shing de dag thams cad dang / ri thams cad kyang 'dud/ rab tu 'dud/
286b2(mdo sde): kun tu rab tu 'dud do// mi 'am ci'i rgyal po sdong pos pi wa nga khog pa bai DUR+Ya las byas pa blangs ma thag tu/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor der 'dus pa'i nang
286b3(mdo sde): nas phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ma gtogs par 'dod chags dang bral ba'i dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma dang / lha dang / klu dang
286b4(mdo sde): gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba dang / mi dang / mi ma
286b5(mdo sde): yin pa dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad la bsam gtan pa'i dgra bcom pa dang / thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor gyis pi wang gi sgra de thos pa dang / pi wang gi sgra de ma bzod nas rang
286b6(mdo sde): rang gi stan las langs te/ 'dar rab tu 'dar/ kun tu rab tu 'dar ro// 'dud rab tu 'dud/ kun tu rab tu 'dud do// gar byed rab tu gar byed/ kun tu rab tu gar byed do// nyan
286b7(mdo sde): thos chen po de dag thams cad kyang rang rang gi stan la mi dga' ste/ 'gul rab tu 'gul zhing spyod lam yang 'khrugs nas/ byis pa chung ngu bzhin du gar byed pa lta bur ston to// de nas
287a1(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' lha'i cod pan gyis/ nyan thos chen po de dag la 'di skad ces smras so// tshe dang ldan pa nyan thos chen po dag nyon mongs pa dang bral ba/
287a2(mdo sde): rnam par thar pa brgyad la bsam gtan pa// bden pa bzhi mthong bar gyur pa yin na/ ci'i phyir rang gi lus 'jog par mi nus shing / tshe dang ldan pa dag byis pa chung ngu bzhin du
287a3(mdo sde): gar byed pa lta bur ston/ nyan thos chen po de dag gis smras pa/ rigs kyi bu mi 'am ci'i rgyal po sdong pos pi wang 'di blangs pa dang / sil snyan dang glu dbyangs sbyar bas pi wang gi
287a4(mdo sde): sgra des bdag cag la dbang med par bdag gis lus rang rang gi stan la 'dug par mi dga' zhing 'dar/ rab tu 'dar/ kun tu rab tu 'dar te/ sems rnam par gzhog par yang ma nus so//
287a5(mdo sde): de nas byang chub sems dpa' lha'i cod pan gyis/ gnas brtan 'od srungs chen po la 'di skad ces smras so// btsun pa 'od srungs chen po rgas gtugs// 'khogs pa
287a6(mdo sde): 'dod pa nyung ba/ chog shes pa/ sbyangs pa'i yon tan 'dzin pa/ lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyi mchod rten du gyur pa yin na/ ci'i phyir rang gi lus 'dzin par
287a7(mdo sde): mi nus shing gnas brtan du gyur kyang byis pa chung ngu bzhin du gar byed pa lta bur ston/ gnas brtan 'od srungs chen pos smras pa/ rigs kyi bu dper na rlung rnam par 'thor byed langs pa na/
287b1(mdo sde): shing dang / nags dang / ri thams cad 'di ltar bdag rnam par gzhag pa'i stobs med/ mthu med de/ de dag thams cad mi 'dod bzhin du g.yo rab tu g.yo// 'gul rab tu 'gul lo//
287b2(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu de bzhin du gang 'di mi 'am ci'i rgyal po ljon pas pi wang blangs pa de'i sgra thos pas/ bdag cag rlung rnam par 'thor byed kyis ri chen po bangs pa bzhin du bdag 'dzin ma nus
287b3(mdo sde): par gyur to/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ skyes bu dam pa 'di'i smon lam dang / bsod nams dang / ye shes kyi khyad par ni 'di 'dra ste/ des nyan thos kyi bsod nams dang / ye shes dang /
287b4(mdo sde): gzi brjid thams cad zil gyis gnon to// byang chub sems dpa' lha'i cod pan gyis smras pa/ btsun pa 'od srungs chen po phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dpal dang
287b5(mdo sde): gzi brjid dang / stobs la gang gi phyir bi wang gi sgra des bskul ba 'am/ bskyod par mi nus pas/ btsun pa 'od srungs chen po su zhig bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang
287b6(mdo sde): chub tu sems mi skyed/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang nyi tshe ba'i ye shes dang ldan pa rnams kyi stobs dang / gzi brjid de ni pi wang gi sgra 'dis zil gyis non to// gang theg pa chen po la
287b7(mdo sde): yang dag par zhugs pa rnams kyi stobs dang / gzi brjid de la ni zil gyis gnon par mi nus pa la ltos/ de nas mi 'am ci'i rgyal po ljon pas pi wang gi sgra sgrog pa na/ sangs rgyas
288a1(mdo sde): kyi mthu dang / mi'am ci'i rgyal po ljon pa'i sngon gyi smon lam gyi byin gyi rlabs kyis pi wang de dang sil snyan brgyad khri bzhi stong po de dag las kyang tshigs su bcad pa/
288a2(mdo sde): 'di dag byung ngo // tha ma 'bring dang de bzhin mchog rnams kyis// chos rnams thams cad mnyam zhing chos rnams dben// zhi bstong pa mi 'gyur 'khrug pa med// gzod nas ngag ste m
288a3(mdo sde): ed nam mkha' bzhin/ / gang dag da ltar gyi dang 'das pa yi// sems can kun mnyam sems can sems can med// sems can skad du sgra rnams 'byung ba yang // chos kyi sgra dang mtshungs
288a4(mdo sde): te de yang med/ / zhing rnams thams cad zhing mnyam zhing min te// bar snang dang ni mtshungs shing mnyam par snang // 'phel ba ma yin mi zad ma skyes te/ gsog gsob nam mkha' lta bur
288a5(mdo sde): rnam par dag/ sangs rgyas kun mnyam sangs rgyas sangs rgyas min// chos dbyings nges par 'dres pa med pa ste/ tshul khrims shes rab ye shes rnam grol mnyam// mtshan nyid gcig
288a6(mdo sde): ste mtshan mnyam mtshan nyid med/ / nyon mongs thams cad nyon mongs ma yin grol// rtog dang rtog pa kun rtog rnam par rtog/ nang na rgyu ba ma yin phyi rol min// 'du shes mdud pa phyin ci log
288a7(mdo sde): las gyur/ / rnam par rtog pas chos dbyings ming btags pa// ming de nyid kyang gzhan min de bzhin min// ming dang gzugs kyi rang bzhin rjes rtogs pa// de dag rtag tu mi chags 'jig
288b1(mdo sde): rten spyod/ / gang rnams 'das pa'i bde gshegs grangs med pa// de dag gis ni gang gsungs chos mang po// gzod nas zad cing deng sa dang 'jigs las dben// de dag yul nga
288b2(mdo sde): phyogs su 'gro ma yin/ / chos 'di dag ni yi ge las byung ste// yi ge de dag sems can zad pa'i chos// yi ge zad pa'i chos nyid shes pas na// chos rnams kun la rnam par rtog ni
288b3(mdo sde): sems kyi rgyud ni rgyud mnyam rgyud ma yin/ / rang bzhin gzhan dang gzhan te chags pa med// sems dang sems byung chos mtha' med shes pas// 'phags pa rnams ni mnyam pa
288b4(mdo sde): chos la 'jug/ mtha' dang mtha' med kun chad rnam par chad// thog ma tha ma bar ma mnyam par gyur// dus gsum dag ni dben pa shes pa mnyam// shes pa de yang mtha' yod ma yin/
288b5(mdo sde): skye bo rtag tu ming dang gzugs la chags// mtha' dang mtha' med lta bas gos pa rnams// rgyu dang rkyen las byung bar shes pas na// bdag dang sems can rnam par rtog ma yin// ba
