316b2(mdo sde): yongs su longs spyod pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das la phul lo/ / de nas mi 'am ci'i rgyal po ljon pa'i bu brgyad stong pos rin po che'i pad+ma bkod pa dang / rin po che'i gdugs brgyad stong du tshang bas
316b3(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bkab ste gtor ma thag tu/ sangs rgyas kyi mthus de dag thams cad 'khor gyi khyams der bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu'i drang thad kyi steng gi bar snang la dpag tshad stong
316b4(mdo sde): tsam na rin po che'i gdugs gcig tu gnas par gyur to/ / de nas mi 'am rgyal po ljon pa'i bu brgyad stong pos bcom ldan 'das kyi cho 'phrul rgya chen po 'di lta bu 'di mthong nas tshim zhing mgu la yi rangs/
316b5(mdo sde): shing rab tu dga' ste/ dga' ba dang yid bde ba skyes nas lhag pa'i bsam pas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do// de dag gis byang chub tu sems bskyed nas/
316b6(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das gang thos pas bdag cag byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos yang dag par sgrub par 'gyur ba byang chub tu yongs su smin par bgyid pa'i chos
316b7(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis bdag cag la bshad du gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis mi 'am ci'i rgyal po ljon pa'i bu de dag gi lhag pa'i
317a1(mdo sde): bsam pa mkhyen nas ta la bdun srid kyi steng gi bar snang la skyil mo krung bcas te bzhugs nas sku las 'di lta bu'i 'od byung ste/ 'od des stong gsum gyi stong chen por
317a2(mdo sde): 'jig rten gyi khams 'di snang ba chen pos khyab par gyur to/ / gang mi 'am ci dang / dri za dang / lto 'phye chen po de dag dang / 'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha'i bu de dag gi rol mo sil snyan rnam pa
317a3(mdo sde): sna tshogs de dag thams cad ma brdungs ma dkrol bar mdzes pa dang ldan par 'khrol lo/ / ri'i rgyal po spos kyi ngad ldang na spos kyi shing dang / me tog gi shing dang / 'bras bu'i shi
317a4(mdo sde): ji snyed pa de dag las kyang rol mo sil snyan gyi sgra byung ngo / / bcom ldan 'das kyi spu'i khung bu thams cad nas kyang 'od zer bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong byung ngo // 'od zer thams cad kyi
317a5(mdo sde): rtse mo las kyang pad+ma tshad shing rta'i 'phang lo tsam dag byung ngo / / pad+ma'i snying po thams cad la'ang byang chub sems dpa'i gzugs skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis legs par brgyan pa
317a6(mdo sde): lus dag gnas par kun tu snang ngo / / de nas sangs rgyas kyi mthus rol mo sil snyan de dag las ni yongs su 'dri ba'i tshigs su bcad pa byung / byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams
317a7(mdo sde): cad ni sgra dbyangs dang skad cig gis tshigs su bcad nas nges par lan 'debs so/ / de la sil snyan las tshigs su bathad pa/ bla na med pa'i byang chub sems// ji lta bur ni bskyed pa dang // bya
317b1(mdo sde): chub snying por 'dug par du/ / sems ni brjed pa med par 'gyur// byang chub sems dpa'i gzugs rnams kyis smras pa/ sems can kun gyi ched kyi phyir// lhag pa'i bsam pa phun sum tshogs/
317b2(mdo sde): snying rje tshe dang ldan pa ni// byang chub sems brjed mi 'gyur ro// sil snyan rnams kyis smras pa/ de dag bsam pa ji lta bu// rab tu sbyor ba'ang ci 'dra zhig/ de dag snying rje chen po la// nges par
317b3(mdo sde): sems pa ji ltar skye/ / byang chub sems dpa'i gzugs rnams kyis smras pa/ g.yo med lhag pa'i bsam pa ste// de dag sbyor ba bcos ma min// mya ngan 'das sgor 'jog pa ni// de dag snying rje de
317b4(mdo sde): 'dra'o/ / sil snyan rnams kyis smras pa/ de dag gtong ba ji lta bu// ji ltar byin nas 'gyod med cing // rnam smin don du mi gnyer bar// byang chub tu ni sngo bar byed// byang chub sems dpa'
317b5(mdo sde): gzugs rnams kyis smras pa/ dngos po kun la mi lta bar// des ni byin nas 'gyod pa med// byang chub lam du 'jog byed pa// de phyir rnam smin re ba med// sil snyan rnams kyis smras pa/ ji ltar
317b6(mdo sde): tshul khrims ldan gyur kyang / / tshul khrims kyis ni rlom sems med// theg chen bla na med pa la// tshul khrims 'chal pa smin par byed// byang chub sems dpa'i gzugs rnams kyis smras pa/ bya/
317b7(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' tshul khrims ldan// stong pa nyid kyis rlom sems med// byams pa chen po skyed pa ni// tshul khrims 'chal pa yongs smin byed// sil snyan rnams kyis smras pa/ ji lta bur na
318a1(mdo sde): sems can gyis/ / spros shing bsdigs pa bzod byed cing // sems kyis gnod pa mi byed la// mchog tu dga' ba skyed par 'gyur// byang chub sems dpa'i gzugs
318a2(mdo sde): rnams kyis smras pa/ bdag ni sems can thams cad kyi// nyon mongs gso ba'i sman pa snyam// de dag ngan par smras pa yis// tshig thos zhe sdang mi 'gyur ro// sil snyan rnams kyis smras pa/
318a3(mdo sde): de dag brtson 'grus ji lta bu// brtul ba yang ni ci 'dra zhig/ ji ltar zhum pa med sems kyis// byang chub sprad pa spyod par 'gyur// byang chub sems dpa'i gzugs rnams kyis smras pa/ chos
318a4(mdo sde): dang sems can srung ba ni/ / rtul ba dang ni brtson 'grus so// dge ba'i rtsa bas brtan pa ni// des na sems ni zhum mi 'gyur// sil snyan rnams kyis smras pa/ de dag ji ltar dran dang ldan//
318a5(mdo sde): blo gros rtogs par khong du chud// ji ltar bsam gtan bsam gtan byed// de la chags pa med par 'gyur// byang chub sems dpa'i gzugs rnams kyis smras pa/ g.yeng ba med pa dran
318a6(mdo sde): dang ldan/ / tshul 'chos med pa blo gros ldan// thabs kyis bsam gtan bsam gtan byed// des na de la chags mi 'gyur// sil snyan rnams kyis smras pa/ ji ltar shes rab ldan
318a7(mdo sde): pa dang / / yang dag lta ba drang po dang // chos rnams rnam par dbye ba la// mkhas shing 'jigs pa med par 'gyur// byang chub sems dpa'i gzugs rnams kyis smras pa/ thos pas shes
318b1(mdo sde): rab kun tu 'phel/ / rten pas lta ba drang por 'gyur// chos kyi sbyin pas nges 'gyur te// tshul bzhin gyis ni don rtogs 'gyur// sil snyan rnams kyis smras pa/ ji ltar thos pa
318b2(mdo sde): btsal bas na/ / de dag thos pa mang du 'gyur// gang gis che ba'i bdag 'gyur bar// thos pa'i chos rnams ston par 'gyur// byang chub sems dpa'i gzugs rnams kyis smras pa/
318b3(mdo sde): gus par byas te thos tshol zhing // grub pas thos pa mang du 'gyur// phang zing med par chos sbyin pa/ des ni che ba'i bdag nyid 'gyur// sil snyan rnams kyis smras pa/ de dag byams pa ji lta
318b4(mdo sde): pubu/ de dag snying rje ci 'dra zhig/ de dag dga' ba ji lta bu// btang snyoms kyang ni ci 'dra zhig/ byang chub sems dpa'i gzugs rnams kyis smras pa/ sems dang btang snyoms byams
318b5(mdo sde): ba ste/ sems can dgrol ba'i snying rje'o// sangs rgyas chos dag dga' ba ste// gnyis spangs pa ni btang snyoms so// sil snyan rnams kyis smras pa/ ji ltar sangs rgyas mthong
318b6(mdo sde): pabar 'gyur/ / sems kyang ji ltar dang bar 'gyur// chos thos nas ni ji lta bur// de dag the tsom skye mi 'gyur// byang chub sems dpa'i gzugs rnams kyis smras pa/ sangs
318b7(mdo sde): rgyas rjes su dran bsgoms pa/ / des ni 'dren pa mthong bar 'gyur// the tshom med cing bsam dag pas// chos thos nas ni som nyi med// sol snyan rnams kyis smras pa/ bsod
319a1(mdo sde): nams tshogs ni ji lta bu/ / ye shes tshogs kyang ci 'dra zhig/ de dag zhi gnas lhag mthong la// rtsom pa yang ni ji lta bu// byang chub sems dpa'i gzugs
319a2(mdo sde): rnams kyis smras pa/ ngoms mi shes pa bsod nams tshogs// 'dri ba rnams ni ye shes tshogs// zhi ba'i sems ni zhi gnas te// chos shes pa ni lhag mthong ngo // sil snyan
319a3(mdo sde): rnams kyis smras pa/ de dag gi ni spyod yul gang // de dag gnas kyang ji lta bu// de dag gnas pa ci 'dra zhig/ de dag sbyor ba'ang ji lta bu// byang chub sems dpa'i gzugs rnams kyis
319a4(mdo sde): smras pa/ de dag spyod yul stong pa nyid// gnas ni pha rol phyin pa'i lam// gnas pa bsam gtan bzhi rnams te// sems can rab dgrol sbyor ba'o// sil snyan rnams kyis smras pa
319a5(mdo sde): de dag bdud kyi las gang yin/ / sangs rgyas 'phrin las ji lta bu// ci 'dra ba yi las byas na// byang chub la ni gzhol bar 'gyur// byang chub sems dpa'i gzugs rnams kyis smras
319a6(mdo sde): pa/ theg pa dman pa bdud kyi las// sangs rgyas 'phrin las theg pa che// sdig pa thams cad spong ba ni// byang chub gzhol bar 'gyur ba'o// sil snyan rnams kyis smras pa// de dag
319a7(mdo sde): grogs brten ji lta bu/ / sdig pa'i grogs po ci 'dra zhig/ log par lta la mi gnas shing // ji ltar yang dag song bar 'gyur// byang chub sems dpa'i gzugs rnams kyis smras pa/
319b1(mdo sde): gang zhig byang chub lam ston pa// rtag tu bde sbyin grogs po'o// byang chub sems las gang zlog pa// de dag sdig pa'i grogs por shes// sil snyan rnams kyis smras pa/ lam du 'jug
319b2(mdo sde): par 'gyur ba yi/ / lta ba drang po ji lta bu// sbyor ba rnam par shes nas su// ji ltar lta de 'jig mi byed// byang chub sems dpa'i gzugs rnams kyis smras pa/ las dang bya bar 'jug pa ni/
319b3(mdo sde): de dag drang por lta ba yin// log par sbyor ba rnam shes nas// lta ba de dag 'dzag mi byed// sil snyan rnams kyis smras pa// ji ltar dam pa'i chos srung zhing // sems can yongs su smin par
319b4(mdo sde): byed/ ji lta bu yi thabs kyis ni// de dag byang chub sgrub par 'gyur// byang chub sems dpa'i gzugs rnams kyis smras pa/ brtson 'grus kyis ni chos srung ste// bsdu bas
319b5(mdo sde): yongs su smin par byed/ / mtha' gnyis rnam par spangs pa ni// byang chub sgrub par byed pa yin// sa la snyan rnams kyis smras pa// de dag shes pa'i lam ci 'dra// nga rgyal
319b6(mdo sde): khas ni ji lta bu/ / ji ltar bka' blo bde ba dang // thams cad dus su 'thun par 'gyur// byang chub sems pa'i gzugs rnams kyis smras pa/ rtsod pa med pa shes pa'i las//
319b7(mdo sde): nga rgyal las ni rtsod pa 'byung // nges pa bka' blo bde ba ste// gus pa yis ni 'thun par 'gyur// sil snyan rnams kyis smras pa/ de dag lam ni ji lta bu// log pa'i lam
320a1(mdo sde): yang ci 'dra zhig/ bla med byang chub lam du ni// ji ltar sems can rab tu 'god// byang chub sems dpa'i gzugs rnams kyis smras pa/ lam ni pha rol phyin
320a2(mdo sde): pa drug/ theg pa dman pa log pa'i lam// shes rab thabs la bslab pa ni// sems can lam la 'dzud pa'o// sil snyan rnams kyis smras pa/ ji lta bur na nor chen 'gyur//
320a3(mdo sde): de dag rnyed pa'ang ci 'dra zhig/ gter rnams kyang ni ji lta bu// gang gis de dag 'gro tshim byed// byang chub sems dpa'i gzugs rnams kyis smras pa/ nor bdun dang ni rtag
320a4(mdo sde): tu ldan/ / chos rnyed pa ni rnyed pa'o// de dag gter ni gzugs yin te// rab tu rnyed nas tshim par byed// sol snyan rnams kyis smras pa/ de dag gis ni pha ma gang // nye du'i tshogs rna rdza
320a5(mdo sde): lta bu/ g.yog rnams kyang ni ci 'dra zhig/ gang gis mkhas pa de dag mdzes// byang chub sems dpa'i gzugs rnams kyis smras pa/ ma ni shes rab pa ni thabs// nye du byang chub
320a6(mdo sde): phyogs rnams yin/ / dge ba rnams ni g.yog yin te// des ni mkhas pa de dag mdzes// sil snyan rnams kyis smras pa/ ji ltar bdag med rtogs nas ni// byams pas
320a7(mdo sde): 'gro ba khyab par byed/ / bdag med pa dang byams pa dag/ de la ji ltar mtshungs par 'gyur// byang chub sems dpa'i gzugs rnams kyis smras pa/ gang dag stong nyid rab tu shes//
320b1(mdo sde): de ni bdag med khong du chud// gang gis 'gro ba stong shes pa// de ni de yi byams pa mchog/ sil snyan rnams kyis smras pa/ 'du byed rnams ni rang bzhin gyis// 'ong ba med cing /
320b2(mdo sde): 'gro med na// las dang las kyi rnam par smin// ji lta bur na thar par 'gyur// byang chub sems dpa'i gzugs rnams kyis smras pa/ dam pa'i don du 'ong med de// gang du'ang 'gro ba
320b3(mdo sde): yod ma yin/ / kun rdzob tu na lam 'jug cing // rnam par smin pa nye bar ston// sel snyan rnams kyis smras pa/ stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med// smon lam rnam par spangs par ni// /
320b4(mdo sde): mtshan nyid gcig tu rab rtogs nas// de kho na ni ji ltar shes// byang chub sems dpa'i gzugs rnams kyis smras pa/ stong nyid gang yin de mtshan med// mtshan ma don du gnyer med pa//
320b5(mdo sde): mtshan nyid gcig cing don gcig ste// rnam par thar pa'i sgor ston to// sil snyan rnams kyis smras pa/ gang gis mya ngan 'das 'gro ba'i// stong par rtog pa ji lta bu// sems can lta
320b6(mdo sde): ba ji lta bu/ / yongs su smin byed ji lta bu// byang chub sems dpa'i gzugs rnams kyis smras pa/ shes rab kyis ni stong par rtog/ thabs kyis sems can rnams la lta// snying rjes
320b7(mdo sde): yongs su smin par byed/ / des ni mya ngan 'das par 'gro// sil snyan rnams kyis smras pa// chos 'di dag ni chos nyid kyis// skye ba med cing 'byung med par// tshul mchog 'di
321a1(mdo sde): 'dra shes nas ni/ / gang gis 'khor bar skye bar 'gyur// byang chub sems dpa'i gzugs rnams kyis smras pa/ mi skye ba dang mi 'byung ba// de ni shes rab
321a2(mdo sde): spyod yul lo/ / bsams bzhin du ni gang skye ba// de ni thabs kyi tshul yin no// sol snyan rnams kyis smras pa/ gtong la dga' bar ji ltar 'gyur// ji lta bur ni phyir mi ldog/ ji ltar bzod pa
321a3(mdo sde): phun sum tshogs/ / ji ltar rnam par nges par 'gyur// byang chub sems dpa'i gzugs rnams kyis smras pa/ mnyam par gnas pa gtong la dga'// chos kyi dbyings las phyir mi ldog/ mi skye ba
321a4(mdo sde): la bzod pa ste/ / chos shes nas ni rnam par nges// sil snyan rnams kyis smras pa/ ji ltar byang chub snying po gang // rdzogs pa'i byang chub mtshan nyid gang // ci phyir rdzogs sangs rgyas zhes bya//
321a5(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa ji ltar grol// byang chub sems dpa'i gzugs rnams kyis spras pa/ byang chub snying po nam mkha' ste// byang chub nam mkha'i mtshan nyid do// gang yang kun nas ga
321a6(mdo sde): mug med/ / de bzhin nyid phyir de bzhin gshegs// de nas mi 'am tsho'i rgyal po'i bu de dag gis tshigs su bzud pa 'di dag thos nas/ mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob bo// de dag gis bzod pa
321a7(mdo sde): thob nas/ rang rang gis gos dang rgyan bcom ldan 'das kyi sku la gsol te/ 'di skad ces kyang gsol to// bcom ldan 'das gang gi slang du bdag cag gis nyan pa'i rnam pa 'di lta bu thos pas
321b1(mdo sde): sangs rgyas ni bdag cag gi ched du byung ngo / / bcom ldan 'das sil snyan dang glu dbyangs 'di dag las the tsom 'dri ba'i sgra 'di lta bu byung ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i gzugs 'di dag gis dris
321b2(mdo sde): pa de dag thams cad kyis lan btab pas 'khor 'di'i dogs pa thams cad spangs pa dang / bdag cag kyang chos kyi snang ba bdag tu ma mchis pa skyes pa ngo mtshar to// bcom ldan 'das sil snyan de dag
321b3(mdo sde): las sgra 'di lta bu byung ba'i rgyu ci lags/ su'i byin gyi rlabs kyis na// byang chub sems dpa'i gzugs 'di dag gi pa lan 'debs par gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ bzhin bzangs
321b4(mdo sde): dag de dag thams cad ni sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs su blta'o/ / bzhin bzangs dag de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyis nam mkha' las kyang chos kyi sgra 'di lta bu 'byung na/ sil snyan las
321b5(mdo sde): chos kyi sgra ci phyir mi 'byung ste/ bzhin bzangs de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi rlabs ni bsam gyis mi khyab bo// mi 'am ci'i rgyal po'i bu de dag gis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das sems
321b6(mdo sde): can thams cad kyis sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs bsam gyis mi khyab pa thob par gyur cig/ de nas mi 'am ci'i rgyal po ljon pa'i slas mi 'am tso mo brgyad khri bzhi stong mu tig kha dog sna tshogs
321b7(mdo sde): kyi do shal thogs nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste byin pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyags 'tshal nas/ ji ltar thogs pa mu tig gi do shal de
322a1(mdo sde): dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bkab bo/ / mu tig gi do shal de dag bral ma thag tu/ sangs rgyas kyi mthus de dag bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu'i gtsug gi drung zad
322a2(mdo sde): kyi steng gi bar snang la mu tig gi do shal gyi khang pa brtsegs pa brgyad khri bzhi stong du myur te/ khang pa brtsegs pa de dag thams cad kyang gru bzhi lham pa/ ka ba bzhi zug pa/ cha mnyam pa/ ngos
322a3(mdo sde): shin tu rnam par phye ba sha stag go/ / khang pa brtsegs pa de dag na rin po ches spras pa'i khri rtsa ba'ang rin po che las byas pa/ lha'i ras bcos bu'i zung du ma bkram pa dag byung bar gyur to//
322a4(mdo sde): khri de dag thams cad la'ang de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis legs par brgyan pa dag bzhugs par kun tu snang ngo // de nas mi 'am
322a5(mdo sde): mo brgyad khri bzhi stong gis bcom ldan 'das kyi cho 'phrul 'di lta bu 'di mthong nas tshim zhing mgu ste yid rab tu dga' nas/ dga' ba dang yid bde ba skyes te bsam pa thag pa nas bla na med
322a6(mdo sde): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do/ / de dag byang chub tu sems bskyed nas/ dga' zhing mchog tu dga' ste dang ba thob nas/ thams cad kyis sgra skad dang
322a7(mdo sde): dbyangs gcig tu tshul dang 'dra ba'i tshogs su bcad pa 'di dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod do/ / bla na med pa'i dgra bcom mchog gsung ba// don dgongs
322b1(mdo sde): mtshungs pa ma mchis bsam mi khyab/ / don dang chos dang 'dul ba rab brlabs pa// sems can mchog la mgo bos phyag 'tshal lo// 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug thab 'jig/ dgon par
322b2(mdo sde): zhugs dgyes bsnyengs pa mi mnga' ba/ / rin chen mdzod dang rin chen ston pa po// bcom ldan rgyal po'i rgyal la phyag 'tshal lo// spyan snga dri bral nyon mongs mi mnga' ba// sa yi dbang po
322b3(mdo sde): pha rol dgra bcom pa/ / pad+ma lta bur srid gsum mi gos pa// bde gshegs mchog brnyes khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// 'gro ba'i nang na mig dang 'drar sprod cing // nyi zla 'di yi 'o da ni spa
322b4(mdo sde): bkong ba/ / 'khor los sgyur ba'i rigs su rgyal por skyes// 'khor lo'i mtshan mnga' khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// ming dang gzugs la nam yang mi tshogs shing // mgon dang dpung
322b5(mdo sde): dang skyabasu mnga' brnyes gyur/ / khyod dang mtshungs med lhag pa ga la zhig/ mtha' yal dbyangs mngar khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// brnyes dang brnyes la nam yang chags mi mngar/
322b6(mdo sde): 'jig rten chos rnams zil gyis mnan te bzhugs// chags sred 'khri shing dra ba 'grol mdzad pa// bcom ldan 'jig rten mgon la phyag 'tshal lo// dul ba thugs ni rtag tu
322b7(mdo sde): mnyam par gzhag/ nyon mongs bsregs te stobs bcus rab zhugs shing // 'gro la zang zing mi mnga' sbyin stsol ba// sbron pa'i gnas la mgo bos phyag 'tshal lo// smra mchog
323a1(mdo sde): dam pa mtshan gyi 'od 'phros pa/ / lam log phyin ci log ni rnam par spangs// 'jam zhing snum la sbyin pa'i gsung gsungs pa// srid pa gsum las 'phags
323a2(mdo sde): la phyag 'tshal lo/ / mi mchog gdung bas gdungs pa ma mnga' ba// rdzu 'phrul gyis ni bye ba'i zhing du gshegs// 'gro ba rab tu sgrol ba'i gru mdzad pa// bcom ldan bran 'dra khyod
323a3(mdo sde): la phyag 'tshal lo/ / bcom ldan brtson 'grus dag pa ston mdzad pa// chags shing zhen pa'i 'gro dang mngon shes drug/ ldan zhing mkhas pa'i nyan thos rnams kyang 'grel// 'gro
323a4(mdo sde): drug nye gshegs khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ / gser gyi kha dog 'dra la phyag 'tshal lo// zhi gnas dbang po dul la phyag 'tshal lo// ston gyi zla 'dra'i zhal la phyag 'tshal lo// mi
323a5(mdo sde): mchog yon tan mnga' la phyag 'tshal lo/ / nyon mongs bsregs shing bsnyengs pa mi mnga' ba// skye dgu 'di dag bsgral dka' chu bzhi sgrol// bsdams shing dbang po dul ba'i
323a6(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das/ / khyod la skyabs su mchi bar mchod kyis 'tshal// thub pas sbyin pa bsam gyis mi khyab stsal// bslangs nas dbang po gyes par rab 'gyur ba// pha rol dag
323a7(mdo sde): la sbyin pa mchog stsol ba/ / gtong ba bcom ldan khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// sems can nga rgyal rgyags khengs gti mug pa// rgyu dang rkyen dang bya ba 'ga' bgyid rnams// 'phags pa bla na
323b1(mdo sde): med pa'i lam mchog la/ / rnam par 'dren pa chen po khyod kyis bkod// phung po rang bzhin gyis ni stong mkhyen nas// las dang nyon mongs zil gyis mnan te bzhugs// 'dren pa 'gro ba rnams kyi som
323b2(mdo sde): gcod/ / bcom ldan dus gsung khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// bden pa'i chos la brtson zhing mnyam par gzhag/ chos rnams kun la mnga' dbang pha rol phyin// bla na med pa kha lo sgyur ba mchog/ bcom
323b3(mdo sde): ldan ded dpon khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ / bcos pa mi mnga' g.yo sgyu rnams dang bral// bdud kyi sde rnams 'joms pa'i stobs po che// mi mchog lam dang lam ma lags la mkhas// rlung mar lta bur/
323b4(mdo sde): ci la'ang chags mi mnga'// gzir bar gyur bsal pha rol shin tu gnas// thub pa bas pa ma 'tshal bang mdzod mnga'// spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe na gang+gA yi// bye ma snyed kyi mi mchog rnams la mchod//
323b5(mdo sde): mthu brnyes mi g.yo bsam gyis mi khyab pa// chags pa'i skyon mi mnga' zhing thang la bzhugs// gnas na bzhugs pa'i rgyal ba rnams kyis sten// de slad mi rnams mchog la phyag 'tshal lo// skye dang
323b6(mdo sde): na dang rga shi rnam par spangs/ / tshe rabs bye ba bsam gyis mi khyab dgongs// bcom ldan 'das kyi mkhyen pa'i gdugs 'od kyis// 'jigs pa chen po'i dra ba rab tu 'bral// 'dren pa rmi 'drar
323b7(mdo sde): chos rnams thugs su chud/ / phyag dang zhabs la bkra shis mtshan mnga' zhing // bkra shis pa las 'jam pa'i ran slong ba// bcom ldan bkra shis mdzad la phyag 'tshal lo// gzungs
324a1(mdo sde): rnams la ni dbang gi pha rol phyin/ / zang zing mi mnga' chos kyi smon pa stsol// thub pa chos kyi rnga ni rab rdung ba// chos rje bcom ldan khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// shAkya
324a2(mdo sde): rigs rus rgyal po las byung ba/ / dbang po zhi zhing thugs kyang rab tu zhi// ston pa srid gsum 'jig rten rnams gzigs pa// bde gshegs zhi thugs khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// bdud
324a3(mdo sde): rnams dpung dang bcas pas rno ba yi/ / ral gri thogs nas byang chub drung lcags kyang // khyod kyi baspu tsam yang ma g.yos te// bcom ldan lhun po 'dral phyag 'tshal lo// mi yi dam pa
324a4(mdo sde): bzod pa'i pha rol phyin/ / sku rnams kun la nongs par bgyis kyang bzod// yang 'byung ba dang skye dang 'tsho bas pa// bzod gsungs bcom ldan khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// mthu brnyes bde
324a5(mdo sde): bar gshegs pa mi g.yo ba/ / gnas dang gnas min mkhas pa bsnyengs mi mnga'// khyod kyis sems can mang po byang chub bkod// chos gnas rgyal ba khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// 'dus bgyis
324a6(mdo sde): nyam chung snying po med par mkhyen/ / skye ba'i tshogs ni nyung ba ma lags sel// khyod kyi mkhyen pa srid gsum khyad par 'phags// ye shes pha rol phyin la phyag 'tshal lo// sems can long ba
324a7(mdo sde): sdug bsngal mgon med pa/ / de dag khyod kyi dkon mchog gsum tshim bgyis// khyod ni bdud dpung bcas pa skrag mdzad pa// bcom ldan mgon gyur khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// stobs dang
324b1(mdo sde): thasam satan dang ni dang pa bsgoms/ / khyod kyas dngas su 'ang bcas pa bcos// med pa rnams kyi nga na ma chos myur ba// drung byu ba pa sa pa la byug tshal la/ 8
324b2(mdo sde): pa'i rtsa ba rgya chen chos gsan pa/ / mtshungs med byang chub la ni chags mi mngar// grib ma lta bur mkhyen nas bde gsungs pa// bcom ldan gdugs 'dra khyod la phyag 'tshal lo//
324b3(mdo sde): 'dren pa rmi 'dra chos rnams thugs su chud// 'phags pa'i 'khor lo rmi 'dra rab tu bskor// 'dus bgyis yang dag tu ni rmi lam 'drar// mkhyen nas sems can mang po dran par
324b4(mdo sde): mdzad/ / khyod kyi ljags mchog dag pa dri mi mnga'// ljags kyis rang gi zhal gyi dkyil 'khor khebs// ljags ni pad+ma 'dab ma brgya lta bu// ljags skyon mi mnga' khyod la phyag
324b5(mdo sde): 'tshal lo/ / srid gsum kun la chags pa mi mnga' ba// 'gro ba rnams la 'dun pa'i mi skyon gsung // 'dun pa'i 'dod chags bral ba ma smad pa// byang chub mchog la srog
324b6(mdo sde): chags 'dun par mdzad/ / nyon mongs dgra dang sdig pa'i dgra spangs pa// ser sna'i 'dod chags bral zhing chags mi mnga'// mi yi dam pa gser ltar dpal sdug pa// khyod
324b7(mdo sde): kyi mtshan dang grangs pa chub par grags/ / gnas dang dbang po rnam par 'byed la mkhas// 'di na bzhugs shing 'gro ba'i mig tu gyur// gnas dang yig 'bru tshig gi
325a1(mdo sde): don bslabs pas/ / khyod kyis chu bo bzhi la zam pa btags// glang po rin tang ma mchis sbyin pa mdzad// 'dren pa mi dang lha rnams sgrol ba po// khyod
325a2(mdo sde): kyi yon tan mtha' ma mi rnyed de/ / mgon po khyod la bdag ni thal mo sbyor// mi yi mchog la rdul ni sbyin byin pas// mi mjed 'dzam bu'i rgyal por gyur lags na// 'dir ni dbang po
325a3(mdo sde): dang bas thal sbyar nas/ / skyabs su nye bar mchi ba spos ci 'tshal// phung po gsog ste nyam chung snying po med// stong pa sgyu mchu zla 'dra bar ni// go'u ta ma khyod kyis de dag yang dag mkhyen//
325a4(mdo sde): phung po khams mkhas khyod lo phyag 'tshal lo// srid pa'i srad bus dam du mdung bor te// sred pa'i 'gro ba dra bar rab grags pa// srid pa'i 'gro ba rnams kyi dra ba de// bde gshegs khyod
325a5(mdo sde): kyis mkhyen pa'i 'od kyis dral/ / tshangs pa'i sgra skad lta bu'i gsung rjod pa// sho bo ma lags mi 'gyur 'drid ma lags// dran tshogs gsung ba de dag thos nas ni// thal mo sbyar te/
325a6(mdo sde): skyabs su nye bar mchi// yug gi mthil gyis se 'dir rig pa na// nags tshul bcas par rnam pa drug ga yos kyang // 'dir ni zhabs la gnod par 'gyur ma mchis// bdud phyog
325a7(mdo sde): dgra bcom khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ / lha yi rgyal po che dang mkhas pa gang // khyod kyi chos don gnyer zhing mchis pa rnams// de dag so sor chos bstan thos nas su// zhabs gnyis
325b1(mdo sde): la ni rab tu gtug par bgyid/ / de nas mi 'am ci'i rgyal po'i slas rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon par bstod nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces
325b2(mdo sde): gsol to/ / bcom ldan 'das bdag cag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la yang dag par zhugs nas/ bud med kyi dngos pos bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyang mngon
325b3(mdo sde): par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar mi nus na/ ji ltar bdag cag bud med kyi dngos po las gyur te/ skyes pa'i dngos po 'thob pa dang / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyang mngon par
325b4(mdo sde): rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos de bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag cag la legs par bshad du gsol/ / de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis/ mi 'am ci'i
325b5(mdo sde): rgyal po ljon pa'i slas de dag la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ / sring mo dag de'i phyir legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zung zhig dang / ji ltar bud med kyi dngos po las gyur te/ skyes pa'i
325b6(mdo sde): dngos po 'thob cing myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyang mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba ngas khyed la bshad par bya'o/ / mi 'am ci'i rgyal po'i
325b7(mdo sde): slas rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das legs so zhes gsol te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar nyan pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis/ de dag la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// sring mo
326a1(mdo sde): ngag chos gcig dang ldan na/ bud med bud med kyi dngos po las gyur te/ skyes pa'i dngos po 'thob cing myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyang mngon
326a2(mdo sde): par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur te/ chos gcig pu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ lhag pa'i bsam pas byang chub tu sems skyed pa dang / thams cad mkhyen pa'i sems skyed pa dang /
326a3(mdo sde): mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i sems skyed pa dang / 'jig rten gsum las khyad par du 'phags pa'i sems skyed pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad la brjed pa med pa'i sems
326a4(mdo sde): skyed pa ste/ sring mo dag chos gcig pu 'di dag dang ldan na/ bud med bud mod kyi dngos po las gyur te/ skyes pa'i dngos po 'thob cing myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang
326a5(mdo sde): chub kyang mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro/ / sring mo dag gzhan yang chos gnyis dang ldan na/ bud med bud med kyi dngos po las gyur te/ skyes pa'i dngos po 'thob cing myur
326a6(mdo sde): du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyang mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur te/ gnyis gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ phrag dog med pa dang / ser sna med pa ste/ sring
326a7(mdo sde): mo dag chos 'di gnyis dang ldan na/ bud med bud med kyi dngos po las gyur te/ skyes pa'i dngos po 'thob cing / myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyang mngon
326b1(mdo sde): par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro/ / sring mo dag gzhan yang chos gsum dang ldan na/ bud med bud med kyi dngos po las gyur te/ skyes pa'i dngos po 'thob cing / sbyar du bla
326b2(mdo sde): na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyang mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur te/ gsum gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ lus kyi sdom pa gsum yongs su dag pa dang
326b3(mdo sde): ngag gi sdom pa bzhi yongs su dag pa dang / yid kyi sdom pa gsum yongs su dag pa te/ sring mo dag chos gsum po 'di dag dang ldan na/ bud med bud med kyi dngos po las gyur te/
326b4(mdo sde): skyes pa'i dngos po 'thob cing / myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyang mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro// sring mo dag gzhan yang chos bzhi dang

326b6(mdo sde): rgya bar 'gyur te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ g.yo med par sbyin pa sbyin pa dang / g.yo med par bslab pa'i gnas 'dzin pa dang / g.yo med par tshul khrims sten pa dang /
326b7(mdo sde): g.yo med par chos nyan pa ste/ sring mo dag chos bzhi po 'di dag dang ldan na/ bud med bud med kyi dngos po las gyur te/ skyes pa'i dngos po 'thob cing / myur du bla na med
327a1(mdo sde): ba yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyang mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro/ / sring mo dag gzhan yang chos lnga dang ldan na/ bud med bud med kyi dngos

327b1(mdo sde): cing myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyang mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro/ / sring mo dag gzhan yang chos bdun dang ldan na/ bud med bud med kyi dngos po

327b4(mdo sde): dge 'dun rjes su dran pa dang / smon lam yongs su dag par bya ba'i phyir tshul khrims rjes su dran pa dang / nyon mongs pa thams cad yongs su dor ba'i phyir/ gtong ba rjes su dran pa dang

327b6(mdo sde): bud med bud med kyi dngos po las gyur te/ skyes pa'i dngos po 'thob cing / myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyang mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro//

328a1(mdo sde): par rdzogs par 'chang rgya bar 'gyur te/ brgyad gang zhen/ 'di lta ste/ zas la med pa ma yin pa dang / skom la sred pa ma yin pa dang / me tog dang / spos
328a2(mdo sde): dang / 'phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / phye ma la sred pa ma yin pa dang / skyed mos tshal du 'gro ba la sred pa ma yin pa dang / dgod pa dang 'jo ba la sred pa ma yin pa dang / glu dang
328a3(mdo sde): gar dang / rol mo'i dbyangs sgra la sred pa ma yin pa dang / dga' ba dang rtse ba la sred pa ma yin pa dang / rna ba dang / sna dang / dri dang / lce dang / dga' ba la sred pa ma yin pa ste/

328a6(mdo sde): named pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyang mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur te/ dgu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ chad par lto ba ma yin pa dang / rtag par lta ba ma yin/
328a7(mdo sde): ba dang / bdag tu smra ba ma yin pa dang / sems can du smra ba ma yin pa dang / srog tu smra ba ma yin pa dang / gang zag tu smra ba ma yin pa dang / 'byung bar lta ba ma yin pa dang / 'jig
328b1(mdo sde): par lta ba ma yin pa dang / rgyu dang rkyen la 'jug pa la mkhas pa yin pa ste/ sring mo dag chos dgu po 'di dag dang ldan na/ bud med bud med kyi dngos po las gyur te/ skyes pa'i dngos pa

328b3(mdo sde): po las gyur te/ skyes pa'i dngos po 'thob cing / myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyang mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur te/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/
328b4(mdo sde): sems can thams cad la byams par gnas pa dang / gzhan gyi longs spyod la brnab sems mi skyed pa dang / skyes pa'i sems su yid la byed pa skyed pa dang / srog gi phyir yang brdzun
328b5(mdo sde): gyi tshig mi smra ba dang / phra ma'i tshig mi smra ba dang / zhe gcod pa'i tshig mi smra ba dang / tshig 'khyal pa mi smra ba dang / pha rol po dga' zhing rtse ba la phrag dog med cing gnod sems kyi bag la
328b6(mdo sde): la mngon par mi sgrub pa dang / yang dag par lta ba dang ldan par gyur pa dang / rnam par smin pa la re ba med pa ste/ sring mo dag chos bcu po 'di dag dang ldan na/ bud med bud med kyi
328b7(mdo sde): dngos po las gyur te/ skyes pa'i dngos po 'thob cing // myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyang mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro// sra
329a1(mdo sde): mo dag gzhan yang bud med zab mo la mos pa yin te/ de gzugs la dbu ba rdos pa lta bur so sor rtog kyang gzugs kyis rgyags shing myos par mi 'gyur ba dang
329a2(mdo sde): tshor ba la chu'i chu bur lta bur so sor rtog kyang bde ba'i tshor ba la rjes su chags pa med pa dang / sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba la khong khro bar mi 'gyur ba dang / bde ba'ang ma yin/ sdug bsngal ba'ang
329a3(mdo sde): ma yin pa'i tshor bas kun tu gti mug par mi 'gyur ba dang / 'du shes la mig rgyu ba lta bur so sor rtog ste bud med kyi 'du shes mi skyed/ skyes pa'i 'du shes mi skyed pa dang / 'du byed
329a4(mdo sde): rnams la chu shing gi phung po lta bur so sor rtog pa ste/ 'du byed thams cad la snying po med par rtogs nas/ 'du byed thams cad la mi gnas shing de la chags pa mi skyed pa dang / rnam par
329a5(mdo sde): shes pa la sgyu ma lta bur so sor rtog ste/ sems dang / yod dang / rnam par rig pa de sgyu ma byas pa bzhin du rtog pa nas/ chos thams cad la chags pa med/ zhe sdang med/ gti mug
329a6(mdo sde): med pa dang / lus la 'byung ba chen po bzhi dang ldan par so sor rtog ste/ 'di lta ste/ so'i khams dang ldan pa dang / chu'i khams dang ldan pa dang / me'i khams dang ldan pa dang / rlung gi
329a7(mdo sde): khams dang ldan par lus la so sor rtog go/ / lus 'di na bsdus pa rtswa dang / shing dang / bong ba dang / rtsig pa dang / mig yor lta bu ste/ 'di bdag ma yin/ sems can ma yin/ sros
329b1(mdo sde): ma yin/ skyes bu ma yin/ gang zag ma yin gyi/ phyin ci log sngon du song bas rgyu dang / bya ba dang / las kyis byung ba'o// gzhan yang bud med mig la kha zas las skyes pa'i sha
329b2(mdo sde): gong bu ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa rang bzhin gyis dben par yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du so sor rtog pa dang / de bzhin du rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid la ngo bo nyid kyis stong par
329b3(mdo sde): rang bzhin gyis dben par yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du so sor rtog pa'o/ / gzhan yang bud med lus la gzugs brnyan lta bur 'jug pa dang / ngag la brag cha lta bur 'jug pa dang / sems la
329b4(mdo sde): sgyu ma lta bur 'jug pa'o/ / sring mo dag chos 'di dag dang ldan na/ bud med bud med kyi dngos po las gyur te/ skyes pa'i dngos po 'thob cing / myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
329b5(mdo sde): po'i byang chub kyang mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro/ / de nas mi 'am ci'i rgyal po ljon pa'i slas de dag thams cad kyis/ bcom ldan 'das las bud med kyi dngos po
329b6(mdo sde): las bsgyur ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos nas tshim zhing mgu ste/ yi rangs shing rab tu dgar nas dga' ba dang yid bde ba skyes te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal nas
329b7(mdo sde): tshul dang 'dra ba'i tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod do/ / dri med dri bral dri ma gcod mdzad pa// rdul med rdul bral lhag pa'i gzi brjid mnga'/
330a1(mdo sde): pad+ma'i 'dab 'dra'i spyan dang mdzes pa'i thugs// dri med bla gal khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// dga' mdzad gi mdzad nyon mongs gcod mdzad pa// dga' ba ston pa rtag tu dgon/
330a2(mdo sde): par dgyes// rin chen 'byung gnas rin chen mdzod mnga' ba// yon tan mchog mnga' khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// pha rol gshegs pa gzhan gyi tshogs rnams 'joms// pad+ma lta bur stong mchog
330a3(mdo sde): bka' mchid gsung / / lam mchog sogs shing dam pa'i don ston pa// mchog tu dga' mdzad khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// chu bo bzhi brgal bden bzhi bka' mchid gsung // sa la rgyu ba 'di
330a4(mdo sde): mig stsol mdzad pa/ / 'khor lo mchog gi mtshan ni stong mnga' ba// rdul med phan mdzad khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// nyon mongs rdul bsal dam pa mthu bo che// mgon po 'gro la mchog gi
330a5(mdo sde): don mdzad pa/ / bdud kyi dpung rnams stobs med 'jig mdzad pa// bcom ldan stobs bcu khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// sred pa'i 'khri shing gcod mdzad mnyam pa med// brnyes
330a6(mdo sde): ba dag dang ma brnyes mtshungs pa'i thugs/ / 'jig rten mthar 'byin sna ba'i sgron mdzad pa// rgya mtsho lta bu khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// dul zhing stobs bcu chen po dam pa mnga'//
330a7(mdo sde): sbyin pa stsol cing rtag tu gtong la dgyes// dul bzhi gnas yon tan pha rol phyin// nyon mongs rdul bsal khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// mtshan mchog 'gro ba kun la dam pa stsol/
330b1(mdo sde): skye bo'i 'dren pa sku yi mchog pas mcho// sems dang stobs dang bzod la nges par rjes// mdzang 'os pader gshegs khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// mur me lta budri med zla ba 'dra/
330b2(mdo sde): phyi nang nyon mongs dri ma gcod mdzad pa// nyon mongs spangs pa yon tan bsod nam sa gter// zhi ba thugs zhi khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// dad pa stsol ba dge sbyong zhi mdzad pa// ston pa skye
330b3(mdo sde): mched drug las thar mdzad pa/ / rjes su dran drug shin tu yongs dag dran// rgyal ba dge sbyong rgyal la phyag 'tshal lo// 'dom gang 'od ni gser gyi kha dog lta// gsung snyan dam pa rnam par
330b4(mdo sde): dag pa'i dbyangs/ / bcom ldan gang zag dam pa skyes bu mchog/ srid gsum zhi mdzad khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// shes rab mun pa ma mchis pha rol gshegs// rtag tu dka' thub brtul zhugs rab tu spyad
330b5(mdo sde): de bzhin kho na gzhan min de bzhin gsung / / mun por sgron ma 'dzin la phyag 'tshal lo// bder gshegs grags ldan yon tan bas ma 'tshal// de dag nyid kyi chos kyi gnas ston pa// yon tan brjod
330b6(mdo sde): pa mthong zhing grags bsgrags pa/ / mchog tu dga' mdzad khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// bsngags la gnas shong brtul zhugs dka' thub 'phags// khengs dang nga rgyal rgyags pa gcod
330b7(mdo sde): mdzad pa/ / ye shes 'byung gnas rdul bral blo gros mchog/ skye bo mthar phyin khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// ka la bing ka tshangs dbyangs thugs rje can// 'dod pa rtsod bgyid dri ma
331a1(mdo sde): sel mdzad pa/ / phung po yongs mkhyen mkhas pa bde bar gshegs// yon tan tshogs mchog mnga' la phyag 'tshal lo// yon tan ston pa yon tan bstod
331a2(mdo sde): mchod pa/ / zab mo blta dka' shin tu rtogs par dka'// 'dzum zhal zla 'dra gsong por gsung mdzad pa// bdud stobs 'joms mdzad khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// mnyam thugs
331a3(mdo sde): kha lo sgyur ba rab dul thugs/ / kun gyis mngon bstod mnyam pa'i lam la gnas// thub pa mchog gsung dben pa'i bka' ma chid can// bde gshegs mnyam thugs khyod la byab 'tshal lo//
331a4(mdo sde): lam sol snyan pa shin tu 'jam pa'i dbyangs// bdud kyi sde mang 'jom mdzad nga rgyal dang // lhag pa'i nga rgyal med ma tshul mi 'chos// thub pa dge sbyong rgyal la phyag 'tshal lo//
331a5(mdo sde): stobs dang mthu dang brtson 'grus bsam gtan dgyes// rtag tu 'dod chags skyon dang rab rib bral// bde bar gshegs pa mi g.yo gnas la bzhugs// stobs bcu mchog mnga' khyod la
331a6(mdo sde): phyag 'tshal lo/ / phyag dang zhabs ni dri med dra bas 'brel// skye dang rga dang 'chi ba mi mnga' ba// rgyal bar 'os pa 'gro ba kun las rgyal// nam mkha' mnyam thugs khyed la 'tshal lo//
331a7(mdo sde): de nas mi 'am ci'i rgyal po ljon pa'i slas mi 'am ci'i mo brgyad khri bzhi stong po de dag gis bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la gtugs pa dang // bcom ldan 'das kyis de dag gi lhag pa'i
331b1(mdo sde): bsam pa mkhyen nas/ de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dzum pa mdzad do// 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams gang gi tshe 'dzum pa mdzad pa'i chos nyid de/ de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal
331b2(mdo sde): gyi sgo nas 'od zer kha dog du ma kha dog sna tshogs pa byung ste/ 'di lta ste/ sngon po dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang / dkar po dang / le brgan dang / shel dang / dngul gyi kha dog lta bu'o//
331b3(mdo sde): de dag gis 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas mu med par 'od kyis khyab par gyur te tshangs pa'i 'jig rten gyi bar du mngon par 'phags nas/ nyi ma dang zla ba'i 'od zil du brlag par byas te/ slar log
331b4(mdo sde): nas bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu'i gtsug tu nub bo// de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo stan las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig
331b5(mdo sde): tu gzar nas/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ zhe sa dang bcas shing gus pa dang bcas par/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/ tshigs su bcad pa mngon
331b6(mdo sde): par bsgrub pa 'dis bcom ldan 'das la 'dzum pa mdzad pa'i don zhus pa/ bde bar gshegs pa ci slad 'dzum ston pa// zla ba dri ma med zhal khyod la zhu// dri med gzi brjid mnga' ba khyod
331b7(mdo sde): la zhu/ gser gyi kha dog lta bu khyod la zhu// bde bar gshegs pa ci slad 'dzum ston pa// dam pa'i gzugs rnams mnga' ba khyod la zhu// 'gro ba rnams kyi don mdzad khyod la zhu// lha
332a1(mdo sde): / mi rnams kyis mchod pa khyod laT// bde bar gshegs pa ci smad 'dzum ston pa// sbyin dang dul la brtson pa khyod lazhu// tshul khrims yongs su dag gyur khrod la/
332a2(mdo sde): zhu/ bzod pa'i stobs dang stobs stsol khyod la zhu// bde bar gshegs pa ci slad 'dzum ston pa// brtson 'grus stobs dang mthu mnga' khyod la zhu// bsam gtan mngon shes dgyes
332a3(mdo sde): pa khyod la zhu/ / shes rab nam mkha' mnyam pa khyod la zhu// bde bar gshegs pa ci slad 'dzum ston pa// rtag tu byams pa'i thugs can khyod la zhu// rtag tu thugs rje ldan pa
332a4(mdo sde): khyod la zhu/ / dga' dang btang snyoms dgyes pa khyod la zhu// bde bar gshegs pa co slad 'dzum ston pa// srid pa gsum po mthar 'byin khyod la zhu// spun gsum dri ma mi mnga'
332a5(mdo sde): khyod la zhu/ / bdud rtsi chos rnams gsung ba khyod la zhu// bde bar gshegs pa ci slad 'dzum ston pa// bdud rnams tha mar 'byin pa khyod la zhu// ngan pa'i tshogs rnams 'jom
332a6(mdo sde): pa khyod la zhu/ / bden pa dam pa gzigs pa khyod la zhu// bde bar gshegs pa ci slad 'dzum ston pa// stobs bcu dam pa mnga' ba khyod la zhu// the tshom dag ni gcod mdzad khyod la
332a7(mdo sde): zhu/ yon tan stong gis rgyas pa khyod la zhu// de skad zhes gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// kun dga' bo khyod/
332b1(mdo sde): kyis mi 'am ci'i rgyal po ljon pa'i slas rnams nga lA dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed de/ lhag pa'i bsam pas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed nas bud med kyi dngos
332b2(mdo sde): po las bsgyur zhing / skyes pa'i dngos po thob par bya ba'i phyir/ nga'i rkang pa gnyis la gtugs pa mthong ngam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mthong lags so// bcom

332b4(mdo sde): gyur te/ skyes pa'i lus thob nas/ dga' ldan gyi lha rnams dang skal ba mnyam par skye bar 'gyur ro// der skyes nas kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa dang lhan cig tu

332b6(mdo sde): ba byed par 'gyur ro/ / bskal pa bzang po'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la'ang rim gyis mnyes par byed par 'gyur/ de dag gi dam pa'i chos kun 'gro ba byed par 'gyur/ 'dzin par
332b7(mdo sde): 'gyur ro/ / de dag rim gyis byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos yang dag par bsgrub par bya ba thams cad kun tu rdzogs par byas nas/ gang gi tshe mi 'am ci'i rgyal po ljon pa bla na med pa yang dag par

333a2(mdo sde): byang chub tu lung ston par yang 'gyur ro/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ mi 'am ci'i rgyal po ljon pas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pas bdag cag la

333a4(mdo sde): bdag cag la chos kyi gter bstan to// bdag cag ye shes kyi sa la bkod do// dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad 'bar bar mdzad do// pha rol tu phyin pa'i phyogs bstan to// thabs la mkhas

333a7(mdo sde): gzo ba lags kyi/ byas pa mi gzo ba ma lags kyang / bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gis sha dang khrag gis kyang de bzhin gshegs pa la lan mi lon na/ gzhan gyis lan ldon par ma
333b1(mdo sde): 'gyur ba lta smos kyang ci 'tshal/ de nas 'khor de'i nang nas byang chub sems dpa' kha cig 'di snyam du sems te/ ma la mi'amatha' rgyal po ljon pa 'di ji srid cig na bla na med pa

335b5(mdo sde): rgyas kyi zhing de na bdud dam/ bdud kyi ris kyi lha 'am// gzhan mu stegs can spyod pa dang / kun tu rgyu dang / dmigs pa'i lta ba la mngon par zhen pa dang / phas kyi rgol ba med par
335b6(mdo sde): 'gyur ro/ / sems can de dag thams cad ni zab mo'i spyod yul stong pa nyid kyi phyag rgyas btang bar 'gyur ro// 'jig rten gyi khams de na ming du btags pa tsam dang / 'du shes
335b7(mdo sde): tsam ma gtogs par lha dang mi zhes tha dad du bya ba med par 'gyur ro/ / sems can de dag thams cad ni yongs su spyod pa mtshungs par 'gyur ro// kun dga' bo bcom ldan 'das de
336a1(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas yon tan gyi rgyal por snang ba de'ang lha dang mi rnams kyi skye bo mang po la phan pa dang / skye bo
336a2(mdo sde): mang po la bde ba'i phyir/ bar gyi bskal pa bcu tham pa tshang bar bzhugs par 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan gyi rgyal por snang ba de gang gi tshe yongs su mya ngan
336a3(mdo sde): las 'da' bar bzhed pa de'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus 'bar ba 'di de'i 'og tu bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs
336a4(mdo sde): par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bkod pa chen po zhes bya ba rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs
336a5(mdo sde): pa 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/ bla na med pa/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das su 'gyur ro// zhes byang chub sems
336a6(mdo sde): dpa' brtson 'grus 'bar bzhes bya ba lung bstan nas mya ngan las 'das par 'gyur ro/ / kun dga' bo bar gyi bskal pa der yang sangs rgyas dkon mchog dang / chos dkon mchog dang /
336a7(mdo sde): dge 'dun dkon mchog dang mi 'bral bar 'gyur te/ bar gyi bskal pa de ni dkon mchog 'byung ba zhes brjod do// de nas mi 'am ci'i rgyal po ljon pas bcom ldan 'das las lung bstan
336b1(mdo sde): ba thos nas/ dga' zhing mgu ste yi rangs shing rab tu dga' nas/ dga' ba dang yid bde ba skyes te/ byang chub sems dpa' dag ra mchog tu dga' ba'i shugs kyis
336b2(mdo sde): sa las steng gi bar snang la shing ta la bdun tsam du 'phags te/ thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor dad pa rgya cher spel ba dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba yang dag par bskyed pa'i phyir/ sangs
336b3(mdo sde): rgyas kyi mthu dang / rang gi shes rab kyi spobs pas/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// chos 'di thams cad rab tu dben pa dang // dri ma med de nam mkha'o ngo/
336b4(mdo sde): bo nyid// rgyud kyi dam pa 'di ni rnam shes na// de phyir de dag thub sras thu bor 'gyur// rmi lam bzhin du mthong ba cung zad med// thams cad med de gzung med gso ba dang
336b5(mdo sde): gsog/ chos rnams thams cad rmi lam 'drar shes nas// 'dus byas dag la nam yang skyo ba med// la la sgyu ma'i rta dang glang chen dang // shing rta dpung bu chung dang bzhon
336b6(mdo sde): mthong ba/ / dam pa'i don du snying po med pa ltar// phung po 'di dag sgyu 'dra snying po med// gzugs kyi rang bzhin dbu ba rdos pa bzhin// tshor ba 'di ni chu yi chu bur 'dra//
336b7(mdo sde): 'du shes dag ni smig rgyu 'dra bar gsungs// 'dus byas thams cad chu shing snying po med// srid gsum 'di ni sems yid rnam par shes// rgyal bas de bzhin rgyu 'drag so
337a1(mdo sde): / // slong na/ das sa sno skye/ khams ngan pa du ma rgyas dru /
337a2(mdo sde): mched rnams ni grong stong lta bu dang // chos 'di gsog dang gsob ltar rnam shes pa// de dag rgyal ba'i chos mdzod 'dzin pa yin// rab tu dul phyir sbyin dang dul ba dang //
337a3(mdo sde): bzhin tshul khrims rnam dag tshul khrims dang // rtag tu 'phags pa'i tshul gyis bzod mi zad// stong pa nyid phyir brtson 'grus rnam par dag/ bsam gtan rang bzhin 'gyur ba med
337a4(mdo sde): pa dang / / de ltar shes rab chags med ma smos pa// gang gi 'jug pa de 'drar gyur pa de// pha rol phyin po'i pha rol rab tu phyin// bdag med khon nyid phyir byams pas tsam//
337a5(mdo sde): nam mapa' lta bur gong du snying rje dag/ ni phyir dga' dang btung snyoms bcas pa yi// lam 'di tshangs pa'i lam ste rtag tu ni// brngub bzhi po khyad par 'phags pa 'di// rnam
337a6(mdo sde): par 'dren pas rjes su gzung phyir gsungs/ / 'dzin pa med cing rnam rtog gang med pa// de ni bsdu ba'i dngos po'i pha rol phyin// sems can 'di dag bdag med sems can med
337a7(mdo sde): srog dang gso ba gang zag mi rnyed do/ / dbang po drug 'di stong ste rab zhi bar// gang shes de ni byang chub sems dpa' yin// sems can med cing byang chub sems dpa' med// de ni gang
337b1(mdo sde): du'ang bdag med rlom sems med/ / gnyis dang bral zhing sa chags spros med pa// sems can byang chub sems dpa' de dpal ldan// chos 'di snying po med de sgyu sa 'dra// gang
337b2(mdo sde): du'ang mi bong nam yang 'gro mi 'gyur/ / chos dbyings 'di yi gnas par rig nas ni// rgyal bas de bzhin nyid ni mnyam sangs rgyas// gang na'ang yod pa'am med pa med mod kyi// rgyu la
337b3(mdo sde): brten nas chos rnams 'byung bas na/ / mkha' la glog mthong 'jig pa lta bur ni// sems kyi 'khri shing de lta shes par bya// rlung ni nam mkha' mi chags rgyu ba bzhin// gzugs med
337b4(mdo sde): sems ni 'dus byas dag la rgyu/ / sems kyi rang bzhin rnam dag de shes nas// nyon mongs gzugs med sogs par mi 'gyur ro// lus ni rtsig pa rtswa dang lo ma 'dra// bem po rje med
337b5(mdo sde): rdo shing ngan pa ltar/ / de yis snga ma'i rang bzhin 'drar shes nas// lus kyi chos la gnas par mi byed do// tshig ni rtag tu gzung med rlung dang 'dra// ri dang phug gi brag cha lta bu ste/ de 'drar
337b6(mdo sde): sgra ni rab tu dben shes pa/ / sgra rnams kun la 'dun pa'i 'dod chags med// bdag ni nam mkha'i ngos nas mi ltung ste// mkha' las ltung ba'i gnas kyang yod ma yin// chos 'di nam mkha'
337b7(mdo sde): 'dra bar bsgoms nas ni/ / de ltar sems can sems can med mtshungs gnas// bskal pa brgya phrag mang po ba sregs kyang ni// ji ltar nam mkha' nam yang sngon ma chog/ chos rnams thams
338a1(mdo sde): / cad nam mkha' 'drar shes pa// de sreg bskal che zhing rnams brgyar yang 'gro// ri dang ri rab kho ra khor yug ri// de bzhin dang bcas pa'i sa rnams kun// nam
338a2(mdo sde): mkha'i ngos kyis phye bar rig nas de/ / rdzu 'phrul stobs kyis bye ba'i zhing du 'gro// sa dang chu dang me dang rlung dag dang // sa gzhi 'di dag nam mkha'i ngos mnyam par// dpa' bo tshul 'di
338a3(mdo sde): khong du chud pa dag/ mkha' las bye ba mtha' yas zhing du 'gro// srid pa gsum na sgra dang skad kyi bag/ bzang ngan de bzhin 'bring po ci yod pa// de yi mtha' ma bskal pa brgyar brjod kyang
338a4(mdo sde): sngon gyi rang bzhin mi snang rgyu ba med/ / rang byung ba ni mtshan mchog ma yin yang // sems kyi chos kyis gzugs kyis rab tu phye// sems dang yid ni mtshungs par dben par 'gyur//
338a5(mdo sde): rgyal ba thams cad chos mtshungs nyid phyir mnyam// sngon gyi sred par byang chub spyad spyod cing // dge ba brgya stong rab tu bsags nas ni// byang chub mnyam zhing mnyam par rab shes pa//
338a6(mdo sde): grags pa chen po rnams ni lung bstan 'gyur// chos rnams kun ni rang yul yongs dag ste// mtha' yas phyir ni rgyal ba'i yul du mnyam// mnyam nyid 'di dag gang gis rab shes
338a7(mdo sde): ba/ / yon tan ldan pa de dag lung bstan 'gyur// bdag ni gzugs mon tshor min 'du shes min// sems pa ma yin rnam par shes med kyang // byang chub khong du chud pa la bdag /
338b1(mdo sde): lung bstan// phung po khams kyis bdag ni lung ma bstan// bzod pa gang zhig gzod ma nas zhi yo// skad cig pa ni zad dang 'dra min la// mtshungs med mi skye ba la bzod pa na// mi dbang
338b2(mdo sde): 'gyur zhes rgyal bas lung bstan to/ / chos rnams kun dang bdag tu rang bzhin mnyam// bdag ni bdag med stong pa'i rang bzhin te// stong pa nam mkha' 'dra ba'i ngo bo nyid// byang chub rtag tu mkha'
338b3(mdo sde): mnyam rang bzhin no/ / zad par bya phyir zad par shes mi nus// mi zad pa ni zad pas zad mi 'gyur// zad pa'i sgo yi chos rnams kun ma skyes// bzod dang ldan la sangs rgyas lung ston to//
338b4(mdo sde): mtshan med gnas 'jug pa yi gnas med de// yang dag 'dus ma byas pa dus las grol// ma byas byed du ma cug byung ba min// de bzhin nyid 'drar rgyal bas bdag lung bstan// gal te
338b5(mdo sde): bdag ni lung bstan 'gyur snyam na/ / chos lam tshul la mi mnyam sbyor ma yin// sems dang yid kyis sbyor ba sbyor mo ya na// chos sbyor khyad par 'phags 'di mtshungs shing mnyam// khyed cag
338b6(mdo sde): thams cad sa yo steng na 'khod/ / bdag ni nam mkha'i dkyil na rnam par gnas// sa dang nam mkha' mnyam par shes nas ni// srod pa gsum na chags med ye shes 'jug/ de nas ma
338b7(mdo sde): 'am ci'i rgyal po ljon pas tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras nas/ steng gi bar snang las babs te/ thal mo sbyar nas bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces
339a1(mdo sde): gsol to/ / bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas ni bdag gi ched du byung ba lags so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das bdag sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa
339a2(mdo sde): don ma mchis par ma bgyis te/ sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams kyis bdag ma bslus pas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag gi bsam pa thams cad yongs su bskang ba'i slad du/ bla na med pa
339a3(mdo sde): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan to/ / de nas 'khor de'i nang nas byang chub sems dpa' ba thig 'di lta bu'i sems skyes te/ mi 'am ci'i rgyal po ljon pas de bzhin
339a4(mdo sde): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang las dang po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed snyam mo/ / de nas byang chub sems
339a5(mdo sde): dpa' lha'i cod pan gyis byang chub sems dpa' de dag gi sems kyi rnam par rtog pa sems kyis shes nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das mi 'am ci'i rgyal
339a6(mdo sde): po ljon pas de bzhin gshegs pa gang las byang chub tu sems bskyed pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa de'i mtshan ci lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu sngon byung ba 'das pa'i
339a7(mdo sde): dus bskal pa grangs med pa'i yang ches grangs med pa/ rgyas pa/ tshad med pa/ bsam gyis mi khyab par gyur pad+mo'i dus na/ rnam par dag pa zhes bya ba'i bskal pa bzang po la 'jig rten gyi
339b1(mdo sde): khams dge ba zhes bya bar de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu
339b2(mdo sde): 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/ bla na med pa/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rin chen phung po zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ngo // rigs kyi bu de'i tshe de'i dus na/ bcom
339b3(mdo sde): ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen phung po de'i byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun ni bye ba phrag drug cur gyur te/ thams cad kyang brtson
339b4(mdo sde): 'grus brtsams pa/ bzod pa thob pa bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog pa sha stag go/ de'i tshe'i tshad ni lo bye ba phrag drug cu thub par gyur to// 'jig rten
339b5(mdo sde): gyi khams dge ba zhes bya ba de'ang bai DUR+Ya las grub pa/ rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa rnam pa'i mchog thams cad dang ldan pa/ dga' ldan gyi lha'i ris lta bur khang khyim dang / longs
339b6(mdo sde): spyod dang / nye bar spyod pa dang / bza' ba dang / btung ba bsams pa tsam gyis 'byor pa'o// sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na theg pa chen po ma gtogs par theg pa gzhan rnam par gzhag pa
339b7(mdo sde): momed par gyur to/ / rigs kyi bu de'i tshe de'i dus na gling bzhi la dbang ba'i 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po sa 'dzin ces bya ba rin po che sna bdun dang ldan pa zhig byung ste/ de'i slas ni stong phrag
340a1(mdo sde): / bzhi bcu yod do// de'i bu ni stong tham pa yod do// de dag dpa' ba/ rtul phod pa/ yan lag mchog gi gzugs dang ldan pa/ pha rol gyi sde rab tu 'jom pa
340a2(mdo sde): stag go/ / rigs kyi bu rgyal po sa 'dzin des bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen phung po de dang / byang chub sems dpa' bye ba phrag drug cu le lo bye ba tham par yid du 'ong ba'i chos
340a3(mdo sde): gos dang / na bza' dang / mal cha dang / na ba'i gsos sman dang / yo byad rnams dang / bde bar sbar ba bde ba la reg par gnas par bya ba thams cad kyis bsnyen bkur byas nas/
340a4(mdo sde): des bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen phung po de la mchod pa dpag tu med pa byas te/ dge ba'i rtsa bas nye bar bstan nas/ bud med bzhi stong po de dag dang / bu stong po de dang
340a5(mdo sde): srog chags brgyad khri bzhi stong dang lhan cig tu bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed / / des byang chub tu sems bskyed nas kyang lo bye bar bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
340a6(mdo sde): gshegs pa rin chen phung po de la bsnyen bkur byas so/ / de nas dus gzhan zhig na bu thu bo brtul zhugs yongs su dag pa zhes bya ba rgyal por bathug nas/ rgyal srid thams cad bor te/ skra
340a7(mdo sde): dang kha spu bregs nas/ gos ngur smrig bgos te/ bcom ldan 'das de'i bstan pa la dad pas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung ngo // de nas rgyal po'i bu de dag gis kyang rim gyis bu
340b1(mdo sde): bo re re rgyal por bcug nas/ pha'i rjes su rab tu byung bar gyur to// rigs kyi bu de ltar na rnam grangs 'das de bzhin gshegs pa de'i tshe'i tshad ring bar gyur to// rgyal bu gzhon
340b2(mdo sde): nu de dag thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa de las rab tu byung nas/ rgyal bu gzhon nu tha chung snying rje'i blo zhes bya ba gcig pu ma gtogs te/ de ni chos kyis rgyal srid byed pa chad pa med pa dang
340b3(mdo sde): mtshon cha med par chos dang 'thun par dbang byed du bcug go/ / rigs kyi bu de ltar rgyal po sa 'dzin de bu dang bcas par bcom ldan 'das de'i bstan pa la rab tu byung nas thog ma dang /
340b4(mdo sde): par ma dang / tha mar de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen phung po de'i dam pa'i chos rab tu bzung ngo // rigs kyi bu de'i tshe de'i dus na gling bzhi la dbang ba'i 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po sa 'dzin
340b5(mdo sde): ces bya bar gyur pa de gzhan zhig yin pa snyam du khyod dogs shing the tsom za'am/ yid gnyis su gyur pa blta na/ rigs kyi bu khyod kyis de ltar mi blta'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ mi 'am
340b6(mdo sde): ci'i rgyal po ljon pa 'di de'i tshe de'i dus na rgyal po sa 'dzin ces bya bar gyur to/ / rgyal po de'i bur gyur pa de dag thams cad ni da ltar phyogs bcu na byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod do/
340b7(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu de ltar na mi 'am ci'i rgyal po ljon pas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen phung po de las bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do//
341a1(mdo sde): na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu dang po sems bskyed chung chad de'i bar thams cad du sangs rgyas mthong ba dang / chos ldan pa dang / dge 'dun la rim gro byed pa/
341a2(mdo sde): dang ma bral bar gyur te/ 'dis yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi tshogs kyang myur du yang dag par bsgrubs pas/ 'di la ngas 'di ni ma 'ongs pa'i dus na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang
341a3(mdo sde): dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas yon tan gyi rgyal po snang ba zhes bya bar 'gyur ro zhes lung yang bstan to/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
341a4(mdo sde): chen po lha'i cod pan gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/ / bcom ldan 'das ji tsam du de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas thogs pa mi mnga' ba'i mkhyen pa dang
341a5(mdo sde): ldan pas/ 'di ltar dge ba'i rtsa ba mngon par 'du bgyis pa'i rgyu bas na/ yun ring du lags pa'ang bcom ldan 'das kyis sgrib pa mi mnga' ba'i mkhyen pas gzigs pa ni ngo mtshar to//
341a6(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu de de bzhin no// ji skad smras pa de bzhin te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ni thogs
341a7(mdo sde): ba med pa'i ye shes mthong ba ldan pa'o/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu gang sems can thams cad kyi 'das pa'i sems kyi rgyud zad pa/ 'gags pa dang bral ba/ rnam par
341b1(mdo sde): gyur pa/ rgyu gang dag las sems kyi rgyud de dag byung ba dang / rgyu gang dag med pas zad pa dge ba 'am/ mi dge ba 'am/ lung du bstan pa 'am/ lung du ma bstan pa de dag thams cad
341b2(mdo sde): rnam pa dang bcas/ gzhi dang bcas// gtan tshigs dang bcas par de bzhin gshegs pas rab tu shes so// da ltar byung ba'i dus kyi sems can thams cad kyi rgyud 'byung ba// dge
341b3(mdo sde): ba 'am/ mi dge ba 'am/ lung du bstan pa 'am/ lung du ma bstan pa'ang rung ste/ sems gang gi 'og tu sems gang 'byung ba de dag thams cad rnam pa dang bcas/ yul phyogs dang
341b4(mdo sde): bcas/ gzhi ci las gyur pa dang bcas par de bzhin gshegs pas rab tu shes so// gang ma 'ongs pa'i sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi rgyud dang sems las byung ba'i chos dge ba
341b5(mdo sde): 'am mi dge ba'am/ lung du bstan pa 'am/ lung du ma bstan pa'ang rung ste/ sems gang gi 'og tu sems gang 'byung bar 'gyur pa de dag thams cad kyang rnam pa dang bcas/ yul
341b6(mdo sde): phyogs dang bcas/ gzhi ci las gyur pa dang bcas par de bzhin gshegs pas rab tu shes so// rigs kyi bu de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
341b7(mdo sde): sangs rgyas ni thogs pa med pa'i ye shes dang ldan no/ / de bzhin gshegs pa'i mkhyen pa thogs pa mi mnga' ba bstan pa 'di bshad pa na/ srog chags sum 'bum gyis bla na med
342a1(mdo sde): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do/ / de nas mi 'am ci'i rgyal po ljon pas bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' dang / nyan thos kyi dge
342a2(mdo sde): 'dun gyi 'khor dang bcas pa la zhag bdun bde bar sbyar ba thams cad kyis bsnyen bkur byas nas yongs su longs spyad par bya ba'i phyir/ rang gi khang khyim dang 'khor gyi khyams de'ang bcom ldan 'das
342a3(mdo sde): la phul te 'di skad ces kyang gsol to/ / bcom ldan 'das bdag la thugs brtse ba'i slad du rtag tu 'dir gshegs shing bzhugs par gsol/ de na skye bo mang po la phan pa dang / skye bo mang po la
342a4(mdo sde): bde ba dang / 'jig rten la thugs brtse ba dang / skye bo phal po che'i don dang / mi 'am ni dang / dri za dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams la phan pa dang bde bar 'gyur ro// de nas mi 'am tsi
342a5(mdo sde): rgyal po ljon pa'i bu dri ma med pa'i mig ces bya bas bcom ldan 'das la nor bu rin po che'i dra ba phul nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das mi 'am
342a6(mdo sde): ci bdag cag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la yang dag par zhugs lags kyang / bdag cag ni sil snyan dang / rol mo'i dbyangs sgra dang / glu dang gar la rab tu chags/ me
342a7(mdo sde): tog dang / spos dang / bdug pa dang / byug pa dang / phye ma la bag ma mchis par dga' zhing rtse ba lags na/ ji ltar bdag cag bag mchis par 'gyur zhing / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos
342b1(mdo sde): rnams yang dag par sgrub par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos rin po che'i phyag rgya'i sgo'i gdams ngag bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag cag la bka' stsal bar gsol/ de skad ces gsol pa dang
342b2(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis/ mi 'am ci'i rgyal po'i bu dri ma med pa'i mig la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// bzhin bzangs dag de'i phyir deng phyin chad sel snyan dang / glu dbyangs de dag las byang
342b3(mdo sde): chub yongs su smin par byed pa'i chos drug cu rtsa bzhi 'byung bar khyed la byin gyis brlab par bya'o/ / drug cu rtsa bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ mi rtag pa'i sgra 'byung ba dang / sdug bsngal gyi sgra
342b4(mdo sde): dang bdag med pa'i sgra dang / zhi ba'i sgra dang / mngon par 'du mi byed pa'i sgra dang / dben pa'i sgra dang / mi skye ba'i sgra dang / dngos po med pa'i sgra dang / 'byung ba med pa'i sgra dang /
342b5(mdo sde): gnas med pa'i sgra dang / ji lta ba bzhin gyi sgra dang / yang dag pa'i mtha'i sgra dang / chos kyi dbyings kyi sgra dang / sems can med pa'i sgra dang / srog med pa'i sgra dang / gang zag
342b6(mdo sde): med pa'i sgra dang / sbyin pa'i sgra dang / tshul khrims kyi sgra dang / bzod pa'i sgra dang / brtson 'grus kyi sgra dang / bsam gtan gyi sgra dang / shes rab kyi sgra dang / byams
342b7(mdo sde): pa'i sgra dang / snying rje'i sgra dang / dga' ba'i sgra dang / btang snyoms kyi sgra dang / 'ongs pa med pa'i sgra dang / 'gro ba med pa'i sgra dang / rgyu ba med pa'i sgra dang / gnas med
343a1(mdo sde): ba'i sgra dang / brtan pa med pa'i sgra dang / stong pa'i sgra dang / mtshan ma med pa'i sgra dang / smon pa med pa'i sgra dang / 'dod chags dang bral ba'i sgra dang /
343a2(mdo sde): 'byung ba med pa'i sgra dang / rten pa'i sgra dang / rten med pa'i sgra dang / sangs rgyas kyi sgra dang / chos kyi sgra dang / dge 'dun gyi sgra dang / byang chub tshad med pa'i sgra dang / dran pa nye
343a3(mdo sde): bar gzhag pa'i sgra dang / yang dag par spong ba'i sgra dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa'i sgra dang / dbang po'i sgra dang / stobs kyi sgra dang / byang chub kyi yan lag gi sgra dang / lam gyi sgra
343a4(mdo sde): dang zhi gnas kyi sgra dang / lhag mthong gi sgra dang / thabs kyi sgra dang / bsdu ba'i dngos po'i sgra dang / sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i sgra dang / bdud tshar gcad pa'i sgra dang /
343a5(mdo sde): dam pa'i chos yongs su gzung ba'i sgra dang / chos thams cad sgyu ma dang / rmi lam dang / gzugs brnyan dang / chu zla dang / brag cha lta bu'i sgra dang / chos kyi dbyings 'dres pa med
343a6(mdo sde): pa'i sgra dang / 'khor bas yongs su mi skyo ba'i sgra dang / 'byung ba'i sgra dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba'i tshegs thams cad kyi sgra dang / lbu ba dang / chu'i chu bur dang / smig rgyu dang
343a7(mdo sde): chu shing gi phung po dang / sgyu ma dang / snying po med pa'i sgra dang / ji skad smras pa de bzhin du bya zhing chos sgrub pa'i sgra 'byung bar 'gyur ro// bzhin bzangs dag de ltar na sangs rgyas
343b1(mdo sde): kyi mthus sil snyan dang / glu dbyangs de dag las gang gis khyed pag yod par byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams sgrub par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i sgra 'di dag 'byung bar 'gyur ro// de nas thams
343b2(mdo sde): cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de ngo mtshar du gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal te 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das ji tsam du sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi byang
343b3(mdo sde): chub 'di byin gyi rlabs kyis shin tu byin gyis brlabs pa dang / chos bstan pa dang / ji tsam du de bzhin gshegs pas byang chub sems dpa' rnams shin tu yongs su bzung ba ni ngo
343b4(mdo sde): mtshar to/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ grogs po dag ji skad smras pa de bzhin te/ de bzhin gshegs pas byang chub sems dpa' rnams shin tu yongs su bzung
343b5(mdo sde): ngo / / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' yongs su bzung bas sems can thams cad yongs su gzung bar 'gyur ro// grogs po dag de bzhin gshegs pas
343b6(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' yongs su bzung ba gang yin pa de sems can thams cad kyi don nyid do/ / de ltar na sems can thams cad kyi ched du de dag go cha gang gis sems can tshad med
343b7(mdo sde): grangs med pa 'khor ba las mya ngan las 'das pa'i lam du bzud par 'gyur ba'i go cha chen po gyon no/ / grogs po dag rnam grangs 'dis 'di ltar da ltar bzhugs kyang rung // yongs
344a1(mdo sde): su mya ngan las 'das kyang rung ste/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams yongs su bzung ba mdzad pa gang yin pa des sems can thams cad yongs su bzung ba yin
344a2(mdo sde): par rig par bya'o/ / grogs po dag byang chub sems dpa' la gos dang / bsod snyoms dang / mal cha dang / na ba'i gsos sman dang / yo byad rnams kyis rim gror byas pa ni
344a3(mdo sde): sems can thams cad la rim gror byas par 'gyur ro/ / grogs po dag byang chub sems dpa' la bde bar sbyar bar nye bar ba sgrub pa ni/ sems can thams cad la bde bar sbyar banye
344a4(mdo sde): par sgrub par 'gyur ro/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ grogs po dag tha na byang chub sems dpa'i dbugs 'byung ba dang / rngub pa gang yin pa de tham cad kyang sems can thams cad la
344a5(mdo sde): snying rje chen po rab tu thob pa dang ldan pa dang / sems can thams cad la phan pa dang / bde ba'i phyir yongs su 'dzin to// de nas 'dod pa na spyod pa dang / gzugs na spyod pa dang
344a6(mdo sde): gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha'i bu de dag dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de bcom ldan 'das
344a7(mdo sde): kyis legs par gsungs pa la rjes su yi rang nas/ lha'i me tog rnam pa mang po kha dog sna tshogs pas bcom ldan 'das la mngon par gtor to// de nas mi 'am ci'i rgyal po ljon
344b1(mdo sde): pas 'di snyam du bsams te/ bcom ldan 'das nyid kyi rdzu 'phrul gyis sam/ gzhan byang chub sems dpa'i rdzu 'phrul gyis bdag gi gnas bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri la gshegs
344b2(mdo sde): pa ni bdag gi cha ma yin gyis/ bdag gis de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa'i las kyi phyir shing rta gang la bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun dang bcas pa dang //
344b3(mdo sde): nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa bzhugs pa de lta bu'i shing rta bkod pa bsgrubs te/ shing rta de'ang bdag 'khor dang bcas pas drangs nas/ de ltar na bdag gi de bzhin gshegs pa
344b4(mdo sde): la mchod pa byas par 'gyur ro snyam mo/ / de nas mi 'am ci'i rgyal po ljon pas yid las byung ba'i lha'i rin po che sna bdun gyi shing rta 'phang du dpag tshad la khyon du dpag tshad lnga pa
344b5(mdo sde): kha khyer rin po che sna tshogs kyis bskor ba/ shing ljon pa sna tshogs kyis legs par brgyan pa/ steng du rin po che dra ba bres pa/ rin po che'i skud pas mig mangs ris su bres pa mngon par
344b6(mdo sde): sprul nas/ shing rta de la bcom ldan 'das kyi gdan seng ge'i khro bkra ba/ blta na sdug pa// 'phang du mi bdun yod pa/ ras bcos bu zung brgya stong mang po bkram pa mngon par sprul/
344b7(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang / nyan thos kyi dge 'dun thams cad kyi stan yang so sor mngon par sprul te/ gang dag bcom ldan 'das la chos nyan cing zham ring du 'brang ba brgya
345a1(mdo sde): byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba dang / 'dod pa na spyod pa dang / gzugs na spyod pa dang / gnas gtsang ma'i rigs kyi lha'i bu de dag gi stan yang
345a2(mdo sde): shing rta de'i steng du ci rigs par sprul to/ / de nas mi 'am ci'i rgyal po ljon pas de lta bu'i shing rta bkod pa de sprul nas thal mo sbyar te/ bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal nas 'di
345a3(mdo sde): skad ces gsol to/ / bcom ldan 'das bdag la thugs brtse ba'i slad du shing rta 'di la ji ltar gdan bshams pa rnams la 'khor thams cad dang thabs cig tu bzhugs su gsol
345a4(mdo sde): de nas seng ge'i khri de la bcom ldan 'das kyang bzhugs/ byang chub sems dpa' dang / dge slong gi dge 'dun dang / 'khor thams cad kyang ci rigs par 'khod do// de nas
345a5(mdo sde): mi 'am ci'i rgyal po ljon pas rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs kyis shing rta de lag pa g.yas pas blangs te/ shing ta la bdun srid kyi steng gi bar snang la spags nas/ de nas mi 'am ci'i bu
345a6(mdo sde): mo brgyad khri bzhi stong de dag thams cad dang / bu brgyad sdong po de dag dang / gzhan yang mi 'am ci dang / dri za dang / lto 'phye chen po brgya stong phrag du ma dang / mi 'am ci'i rgyal po ljon pa
345a7(mdo sde): nyid kyang rin po che'i thag pa thogs nas shing rta la btags te nam mkha' la drangs so/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das steng gi bar snang gi shing rta la bzhugs shing nam mkha'i kyol nas gshegs
345b1(mdo sde): pa la mi 'am ci'i bu mo brgyad khri bzhi stong po de dag gis sil snyan dang glu dbyangs blangs nas/ mchod pa byed de mdun du 'dong zhing / bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis
345b2(mdo sde): mngon par bstod do/ / mo 'am ci mo brgyad khri bzhi stong po// gzugs kyi dam pa dang ni ldan pa dag/ sil snyan rnams ni rab tu dkrol bgyid cing // yang dag bsngags pas 'dren
345b3(mdo sde): la stong par bgyid/ / mtshan mchog bsod nams kyis ni gzi brjid gyur// gzugs mchog mthong na dga' bar bgyid pa'i gzugs// bden pa'i yon tan la ni rtag gnas pa//
345b4(mdo sde): yon tan mtsho chen khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// sngon gyi rgyal ba rnams dang khyod mi 'dra// g.yas g.yon na yang rnam par mthong ma myong // ji ltar ri rab rten zhing mi g.yo ba// de ltar
345b5(mdo sde): khyod kyi sku ni dpal gyis mdzes/ / 'dren pa khyod kyi rdzu 'phrul stobs kyis ni// chags pa ma mchis par yang mkha' las mchi// nam mkha' lta bur dag cing dri mi mngar//
345b6(mdo sde): bcom ldan nyon mongs bsal la phyag 'tshal lo// lha dbang lha min dbang dang srin po dang // brgya byin tshangs pa dang ni dag pa'i lha// nyi ma zla ba skar mar bcas pa'i 'od// khyod
345b7(mdo sde): kyi mdzod spus 'od ni ma mchis gyur/ / shes rab 'byung gnas shes rab rgya mtsho ldan// sems can kun gyi sems kyi spyod la mkhas// 'jig rten gsum na 'jig rten
346a1(mdo sde): gsum gyis mchod/ / 'jig rten grags pa'i zhabs la phyag 'tshal lo// bdud bzhi po yi skyon rnams bsal ba po// bden pa bzhi la bsgom zhing dpyod mdzad/
346a2(mdo sde): pa/ rdzu 'phrul bzhi yi stobs kyis bsnyengs mi mnga'// sangs rgyas gshegs pas gshegs te gshegs pa mdzes// bskal pa brgyar yang skyo ba mi mnga' zhing //
346a3(mdo sde): rtag tu dul la thugs ni mnyam par gzhag/ legs par gsungs pas 'gro ba tshim mdzad kyang // khyod ni tshig dang skad la gnas ma lags// khyod kyi gsung ni yid 'ong rab tu stsa
346a4(mdo sde): zhing brgya dag tu thogs pa med par mchi/ / zla de sems can gang gos thos myur ba// de dag thams cad bde bas tshim par 'gyur// sems tsam pa lo sgyur ba smra gcig ta// stong gsum rgyu
346a5(mdo sde): mtsho'i chab rnams zhugs gyur kyang / / sems can rags pa rnams la 'dom gnod// rdzu 'phrul la yang skyon ni yong mi gda'// stong gsum bya no ro rab ri bo dag/ phyag gcig gi rma
346a6(mdo sde): mthil du bzhag nas su/ / zhing mang bye ba dag tu gshegs mdzad kyang // khyod kyi sku yi stobs ni zhum ma mchis// bskal pa bye ba brgya phrag bsam yas na// brtul zhugs dka' thub
346a7(mdo sde): tshul khrims yon tan dang / / sbyin dang dul dang sdom dang bzod pa dang // brtson 'grus bsam gtan shes rab shin tu bslabs// sangs rgyas bye ba mang la bsnyen bkur mdzad// de dag rnams kyis
346b1(mdo sde): bshad pa'i chos kyang bzung / / thugs rje ldan zhing 'gro ba'i don gyi phyir// khyod la yongs su skyo ba'i thugs mi mnga'// rim gro ma bgyis zhum par mi 'gyur zhing // rim gror bgyis pas mtho bar//
346b2(mdo sde): 'gyur ma lags// dog sa lta bur snyoms shing mi g.yo ste// 'jig rten chos gnas mi gos pad+ma bzhin// chos rnams stong pa mtshan ma ma mchis dang // chu zla 'dra zhing sgyu ma lta bu dang // dbu
346b3(mdo sde): brngos 'dra rmi lam glog 'dra dang / / smig rgyu'i mtshan nyid lta bur rab tu mkhyen// ngo bo nyid kyis gang zag bdag ma mchis// gdod nas stong zhing mi g.yo rjes ma mchis// nam mkha' lta bur dag
346b4(mdo sde): cing dri ma mchis/ / dngos po bas par dngos po ma mchis 'dra// las dang bya ba rgyu dang rkyen rnams las// byung ba lags kyi rjes ni ma mchis par// tshul 'di rnam par spang ba mdzad pas
346b5(mdo sde): na/ / de phyir khyod ni rdzogs sangs rgyas zhes bgyi// gang dag 'dren pa mthong zhing thos gyur pa// de dag la ni ngan song 'jigs ma mchis// de dag bde 'gro dag tu mchog gzhol te//
346b6(mdo sde): srog chags de rnams kyi ni rnyed pa lags// bdag cag rnams kyis gang zag dam pa khyod// kun tu mchod pas mchod pa bgyis nas su// byang chub tu ni sems kyang bskyed bgyis te/
346b7(mdo sde): gang zag mchog 'drar thams cad 'gyur bar shog/ nam mkha' la ni dpag tu nus kyang gda'// rgya mtsho'i chab ni bas bgyis nus kyang gda'// nyi zla mkha' las sar ni ltung gdang yi//
347a1(mdo sde): sangs rgyas yon tan bas par 'gyur mi gda'// de nas bcom ldan 'das shing rta la bzhugs te/ nam mkha'i dkyil gyi lam nas gshegs pas gshegs
347a2(mdo sde): shing gser gyi kha dog lta bu'i sku las 'od gang gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams khyab par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i 'od phyung ba dang / 'od des rgyal po'i khab kyi grong
347a3(mdo sde): khyer chen po dang / bya rgod kyi phung po'i ro'ang rab tu khyab par gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das shing rta des rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer dang / bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri ga la ba der
347a4(mdo sde): gshegs so/ / de nas rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer na/ grong khyer gyi rgyal po ma skyes dgra blon po dang / rgyal bu dang / tshong dpon dang / grong rdal pa dang / khyim bdag tu bcas pa dang
347a5(mdo sde): dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma rnams 'od des bskul nas/ phyi dro'i dus kyi che me tog dang / bdug pa dang / spos dang / 'phreng ba dang / byug pa dang /
347a6(mdo sde): gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang ba dan thogs te/ bcom ldan 'das bsu ba'i phyir rings pa rings par rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen po nas byung ste/ bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri la bcom
347a7(mdo sde): ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ngo / / ljon pa'i slas rnams shing rta 'dren bzhin du sil snyan brgyad khri bzhi stong byed do// si 'am ci rol mo sil snron gyi sgra des bya rgod kyi phung po'or thams
347b1(mdo sde): nad du rmugs par gyur to/ / de ltar mi 'amaH'i rgyal po ljon pa dpung dang bcas/ 'khor dang bcas pas rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs kyis bcom ldan 'das nam mkha'i dkyil nas khyer te/
347b2(mdo sde): bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri la bzhag go/ de nas bcom ldan 'das shing rta de las babs nas/ rang gi gnas su gdan bshams pa la bzhugs so// byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang
347b3(mdo sde): nyan thos chen po de dag dang / thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor rnams kyang shing rta de las babs nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das
347b4(mdo sde): kyis gnang nas/ / bcom ldan 'das la kun nas bskor te/ rang rang gi stan la 'khod do// 'dod pa na spyod pa dang / gzugs na spyod pa dang / gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha'i bu de dag kyang
347b5(mdo sde): shing rta de las babs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// de nas rgyal po ma skyes dgra blon po dang / rgyal po dang / rgyal bu dang
347b6(mdo sde): tshong dpon dang / khyim bdag dang / grong rdal ba dang bcas pa dang / dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma rnams kyis me tog dang / bdug pa dang / spos dang /
347b7(mdo sde): 'phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / chos gos dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan ji ltar thogs pa de dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byas nas/ bcom ldan
348a1(mdo sde): 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das la sku ma mnyel tam/ bde ba la reg par gnas sam zhes gsol nas/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod do//
348a2(mdo sde): de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ byang chub sems dpa' lha'i cod pan gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das mi 'am ci'i rgyal po ljon pa g.yog 'khor dang bcas pas/ bcom ldan
348a3(mdo sde): 'das 'khor dang bcas te/ shing rta la bzhugs pa nam mkha'i dkyil nas drangs pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis mi 'am ci'i rgyal po ljon pa 'khor dang bcas pas ci zhig 'thob par 'gyur// bcom ldan
348a4(mdo sde): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge ba'i rtsa ba des mi 'am ci'i rgyal po ljon pa slas dang bcas/ bu dang bcas// g.yog dang bcas pas 'dir byang chub tu sems bskyed nas// de dag thams cad/
348a5(mdo sde): nam byang chub kyi snying po la 'dug gi bar du mngon par shes pa las mi nyams pa rab tu thob par 'gyur/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du phan tshun 'gro bar 'gyur/ sangs
348a6(mdo sde): rgyas mthong ba dang / chos nyan pa dang / dge 'dun la bsnyen bkur byed pa dang mi 'bral bar 'gyur/ tshe rabs thams cad du skye ba dran par 'gyur/ lung bstan pa thob par 'gyur/ dam
348a7(mdo sde): pa'i chos yongs su gzung ba la brtson par 'gyur/ sems can yongs su smin par bya ba la spro bar 'gyur ro// de nas rgyal po ma skyes dgras/ mi 'am ci'i bdag po ljon pa la 'di skad ces
348b1(mdo sde): smras so/ / mi 'am ci'i bdag po bcom ldan 'das kyis khyod kyi yon tan yongs su brjod pa mdzad pas khyod kyis rnyed pa legs par rnyed kyis/ khyod kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba de las shas shig kho/
348b2(mdo sde): bos kyang 'thob par 'dod do// mi 'am ci'i rgyal po ljon pas smras pa/ rgyal po chen po dge ba'i rtsa ba 'di thams cad bdag gis khyod dang sems can thams cad la dbul lo// de ci'i
348b3(mdo sde): phyir zhe na/ rgyal po chen po byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba ni sems can thams cad dang thun mong ma yin pa de gang yang med do// rgyal po chen po byang chub sems dpa'
348b4(mdo sde): thams cad ni ser sna can ma yin te/ de dag dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad la ser sna mi skyed do// dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad sems can thams cad la gtong yang yid mi bde bar mi
348b5(mdo sde): 'gyur/ 'gyod par mi 'gyur ro// rgyal po chen po byang chub sems dpa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba gang yin pa thams cad mkhyen par yongs su bsngos pa de'ang sems can thams cad kyi 'tsho
348b6(mdo sde): pabar 'gyur ro/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rgyal po chen po byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byang chub ni sems can thams cad kyi gnas byed pa dang / sems can la sbyor ba dang / sems can
348b7(mdo sde): gyi phyir 'brang bar 'gyur ro/ / rgyal po chen po khyod kyis gang gi phyir dge ba'i bshes gnyen bcom ldan 'das dang 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa rnyed de/ de gnyis las khyod kyis
349a1(mdo sde): dam pa'i chos thos nas/ des mi shes pa'i mun pa dang / gti mug gi ling tog chen pos mtshams med pa'i 'gyod pa byung ba'i sems bsal nas/ khyod kyis
349a2(mdo sde): chos la chos kyi snang ba chen po thob ste/ chos kyi snang ba des khyod da ltar sgrib pa med pa thob cing gnas pas/ khyod kyis kyang rnyed pa legs par rnyed do// rgyal po chen po de lta bas na byang chub
349a3(mdo sde): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos gus par byas te/ ci nas kyang chos kyi tshig dang / yi ge 'bru gcig thos pa'ang brjed par mi 'gyur ba dang / chud za bar mi 'gyur ba dang / kun tu gzug
349a4(mdo sde): ba dang / yongs su bsrung ba'i phyir/ bdag chos kyi snod du 'gyur bar bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ byang chub sems dpa' lha'i cod pan gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan
