349a5(mdo sde): 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi snod du 'gyur ba lags/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' lha'i cod pan la 'di skad ces bka' stsal
349a6(mdo sde): to/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos sum cu rtsa gnyis dang ldan na// chos kyi snod du 'gyur te/ sum cu rtsa gnyis gang zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ byang chub
349a7(mdo sde): sems dpa'i snod sangs rgyas kyis byin gyi rlabs dang / lhag pa'i bsam pa dang / byang chub kyi lam nye bar rton pa'i snod sbyor ba dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba khyad par du 'gro ba'i snod lhag pa'i bsam pa
349b1(mdo sde): dang / mang du thos pa'i snod dran pa dang / yam la 'jug pa'i snod blo gros dang / don rtogs pa rjes su rtogs pa'i snod rtogs pa dang / longs spyod chen po'i snod sbyin pa dang / bsam pa yongs su
349b2(mdo sde): / rdzogs pa'i snod tshul khrims dang / skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis thob pa'i snod bzod pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad 'grub pa'i snod brtson 'grus dang / sems las
349b3(mdo sde): su rung ba'i snod bsam gtan dang / dogs pa thams cad las rab tu 'das pa'i snod shes rab dang / sems can thams cad la sems snyoms pa'i snod byams pa dang / dbul zhing nyam
349b4(mdo sde): thag pa thams cad bskyab pa'i snod snying rje dang / chos la dga' ba'i snod dga' ba dang / rjes su chags pa dang khong khro ba spang ba'i snod btang snyoms dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad 'dzin du
349b5(mdo sde): 'jug pa'i snod dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i snod thos pa tshol bas ngoms mi myong ba dang / mi ltos pa'i snod rab tu 'byung ba dang / don nyung zhing bya ba nyung
349b6(mdo sde): ba'i snod dgon pa la gnas pa dang / bsam gtan dang mngon par shes pa'i snod dben pa la dga' ba dang / sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i snod bsdu ba'i dngos po dang / chos sdang
349b7(mdo sde): ba'i snod dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa dang / thos pa'i chos thams cad 'dzin pa'i snod gzungs dang / sems can thams cad kyi the tsom gcod pa'i snod spobs pa dang / sangs
350a1(mdo sde): rgyas mthong ba'i snod sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i snod chos rjes su dran pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba bsrung ba'i snod zhe 'gras pa med/
350a2(mdo sde): pa'i sems dang / lta bar gyur pa thams cad spong ba'i snod stong pa nyid la mos pa dang / mthar 'dzin pa thams cad yongs su spong ba'i snod rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dang / mi 'khrugs
350a3(mdo sde): shing byed par lung ston pa'i snod mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob pa dang / stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi snod phyir ma ldog pa'i sa ste
350a4(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos sum cu rtsa gnyis po 'di dag dang ldan na/ chos kyi snod du rig par bya'o// bstan pa 'di bshad pa na/ srog chags khris bla
350a5(mdo sde): na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed nas/ tshig 'di skad ces bcom ldan 'das sems can thams cad kyang 'di 'dra ba'i chos kyi snod du gyur cig/ bdag bca
350a6(mdo sde): kyang bcom ldan 'das kyis ji skad du bstan pa'i chos de lta bu'i snod du gyur cig ces smras so/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ mi 'am ci'i rgyal po ljon pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal
350a7(mdo sde): to/ / mi 'am ci'i bdag po khyod kyi 'khor 'di skyo bar 'gyur du 'angag/ khyod rang gi gnas su song zhig/ mi 'am ci'i rgyal po ljon pas gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das gang yongs su skyo ba de byang
350b1(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' zhes mi bgyi ste/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' ni skyo ba bzod par bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' yongs su skyo ba lags// ji ltar na
350b2(mdo sde): yongs su mi skyo ba lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ mi 'am ci'i bdag po byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na yongs su skyo bar rig par bya ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta
350b3(mdo sde): ste/ / sems can gyi khams tshad med pa thos na skrag pa dang / 'khor ba tshad med pa thos na skrag pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi ye shes tshad med pa thos na skrag pa dang / bsod nams tshad med pas mtshan
350b4(mdo sde): dang dpe byad bzang po 'grub pa thos na skrag pa ste/ mi 'am ci'i bdag po byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po 'di dag dang ldan na/ yongs su skyo bar rig par bya'o// mi 'am ci'i bdag po byang chub
350b5(mdo sde): sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na/ yongs su mi skyo bar rig par bya ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sems can gyi khams tshad med pa de'ang bdag gis yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar bya'o zhes
350b6(mdo sde): thos na mi skrag pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba bsgrub pa'i phyir 'khor ba tshad med pa yongs su gzung bar bya'o zhes thos na mi skrag pa dang / thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes tshad med pa de bdag gis yongs
350b7(mdo sde): su rdzogs par bya'o zhes thos na mi skrag pa dang / bsod nams tshad med pa bsags pas mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po bsgrub ste/ bdag gis kyang bsgrub par bya'o zhes thos na mi skrag pa ste/
351a1(mdo sde): mi'am ci'i bdag po byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po 'di dag dang ldan na/ yongs su mi skyo bar rig par bya'o// mi 'am ci'i bdag po gzhan yang byang chub sems
351a2(mdo sde): dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na/ yongs su skyo bar rig par bya ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ skabs skabs su nyan thos kyi theg pa 'dod pa dang / skabs skabs su rang sangs rgyas kyi theg
351a3(mdo sde): pa 'dod pa dang / dam pa'i chos rnam par 'jig pa na yal bar 'dor zhing yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang / gzhan yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yang dag par 'dzin du mi 'jug pa ste/ mi
351a4(mdo sde): 'a ma ci'i bdag po byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po 'di dag dang ldan na/ yongs su skyo bar rig par bya'o// mi 'am ci'i bdag po gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na/
351a5(mdo sde): yongs su mi skyo bar rig par bya ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ rab tu nyen kyang byang chub kyi sems mi gtong ba dang / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi sa mi 'dod pa dang / lus dang srog
351a6(mdo sde): kyang 'dor zhing dam pa'i chos srung ba dang / dpag tshad stong du 'gro zhing gzhan dag byang chub yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug pa ste/ mi 'am ci'i bdag po byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po 'di dag
351a7(mdo sde): dang ldan na/ yongs su mi skyo bar rig par bya'o// mi 'am ci'i bdag po gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na// yongs su skyo bar rig par bya'o// bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste
351b1(mdo sde): slong ba mthong na yongs su skyo ba dang / bsod nyims byed par sbyor ba la brtson par gnas pa dang / mang du thos pa tshol ba la mi brtson pa dang / ji ltar thos pa'i chos rnams gzhan la mi ston pa
351b2(mdo sde): ste mi 'am ci'i bdag po byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po 'di dag dang ldan na/ yongs su skyo bar rig par bya'o// mi 'am ci'i bdag po gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na/
351b3(mdo sde): yongs su mi skyo bar rig par bya ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ slong ba la dge ba'i bshes gnyen du 'du shos skyed cing // zhe 'gras pa'i sems med la/ bzhin 'dzum zhing khro gnyer med de/
351b4(mdo sde): tshuchur shog legs par 'ongs so zhes bya ba'i tshig smra ba dang / bdag bde ba la mi chags shing sems can thams cad la bde ba rab tu sbyin pa dang / mang du thos pa tshol bas mi ngoms shing / ji ltar thos
351b5(mdo sde): pa'i chos rnams kyang gzhan dag la rgya cher rab tu ston cing / zang zing med pa'i sems kyis chos de gzhan la rab tu ston pa ste/ mi 'am ci'i bdag po byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po 'di dag
351b6(mdo sde): dang ldan na/ yongs su mi skyo bar rig par bya'o// mi 'am ci'i bdag po gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na/ yongs su skyo bar rig par bya ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di
351b7(mdo sde): lta ste/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i lam yongs su mi tshol ba dang / bsdu ba'i dngos po la mi sbyor ba dang / sems can yongs su smin par byed par brtson 'grus mi rtsom pa dang / yon tan
352a1(mdo sde): chung ngu tsam gyis rlog par 'dzin cing gong du mi tshol ba ste/ mi 'am ci'o bdag po byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po 'di dag dang ldan na// yongs su skyo bar rig par bya'o//
352a2(mdo sde): mi'am ci'i bdag po gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na/ yongs su mi skyo bar rig par bya ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ mgo dang gos la me 'bar ba bzhin du pha rol tu phyin
352a3(mdo sde): pa'i lam yongs su tshol ba dang / bsdu ba'i dngos po la rtag tu brtson pa dang / sems can yongs su smin par byed par brtson 'grus rtsom pa dang / dge ba thams cad yongs su bskang ba'i phyir de
352a4(mdo sde): la mi chags pa yin te/ mi 'am ci'i bdag po byang chub sems dpa' ros bzhi po 'di dag dang ldan na/ yongs su mi skyo bar rig par bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis chos bzhi po
352a5(mdo sde): bsgrub pa 'dis/ mi 'am ci'i bdag po ljon pa la lan btab nas/ rgyal po ma skyes dgra la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rgyal po chen po khyod kyis byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis
352a6(mdo sde): yongs su skyo ba dang / yongs su mi skyo ba bzhi pa bsgrub pa la 'jug par 'di thos sam/ rgyal pos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das thos lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
352a7(mdo sde): stsal ba/ rgyal po chen po de lta bas na khyod byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la yongs su mi skyo bar spad par bya'o// rgyal po sa skyes de gras gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa'
352b1(mdo sde): rnams kyi spyod pa gang lags/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal po ma skyes dgra'i byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa yongs su bskang ba'i phyir/ mi 'am ci'i rgyal po ljon pa la bka' stsal pa/
352b2(mdo sde): mi 'am ci'i bdag po khyod ji ltar sems can yongs su smin par byed pa'i rang gi thabs mkhas pa'i khyad par rgyal po ma skyes dgra 'di'i byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa yongs su bskang ba'i
352b3(mdo sde): phyir khyod kyis ston cig/ de nas mi 'am ci'i rgyal po ljon pas rang gis pi wang de bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar blangs so// pi wang de blangs ma thag tu de nas sangs rgyas kyi mthu dang / mi
352b4(mdo sde): 'am ci'i rgyal po ljon pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba'i gzi brjid kyis/ pi wang gi sgra de las seng ges bsgyings pa ltar shing sA la du ma g.yos pa'i sgrar byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i tshigs su
352b5(mdo sde): bcad pa 'di dag byung ngo / / phan pa spyod pa dag dang don spyod dang // chos thos nan tan byed pa spong ba dang // byang chub mchog gi smod pa gang spyod pa// de dag yongs su skyo ba med par spyod//
352b6(mdo sde): bde ba spyod dang skyid pa spyod pa dang // sems can kun lo sems snyoms spyod pa dang // byang chub mchog gi spyod pa gang spyod pa// de dag rgya chen ma yin spyod pa med// brtan pa spyod dong/
352b7(mdo sde): bden pa spyod pa dang // bsam pa yongs su dag pa spyod pa dang // byang chub mchog gi spyod pa gang spyod pa// de dag gang du'ang sgyu med spyod pa yin// dul ba spyod dang sbyin pa spyod pa/
353a1(mdo sde): dang / dngos po thams cad yongs su gtong spyod dang // byang chub mchog gi spyod pa gang spyod pa// de dag ser sna med par spyod pa yin// tshul khrims
353a2(mdo sde): spyod pa ma nyams spyod pa dang / / lus dang ngag ni yongs dag spyod pa dang // byang chub mchog gi spyod pa gang spyod pa// de dag tshul khrims 'chal pa'i spyod pa med// brtul zhugs
353a3(mdo sde): spyod dang bzod pa spyod pa dang / / khro spyon yongs su gcod pa'i spyod pa dang // byang chub mchog gi spyod pa gang spyod pa// de dag gnod sems med par spyod pa yini// brtson 'grus spyod dang
353a4(mdo sde): mthu rnams spyod pa dang / / 'khor bar yongs su mi skyo spyod pa dang // byang chub mchog gi spyod pa gong spyod pa// de dag le lo med par spyod pa yin// bsam gtan spyod dang ting 'dzin spong
353a5(mdo sde): pa dang / / lus dang sems ni rab tu dben spyod dang // byang chub mchog gi spyod pa gang spyod pa// de dag g.yeng ba med par spyod pa yin// shes rab spyod dang blo mchog spyod pa dang // chos rnams
353a6(mdo sde): thams cad ji bzhin spyod pa dang / / byang chub mchog gi spyod pa gang spyod pa// de dag shes rab 'chal pa'i spyod pa med// byams pa spyod dang phan 'dod spyod pa dang // sems can kun la snying rje
353a7(mdo sde): spyod pa dang / / byang chub mchog gi spyod pa gang spyod pa// de dag khro ba'i tha ba med par spyod// stong pa spyod dang rab tu dben spyod dang // mtshan ma med pa yongs su dag spong dang // byang
353b1(mdo sde): chub mchog gi spyod pa gang spyod pa/ / de dag smon pa med par spyod pa yin// yang dag nyid dang de bzhin nyid spyod dang // shes pa thams cad yongs su dag spyod dang // byang chub mchog gi
353b2(mdo sde): spyod pa gang spyod pa/ / de dag gang du'ang chags pa med par spyod// dad pa spyod dang dang ba spyod pa dang // dran dang g.yeng ba med pa spyod pa dang // byang chub mchog gi spyod pa gang spyod pa// de dag
353b3(mdo sde): yongs su spyod pa med par spyod/ / bsam gtan spyod dang rnam thar spyod pa dang // mngon shes lnga rnams yongs dag spyod pa dang // byang chub mchog gi spyod pa gang spyod pa// de dag rmugs pa
353b4(mdo sde): med par spyod pa yin/ / sangs rgyas spyod dang dam chos spyod pa dang // dge 'dun dkon mchog nye bar brtan spyod pa// byang chub mchog gi spyod pa gang spyod pa// de dag dkon mchog mchog gi spyod pa yin/
353b5(mdo sde): chos spyod pa dang shin tu rigs spyod dang // sems can thams cad yongs su smin spyod dang // byang chub mchog gi spyod pa gang spyod pa// de dag rgyun mo 'chad par spyod pa yin// bya ba spyod dang chos
353b6(mdo sde): rnam spyod pa dang / / mtha' kun yong su gcod pa'i spyod pa dang // byang chub mchog gi spyod pa gang spyod pa// de dag gang du'ang lta bar spyod pa med// dag pa spyod dang rnam par dag spyod dang // nyon mongs
353b7(mdo sde): thams cad yongs su gcod spyod dang / / byang chub mchog gi spyod pa gang spyod pa// de dag yongs su gdung bar spyod pa med// bde ba spyod dang shin tu rnam par spyod// sems can kun
354a1(mdo sde): @la 'jigs med mchog spyod dang / / byang chub mchog go spyod pa gang spyod pa// de dag smon lam spyod pa med pa yin// nyi sa spyod dang zla ba spyod pa dang // pad+ma lta
354a2(mdo sde): bur gos pa med spyod dang / byang chub mchog ga spyod pa gang spyod pa// de dag lhar bcas 'jig rten phyag bya ba// brgya byin spyod dang tshangs pa'i spyod pa dang // dkar po'i chos rnams
354a3(mdo sde): yongs su rdzogs spyod dang / / byang chub mchog gi spyod pa gang spyod pa// de dag bdud rnams sder bcas skrag par byed// mchog spyod pa dang khyad par 'phags spyod dang // 'dod
354a4(mdo sde): chags nyes pa tha ba gcod spyod dang / / byang chub mchog gi spyod pa gang spyod pa// de dag gang du'ang gti mug spyod pa med// lam spyod pa dang mu stegs spyod pa dang // shes rab mig
354a5(mdo sde): ni yongs su dag spyong dang / byang chub mchogs spyod pa paji spyad pa// de dag spyan tu rtog par spyod pa spyod// rdul baspyod dang rab rgyan stong ngo // maung dang gzus su sum chags spyong
354a6(mdo sde): pa dang / / byang chub mchog gi spyod pa dag pa dang // de dag lnga dang ma ni mang pos bstod// 'phags pa'i spyod dang shin tu mnyam spyod dang // g.yon phyogs lam ni yongs su gcod
354a7(mdo sde): spyod dang / byang chub mchog go spyod pa gang spyod pa// de dag rtag tu don la 'bab pa dang // dpa' bo spyod dang shin tu brtan spyod dang // bdud kyi sngo rnams 'jig par byed spyod dang //
354b1(mdo sde): byang chub mchog gi spyod pa gang spyod pa// de dag byang chub snying por gzhol ba yin// gzung ba spyod dang don yod spyod pa dang // gzungs la g.yeng ba med par spyod pa dang // byang chub
354b2(mdo sde): mchog gi spyod pa gang spyod pa/ / de dag gang du'ang ma rig spyod pa med// dgon pa spyod dang rab tu dben spyod dang // rtag tu rab tu 'byung bar spyod pa dang // byang chub mchog gi spyod pa gang
354b3(mdo sde): spyod pa/ / de dag nan tan byed par spyod pa yin// gtso bo'i spyod dang khyad par 'phags spyod dang // 'jig rten thams cad zil gnon spyod pa dang // byang chub mchog gi spyod pa gang spyod
354b4(mdo sde): pa/ / de dag dman pa la ni spyod pa med// rigs pa spyod dang thabs la spyod pa dang // bsam gtan bde las log par spyod pa dang // byang chub mchog gi spyod pa gang spyod pa// de dag mi shes
354b5(mdo sde): spyod pa med pa yin/ / lta ba spyod dang rnam par lta spyod dang // ming dang gzugs la mi chags spyod pa dang // byang chub mchog gi spyod pa gang spyod pa// de dag 'jigs pa med par spyod pa yin//
354b6(mdo sde): thams cad spyod dang kun tu spyod pa dang // dbang po yongs su smin par byed pa dang // byang chub mchog gi spyod pa gang spyod pa// de dag ye shes nam mkha'i mtha' dang 'dra// byang chub sems
354b7(mdo sde): dpa'i spyod pa bstan pa'i tshigs su bcad pa mngon par bsgrub pa 'di po wang gi sgra de las byung ba na/ byang chub sems dpa' lnga stong mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur to// rgyal po ma//
355a1(mdo sde): skyes dgra'i 'khor dang / rgyal po'i khab kyi bram ze dang / khyim bdag dang / mi 'am ci dang / dri za dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / de dag gi 'khor gyi srog chags
355a2(mdo sde): brgyad stong bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed nas/ tshig 'od skad ces bcom ldan 'das bdag cag kyang byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa 'di la bslab par bgyi'o//
355a3(mdo sde): nan tan gyis bsgrub par bya'o// sems can tshad ma mchis pa dag byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa 'di nyid yang dag par 'dzin du stsal bar bgyi'o zhes smras so// de nas bcom ldan 'das
355a4(mdo sde): kyis mi 'am ci'i rgyal po ljon pa 'gror gnang ngo / / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis snang bas mi 'am ci'i rgyal po ljon pa bu dang bcas/ dpung dang bcas// slas dang bcas// gnyen
355a5(mdo sde): 'dab dang bcas/ 'khor dang bcas te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas te bzod pa gsol nas/ sil
355a6(mdo sde): spyan dkrol/ me tog gi char pa ba/ 'od zer gyi dra ba phyung ste/ sa chen po rnam pa drug tu g.yos par byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi thad nas song ste/ de skad cig thang cig yud tsam
355a7(mdo sde): de nyid la/ ri'i rgyal po spos kyi ngad ldang du rang gi khyim du phyin to// de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das
355b1(mdo sde): mi 'am ci'i rgyal po ljon pas de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa dang / chos la mchod pas bdag zil gyis non to// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ko'u shi ka mi 'am/
355b2(mdo sde): ci'i rgyal po ljon pas khyod 'ba' zhig zil gyis mnan pa ma yin gyi/ ko'u shi ka byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa thob pa ma gtogs par/ gang dag stong gsum rgya
355b3(mdo sde): spyo rnon pa'i 'jig rten gyilams kyi rgya byin dang / rgyas pa dang / 'jos rten slong bdadung / can thos dang / rang sangs rgyas de gathams cad mi 'amatha'i rgyal po rtson pam thang gyis kyi
355b4(mdo sde): do ci'i phyir zhe na/ ko'u shi ka byang chub sems dpa' sems bskyed ma thag pas/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang / brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong
355b5(mdo sde): bathams cad zil gyis non to/ / ko'u shi ka de lta bas na byang chub sems dpa' ni lha dang bzlas pa'i 'jig rten gyis zil gyis mi non to// gang byang chub sems dpa' zil gyis gnon par
355b6(mdo sde): sems pa de ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa la zil gyis gnon par 'dod pa'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' las ni de bzhin gshegs pa 'byung ngo // de bzhin gshegs
355b7(mdo sde): pa las ni nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas 'byung ngo / / de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis bstan pa 'od thos nas/ thal mo sbyar te mchim blags nas/ tshig 'di skad kyis kye ma'o
356a1(mdo sde): bdag sangs rgyas kyi mkhyen pa chags pa mi mnga' zhing sgrib pa mi mnga' ba 'di lta bu las nyams so zhes smras so/ / de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyi bu lha'i bu/
356a2(mdo sde): 'od zer srung zhes bya ba 'khor de nyid du 'dus par gyur te 'dug pa des// lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad ces smras so// yab 'di ltar gang dag rab tu dben pa rnam par bsgrub par nye bar
356a3(mdo sde): gnas pa'i mtshan nyid ma lags pa'i chos rnams la bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems mi skyed pa de ni sems can thams cad la snying rje rnyed pa ma lags/ / dge ba'i rtsa ba
356a4(mdo sde): rgya chen po la mos pa'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen la sten pa ma lags te/ phyis 'gyod par 'gyur ba'o// yab skyon med pa la zhugs te/ rgyu tshig cing sa bon tshig ste// theg pa chen po'i snod
356a5(mdo sde): du ma gyur pa la da bgyur ci mchis/ bstan pa 'di bshad pa na/ sum cu rtsa gsum ris kyi lha'i bu las stong tham pa bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do//
356a6(mdo sde): de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ lha'i bu 'od zer srung gis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa dka' ba spyad pa brgya stong phrag ji snyed pa
356a7(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na btar ba ni bdag la mngon sum du gyur to/ / bcom ldan 'das sngon byang chub sems dpar gyur pa na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra
356b1(mdo sde): bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mar me mdzad las mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob pa de la 'jug pa'i rnam par dbye ba bstan pa cung zad cig bcom ldan 'das kyis bshad du gsol/ /
356b2(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob pa gang bdag gis thos nas de bzhin gshegs pa nyid du bsgrubs pas chos de 'thob par 'gyur// de skad
356b3(mdo sde): ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis/ lha'i bu 'od zer srung la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// 'od zer srung byang chub sems pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba ma skyed pa rnams kyis ni mi skye ba'i
356b4(mdo sde): chos la bzod pa thob par mi 'gyur gyi/ byang chub sems dpa' dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa rnams kyis mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par 'gyur ro// 'od zer srung byang chub sems dpa
356b5(mdo sde): chos bzhi dang ldan na/ mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par 'gyur te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas kyi mnyam pa nyid dang / chos kyi mnyam pa nyid dang / dge 'dun gyi
356b6(mdo sde): mnyam pa nyid dang / zhing mnyam pa nyid de/ lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po 'od dag dang ldan na/ mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par 'gyur ro// lha'i bu gzhan yang byang chub
356b7(mdo sde): sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na/ mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par 'gyur te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ bsam gtan bzhis stong pa nyid la rnam par rtsa ba dang / pha rol
357a1(mdo sde): tu phyin pa drug gis thabs mkhas pa la rnam par rtse ba dang / mngon par shes pa lngas ye shes la rnam par rtse ba dang / thogs pa med pa'i ye shes kyis rdzu 'phrul/
357a2(mdo sde): la rnam par rtse ba ste/ 'od zer srung byang chub sems dpa' rlos bzhi po 'di dag dang ldanan// mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par 'gyur ro// 'od zer srung gzhan yang byang chub sems
357a3(mdo sde): dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na/ mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par 'gyur te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ phung po rnams la byang chub tshol yang phung po rnams la byang chub kyi rang bzhin
357a4(mdo sde): du mos pa ma yin pa dang / khams rnams la byang chub tshol yang khams rnams la byang chub kyi rang bzhin du mos pa ma yin pa dang / skye mched rnams la byang chub tshol yang skye mched rnams la
357a5(mdo sde): byang chub kyi rang bzhin du mi rtog pa dang / chos thams cad la byang chub tshol yang chos thams cad la byang chub kyi rang bzhin du mos pa ma yin pa ste/ 'od zer srung byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi
357a6(mdo sde): po 'di dag dang ldan na/ / mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par 'gyur ro// 'od zer srung gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' rlos bzhi dang ldan na/ mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par
357a7(mdo sde): 'gyur te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ mi g.yo ba'i tshul gyis chos thams cad yang dag pa'i mtha' la gnas par shes pa dang / dus gsum mnyam pa nyid pas chos thams cad
357b1(mdo sde): de bzhin nyid la gnas par 'jug pa dang / chos thams cad mtshan nyid 'dres pa med pas chos kyi dbyangs su 'du shes pa dang / chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid kyi rjes su song bas nam
357b2(mdo sde): mkha'i rang bzhin du so sor rtogs pa ste/ 'od zer srung byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po 'di dag dang ldan na/ mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par 'gyur ro// mi skye ba'i chos
357b3(mdo sde): la bzod pa thob pa bstan pa 'di bshad pa na/ byang chub sems dpa' lnga stong mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur to// lha'i bu 'od zer srung ni rjes su 'thun pa'i chos
357b4(mdo sde): la bzod pa thob par gyur to/ / chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i tha mar bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo khyod kyis mi 'am ci'i rgyal
357b5(mdo sde): bo ljon pas zhus pa/ pha rol tu phyin pas 'dul ba bstan pa'i sgo'i le'u'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bzung ngam/ kun dga' bos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas
357b6(mdo sde): kyi mthu nyid kyis bdag gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bzung lags so/ / bcom ldan 'das a la la ji tsam du chos kyi rnam grangs 'di zab mo rnam par nges pa dang / don bzang po dang / tshig
357b7(mdo sde): 'bru bzang pos brgyan pa ni mdzes te ngo mtshar to/ / bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rnam grangs 'dir/ bcom ldan 'das kyis rlos sgom bsdus pa de gang yang ma mchis so// bcom ldan
358a1(mdo sde): 'das sngon bdag la chos snang bar gyur pa gang lags pa de'ang da rlos kyi rnam grangs 'di la brten nas 'bum 'gyur du skyes so/ / bcom ldan 'das bdag ni 'di snyam/
358a2(mdo sde): du bdag lta bu nyi tshe ba'i 'tshal ba dang ldan pa/ blo chung ngu nyan thos kyi theg pa'i skyon ma mchis pa tha chad la zhugs par gnas pas chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos nas kyang 'di lta bu'o//
358a3(mdo sde): chos kyi snang ba 'di skyes par gyur na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ye shes tshad ma mchis pa'i snod du gyur pa/ blo rgya che zhing rgya mtsho lta bu dang ldan pa/ chos rin po
358a4(mdo sde): che thams cad yongs su 'dzin pa/ gsol ba ma btab par sems can thams cad kyi dge ba'i bshes gnyen bgyid pa gang lags pa de dag gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos nas/
358a5(mdo sde): chos kyi snang ba ji snyed cig thob par 'gyur ba lta smos kyang ci 'tshal snyam bgyid do// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi
358a6(mdo sde): khams kyi nyi ma dang zla ba'i snang ba ji snyed pa de thams cad ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i spu gcig gi 'od kyis mog mog por 'gyur ro/ / kun dga' bo de bzhin gshegs pa'i spu'i khung du
358a7(mdo sde): thams cad nas 'od ji snyed byung ba de dag ni shes rab kyi 'od kyi brgya'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro ste/ stong gi cha dang / stong phrag brgya'o cha dang / bye ba'i cha dang / bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong gi
358b1(mdo sde): cha dang / grangs dang / chad dang / bgrang ba dang / dpe dang rgyur yang nye bar mi 'gro'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ snang ba thams cad ni shes rab kyi snang ba las byung ba'i phyir ro// kun dga'
358b2(mdo sde): po de bzhin gshegs pa'i shes rab kyi snang ba gang yin pa'i shes rab kyi snang ba de dang ldan na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis 'das pa
358b3(mdo sde): dang ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi spyod pa dang / g.yo ba rnams mkhyen pa'i shes rab kyis snang ba de lta bu dang / rigs kyi bu dang / rigs
358b4(mdo sde): kyi bu mo dag dang ldan par 'gyur ro/ / kun dga' bo gang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di nyin pa dang / thos nas kyang mos pa dang / mos nas kyang 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang /
358b5(mdo sde): kun chub par byed pa dang / gzhan dag la'ang rgya cher rab tu ston pa dang / tshul bzhin du so sor rtogs pa dang / de bzhin nyid du sgrub pa de dag ni byang chub kyi sems mi brjed pa dang
358b6(mdo sde): sems can yongs su smin par bya ba don du gnyer ba dang / snying rje chen po'i go cha bgos pa dang / byams pa chen po'i go cha bgos pa dang / bdud dang phyir rgol ba bcom pa dang / byang chub kyi
358b7(mdo sde): snying por gzhol ba'i skyes bu dam par rig par bya'o/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das gang chos kyi rnam gra
359a1(mdo sde): 'di thos nas mos pa dang / 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par bgyid pa dang / gzhan dag la'ang rgya cher rab tu ston pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/
359a2(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu mo de bsod nams ji snyed gcig skyed par 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang gis snga dro'i dus kyi tshe/
359a3(mdo sde): stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rin po che sna bdun gyis rab tu bkang ste/ rgyun du zhugs pa dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang / phyir mi 'ong ba dang / dgra bco
359a4(mdo sde): pa dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la sbyin pa sbyin pa dang / de bzhin du nyi ma'i gung dang / phye ma red kyi dus dang / nam
359a5(mdo sde): gyi cha stod dang / nam gyi gung thun dang / tho rangs stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad rin po che sna bdun gyis yongs su bkang ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra
359a6(mdo sde): bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi bar la sbyin pa dang / rnam grangs 'di lta bus lo gcig gam/ lo brgya'am/ lo stong ngam/ lo brgya phrag stong du sbyin pa byin na
359a7(mdo sde): kun dga' bo de ji snyam du sems/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de bzhi de las bsod nams mang du skyed dam/ kun dga' bos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das song ste/ tshangs
359b1(mdo sde): mchis so/ / bde bar gshegs pa dpag tu ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das gdugs gcig bsags pa'i bsod nams kyi phung po de'ang tshad ma mchis na/ dgung lo brgya phrag stong du
359b2(mdo sde): bsags pa lta smos kyang ci 'tshal/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo khyod mos par bya'o// khyod kyis khong du chud par bya'o// byang chub don du gnyer ba dang / chos kyi
359b3(mdo sde): 'khor lo bskor ba don du gnyer ba dang / sems can rab tu thar par bya ba don du gnyer ba gang chos kyi rnam grangs 'od thos nas mos sam/ 'dzin tam/ 'chang ngam/ klog gam/ kun chub
359b4(mdo sde): par byed na/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa de las bsod nams kyi phung po mang du skyed na/ gang de bzhin nyid du sgrub pa lta smos kyang ci dgos/ de ci'i
359b5(mdo sde): phyir zhe na/ kun dga' bo gang dag chos kyi rnam grangs 'di las tha na tshig bzhi pa'i tshigs su bcad pa tsam 'dzin tam/ 'chang ngam/ klog pa 'am/ kun chub par byed dam/ gzhan dag
359b6(mdo sde): la'ang ston na/ de ni sbyin pa zhes bya ste/ des ni sbyin pa thams cad zil gyis gnon pa'o// 'di lta ste/ chos kyi sbyin pa 'di ni sbyin pa thams cad kyi mchog go// 'di lta ste/ chos kyis
359b7(mdo sde): phan 'dogs pa de ni phan 'dogs pa rnams kyi mchog go/ / 'di lta ste/ chos kyi gding ba de ni gding ba rnams kyi mchog go// 'odi lta ste/ chos yongs su 'dzin pa de ni yongs su 'dzin
360a1(mdo sde): pa rnams kyi mchog go/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kun dga' bo chos kyi sbyin pa byin pas ni nyon mongs pa 'bri bar 'gyur ro// zang zing gi sbyin pa byin pas ni
360a2(mdo sde): lus brtan pa byas par 'gyur ro/ / kun dga' bo de lta bas na byang chub sems dpa' nyon mongs pa 'bri bar byed par 'dod pas/ sangs rgyas kyi gnang ba chos kyi sbyin pa sbyin par byas
360a3(mdo sde): te chos kyi sbyin pa des ni yon tan gyi khyad par thams cad thob par 'gyur ro/ / byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi sbyin pa sbyin pa ni/ yon tan gyis phan yon yang dag phul sum cu rtsa gnyis
360a4(mdo sde): rab tu 'dzin par 'gyur te/ sum cu rtsa gnyis gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ dran pa dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang / blo gros dang ljon par 'gyur ba dang / rtogs pa dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang
360a5(mdo sde): 'dod chags rlung bar 'gyur ba dang / zhe sdang chung bar 'gyur ba dang / gti mug chung bar 'gyur ba dang / bdag dang gzhan gyi nyon mongs pa tshar gcod par 'gyur ba dang / skye bo mang
360a6(mdo sde): po dga' bar 'gyur ba dang / de'i bsngags pa lha rnams kyis rjod par 'gyur ba dang / lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za rnams kyis srung bar 'gyur ba dang // las byos nas
360a7(mdo sde): bsod snyoms za bar 'gyur ba dang / chos gos dang / bsod snyoms dang / mal cha dang / na ba'i gsos sman dang / yo byad rnyed par 'gyur ba dang / grags pa dang / sgra dang /
360b1(mdo sde): tshigs su bcad pa phyogs bcur grags par 'gyur ba dang / mi ma yin pa rnams kyis glags rnyed par mi 'gyur ba dang / rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis bsngags par 'gyur ba dang
360b2(mdo sde): dam pa'i chos yongs su srung ba dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi dam pa'i chos 'gyur ba dang / ngan song thams cad kyis 'jig par mi 'gyur zhing / de la lha dang mir skye ba
360b3(mdo sde): dka' bar mi 'gyur ba dang / sangs rgyas mthong ba dang 'bral bar mi 'gyur ba dang / chos nyan pa dang 'bral bar mi 'gyur ba dang / dge 'dun la bsnyen bkur byed pa dang 'bral bar mi
360b4(mdo sde): 'gyur ba dang / skye ba dran par 'gyur ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par skye bar 'gyur ba dang / nam du'ang dbang po ma tshang bar mi 'gyur ba dang / skyes bu chen po'i
360b5(mdo sde): mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis thob par 'gyur ba dang / gzi brjid can gyi gzungs kyi sa bon sgrub par 'gyur pa dang / spobs pa rgyun mi 'chad pa'i rgyu rab tu 'dzin par 'gyur ba dang
360b6(mdo sde): skye bo mkhas pas g.yog bya bar 'gyur ba dang / shes rab chen po'i rgyu rab tu 'dzin par 'gyur ba dang / myur du chos kyi snang ba thob par 'gyur ba dang / de'i sems la tshul
360b7(mdo sde): bzhin ma yin pa yid la byed pa kun tu mi 'byung ba dang / 'jig rten gyi zang zing gi sbyin pa thams cad zil gyis mnan nas/ de chos kyi gtor zad mi shes pa yongs su
361a1(mdo sde): par 'gyur ba ste/ kun dga' bo byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi sbyin pa sbyin pa de/ yon tan gyi khyad par yang dag dul sum cu rtsa gnyis po 'di dag thob par
361a2(mdo sde): 'gyur ro/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag gis kyang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bzung lags te/
361a3(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i slad na/ sems can snod du gyur pa de dag gi rna lam du bsgrag par bgyi/ mos par bgyi/ kun bsrung bar bgyi'o// de ci'i slad du
361a4(mdo sde): zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das bdag ni yon tan phun sum tshogs pa 'di dang / bsod nams yongs su 'dzin pa don du gnyer ba'i slad du'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lha rnams kyi dbang
361a5(mdo sde): po brgya byin la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ ko'u shi ka khyod dam pa'i chos yongs su gzung ba'i phyir/ nga'i mdun du seng ge'i sgra bsgrags la legs so legs so// ko'u shi ka dge
361a6(mdo sde): ba'i rtsa ba 'dis nga'i dam pa'i chos yun ji srid gcig tu gnas pa de srid du lha dang lha ma yin g.yul 'gyed pa na/ lha ma yin rnams ni pham par 'gyur/ lha rnams ni rgyal bar
361a7(mdo sde): 'gyur ro/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau chu shig chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni chos yang dag phul yin te/ ko 'u shi ka 'di lta ste/ chos thams cad mi ngomigs pa de ni 'jigs pa med zan
361b1(mdo sde): sbyin pa'o/ / ko'u shi ka gang cung zad 'jigs pa skye ba de dag thams cad ni 'jig tshogs la lta ba la dmigs shing rab tu gnas pa las byung ngo // ko'u shi ka gang mi dmigs pa de dam pa'i
361b2(mdo sde): chos yongs su 'dzin pa'o/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag bsam gtan gyi bde ba la gnas pa tshad ma
361b3(mdo sde): mchis pa btang ste/ grong dang / grong khyer dang / grong rdal dang / ljongs dang / yul 'khor dang / rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor gang dang gang na chos kyi rnam grangs 'di rab tu spyod pa de dang
361b4(mdo sde): de dag tu bdag chos nyan pa'i slad du nye bar mchi bar bgyi'o/ / mchis nas kyang chos smra ba de dag chos dang ldan pas bsrung ba dang / sba ba dang / bskyab par bgyi'o// de ci'i slad du zhe na/
361b5(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba dang / 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po rnams ni 'di las 'byung ba'i slad du'o//
361b6(mdo sde): de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ rgyal po chen po bzhes 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das rgyal po bzhi po bdag cag dang / bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos chen po de dag dang
361b7(mdo sde): bdag cag gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ring du gnas par bgyi ba'i slad du/ bsrung ba dang / sba ba dang / bskyab pa la brtson par bgyi'o// bdag cag gis 'khor gang dag sangs rgyas
362a1(mdo sde): dang sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa la ma dad pa de dag kyang / ci nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa bsrung ba'i slad du brtson par 'gyur bar dad par bgyi'o//
362a2(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma gang dag sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa la brtson pa dang / gzhan yang bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la mngon
362a3(mdo sde): par dad pa srung ba ma mchis pa de dag bsrung ba'i ched du gsang sngags kyi tshig 'di dag kha ton du bgyi'o/ / gsang sngags kyi tshig de dag gis gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / dri za dang /
362a4(mdo sde): mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / grul bum la sogs pa dang / mi dang mi ma yin pa lags pa dang / gzhan yang sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa la zhe sdang bar bgyid pa rnams shin tu tshar/
362a5(mdo sde): gcod par 'gyur ro// tad+ya thA/ ta ra be a ra be/ a no be/ sa ra be/ hu lu/ mah+ma hu lu/ hu lu hu lu/ A bad De/ bi kad Di/ pa rits+tshe dA na/ nik+thaHti/ rbe g+hA ta ni/ id
362a6(mdo sde): Di i Di/ bid Di bid Te/ adade tshe g+hats+tshe/ mA ra ni gra ha na sarba ba ra pra bA daM ni gra ha na/ sarba mid r+yA pra yA DA nan ni gra ha na/ sarba b+hu ta ni gra ha na/ bud d+ha te ba ra ni/ dA d+hA ma no yen ta shA ya/
362a7(mdo sde): bud d+ha na bud d+ha ba ran tan/ tsa tur mahA rA dza nir de shA na/ man tra ba lan/ a ba tA ra pr-i k+Shi nA na gr-i hA ya/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ byang chub sems dpe'i byams pa dang /
362b1(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' lha'i cod pan la bka' stsal ba/ skyes bu dam pa dag ngas bskal pa mtha' yas grangs med par yang dag par bsgrubs pa'i byang chub 'di ci nas yun ring du
362b2(mdo sde): gnas par 'gyur pa dang / nub par mi 'gyur bar bya ba'i phyir/ khyed gnyis kyi lag tu bzhag go// gtad do// de gnyis kyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag cag
362b3(mdo sde): gnyis kyis bcom ldan 'das yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i slad na chos kyi rnam grangs 'od gzung bar bgyi'o/ / rgyas par bgyi'o// chos kyi rnam grangs 'di chos smra ba dang /
362b4(mdo sde): dge ba'i rtsa ba bskrun pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de dag gi lag tu mchi bar bgyi'o// de dag mdo sde 'di la mos par bgyi ba dang / yongs su 'dzin par bgyi ba'i
362b5(mdo sde): slad du de dag gi yid rab tu gzung bar bgyi'o/ / bcom ldan 'das slad ma'i che slang ma'i dus na/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di gang dag gi rna lam du thos pa dang / thos nas 'dzin pa dang
362b6(mdo sde): 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par bgyid pa dang / 'chad pa de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' byams pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' lha'i cod pan gyi byin gyi rlabs lags
362b7(mdo sde): par rig par bgyi'o/ / de nas bdud sdig can 'khor der 'dus par gyur nas 'dug pa de gdong las mchi ma zag cing nga ro byung nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol
363a1(mdo sde): tobacom ldan 'das gang bcom ldan 'das kyis nyan thos kyi theg pa las brtsams te chos bstan pa de la ni bdag tha na spu zing zhes bgyid pa tsam yang ma mchis so/ /
363a2(mdo sde): gang bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' phyag rgya de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyis byin gyis brlabs pa/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi byang chub kyi lam la
363a3(mdo sde): 'jug pa/ sems can thams cad kyi ston pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di gsung ba des bdag mya ngan gyi zug rngu dang ldan zhing bdag rnyis par gyur par snyam bgyid do// bcom ldan
363a4(mdo sde): 'das bdag la phyag brkyang ba stsal du gsol/ gang thos pas bdag mya ngan gyi zug rngu dang ldan par 'gyur pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di lta bu'ang mi gsung bar gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis
363a5(mdo sde): bka' stsal pa/ sdig can khyod dang 'thun pa'i sems can chos zab mo 'di lta bu la mo mos pa ni mang / gang dag mos pa'i sems can de dag ni nyung gis mya ngan ma byed/ smre sngags ma
363a6(mdo sde): 'don cig/ sdig cen khyod 'di lta ste/ dper na sa'i steng nas rdul blangs pa snyed kyi sems can ni chos kyi rnam grangs zab mo 'di lta bu la mos so// sa'i rdul ji snyed pa de skyed
363a7(mdo sde): kyi sems can ni chos kyi rnam grangs zab mo 'di la mi mos te/ de dag thams cad ni khyod dang 'thun no// sems can gyi khams tshad med pa khyod dang 'thun gyis/ de bas na sdig can
363b1(mdo sde): dga' bar gyis/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad pa na/ sems can dpag tu med pa ni byang chub la yang dag par zhugs/ byang chub sems dpa' dgu khri nyis stong ni mi skye ba'i
363b2(mdo sde): chos la bzod pa thob par gyur to/ / srog chags brgyad khri bzhi stong ni chos rnams la chos kyi mag rdul med cing dri ma dang bral ba rnam par dag go/ dge slong brgyad stong ni nye bar len pa
363b3(mdo sde): med par zag pa rnams las sems rnam par grol lo/ / stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di'ang rnam pa drug tu g.yos nas snang ba chen pos 'jig rten khyab par
363b4(mdo sde): gyur te/ lha'i me tog gi char ni rab tu phab/ sil snyan brgyad stong dag ni ma dkrol bar rang khrol lo// lha bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong rnams ni steng gi bar snang las kye ma bdag ca
363b5(mdo sde): gis 'dzam bu'i gling du chos kyi 'khor lo lan gnyis bskor ba 'di mthong ngo / / bcom ldan 'das kyis gang yang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bstan te bshad nas/ sems can gyi don mdzad pa
363b6(mdo sde): gang lags pa 'di ni grong khyer wA rA nA sir chos kyi 'khor lo bskor te/ sems can yongs su smin par mdzad pa de bas ches mchog go// gang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'dzin pa dang / 'chang
363b7(mdo sde): ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par 'gyid pa dang / gzhan dag la rgya cher ston pa dang / tha na glegs bam lo bris te 'chang ba'i sems can de dag kyang chos kyi 'khor lo skor bar 'gyur/
364a1(mdo sde): ro zhes ched du brjod do// de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ byang chub sems dpa' byams pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' lha'i cod pan dang / tshe dang ldan pa
364a2(mdo sde): kun dga' bos 'di skad ces gsol to/ / bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i ming ci lags/ 'odi ji ltar gzung bar bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// rigs
364a3(mdo sde): kyi bu dag de'i phyir khyed kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di mo 'am ci'i rgyal po ljon pas zhus pa pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par nges pa bstan pa dang / dam pa'i chos rin po che'i le'u zhes bya bar zung zhig
364a4(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ byang chub sems dpa' byams pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' lha'i cod pan dang / tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo
364a5(mdo sde): dang lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// 'phags pa mo 'am ci'i rgyal po
364a6(mdo sde): ljon pas zhus pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so/ / / the chen gyi lo tsa ba ban+de dpal gyi lhun po dang / ban d+he dpal brtsegs rika tas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan
364a7(mdo sde): la phab pa/ / rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya su bi krAn ta tsi na ta de ba puM tra pa ri pr-its+tsha nA ma ma hA yAn sU tra/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa lha'i bu rab rtsal
364b1(mdo sde): sems kyis zhus pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/ bam po dang po/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag
364b2(mdo sde): gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das mnyan du yod pa na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na/ dge slong khri'o dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang
364b3(mdo sde): 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan dag nas 'dus pa'i byang chub sems dpa' stong phrag rab tu mang po dang / 'dod pa na spyod pa dang / gzugs na spyod pa'i lha'i bu rnams dang / de las gzhan/
364b4(mdo sde): lha'i burnamA dang / klu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho la sogs pa gnod sbyin gyi 'khor mang po rnams dang / nam mkhar lding gi rgyal po stobs chen la sogs pa nam mkha' lding gi 'khor mang po rnams dang / lha ma yin gyi dbang
364b5(mdo sde): po sgra gcan la sogs pa lha ma yon gyi 'khor mang po rnams dang / mo 'am ci'i rgyal po ljon pa la sogs pa mi 'am ci'i 'khor mang po rnams dang / lto 'phye chen po'i dbang po lag
364b6(mdo sde): bzangs la sogs pa lto 'phye chen po'i 'khor mang po rnams dang / rgyal po chen po bzhi 'khor dang bcas pa rnams dang / lha'i dbang po brgya byin lha'i bu stong phrag mang po'i 'khor dang
364b7(mdo sde): bcas pa dang / mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa tshangs ras kyi lha'i bu 'bum phrag du ma'i 'khor dang bcas pa dang / rgyal po gsal rgyal 'khor stong phrag du ma dang bcas pa dang
365a1(mdo sde): khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin 'khor dang bcas pa dang thabs cig tu bzhugs te/ de dag la sogs pa 'khor bzhi po rnams kyis yongs su bskor cing mdun gyis
365a2(mdo sde): bltas te chos ston to/ / de'i tshe na 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa 'khor de nyid du 'dus par gyur te 'dug go// lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa
365a3(mdo sde): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog pa rab rtsa la sems kyang 'dus par gyur te 'dug go/ de nas lha'i bu rab rtsal sems kyis 'khor phal po che de 'dus par
365a4(mdo sde): rig nas/ stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ bcom
365a5(mdo sde): ldan 'das la 'ad skad ces gsol to/ / bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po la gzhan gyi drang mi 'jog pa rnams lagos/ ji ltar na byang chu
365a6(mdo sde): sems dpa' sems dpa chen po brtsam pa thams cad la brtson 'grus brtan pa rnams lags/ ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsod nams dag gis mngon par
365a7(mdo sde): 'phags pa rnams lags/ ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ye shes kyis chags pa ma mchis par spyod pa rnams lags/ ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems
365b1(mdo sde): dpa' chen po shes rab kyis mun pa dang bral ba rnams lags/ ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'khor rnams kyi nang du 'jigs pa dang bral ba rnams lags/ ji ltaran
365b2(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thos pas don la rton pa rnams lags/ ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jig rten gyi tshul gyis chos la rton pa rnams
365b3(mdo sde): lags/ ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis gsungs pa bzhin du smra ba rnams lags/ ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems
365b4(mdo sde): dpa' chen po sems can rnams la chos smra ba rnams lags/ ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mngon par shes pa rnams kyis mngon par 'phags pa rnams lags/ ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa'
365b5(mdo sde): sems dpa' chen po bdud thams cad kyis thul bar dka' ba rnams lags/ 'ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po blos gting dpag dka' ba rnams lags/ ji ltar na byang chub sem dpa' sem dpa' chen po
365b6(mdo sde): 'jig rten gyi chos brgyad kyis mi gos rnas la/ / ji k+tan byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gting dpag dka' zhing zab mo la spyod pa rnams lags/ ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa'
365b7(mdo sde): sems dpa' chen po chos ston pas dbang po la mkhas pa rnams lags/ ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'dus ma byas dang ma 'dres pas rnam par thar pa'i sgor gnas
366a1(mdo sde): pa rnams lags/ ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lhag pa'i nga rgyal can char gcad pa'o slad du snrel zhir bsgrub pa la mkhas pa rnams lags/ ji ltar/
366a2(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po las kyi bgyi ba thams cad kyi rgyu la mkhas pa rnams lags/ ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lta ba'i rnam pa dang bral zhing rten ci
366a3(mdo sde): 'brel par 'byung ba la mkhas pa rnams lags/ ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can yongs su smin par bgyi ba dag la thabs la mkhas pa rnams lags
366a4(mdo sde): ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam pa yongs su dag pas brtul zhugs grub pa rnams lags/ ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhe 'gras
366a5(mdo sde): pa'o sems ma mchis shing bzod pa'i stobs dang ldan pa rnams lags/ ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad kyi pha rol tu son pa rnams
366a6(mdo sde): lags/ ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can thams cad kyi nye bar 'tsho ba rnams lags/ ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jig
366a7(mdo sde): rten thams cad mngon par 'du bar 'gyur ba rnams lags/ ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po srog chags thams cad kyis bsngags par 'gyur ba rnams lags
366b1(mdo sde): ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dge ba'i spyod pa thams cad la rmas pa ma mchis pa rnams lags/ ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab
366b2(mdo sde): dag la rgya mtsho lta bu rnams lags/ ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos la dbang sgyur bas dbang phyug tu gyur pa rnams lags/ ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa'
366b3(mdo sde): sems dpa' chen po 'gyi ba thams cad la slob dpon du gyur pa rnams lags/ ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad du khan ma tho ba ma mchis shing yon
366b4(mdo sde): tan rnam pa thams cad dang ldan pa rnams lags/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis/ lha'i bur rabartsal sems la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rab rtsal
366b5(mdo sde): sems legs so legs so/ / lha'i bu khyod byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jog rten thams cad las mngon par 'phags pa/ 'jig rten gyi yongs su 'dren pa/ snying
366b6(mdo sde): rje chen po dang ldan pa/ bskal pa grangs med pa nas go cha bgos pa/ brtson 'grus shin tu brtan pa/ ded dpon chen po/ sems can dpag tu med pa'i don byed pa/ sems can dpag tu med pa
366b7(mdo sde): thang bde ba la rab tu 'god pa la mkhas pa/ yon tan dpag tu med pa dang ldan pa rnams kyi don du de bzhin gshegs pa la yongs su zhu ba ni yang khyod legs so// lha'i bu de'i phyir legs par rab tu nyon la yid
367a1(mdo sde): la zung zhig dang / ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi yon tan gyi khyad par de dag dang / gzhan dag kyang 'thob par 'gyur ba ngas khyod la bshad par bya'o//
367a2(mdo sde): lha'i bu rab rtsal sems kyis bcom ldan 'das de ltar 'tshal lo zhes gsol to// bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar nyan pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// lha'i bu byang chub sa
367a3(mdo sde): dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos bzhi dang ldan na/ / theg pa chen po la gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog pa rnams yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ thab mkhas pas mngon par bsgrub pa'i shes rab dang / snying
367a4(mdo sde): chen pos mngon par bsgrubs pa'i byams pa dang / don dang chos kyis mngon par bsgrubs pa'i spobs pa dang / byang chub kyi yan lag gi rnam par mngon par bsgrubs pa'i mngon par shes pa lnga// /
367a5(mdo sde): po dag ste/ lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na// theg pa chen po la gzhan gyi drang mi 'jog pa rnams yin no// de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ thab
367a6(mdo sde): la mkhas pa mngon par sgrub par byed pa yi/ / mngon sum shes rab rtogs par khong du chud gyur cing / thams cad bskyab phyir snying rje chen po yangs pa la// gnas pa'i byams pa mngon par
367a7(mdo sde): sgrub par byed gyur la/ / don dang chos la shin tu mkhas par 'gyur ba yi/ so so yang dag rig la spobs pa thob gyur la// byang chub lam la mngon shes dag gis rnam rtsa na// des na gzhan
367b1(mdo sde): gyi dring la 'jog par mi 'gyur ro/ / lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos bzhi dang ldan na/ brtsam pa thams cad la brtson 'grus brtan pa rnams yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ phyir ma
367b2(mdo sde): ldog pa'i brtson 'grus dang / bsam pa dag pa'i rtul ba dang / byang chub la 'dun pa drag po dang ldan pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos yongs su bsgrub pa la yid yongs su mi skyo ba dang ldan pa ste/ lha'i
367b3(mdo sde): bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na/ brtsam pa thams cad la brtson 'grus brtan pa yin no// de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ brtson 'grus brtan zhing /
367b4(mdo sde): rab tu gnas pa med gyur cing // bsam pa rnyog pa med cing yongs su dag gyur la// sangs rgyas ye shes don phyir 'dun pa drag ldan zhing // sangs rgyas chos rnams 'dod cing rtag tu yongs
367b5(mdo sde): mi skyo/ gang la chos pon rgya chen khyad par de yod pa// de ni byang chub sems 'byung brtsam pa brtan 'gyur zhing // byang chub yan lag lag mthil bzhag pa bzhin 'gyur la// ring po mi
367b6(mdo sde): thogs 'jig rten gsum gyi chos rgyal 'gyur/ / lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos bzhi dang ldan na/ bsod nams dag gis mngon par 'phags pa rnams yin te// /
367b7(mdo sde): bzhi gang zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la 'doms par byed pa dang / sems can gang dag byang chub tu sems ma skyed pa de dag byang chub tu sems bskyed
368a1(mdo sde): du 'jug pa dang / sprul pa lta bur dus gsum yongs su spro ba dang / byang chub kyi sems ma bral bas dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad skyed pa mngon par 'du byed pa ste/ chos bzhi po de
368a2(mdo sde): dag dang ldan pa'o/ / de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ mkhas pa gang dag shes rab pha rol phyin 'doms shing // byang chub zhugs pas byang chub sems 'dzin 'jug byed la// gang dag byang chub zhugs pas
368a3(mdo sde): dus gsum yi rang zhing / / yid dang ma bral sprul 'dra byang chub 'dod byed la// dge ba gang yin cung zad byed pa thams cad ni// thams cad mkhyen nyid sems la rten par byed pa yin// lha'i
368a4(mdo sde): bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos bzhi dang ldan na/ ye shes kyis chags pa med par spyod pa rnams yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ shes pas byas pa'i bya ba rnams byed cing
368a5(mdo sde): nga rgyal gyis bya ba rnams mi byed pa dang / chos thams cad rkyen la rag las shing byin gyis rlob pa med la gang zag dang bral bar shes pa dang / stong pa nyid kyi spyod yul du gyur cing / sems can
368a6(mdo sde): thams cad mi gtong ba'i bsam pa dang ldan pa dang / chags pa thams cad las yang dag par 'das shing skye mched drug yongs su shes pa srung ba ste/ chos bzhi po de dag dang ngo // de la 'od skad
368a7(mdo sde): ces bya ste/ shes pas las byed de dag nga rgyal yod min zhing // brtan la mkhas pa yin zhing de dag lta med la// stong nyid spyod yul de dag sems can mi gtong zhing // chags pa kun las 'das shing
368b1(mdo sde): phyi nang gnas pa med/ / chos mchog bzhi po de la shin tu rab gnas pa// shes pas pha rol phyin cing chags med spyod pa yin// lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos bzhi dang
368b2(mdo sde): ldan na/ shes rab kyi mun dang bral ba rnams yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ thos pas ngoms pa med cing tshul bzhin la rab tu sbyor ba dang / zang zing med pa'i sems kyis chos ston pa dang / chos kyi dbyings
368b3(mdo sde): dbyer med pa shes par bya ba'i phyir nyon mongs pa thams cad la sgyu ma lta bur so sor rtog pa dang / tshul gcig la 'jug pas tshul thams cad kyi 'jug pa la 'jug pa ste/ chos bzhi po de dag dang
368b4(mdo sde): ngo / / de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ de dag thos tshol ngoms med tshul bzhin rtog byed cing // de mnyam ston cing klog 'dzin rnyed pa tshel ma byed// nyon mongs sprin 'dra sgyu ma rmi lam lta bur lta//
368b5(mdo sde): chos nyid tha dad mi byed de dag tshul gcig 'jug/ che bdag chos bzhi de sten khyad par thob 'gyur zhing // shes rab sgron 'das mun bsal zla ltar 'jig rten rgyu// lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems
368b6(mdo sde): dpa' chen po chos bzhi dang ldan na/ 'khor rnams kyi nang du 'jigs pa dang bral ba rnams yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ thos pa thams cad 'dzin pa'i gzungs thob pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi the tsom
368b7(mdo sde): gcod pa'i spobs pa thob pa dang / sems can thams cad la bdag med pa ston pa'i snying rje chen po dang / bdud dang nyon mongs pa dang bral ba mngon par shes pa'i ye shes kyi go cha bgos pa ste// ches
369a1(mdo sde): po de dag dang ngo / / de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ thon tu chud mi za bar 'gyur ba'i gzungs thob cing // de dag spobs ldan sems can som nyi gcod par byed// snying rjes
369a2(mdo sde): chos 'di thams cad bdag med ston byed cing / / mngon shes shes pa'i go bgos nyon mongs bdud mang nyams// byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po dag gis 'jug na// 'khor kun nang du song
369a3(mdo sde): yang de la 'jigs pa med/ / lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos bzhi dang ldan na/ thos pas don la rton pa rnams yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ thos pa thams cad mi 'dzin pas
369a4(mdo sde): thos pa dang mi ldan zhing / sgrub pa nyams pa'i byis pa thams cad yongs su spong ba dang / yi ge dang / sgra dang / skad dang / tshig gi lam thams cad mngon du rnam par shes par bya ba'i phyir brag
369a5(mdo sde): cha dang mtshungs pa nyid khong du chud pa dang / don 'dod pa nyid kyi phyir thos pa yongs su tshol zhing dga' mgur bya ba'i phyir ma yin pa dang / brjod pa med pa'i don la 'jug cing brjod pa'i don la
369a6(mdo sde): sa yin pa ste/ chos bzhi po de dag dang ngo // de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ ji tsam mang du thos kyang don la mi rtog pas// byis pa thos dang ma ldan rtag tu sgrub chos nyams// srid bsnam snga
369a7(mdo sde): skad dbyangs dang tshig lam gang yod pa/ / thag cha 'drar shes de las don ldan sgra thos nas// don nyid rtog cing dga' mgur nyes kun phyir mo 'jug/ chos nyid 'di ni don mchog yin te/
369b1(mdo sde): brjod du med// 'di na don dang sgra skad thos par gyur pa las// 'gro ba rnams su 'gro bar byed cing 'gro bar 'gyur// lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos bzhi dang
369b2(mdo sde): ldan na/ 'jig rten gyi tshul gyis chos la rton pa rnams yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ bre mo gtam byed pa rnams la chos ston pa dang / skye bo phal po che 'dus pa dag la 'chi ba rjes su dran pa dang /
369b3(mdo sde): gtong ba chen po dag la rjes su yi rang zhing byang chub tu yongs su sngo ba dang / 'du 'dzi thams cad las dben par gzhol ba ste/ chos bzhi po de dag dang ngo // de la 'di skad ces bya ste/
369b4(mdo sde): gang tshe skye bo mang po'i dbus su son gyur pa// der ni mkhas pas chos kyi gtam la 'jug par bya// skye bo mang po 'dus par gyur pa'i tshogs rnams la// 'chi bar 'gyur ba'i 'du shes
369b5(mdo sde): rab tu bsgom par bya/ / de nas bag yod gzhan gyi gtong ba rnam lnga yi// gtong la yi rang byas nas byang chub bsngo bya zhing // gang tshe 'du 'dzi dag dang phrad par gyur po'i tshe// der ni dben par
369b6(mdo sde): gzhol ba rab tu 'dod par bya/ / lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos bzhi dang ldan na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis gsungs pa bzhin du smra ba rnams
369b7(mdo sde): yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ byang chub kyi sems mi gtong ba dang / thos pa sgrub pa snying por byed pa dang / ji skad smras pa de bzhin du byed pa dang / rang bzhin gyis bdag med pa la 'jug pa ste/
370a1(mdo sde): chos bzhi po de dag dang ngo // de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ nyam nga gnod par gyur kyang byang chub sems mi gtong // de dag skyob pa'i chos thos sgrub pa snying por byed// bka' blo bde
370a2(mdo sde): 'thun ji skad smras pa de bzhin byed/ / mkhas pa de dag chos kun rang bzhin bdag med 'jug/ de ltar brtson pa'i shes ldan spras bzhin byed 'gyur zhing // rtag brtson mi 'dor rjes 'thun bdag med
370a3(mdo sde): yang med/ / rtag tu snyan pa'i 'brang 'phyogs bcur grags 'gyur zhing // de ltar chos spyad dag chos kyi shes pas 'phags// lha bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos pa'i dang ldanan//
370a4(mdo sde): sems can rnams la chos smra ba rnams yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ bdag nyid sgrub pa la gnas shing sems can rnams la chos ston pa dang / bdag nyid dul ba dang / bsrung ba dang / sgrol ba dang / brtul
370a5(mdo sde): ba dang / yongs su mya ngan las 'das shing sems can gzhan dag dul bar bya ba dang / bsrung ba dang / dgrol ba dang / gdul ba dang / yongs su mya ngan las bzla ba'i phyir chos ston par byed pa dang /
370a6(mdo sde): bdag nyid yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bsam pa nges par gyur cing / sems can rnams kyang theg pa chen po la rab tu 'god par byed pa dang / bdag nyid chos 'dod cing chos 'dod pas
370a7(mdo sde): gzhan dag la'ang ston par byed pa ste/ chos bzhi po de dag dang ngo // de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ sgrub pa snying por byed cing 'gro la chos ston la// dul bsrungs legs btul shin tu mya ngan
370b1(mdo sde): 'das nas kyang / / gang dag ma dul ma bsrungs ma btul mya ngan las// ma 'das de dag chos kyi dkon mchog 'byor par 'dzud// de dag byang chub sems dpa' bsam pa nges gyur cing // theg
370b2(mdo sde): pa de la 'gro ba rnams kyang 'god par byed/ / rtag tu chos 'dod don ldan bla ma gus byed cing // sems can rnams la'ang de dang 'thun pa'i chos rnams ston// lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa'
370b3(mdo sde): sems dpa' chen po chos bzhi dang ldan na/ mngon par shes pa rnams kyis mngon par 'phags pa rnams yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ yang dang yang du tshangs po'i gnas pa bzhis gnas pa dang / rtag par
370b4(mdo sde): rgyun du rab tu dben par gnas pa dang / / chos zab mo la bzod pa dang / lus dang sems mnyam pa nyid du shes pa ste/ chos bzhi po de dag dang ngo // de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ tshangs pa'i gnas pa dang
370b5(mdo sde): la rtag tu rab gnas shing / / dben par gnas pa la yang dga' ba skyed byed la// shes pas zab mo'o bzod la nges pa thob gyur cing // mkha' dang mnyam pa'i sems dang ldan par gyur pa ste//
370b6(mdo sde): de ltar mngon par brtson pa'i 'jigs pa med pa rnams// mngon shes lnga po dag gis mngon par 'phags gyur cing // de dag sangs rgyas rnams kyi spyan sngar 'dug 'dral// sems
370b7(mdo sde): can bang po rnams kyang yongs su sprin byed 'gyur/ / lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ches bzhi dang ldan na/ bdud thams cad kyis thul bar dka' ba rnams yin te/
371a1(mdo sde): bzhi gang zhe na/ stong pa nyid kyi rnam pas mngon par bsgrubs pa'i bsam gtan bzhi dang / sems can thams cad mi gtong bar snying rje chen po dang / dkon mchog gsum gyi
371a2(mdo sde): gdung mi gcod pa'i brtson 'grus dang / thabs la mkhas pas mngon par bsgribs pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug ste/ chos bzhi po de dag dang ngo // de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ mtshan med stong pas
371a3(mdo sde): nges pa'i bsam gtan bzhi sgom zhing / / sems can yongs su bskya phyir rtag tu snying rje ldan// dkon mchog gsum rgyun mi gcod brtson 'grus thob gyur cing // kun tu thabs ldan pa rol phyin pa drug
371a4(mdo sde): la 'jug/ de ltar spyod mkhas blo ldan che bdag yid gzhungs pa// de dag bdud bzhi dag las yang dag 'das gyur cing // bdud kyi lcags kyus zin pa'i 'gro ba mgon med rnams// mya ngan 'da' bar
371a5(mdo sde): 'gro ba'i lam la 'god par byed/ / lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos bzhi dang ldan na/ blos gting dpag dka' ba rnams yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ chos zang mo'i tshul la
371a6(mdo sde): 'jug pa dang / rtag tu don dang ldan zhing bsnyen par dka' ba dang / rtag tu yang phyung zhing chos sems par byed pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi ye shes sgrib pa med pa la sems kyis nges par rtog par byed
371a7(mdo sde): pa ste/ chos bzhi po de dag ngang ngo // de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ zab mo'i chos kyi tshul la zhugs par gyur pa dang // rtag tu don dang ldan zhing bsnyen par dka' 'gyur la// rtag tu yid byung chos
371b1(mdo sde): labasam bzhugs gyur cing / / sems kyis nges par rtog par byed pa gang yin pa'i// mkhas pa theg pa che la brtan par rab gnas pa// blo rnams dag gis gting dpag dka' bar rab 'gyur zhing //
371b2(mdo sde): chags pa med pa'i ye shes yang dag sgrub byed pa// de phyir blo rnams dag gis gting dpag dka' ba yin// lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos bzhi dang ldan na/ 'jig rten
371b3(mdo sde): gyi chos brgyad kyis mi gos pa rnams yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ rnyed pa dang / snyan pa dang / bstod pa dang / bde bar khengs pa med pa dang / ma rnyed pa dang / ma snyan pa dang / smad pa dang / sdug bsngal
371b4(mdo sde): gyis zhum pa med pa dang / sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir/ phung po rnams la yongs su spyod par byed pa dang / phung po yongs su shes pa srung zhing dben par lta ba ste/ chos bzhi po de dag
371b5(mdo sde): dang ngo / / de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ rnyed dang sman dang bstod dang bde ba kun thob kyang // de dag la ni rnams kyang khengs par 'gyur ba med// ma rnyed mi snyan smad dang sdug bsngal thob myur kyang // de dag
371b6(mdo sde): pad+ma bzhin du chags med 'jig rten spyod/ / sems can smin par bya phyir phung po yongs spyod cing // phung po sgyu ma gsog 'dra ya ma brlar shes pa// sems can pha na bde'i don du 'jig rten spyod
371b7(mdo sde): byed kyang / / 'jig rten chos kyis mi gos tshul khrims spos dang ldan// lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos bzhi dang ldan na// gting dpag dka' zhing zab mo la spyod pa rnams
372a1(mdo sde): @yin te/ bzhi dang zhe na/ bdag la bdag med pa dang / sems can la sems can med pa dang / chos dben pa dang / shes pa chags pa med pa ste/ chos bzhi po de dag dngango //
372a2(mdo sde): de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ bdag la bdag med nyid du yongs su shes gyur cing // sems can sems can med par rjes su rtogs gyur la// chos rnams dben pa nyid du yongs su rtogs gyur cing //
372a3(mdo sde): mkha' la lag bzhin shes pa chags pa yod min pa'o// dpa' rnams zab mo dag la yongs su spyod byed pa// spyod pa med la rtag tu spyod par byed gyur cing // 'dzin dang kun 'dzin kun dang
372a4(mdo sde): rnams bral bas/ / sems can dag pa de dag de phyir gting dpag dka'// lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos bzhi dang ldan na/ chos ston pas dbang po la mkhas
372a5(mdo sde): pa rnams yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ mngon par shes pa thob pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa shes pa dang / shes rab rno ba dang / sngon gyi smon lam rnam par dag pa ste/ chos pon po de dag
372a6(mdo sde): dngango / / de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ mngon par shes pa rnams ni rab tu thob gyur cing // sa pas so so yang dag rig pa mi zad 'gyur// rtag tu shes rab rnon por gyur cing sngon yang ni//
372a7(mdo sde): yang dag bsags pa yongs su dag pa thob gyur pa// sems can rnams kyi dbang po yongs su shes byas nas/ de dang 'dra ba'i chos rnams yongs su ston par byed// de dag bstan pa 'bras
372b1(mdo sde): bu med pa ma yin te/ / de'i phyir mya ngan 'das nas mya ngan 'da' bar byed// lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos bzhi dang ldan na/ 'dus pa byas dang ma 'dres pas
372b2(mdo sde): rnam par thar pa'i sgor zhugs pa rnams yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ stong pa nyid spyod yul du gyur cing lta ba'i 'ching bas bcings pa'i sems can rnams thar par byed pa dang / mtshan ma med
372b3(mdo sde): pa la gnas shing rnam par rtog pa spyod pa rnams yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar byed pa dang / smon pa med pa la gnas shing sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir bsams bzhin du skye ba
372b4(mdo sde): len pa dang / thabs la mkhas shing shes rab kyis nges par byung ba ste/ chos bzhi po de dag dang ngo // de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ stong nyid spyod yul de dag ltas bcings grol byed cing //
372b5(mdo sde): mtshan med gnas shing sems can 'di dag yongs smin byed// smon pa med la gnas shing sems can smin byar phyir// bsams bzhin skye zhing gang du 'dod pa der skye 'gyur// shes
372b6(mdo sde): rab thabs kyis nges byung rnam thar sgor gnas kyang / / 'dus ma byas pa'i dbyings ni dus min thob mo byed// lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos bzhi dang ldan na//
372b7(mdo sde): lhag pa'i nga rgyal can tsher gcad pa'i phyir snrel zhir bsgrub pa la mkhas pa rnams yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ chos kyi dbyings kun nas sgo yang dag par shes pa dang / chos thams cad sgrib
373a1(mdo sde): pa med par mos pa dang / kun tu rtog pa'i rtsa ba las byung ba'i nyon mongs pa rnams yongs su shes pa dang / mya ngan las 'das pa'i rang bzhin can gyis chos thams
373a2(mdo sde): cad la nem nur med pa ste/ chos bzhi po de dag dang ngo // de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ sems mnyam chos kyi dbyings su nges par byung gyur zhing // de dag rnams kyi sgrib pa 'ga' yang mthong
373a3(mdo sde): mi 'gyur/ / nyon mongs kun tu rtog pa'i rtsa las rab byung bar// shes nas de las snrel zhir kun tu ston mi byed// chos 'di thams cad rang bzhin mya ngan 'das pa dang // ma skyes
373a4(mdo sde): ma 'gags ngo bo nyid kyis dag pa yin/ / de dag kun mkhyen yongs btsal mya ngan 'das gyur nas// lhag pa'i nga rgyal can dag tshar gcod byed pa yin// lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa'
373a5(mdo sde): sems dpa' chen po chos bzhi dang ldan na/ las kyi bya ba thams cad kyi rgyu la mkhas pa rnams yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ longs spyod chen po'i rgyu sbyin pa mi spong ba dang // mtho ris su skye ba'i
373a6(mdo sde): rgyu tshul khrims mi spong ba dang / shes rab chen po'i rgyu thos pa mi spong ba dang / grol ba'i rgyu sgom pa mi spong ba ste/ chos bzhi po de dag dang ngo // de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ longs spyod che rgyu sbyin
373a7(mdo sde): ba mo spong de'i 'bras te/ mtho ris skye ba'i tshul khrims thob cing de'i 'bras te// shes rab nyon mongs 'joms rgyu thos pa de'i 'bras te// rnam grol reg rgyu sgom par byed cing de
373b1(mdo sde): 'bras te/ / rgyu bzhi de la rtag brtson khas pa de dag ni// byang chub snying por dbang bskur 'bras phyir nyin mtshan spyod// lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos bzhi dang
373b2(mdo sde): ldan na/ lta ba'i rnam pa dang bral zhing rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba la mkhas pa rnams yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ chad par smra ba ma yin pa dang / rtag par smra ba ma yin pa dang / ma rig pa
373b3(mdo sde): byung na rga shi'i bar du 'byung bar lta zhing bdag tu lta bar yang mi byed pa dang / ma rig pa 'gags na rga shi'o bar du 'gags par lta zhing srid pa 'gags par yang mo byed pa ste/ chos bzhi po
373b4(mdo sde): de dag dang ngo / / de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ nam yang rtag par ma lta chad par ltung mi byed// des ni chos rnams rkyen byung byed pa po dang ni// tshor ba po med rang bzhin rnam par dag par
373b5(mdo sde): shes ma rig rtsa nas rga shi'i bar du 'byung 'gyur pa/ / rgyal ba kun gyis gsungs te de 'gag rgyu dang ni// rkyen zad de phyir phyin chad skye mi 'gyur zhes gsungs// lha'i bu byang chub
373b6(mdo sde): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos bzhi dang ldan na/ sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i thabs la mkhas pa rnams yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems can
373b7(mdo sde): thams cad la rag las par lta ba dang / dge ba'i rtse ba yang dag par bsags pa la skyo ba med pa dang / 'khor ba'i sgo nas mya ngan las 'das pa'i sgo yongs su tshol ba dang / sems can rnams
374a1(mdo sde): kyi mos pa ji lta ba de lta bu'i mos pa'i thabs kyis nyams su myong bar byed cing / / nyon mongs pa rnams kyis ma yin pa ste/ chos bzhi po de dag dang ngo // de la 'di skad ces bya ste/
374a2(mdo sde): sangs rgyas byang chub 'di ni sems can rnams la rten// dge ba sogs shing 'dod pas yongs su skyo ba med// 'khor ba'i sgo nas mya ngan 'das pa yongs tshol zhing // sems can ji bzhin mos pa thabs
374a3(mdo sde): kyis yongs su shes/ / lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos bzhi dang ldan na/ sems can thams cad kyi nye bar 'tsho ba rnams yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ longs spyod mi zad pa dang /
374a4(mdo sde): chos ston pa mi zad pa dang / mngon par shes pa thob pa dang / sems sa dang mnyam pa ste/ chos bzhi po de dag dang ngo // de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ de dag rnams kyi longs spyod rtag tu mi zad cing // /
374a5(mdo sde): rtag tu chos kyis mi zad rgya mtsho 'dra ba yin// de dag mngon shes lnga po mi zad rtag ma g.yo// rtag tu dran ldan bsam pas dang 'dra ba yin// mnyam med byang chub phyir ni yang dag zhugs gyur cing //
374a6(mdo sde): mya ngan ma 'das gang la chos rnams de yod pa// de dag 'gro ba kun gyi nye bar 'tshor 'gyur zhing // byang chub mchog phyir myur du nges par 'byung bar 'gyur// lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa'
374a7(mdo sde): sems dpa' chen po chos bzhi dang ldan na/ 'jig rten thams cad mngon par 'du bar 'gyur ba rnams yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ tshangs pa'i gnas pa bzhis gnas pa dang / bsdu ba'i dngos
374b1(mdo sde): po bzhis sdud pa dang / bden pa bzhi shes pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi thob pa ste/ chos bzhi po de dag dang ngo // de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ tshangs pa'i gnas pa bzhi po dag gis
374b2(mdo sde): gnas byed cing / / bsdu ba'i dngos po dag la rtag tu dgar byed la// bden pa bzhi po dag la 'jigs med dpa' bo rnams// 'gro bas ri mo byas shing mchod pa byas par 'gyur// so so yang dag
374b3(mdo sde): rig pa'i pha rol son gyur cing / / 'chad dang klog pa dag la rtag tu brtson gyur la// pha rol bde bar gyur pa'i bde bas mgu byed na// de phyir de dag yid du 'ong zhing sdug par 'gyur// lha'i bu
374b4(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos bzhi dang ldan na/ srog chags thams cad kyis bsngags par 'gyur ba rnams yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ thos pa dang / tshul khrims dang ldan
374b5(mdo sde): zhing tshul 'chos pa med pa dang / des shing 'grogs na bde ba dang / dben pa la dga' zhing dbang po bsrungs pa dang / bdag nyid bde ba la lhag par chags pa med cing rtag tu kha na ma tho ba la lta
374b6(mdo sde): pa ste/ chos bzhi po de dag dang ngo // de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ thos pa'i yon tan thob cing tshul khrims pha rol son// tshul 'chos med cing rtag tu des la brtul zhugs bzang // nags
374b7(mdo sde): dang nags 'dab gnas shing dbang po sdom byed la/ / dran ldan bdag bde mi ltos kha na ma tho lta// gang la rtag tu dge ba'i yon tan de yod pa// de dag rtag tu sems can phan phyir brtson 'gyur
375a1(mdo sde): zhing / de dag sems can don yang rtag tu byed 'gyur la// de dag rtag tu byang chub phyir yang yid gzhol 'gyur// lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
375a2(mdo sde): chen po chos bzhi dang ldan na/ / dge ba'i spyod pa thams cad la smras pa med pa rnams yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ dad pa phun sum tshogs pa dang / brtson 'grus phun sum tshogs pa dang / snying rje
375a3(mdo sde): chen po phun sum tshogs pa dang / theg pa chen por yongs su sngo ba la mkhas pa rnams te/ chos bzhi po de dag dang ngo // de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ de dag dang dang ldan la rtul ba brtan ldan zhing // /
375a4(mdo sde): de dag brtson 'grus mthu dang stobs dang ldan pa yin// 'gro ba kun la byams dang snying rje che ldan zhing // byang chub ched du yongs su sngo la mkhas pa ste// de phyir dge ba kun la smas pa yod mon zhing
375a5(mdo sde): zla ba nya ba'i zla ba mkha' la skar ma yi/ / tshogs kyi dbus na gnas pa rnam par mdzes pa ltar// yang dang yang du dge ba kun la rnam 'phel 'gyur// lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems
375a6(mdo sde): dpa' chen po chos bzhi dang ldan na/ shes rab dag la rgya mtsho lta bu rnams yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ ji skad smras pa de bzhin du byed pa dang / sgrub pa snying por byed pa dang / blo rab tu gnas pa
375a7(mdo sde): dang lhag pa'i bsam pa rdo rje ltar brtan pa ste/ chos bzhi po de dag dang ngo // de la 'ang skad ces bya ste/ mkhas pa de dag ji skad smras pa de bzhin byed// de dag sgrub pa snying por byed cing blo rab gnas/
375b1(mdo sde): gang dag brtson pa de dag rdo rje lta bu yi// lhag pa'i bsam pa brtan pa dag dang ldan par 'gyur// mkhas pa gang dag chos pa ni de dag ston byed pa// de dag rtag tu dge ba'i bshes gnyen sten byed cing //
375b2(mdo sde): dam bcas rnams pa snying por byed par 'gyur ba dang // rtag tu sangs rgyas gsung yang 'dzin par byed pa yin// lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos bzhi dang ldan na/ chos
375b3(mdo sde): la dbang sgyur bas dbang phyug tu gyur pa rnams yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ ye shes kyi stobs can rnams yin zhing nyon mongs po'i stobs can rnams ma yin pa dang / sems la dbang sgyur ba
375b4(mdo sde): rnams yin zhing bdud kyi dbang sgyur ba rnams ma yin pa dang / gzungs dang spobs pa phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin pa dang / 'bras bu yod par chos ston pa rnams yin te/ chos bzhi po de dag
375b5(mdo sde): dang ngo / / de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ de dag ye shes stobs ldan nyon mongs dbang mi 'gro// shes rab stobs kyis blun spangs lha rnams kun dang bral// sems la dbang sgyur byed cing
375b6(mdo sde): bdud bzhi spangs gyur la/ / spobs pa brtan par gyur cing gzungs kyis 'khrugs pa med// de dag ston pa 'bras bu med par mi 'gyur te// de phyir myur du dbang phyug nyid dang ldan par
375b7(mdo sde): 'gyur/ / lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos bzhi dang ldan na/ bya ba thams cad la slob dpon du gyur pa rnams yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ nga rgyal med pa dang / hA/
376a1(mdo sde): ma la gus pa dang / bag yod pa dang / 'dun pa drag po ste/ chos bzhi po de dag dang ngo // de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ nga rgyal med cing bla ma gus pas gnas gyur la/
376a2(mdo sde): kun nas bag yod byang chub mchog la 'dun drag cing // bsam pa thag pas smon cing rtag tu drang gyur la// slob dpon dpe mkhyud med pa rtag tu slob dpon 'gyur// mkhas pa 'jig rten 'jig
376a3(mdo sde): rten 'das pa'i don mkhas shing / / tshul dang tshul ma yin la mkhas pa'i brtan pa rnams// 'jig rten kun mdza' thams cad rtogs par khong du chud// de phyir 'gro bas spyi bor thal sbyar de la 'dud
376a4(mdo sde): lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos bzhi dang ldan na/ thams cad du kha na ma tho ba med cing yon tan rnam pa thams cad dang ldan pa rnams yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ mngon par shes
376a5(mdo sde): pa'i ye shes kyis rnam par rtse ba dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyis dgongs pa'i spobs pa dang / dge ba thams cad dang mi 'bral zhing bag chags dang bral ba dang / dge ba'i chos thams cad dang ldan
376a6(mdo sde): zhing / dbang bskur ba thob pa ste/ chos bzhi po de dag dang ngo // de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ sems can dag pa rgya chen mngon shes shes pas rtse// bde gshegs kun gyis dgongs pa mkha' 'dra'i
376a7(mdo sde): spobs dang ldan/ / brtson 'grus thogs med mi dge bag chags kun spangs shing // dge dang ldan zhing dbang bskur thob par gyur pa ste// chos rnams de dag la ni rab tu gnas gyur pa//
376b1(mdo sde): dedag kha na ma tho med pa'i yon tan ldan// bcom ldan 'das kyis bzhi pa sgrub pa 'di bstan pa na/ lha dang mi rnams las srog chags sa ya nyis 'bum gyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang
376b2(mdo sde): chub tu sems bskyed do/ / byang chub sems dpa' nyi khri lnga stong gis ni mo skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur to// lha dang mi rnams kyi skye dgu las srog chags 'bum ni chos rnams la chos kyi
376b3(mdo sde): mig rdul med cing dri ma dang bral ba rnam par dag go/ / stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di'ang rnam pa drug rab tu g.yos shing / 'jig rten thams cad snang ba chen pos/
376b4(mdo sde): khyab par yang myur to// lha rnams kyis kyang wa'i me tog ga char rab tu bcing / wA rje sa la spyan dag gi sgra yang byung bar gyur to// klu rnams kyis kyang mu tig dmar po dang / klu'i me tog sa
376b5(mdo sde): char rab tu phababo/ / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang // lto 'phye chen po dang / gnod sbyin rnams kyis kyang / bcom ldan 'das la lha'i mchod pa dag gis mchod pa byas so/
376b6(mdo sde): / thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor rnams kyis kyang a la la chos/ a la la chos/ a la la chos zhes lan gsum ched du brjod nas/ mchod pa chen po dag kyang byas so// de nas
376b7(mdo sde): b+ha'i bu rab rtsal sems kyis/ / 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'dadi skad ces smras so// 'jam dpal bcom ldan 'das kyis chos sum cu rtsa gnyis po de dag gi don dang / tshig gis rnam
377a1(mdo sde): par gtan la dbab pa bstan pa de bka' stsal gyis/ 'jam dpal khyod kyang chos sum cu rtsa gnyis po de dag gi don dang tshig rnam par gtan la dbab pa de la spobs par gyis
377a2(mdo sde): shoshig/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po la gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog pa rnams yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems
377a3(mdo sde): dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems gzhan gyi rkyen gyis mi 'gro ba de lta na/ lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po la gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog pa rnams yin no// lha'i bus
377a4(mdo sde): smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtsams pa thams cad la brtson 'grus brtan pa rnams yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa
377a5(mdo sde): sems dpa' chen po rnams nyon mongs pa thams cad nges par 'jom par byed pa de ldan/ lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtsam pa thams cad la brtson 'grus brtan pa rnams yin no//
377a6(mdo sde): lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsod nams dag gis mngon par 'phags pa rnams yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu gang gi tshe byang
377a7(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams chos kyi dbyings mi g.yo ba rjes su rtogs pa de lta na/ lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsod nams dag gis mngon par 'phags pa
377b1(mdo sde): rnams yin no/ / lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ye shes kyis chags pa med par spyod pa rnams yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/
377b2(mdo sde): rtswa'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams yul thams cad la chags par mi byed pa de ltar na/ lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ye shes kyis chags pa
