377b3(mdo sde): med par spyod pa rnams yin no/ / lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyis mun pa dang bral ba rnams yin// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa
377b4(mdo sde): lngalhalci'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis yongs su dag par shes par byed pa de lta na/ lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen mi shes
377b5(mdo sde): rab kyis mun pa dang bral ba rnams yin no/ / lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'khor rnams kyi nang du 'jigs pa dang bral ba rnams yin/
377b6(mdo sde): 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams chos thams cad rnam par phyen mi rnyed par byed pa de lta na/ lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems
377b7(mdo sde): dpa' chen po 'khor rnams kyi nang du 'jigs pa dang bral ba rnams yin no/ / lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thos pas don la rton pa
378a1(mdo sde): rnams yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams chos thams cad brjod du med par shes par byed pa de lta na/
378a2(mdo sde): lho bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thos pas don la rton pa rnams yin no// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jig rten gyi tshul
378a3(mdo sde): gyis chos la rton pa rnams yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams chos kyi dbyings zhi ba nyid du shes par byed pa de lta na/ lha'i
378a4(mdo sde): bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jig rten gyi tshul gyis chos la rton pa rnams yin no/ / lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems chen po sangs
378a5(mdo sde): rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis gsungs pa bzhin du smra ba rnams yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams sgra thams cad la
378a6(mdo sde): rten par mi byed pa de lta na/ lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis gsungs pa bzhin smra ba rnams yin no// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpa
378a7(mdo sde): ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can rnams la chos smra ba rnams yin/ / 'jam dpal gyis smras pa// lha'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
378b1(mdo sde): rnams smra ba thams cad las ldog par byed pa de lta na/ lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can rnams la chos smra ba rnams yin no// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar
378b2(mdo sde): na byang chub sems dpa sems dpa' chen po mngon par shes pa rnams kyis mngon par 'phags pa rnams yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems
378b3(mdo sde): dpa' chen po rnams chos thams cad las g.yo bar mi byed pa de lta na/ lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mngon par shes pa rnams kyis mngon par 'phags pa rnams yin no//
378b4(mdo sde): lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bdud thams cad kyis thul bar dka' ba rnams yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu gang gi tshe
378b5(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams stong pa nyid rjes su rtogs par bya ba'i phyir/ nyon mongs pa nyid byang chub yin par yongs su tshol bar byed pa de lta na/ lha'i bu byang chub sems
378b6(mdo sde): dpa' sems dpa' chen po bdud thams cad kyis thul bar dka' ba rnams yin no/ / lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po blos gting dpag dka'
378b7(mdo sde): ba rnams yin/ 'jam dpal gyis spras pa/ lnga'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyi gting rtogs par byed pa de lta na/ lha'i bu byang chub
379a1(mdo sde): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po blos gting dpag dka' ba rnams yin no/ / lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jig rten gyi chos brgya
379a2(mdo sde): kyis mi gos pa rnams yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams 'jig rten na spyod kyang 'jig rten gyi chos rnams kyis gos par mi 'gyur ba de lta na// lha
379a3(mdo sde): bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jig rten gyi chos brgyad kyis mi gos pa rnams yin no/ / lha'i dus smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gtang dpag dka'
379a4(mdo sde): zhing zab mo la spyod pa rnams yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams bdag la bdag med pas sgyid lug par mi 'gyur ba de lta na/ lha'i du byang chub
379a5(mdo sde): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gting dpag dka' zhing zab mo la spyod pa rnams yin no/ / lhar bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos ston pas dbang po la mkhas pa
379a6(mdo sde): rnams yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams dbang po drug gis dbang po thams cad la lta bar byed pa de lta na/ lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
379a7(mdo sde): po chos ston pas dbang po la mkhas pa rnams yin no/ / lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'dus ma byas dang ma 'dres pas rnam par thar pa'i sgor gnas pa rnams yin/
379b1(mdo sde): 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams sgo thams cad nas thar pa ston par byed pa de lta na/ lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'dus ma byas
379b2(mdo sde): dang ma 'dres pas rnam par thar pa'i sgor gnas pa rnams yin no/ / lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lhag pa'i nga rgyal can tshar gcad pa'i phyir bsgrub pa la mkhas pa
379b3(mdo sde): rnams yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams 'khor ba las mya ngan las 'das pa tshol zhing lta bar byed la/ mya ngan las 'das pa las kyang 'khor ba
379b4(mdo sde): tshol zhing lta bar byed pa de lta na/ lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lhag pa'i nga rgyal can tshar gcad pa'i phyir snrel zhir bsgrub pa la mkhas pa rnams yin no// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar
379b5(mdo sde): na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po las kyi bya ba thams cad kyis rgyu la mkhas pa rnams yin/ 'jam dpal gyis spras pa/ lho'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams chos thams
379b6(mdo sde): cad mi 'pho bar lta bar byed pa de lta na/ lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po las kyis bya ba thams cad kyi rgyu la mkhas pa rnams yin no// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub
379b7(mdo sde): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lta ba'i rnam pa dang bral zhing / rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba la mkhas pa rnams yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lho bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
380a1(mdo sde): chen po rnams chos thams cad bdag po med par shes par byed pa de lta na/ lha'i du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lta ba'i rnams dang bral zhing rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba la
380a2(mdo sde): mkhas pa rnams yin no/ / lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can yongs su smin par bya ba dag la thabs la mkhas pa rnams yin// 'jam dpal gyis
380a3(mdo sde): smras pa/ lha'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams 'jig rten gyi tshul la smod par mi byed pa de lta na/ lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can yongs su smin par
380a4(mdo sde): bya ba dag la thabs la mkhas pa rnams yin no/ / lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam pa yongs su dag pas brtul zhugs grub pa rnams yin/ 'jam
380a5(mdo sde): dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtogs pa nyid byang chub yin par shes par byed pa de lta na/ lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam pa yongs su
380a6(mdo sde): dag pas brtul zhugs grub pa rnams yin no/ / lha'i bus spras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhe 'gras pa'i sems med cing / bzod pa'i stobs dang ldan pa rnams yin
380a7(mdo sde): 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams chos thams cad gtan du yongs su mya ngan las 'das par shes par byed/ lta bar byed pa de lta na/ lha'i bu byang chub sems
380b1(mdo sde): dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhe 'gras pa'i sems med cing bzod pa'i stobs dang ldan pa rnams yin no/ / lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin pa
380b2(mdo sde): thams cad kyi pha rol tu son pa rnams yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams chos thams cad pha rol las mthong bar byed pa de lta na/ lha'i bu byang chub sems
380b3(mdo sde): dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad kyi pha rol tu son pa rnams yin no/ / lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can thams cad kyi nye bar
380b4(mdo sde): 'tshe ba rnams yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams chos kyi dbyings mi zad pa rab tu rtogs par byed pa de lta na/ lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems
380b5(mdo sde): dpa' chen po sems can thams cad kyi nye bar 'tshe ba rnams yin no/ / lho bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jig rten thams cad mngon par 'du bar 'gyur ba rnams yin/
380b6(mdo sde): 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams mi snang ba'i tshul gyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad na snang ba de lta na/ lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
380b7(mdo sde): 'jig rten thams cad mngon par 'dra bar 'gyur ba rnams yin no/ / lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po srog chags thams cad kyis bsngags par 'gyur pa
381a1(mdo sde): rnams yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams chos 'bra' yang len par mi byed/ spong bar mi byed pa de lta na/ lha'i bu byang
381a2(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po srog chags thams cad kyis bsngags par 'gyur ba rnams yin no/ / lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dge ba'i spyod pa thams cad la smras
381a3(mdo sde): pa med pa rnams yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams chos thams cad la nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa 'dra bar shes par byed pa de lta na/ lha'i bu byang chub sems
381a4(mdo sde): dpa' sems dpa' chen po dge ba'i spyod pa thams cad la smas pa med pa rnams yin no/ / lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab dag la snying por gyur pa rnams yin/ 'jam/
381a5(mdo sde): dpal gyis spras pa/ lha'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams chos kyi dbyings kun tu 'byed pa mi 'byed pa de lta na/ lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab dag la snying por
381a6(mdo sde): gyur pa rnams yin no/ / lha'i bus spras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos la dbang sgyur bas dbang phyug tu gyur pa rnams yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lho bu
381a7(mdo sde): gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams bsam du med pa sems pas sems thams cad shes par byed pa de lta na/ lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos la dbang sgyur
381b1(mdo sde): pas dbang phyug tu gyur pa rnams yin no/ / lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bya ba thams cad la slob dpon du gyur pa rnams yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/
381b2(mdo sde): lha'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams tshul gcig gis tshul thams cad shes par byed cing / tshul thams cad kyis kyang tshul gcig shes par byed pa de lta na/ lha'i bu byang chub
381b3(mdo sde): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bya ba thams cad la slob dpon du gyur pa rnams yin no/ / lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad du kha na ma tho ba med
381b4(mdo sde): cing yon tan thams cad dang ldan pa rnams yin/ 'jam dpal gyos smras pa/ lha'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams chos thams cad gnyen po med par rtogs nas chos 'ga'
381b5(mdo sde): yang sgrub par mi byed/ chos 'ga' yang sel bar mi byed pa de lta na/ lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad du kha na ma tho ba med cing / yon tan rnam pa thams cad dang ldan pa rnams yin
381b6(mdo sde): no/ / 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas bstan pa 'di bshad pa na/ byang chub sems dpa' lnga khri brgyad stong gis mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur to// lha dang mi rnams kyi skye dgu bdun khri nyis stong
381b7(mdo sde): ni chos rnams la chos kyi mig rdul med cing dri ma dang bral ba rnam par dag go/ / srog chags 'bum lhag tsam ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do// 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la
382a1(mdo sde): mchod pa'i phyir lha rnams kyis kyang steng gi bar snang las lha'i me tog gi char dag mngon par rab tu phab bo/ / thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor rnams kyis kyang 'jam dpal gzhon nur/
382a2(mdo sde): gyur pas bstan pa 'di thos nas yi rangs pa dang / dga' ba dang / yid bde ba skyes nas tshig 'di skad ces bdag cag gis kyang chos de dag thob par gyur cig/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i spobs
382a3(mdo sde): pa ji lta ba de lta bu'i spobs pa mchod pa'ang thob par gyur cig ces smras so/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'jam dpal khyod kyis chos rnam par gtan la dbab pa bstan pa
382a4(mdo sde): 'di legs par smras te/ legs so legs so zhes legs so zhes bya ba byin no// // bam po gnyis pa// de nas lha'i bu rab rtsal sems kyis
382a5(mdo sde): 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so/ / 'jam dpal ci khyod kho bo las chos kyi dgab pa 'dod dam/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu 'di skad du/ khyod chos kyi dgab pa 'dod
382a6(mdo sde): dam zhes zer ba ni lha'i bu legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba 'di la chos kyi dgab pa zhes bya ba 'di ni med pa dang 'dod pa spangs pa yin te/ chos 'di ni so sor rtogs pa med pa'i phyir 'dod pa med/
382a7(mdo sde): pa yin no// chos 'di na mig gi lam las yang dag par 'das pa'i phyir bltar mi snang ba yin no// chos 'dini mngon par grub pa med pa'i phyir ma byas pa yin no// chos 'di ni yul drug dang ma
382b1(mdo sde): 'dres pa'i phyir mi mthong ba yin no/ / chos 'di na sems dang / yid dang / rnam par shes pa dang bral ba'i phyir bdag gi ba med pa yin no// chos 'di ni gtan yongs su ma grub pa'i phyir gzung ba med pa/
382b2(mdo sde): yin no// chos 'di ni yul med pa'i yul du 'gro ba'i phyir gzhi med pa yin no// chos 'di ni rang bzhin gyis dben pa'i phyir zag pa med pa yin no/ chos 'di ni sngon gyi mtha' rnam par dag pa'i phyir
382b3(mdo sde): 'ong ba med pa yin no/ / chos 'dzin phyi ma'i mtha' rnam par dag pa'i phyir 'gro ba med pa yin no// chos 'din da ltar byung ba rnam par dag pa'i phyir gnas pa med pa yin no// chos 'di ni brtag cing sel
382b4(mdo sde): ba'ang bral ba'i phyir rtsol ba med pa yin no/ / chos 'di ni nam mkha' dang mnyam pa'i phyir mnyam pa med pa yin no// chos 'di ni gnyen po med pa'i phyir mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa yin no// chos 'di ni bdud kyi
382b5(mdo sde): yul thams cad las yang dag par 'das pa'i phyir g.yo ba med pa dang / rlom sems med pa dang / ma brtags pa dang / rnam par ma brtags pa dang / rnam par ma bsgrubs pa dang / kun tu ma bstan
382b6(mdo sde): pa yin no/ / chos 'dzin skye ba dang / 'jig pa dang bral ba'i phyir blang ba med pa dang / dor ba med pa yin no// chos 'di ni chos kyi dbyings su yang dag par gzhol ba'i phyir gnas med par gnas pa yin no//
382b7(mdo sde): chos 'di ni yang dag par ma byung ba'i phyir dbyer med pa yin no// chos 'di na spros pa dang bral ba'i phyir rab tu spyod pa med pa yin no// chos 'di ni rang bzhin gyis nye bar zhi ba'i phyir spros pa dang bral ba
383a1(mdo sde): yin no/ / chos 'di na rnam par rtog pa thams cad dang bral ba'i phyir nye bar zhi ba yin no// chos 'di ni phas kyi rgol ba thams cad nges par bcom pa'i phyir rnam par rtog pa med pa yinano/
383a2(mdo sde): chos 'din 'dod pa'i 'dod chags kyi rdul dang bral ba'i phyir shin tu 'phags pa yin no// chos 'di ni stong pa nyid kyi phyir stong pa yin no// chos 'di ni nges par ma brtags pa'i phyir mtshan ma med pa yin no//
383a3(mdo sde): chos 'di ni rnam par shes pa mi gnas pa'i phyir smon pa med pa yin no// chos 'di ni rtsa ba yongs su chad pa'i phyir mi gnas pa yin no// chos 'di ni grogs med pa'i phyiraro mi rten pa yin no// chos 'di ni ma
383a4(mdo sde): rten pa'i phyir mi g.yo ba yin no/ / chos 'di ni gzod ma nas rnam par dag pa'i phyir bdag med pa yin no// chos 'di ni gtan mngon par grub pa med pa'i phyir sems can med pa yin no// chos 'di ni gzod ma
383a5(mdo sde): nas sa byung ba'i phyir rtag pa med pa yin no/ / chos 'don gzod ma nas ma skyes pa'i phyir ma byung ba yin no// chos 'don mtshan nyid dang bral ba'i phyir ma skyes pa yin no// chos 'di ni mtshan nyid thams cad
383a6(mdo sde): dang bral ba'i phyir mtshan nyid med pa yin no/ / chos 'di ni gzod ma nas yang dag par rgyun chad pa'i phyir zhi ba yin no// chos 'di ni gzod ma nas nye bar zhi ba'i phyir yang dag par rgyun chad pa med pa yin no// chos 'di
383a7(mdo sde): ni ma phyed pa dang mi snang ba'i phyir nam mkha'i mtshan nyid lta bu yin na/ lha'i bu chos de lta bu de la chos kyi dgab pa ji lta bu zhig yod/ lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal chos 'di'i dgeb pa ni kun tu 'phro ba med pa yin no//
383b1(mdo sde): 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu legs so legs so// ji skad smras pa de bzhin te/ chos 'di'i dgab po na gang la lus dang / ngag dang / sems kyis rtul ba med pa de lta bu yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe/
383b2(mdo sde): na/ chos 'di ni gsal ba rnyog pa med pa yin pas de ni sems rnyog pa can gyis mchod par mi nus pa'i phyir ro// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na sems rnyog pa can yin/ 'jam dpal
383b3(mdo sde): gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu gzugs kyi mtshan rjes su dran par byed pa ni sems rnyog pa can yin no// sgra dang / skad dang / dbyangs dang / tshig gi lam gyis chos rjes su dran par byed pa ni sems rnyog
383b4(mdo sde): pa can yon no/ / 'bras bu thob pa mngon du byed pas dge 'dun rjes su dran par byed pa ni sems rnyog pa can yin no// nyon mongs pa gtan spong ba rjes su dran par byed pa ni sems rnyog pa can yin no//
383b5(mdo sde): skye ba la rten pas lha rjes su dran par byed pa ni sems rnyog pa can yon no// ma dul ba'i sbyin pa'i sems ni sems rnyog pa can yin no// ma zhi ba'i tshul khrims kyi sems ni sems rnyog pa can yin
383b6(mdo sde): no/ sems can la rten pa'i bzod pa'i sems ni sems rnyog pa can yin no// spros pa dang bcas pa'i shes rab kyi sems ni sems rnyog pa can yin no// bdag tu 'dzin pa la gnas pa'i byams
383b7(mdo sde): pa'i sems ni sems rnyog pa can yin no/ / sems la nges par ma bsams pa'i bsam gtan gyi sems ni sems rnyog pa can yin no// the tsom can gyi snying rje'i sems ni sems rnyog pa can
384a1(mdo sde): yin no/ / mya ngan las 'das pa'i lam dang bral ba'i dga' ba'i sems ni sems rnyog pa can yin no// gnyis la gnas pa'i btang snyoms kyi sems ni sems rnyog pa can yin no//
384a2(mdo sde): lus su 'du shes pa'i tshor ba'i sems ni sems rnyog pa can yin no// chos su 'du shes pa'i dran pa nye bar gzhag pa'i sems ni sems rnyog pa can yin no// skye ba dang 'jig par 'du shes pa'i yang dag par spong ba'i
384a3(mdo sde): sems ni sems rnyog pa can yin no/ / lus dang sems la rten pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa'i sems ni sems rnyog pa can yin no// dbang po drug la rten pa'i dbang po lnga'i sems ni sems rnyog pa can yin no//

384a5(mdo sde): pa'i lam bsgom pa'o sems ni sems rnyog pa can yin no/ / sdug bsngal la yongs su rtog pa'i 'du shes can gyi sems ni sems rnyog pa can yin no// kun 'byung ba la bsgom pa'i 'du shes can gyi sems
384a6(mdo sde): ni sems rnyog pa can yin no/ / 'gog pa zad par 'du shes pa'i sems ni sems rnyog pa can yin no// lam bsgom pa la bsgom pa'i 'du shes pa'i sems ni sems rnyog pa can yin te/ lha'i bu ji tsam du
384a7(mdo sde): rang bzhin gyis yongs su dag pa nyid la sgro 'dogs par byed pa de tsam du sems rnyog pa can yin no/ / lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal sems rnyog pa med pa dag gang yin/ 'jam dpal gyis
384b1(mdo sde): smras pa/ / wa bu gang dag gi sems nam mkha' dang banyas pa dnga'o// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal nam mkhara' la sems cung zad kyang yod dam/ 'jam dpal gyis spras pa/ lha'i bu ji ltar

384b3(mdo sde): par 'gyur/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu lhag par byed pa la brtson pa rnams kyis mos par dka' ba yin no// lha'i bus smras pa 'jam dpal lhag par byed pa zhes bya ba de ji lta bu yin/

384b7(mdo sde): no/ / sgyu ma dang / rmi lam dang / mig yor dang / gzugs brnyan dang / zag cha dang / chu zla dang / smig rgyu dang / sprul pa'i dpe nye bar dgod pa dag gis chos rnam par 'jog par byed/ mtshon par byed/
385a1(mdo sde): 'jug par byed/ ston par byed pa de ni lhag par byed pa yin no// ji tsam du chos rnam par 'jog par byed pa de tsam du lhag par byed pa yin te/ kun nas nyon mongs pa la skyon du byed

385a3(mdo sde): ngadag ni lhag pa'i nga rgyal can rnams kyi lhag par byed pa dag yon no/ / lha'o bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na lhag pa'i nga rgyal med pa yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu gang gis nges par
385a4(mdo sde): 'byung ba'i dbyings rtogs shing nyon mongs pa thams cad 'gog pa bsgrubs te gnas kyang / 'gog pa 'gog par yang mi byed la/ skye ba med pa skyed par yang mi byed cing ga sgra thams cad kyis skrag par yang mi
385a5(mdo sde): byed la/ kun nas nyon mongs pa'i rang bzhin gang yin pa de nyid rnam par byang ba'i rang bzhin yin pa de ltar shes shing chos thams cad la gnyis dang bral ba dang / blang ba med pa dang / dor ba med pa thob pa de ni lha'i bu
385a6(mdo sde): lhag pa'i nga rgyal med pa yin no/ / 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas bstan pa 'di bshad pa na/ lha'i bu nyi khri nyis stong chos rnams la chos kyi mog rdul med cing dri ma dang bral ba rnam par dag go// dge slong lnga stong ni
385a7(mdo sde): len pa med par bas pa rnams las sems rnam par grol lo/ / byang chub sems dpa' ma khri cos stong gis ni mo skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur to// srog chags stong phrag rab tu mang po dag gis ni bla na med pa dang /
385b1(mdo sde): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do// dge bsnyen stong yang chos rnams la chos kyi mog rdul med cing dri ma dang bral ba rnam par dag go// khyim pa dang rab tu byung ba las bud med nyis stong yang chos rnams
385b2(mdo sde): la chos kyi sog rdul med cing dri ba dang bral ba rnam par dag go/ / de nas lha'i bu rab rtsal sems kyis/ nyan thos chen po de dag la 'di skad ces smras so// tshe dang ldan pa dag khyed cag kyang the tsom ci yod pa dag
385b3(mdo sde): 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la dris shig/ de nas gnas brtan 'od srungs chen pos/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so// 'jam dpal dge slong rnam par thar pa brgyad la bsam
385b4(mdo sde): gtan byed pa/ ci zhig la bsam gtan byed pa yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ btsun pa 'od srungs chen po dge slong rnam par thar pa brgyad la bsam gtan byed pa ni/ rtsa ba med pa dang / mtha' med

386a1(mdo sde): gnyis su med par shes pas na/ btsun pa 'od srungs chen po kho bos de las bsams nas dge slong rnam par thar pa brgyad la bsam gtan byed pa ni rtsa ba med pa dang

386a5(mdo sde): pa de dag kyang spong bar mi byed na/ de tsam gyis na byang chub sems dpa' chags pa med pa'i shes rab dang ldan pa yin no// mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen pos smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems

387a1(mdo sde): pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' 'dul ba 'dzin pa yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ btsun pa nye bar 'khor gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' chos rnams gtan du lag

387b1(mdo sde): gyis ma skyes par phyir/ mtshams med pa dang mnyam par lta bar byed na/ de tsam gyis na byang chub sems dpa' dbang po rno ba yin no// ka t+ya'i bu chen pos smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar nga byang chub sems dpa'

387b6(mdo sde): par rig pa ston pa dang / chos kyi dbyings gnas pa nyid kyis chos so so yang dag par rig pa ston pa dang / ming dang mtshan pa med pa nyid kyis nges pa'i tshig so so yang dag par rig pa ston pa dang / brag cha dang /

388a1(mdo sde): dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' tshul khrims dang ldan pa yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ btsun pa sgra gcan zin gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' tshul khrims dang //
388a2(mdo sde): brtul zhugs yang dag par blangs shing / sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir tshul khrims 'chal pa'i 'gro ba gang yin par 'gro bar byed na/ de tsam gyis na byang chub sems dpa' tshul khrims dang
388a3(mdo sde): ldan pa yin no/ / kun dga' bos smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' mang du thos pa yin/ 'jam dpal gyis spras pa/ btsun pa kun dga' bo gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sangs
388a4(mdo sde): rgyas thams cad kyis gsungs pa nyan par byed cing thos pa thams cad kyi don kyang rtog par byed la/ ji ltar thos pa'ang 'dzin par byed cing / ji ltar gzung ba bzhin ston par yang byed na/ de tsam gyis na byang chub
