388a6(mdo sde): pa de lta bu'i chos 'ga' dang ldan nam/ de dag gis smras pa/ lha'i bu bdag cag la ni chos de dag las 'ga' tsam yang med do// lha'i bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa dag de lta na khyed cag nyan thos chen po mchog tu gyur
388a7(mdo sde): ba ma yin par mi 'gyur ras/ shA ri'i bus smras pa/ lha'i bu 'di lta ste/ dper na gnag rjes las brten na rdzong bu mchog yin pa de bzhin du/ can thos gzhan dag las brten na kho bo cag kyang mchog yin no//
388b1(mdo sde): 'di lta ste/ dper na rgya mtsho chen po las brten na 'og gi chu'i phung po mchog yin pa de bzhin du/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad la brten na// byang chub sems dpa' mchog yin no// lhag pa'i nga rgyal med/
388b2(mdo sde): pa yin no// byang chub sems dpa' ni lhag pa'i nga rgyal med pa rnams kyis bstan pa yin te// legs so legs so// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lhor bu de de bzhin te/ nyan thos ni lhag pa'i nga rgyal med pa
388b3(mdo sde): yin no/ / byang chub sems dpa' ni lhag pa'i nga rgyal can yin no// lhor bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal ci las bsams te de skad smra/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu 'di ltar nyan thos rnams ni rang
388b4(mdo sde): sangs rgyas las brten na nga rgyal spangs pa yin gyi/ byang chub sems dpa' ni lhag pa'i nga rgyal can yin la/ nga rgyal des sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams yang dag par sgrub par byed pas na// de'i phyir byang chub
388b5(mdo sde): sems dpa' ni lhag pa'i nga rgyal can yin no/ / lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal lhag pa'i nga rgyal can ni bdag la stod par byed cing / gzhan la smod par byed pa yin na/ byang chub sems dpa'
388b6(mdo sde): yang de lta bur mi 'gyur ram/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu de bzhin te/ byang chub sems dpa' ni bdag la stod par byed cing / gzhan la smod par byed pa yin no// lha'i bus smras pa
388b7(mdo sde): 'jam dpal ci las bsams te de skad smra/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' ni rnam grangs du mar theg pa chen po'i bsngags pa rjod par byed cing / nyan thos kyi theg pa'i
389a1(mdo sde): bsngags pa ma yin pa rjod par byed pa dang / ji ltar sems can rnams byang chub tu sems bskyed par 'gyur snyam nas/ bdag nyid kyi yon tan gyi chos rjod par byed cing 'di la dga' ba'i sems
389a2(mdo sde): skyed par mi 'gyur bar bya'o snyam nas/ theg pa dman pa la rnam par sdang bar byed pa yin pas/ lha'i bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' ni theg pa chen po la stong par byed pa dang / nyan thos kyi theg pa la spod
389a3(mdo sde): par byed pa yin no/ / lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal de lta na byang chub sems dpa' ltung ba dang bcas par mi 'gyur ram/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu gang gis nor bu mching bu'i bsngags pa
389a4(mdo sde): ma yin pa brjod cing / nor bu rin po chebai DUR+Ya'i bsngags pa brjod par gyur na/ de'ang ltung ba dang bcas par 'gyur ram/ lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal de ni mi 'gyur ro// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/
389a5(mdo sde): lha'i bu de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' theg pa chen po'i bsngags pa rjod par byed cing / nyan thos kyi theg pa'i bsngags pa ma yin pa rjod par byed pa'ang ltung ba dang bcas par mi 'gyur ro// lha'i bu 'od lta ste/
389a6(mdo sde): dper na skyes bu shin tu stobs dang ldan pa gang zhig gis 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po'i bsngags pa brjod cing / khams kyi rgyal po la de lta ma yin na de smad pa'i 'os su 'gyur ba yin snyam mam/ lhor bus
389a7(mdo sde): smras pa/ 'jam dpal de lta ma yin no// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' theg pa chen po la stod par byed cing / nyan thos kyi theg pa la smod par byed pa'ang smad
389b1(mdo sde): pa'i 'os su mi 'gyur ro/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ 'jam dpal legs so legs so// khyod kyi tshig de ni legs par smras te/ 'jam/
389b2(mdo sde): dpal theg pa chen po'i bsngags pa brjod pas de ni theg pa thams cad kyi bsngags pa rjod par 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'jam dpal theg pa thams cad ni de las nges par byung ba yin pa'i phyir ro//
389b3(mdo sde): gzhan yang lha'i bu rab rtsal sems kyis/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so// 'jam dpal byang chub sems dpa' gang las brten nas byang chub tu sems skyed par byed/ 'jam
389b4(mdo sde): dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' ni sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa las brten nas byang chub tu sems skyed par byed do// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal ci'i phyir na byang chub sems
389b5(mdo sde): dpa' sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa las brten nas byang chub tu sems skyed par byed/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu gal te sems can rnams kyi nyon mongs pa dag byang chub kyi theg pa ma yin du
389b6(mdo sde): zin na ni byang chub sems dpa' yang byang chub tu sems bskyed nas go cha gyon par mi 'gyur ro/ / lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal byang chub kyi sems ci zhig la rten/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/
389b7(mdo sde): lha'i bu byang chub kyi sems ni sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la rten to// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ lha'i bu sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad ni byang chub sems kyi rtsa ba las brten nas/ skye bar 'gyur
390a1(mdo sde): ba'i phyir ro/ / lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal chos thams cad ci la rten// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu chos thams cad ni rtsa ba med pa'i gnas la rten pa 'i
390a2(mdo sde): no/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ lnga'i bu chos thams cad ni mtha' yas pa'i phyir rtsa ba med pa dang / mngon par skabs yod pa dang / nam mkha' la rten po yin pa'i phyir ro// lha'i bus spras pa/ 'jab dpal
390a3(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams ji snyed yod/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu chos thams cad ji snyed pa de snyed pa yod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni chos thams cad sangs rgyas pas na//
390a4(mdo sde): lha'i bu de'i phyir chos thams cad ji snyed pa sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyang de snyed do// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal 'o na ci 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug rnams kyang sangs rgyas kyi chos yin
390a5(mdo sde): nam/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu de de bzhin te/ 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug rnams kyang sangs rgyas kyi chos yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ nyon mongs pa de dag gi rtsa ba'i gnas rjes su
390a6(mdo sde): rtogs pa ni sangs rgyas yin no zhes ston pa'i phyir ro/ / lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal gang gis sems can thams cad sangs rgyas su 'gyur ba'i rnam grangs yod dam/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/
390a7(mdo sde): lha'i bu rnam grangs med pas sems can thams cad sangs rgyas su 'gyur gyis/ rnam grangs kyis ni ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pas ni sems can thams cad rtogs par
390b1(mdo sde): thugs su chud pa'i phyir ro/ / lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar rtogs par thugs su chud/ 'jam dpal gyis spras pa/ lha'i bu sems can med pa'i rnam pa dang / stong pa nyid kyi rnam
390b2(mdo sde): pas so/ / lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal stong pa nyid kyis ci zhig rtogs par byed/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu gal te cung zad rjes su rtogs par byed na ni de stong pa nyid du mi
390b3(mdo sde): 'gyur ro/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ lha'i bu stong pa nyid ni rnam par rtog pa med pa dang / rtsol ba med pa yin pa'i phyir ro// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pas stong pa nyid
390b4(mdo sde): rjes su rtogs pa ni byang chub yin no zhes ma gsungs sam/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu stong pa nyid gang yin pa de nyid byang chub yin pas na/ bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang stong
390b5(mdo sde): pa nyid rjes su rtogs pa kho na byang chub yin no zhes gsungs so/ / lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal stong pa nyid la gnas pa ci zhig la gnas pa yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i
390b6(mdo sde): bu stong pa nyid la gnas pa ni/ 'dod pa dang / gzugs dang / gzugs med pa la gnas pa ma yin/ phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched la gnas pa ma yin/ lus dang sems la
390b7(mdo sde): gnas pa ma yin no/ / de ci'o phyir zhe na/ lha'i bu de gnas pa gang gis gnas par 'gyur pa'i gnas pa de'ang stong pas na/ stong pa nyid ni stong pa nyid la mi gnas pa'i phyir ro// lha'i bus smras pa//
391a1(mdo sde): 'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pa don dam pa stong pa nyid byis panas pas gnas par mi mdzad dam/ 'jam dpal kyis smras pa/ lha'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa nyid stong pa nyid yin la/
391a2(mdo sde): stong pa nyid gang yin pa de ni gnyis su med pa yin pas na/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni gnyis su med pa'i gnas pas gnas par mdzad do// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal gnyis su med pa'i gnas pa gang
391a3(mdo sde): yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu gnyis su med pa'i gnas pa ni gnyis su med pa nyid yin gyi/ de la gnas pa gzhan med de/ de'i gnas pa gnyis su med pa de las gzhan med pa de nyid kyang //
391a4(mdo sde): gnyis su med pa nyid yin no// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal gnyis zhes bya ba ni gang / gnyis su med pa zhes bya ba ni gang / 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu 'dod chags dang / 'dod
391a5(mdo sde): chags bral bar byed pa ni gnyis so/ / 'dod chags kyi rang bzhin ni gnyis su med pa'o// zhe sdang dang / zhe sdang med par byed pa de ni gnyis so// zhe sdang gi rang bzhin gnyis su med pa'o// gti mug
391a6(mdo sde): dang / gti mug med par byed pa de ni gnyis so// gti mug gi rang bzhin ni gnyis su med pa'o// nyon mongs pa dang / nyon mongs pa med par byed pa de ni gnyis so// nyon mongs pa'i rang bzhin ni
391a7(mdo sde): gnyis su med pa'o/ / bdag dang bdag med par byed pa de ni gnyis so// bdag gi rang bzhin ni gnyis su med pa'o// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal bdag gi rang bzhin yin/ 'jam dpa'
391b1(mdo sde): kyis smras pa/ lha'i bu bdag gi rang bzhin ni bzod ma nas dag pa'i phyir bdag med pa nyid yin no// bdag gi rang bzhin ni gzod ma nas dag pa'i phyir gzod ma nas dben pa nyid dang / gzod
391b2(mdo sde): ma nas ma skyes pa nyid dang / gzod ma nas ma byung ba nyid yin no// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal ci'i phyir rang bzhin zhes bya/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu de ni 'gyur ba med pas
391b3(mdo sde): de'i phyir rang bzhin zhes bya'o/ / de ni gzod ma ras gsal zhing nyon mongs pa can ma yin pas de'i phyir rang bzhin zhes bya'o// de ni nam mkha' dang mnyam pa nyid kyis mnyam zhing tshad med pas de'i phyir
391b4(mdo sde): rang bzhin zhes bya'o/ / de ni spros pa dang bral ba dang / de ni rgyu ba dang bral ba dang / de ni 'od gsal bas de'i phyir rang bzhin zhes bya'o// de ni blang ba med pa dang dor ba med pas de'i phyir rang bzhin
391b5(mdo sde): zhes bya'o/ / lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal rang bzhin mi shes pa dag gang yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu gang dag chos rnams kyi rang bzhin mi shes pa dag go// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam
391b6(mdo sde): dpal rang bzhin she sa pa dag gang yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu gang dag de dag gi rang bzhin shes pa dag go// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal dad pa dang ldan pa'i mtshan nyid gang yin
391b7(mdo sde): 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu dang ba dang ldan pa'i mtshan nyid ni chags pa thams cad las yang ngas par 'das pa yin no// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal dge slong dad pa dang mi ldan pa ji ltar
392a1(mdo sde): dad pas byin pa la dad par byed/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu dad pa dang mi ldan pa zhes bya ba ni gang mngon sum du gyur pa'i chos thams cad la gzhan gyi zong mi
392a2(mdo sde): 'jog cing / gzhan gyi dad pas yang dang yang du ma 'gro ba yin pas de'i phyir dad pa dang mi ldan pa zhes bya ste/ de ni dad pas byin pa sbyong bar ma byed do// ci'i phyir zhe na// gzod ma nas dag pa'i phyir ro// lha'i
392a3(mdo sde): bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal dge slong gang dge 'dun dang lhan cig mi gnas pa de la ji skad ces bya/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu dge slong gang dge 'dun dang lhan cig mi gnas pa de ni/ des na 'jig
392a4(mdo sde): rten gyi gnas su 'gyur ro/ / de ci'i phyir na/ lha'i bu dge 'dun ni 'dus ma byas pa yin la/ byang chub sems dpa' ni 'dus ma byas dang lhan cig mi gnas pas de'i phyir de ni 'jig rten gyi sbyin gan su 'gyur ba yin pa'i
392a5(mdo sde): phyiraro/ / lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal gal te byang chub sems dpa' 'dus ma byas dang lhan cig gnas par gyur na nyes pa cir 'gyur// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa// lha'i bu
392a6(mdo sde): 'dus ma byas thob na sems can rnams skyo bar mi byed cing / nyan thos su 'gyur bas de'i nyes pa ni der 'gyur ro// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal 'dus byas ni so so'i skye bo'i sa yin la/
392a7(mdo sde): 'dus ma byas ni 'phags pa rnams kyis yin no// don ji ltar byang chub dpa' 'phags pa'i sa spangs shing so so'i skye bo'i sa la gnas pa 'jig rten gyi sbyin gnas su 'gyur/ 'jam
392b1(mdo sde): dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' ni 'dus byas la 'ang mi gnas/ dus ma byas la'ang mi gnas pas de'i phyir de ni 'jig rten gyi sbyin gnas su 'gyur ro// de ci'i/
392b2(mdo sde): phyir zhe na/ lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' ni 'du byed las yid bskyod pa dang / 'dus ma byas la mi gnas pa yin pa'i 'dus byas kyi skyon dang bral ba dang / 'dus ma byas shes pa rtog pa yin
392b3(mdo sde): te/ de 'dus byas kyi skyon dang bral bas ni 'dus byas la mi gnas la/ 'dus ma byas shes pa rtogs pas ni 'dus ma byas su mi ltung ba'i phyir ro// lha'i bu 'di lta ste/ dper na mtshan po
392b4(mdo sde): che chen pos steng gi bar snang la mda' 'phangs par gyur la/ de nas mda' de nam mkha' la mi gnas par 'dug cing sa la'ang mi lhung na/ lha'i bu de la dka' ba cung zad yod dam/ lha'i bus
392b5(mdo sde): smras pa/ 'jam dpal dka' do// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu de bas kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag 'dus byas kyang mi spong zhing 'dus ma byas
392b6(mdo sde): kyang thob par byed la/ 'dus ma byas su'ang mi ltung zhing / 'dus byas thob pa rnams kyang yongs su smin par byed pa ni ches dka' ba yin no// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal byang chub
392b7(mdo sde): sems dpa'i 'jig pa 'dus byas sam/ 'on te 'dus ma byas sam/ gang las 'byung bar 'gyur/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa'i 'jig pa ni 'dus byas las kyang
393a1(mdo sde): 'byung bar 'gyur/ 'dus ma byas las kyang 'byung bar 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ lha'i bu 'dus byas las ni nyon mongs pa'i 'jigs pa 'byung la/ 'dus ma byas las ni/
393a2(mdo sde): nyon mongs pa med pa'i 'jigs pa 'byung ba'i phyir ro// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal nyon mongs pa med pas 'jigs pa ci yod/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu khams gsum na ni
393a3(mdo sde): nyon mongs pa'i 'jigs pa yod la/ byang chub sems dpa' gang khams gsum du nyon mongs par mi byed na/ de ni nyan thos su 'gyur ro// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems
393a4(mdo sde): dpa' 'jigs pa med pa yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' gang shes rab kyi shes pas 'dus byas la spyod par byed cing / thabs kyi shes pas 'dus ma
393a5(mdo sde): byas su mi ltung ba de lta na/ lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' 'jigs pa med pa yin no// lha'i bu gzhan yang gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems can la lta bas 'dus byas spong bar mi byed cing /
393a6(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi chos la lta bas 'dus ma byas su mi ltung ba de lta na/ byang chub sems dpa' 'jigs pa med pa yin no// lha'i bu gzhan yang gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' bsod nams kyi tshogs te
393a7(mdo sde): bar bsags pa'i phyir 'dus byas la sbyor bar byed cing / sangs rgyas kyi ye shes kyi tshogs nye bar bsags pa'i phyir/ 'dus ma byas su mi ltung ba de lta na/ byang chub sems dpab 'jigs pa med
393b1(mdo sde): pa yin no/ / rtswa'i bu gan ya krung gi byang chub sems dpa 'dus ma byas la gnas te bsam gtan rnams myed par byed cing / thabs la gnas te bsam gtan rnams las rdzog par byed pa ng+geH/
393b2(mdo sde): nu/ byang chub sems dpa' 'jigs pa med pa yin no// lha'i bu gzhan yang gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' byang chub kyi sems la gnas te dge ba'i rtsa ba nye bar bsogs par byed cing / snying rje
393b3(mdo sde): chen po la gnas te sems can rnams yongs su smin par byed pa de lta na/ byang chub sems dpa' 'jigs pa med pa yin no// lha'i bu gzhan yang gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' dben pa la gnas
393b4(mdo sde): te bdud kyi las rnams rtogs par byed cing / thabs la gnas te bdud kyi las rnams spong bar byed pa de lta na/ byang chub sems dpa' 'jigs pa med pa yin no// lha'i bu gzhan yang gang gi
393b5(mdo sde): tshe byang chub sems dpa' byams pa chen po la gnas te chos ston par byed cing / snying rje chen po la gnas te zang zing gi sbyin pa sbyin par byed pa de lta na/ byang chub sems dpa' 'jigs pa med pa
393b6(mdo sde): yin no/ / lha'i bu gzhan yang gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' 'khor ba la gnas te mya ngan las 'das pa yongs su sbyang ba'i las byed cing / mya ngan las 'das pa la gnas te 'khor ba yongs su sbyang
393b7(mdo sde): ba'i las byed pa de tsam gyis na byang chub sems dpa' 'jigs pa med pa yin no/ / lha'i bu gzhan yang gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' skye ba med pas skye bar byed cing / 'pho ba med pas 'byung bar byad/
394a1(mdo sde): pa dang / chos la lta bas snang bar byed cing / phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched kyis rab tu phye ba ma yin pa dang / thams cad dang rjes su 'brel cing zhi ba dang /
394a2(mdo sde): nye bar zhi bar gyur pa dang / 'bar dar byed cing 'bar bas tshig par mi byed pa dang / nyon mongs pa thams cad la yongs su spyod par byed cing / nyon mongs pa'i skyon rnams kyis mi gos pa dang / slob pa
394a3(mdo sde): dang mi slob pa rnams 'dul bar byed cing / nyan thos kyi rnam par grol ba la reg par mi byed pa dang / sems can rnams kyi bosam pa la 'jug cing / chos kyi bsam pa spong bar mi byed pa dang / bdud
394a4(mdo sde): kyi lcags kyu shes par byed cing / chos kyi lcags kyu spong bar mi byed pa dang / shes pas 'jug par byed cing / thabs kyis ldog par byed pa dang / 'phags pa'i rnam pa ston par byed cing
394a5(mdo sde): 'phags pa ma yin pa yongs su smin par bya ba la spro bar byed pa dang / sangs rgyas mthong ba la mngon par dga' bar byed cing / chos mthong ba la kun tu 'dod par byed pa de tsam gyis na byang chub sems
394a6(mdo sde): dpa' 'jigs pa med pa yin no/ / 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas bstan pa 'di bshad pa na/ lha'i bu lnga khri chos rnams la chos kyi mig rdul med cing dri ma dang bral ba rnam par dag go/ lha'i bu nyi
394a7(mdo sde): khri lnga stong ni len pa med par zag pa rnams las sems rnam par grol lo/ / byang chub sems dpa' sngon dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa lnga khri ni mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur to// byang chub sems dpa' nyi khri ni/
394b1(mdo sde): grongs pa zlogs pa med pa skyes so// lha dang mi rnams ci sgra dbu las srod chags stong thab rab tu mang po dag gis ni byang chub tu sems bskyed nas/ de badzin gshegs pa dang 'jam dngul gzhon nur gyur/
394b2(mdo sde): pa la lha'i mchod pa dag byas so// gzhan yang lha'i bu rab rtsal sems kyis/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so// 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa'i lam la gnas pa
394b3(mdo sde): yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' 'dod chags spangs pa'i phyir yang chos ston par byed la/ 'dod chags dang bral ba mngon du'ang mi byed pa dang / zhe sdang
394b4(mdo sde): spang ba'i phyir yang chos ston par byed la/ zhe sdang spong ba mngon du 'ang mi byed pa dang / gti mug spang ba'i phyir yang chos ston par byed la/ gti mug spong ba mngon du'ang mi byed pa dang / nyon mongs pa
394b5(mdo sde): spang ba'i phyir chos ston par yang byed la/ nyon mongs pa spong ba mngon du'ang mi byed pa de tsam gyis na/ sgro'i bu byang chub sems dpa' lam la gnas pa yin no// lha'i bu gzhan yang gang gi tshe byang chub se
394b6(mdo sde): dpa' sems can rnams la stong pa nyid ston pa yang byed la/ stong pa nyid mngon du'ang mi byed pa dang / sems can rnams la mtshan ma med pa ston par yang byed la/ mtshan ma med pa mngon du'ang mi bye/
394b7(mdo sde): pa dang / sems can rnams la smon pa med pa ston par yang byed la/ smon pa med pa mngon du'ang mi byed pa dang / de bzhin du sems can rnams la mngon par 'du byed pa med pa dang / skye ba med pa dang
395a1(mdo sde): 'byung ba med pa dang / dngos po med pa dang / 'dod chags dang bral ba dang mi ldan pa dang / 'gog pa'i chos ston par yang byed la/ 'gog pa mngon du'ang mi byed pa de tsam gyis na
395a2(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' yam la gnas pa yin no/ / lha'i bu gzhan yang gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' yongs su mi gtong bas sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa sgrub par byed pa dang / tshul khrims las yang dag
395a3(mdo sde): par 'da' bas tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgrub par byed pa dang / gnod sems kyis bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa sgrub par byed pa dang / le los brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgrub par byed
395a4(mdo sde): pa dang / brjed ngas pas bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgrub par byed pa dang / bems po dang lug ltar lkugs pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgrub par byed pa de tsam gyis na byang chub sems
395a5(mdo sde): dpa' lam la gnas pa yin no/ / lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal ci las bsams te de skad smra/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi yongs su mi
395a6(mdo sde): gtong ba yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ sems can yongs su mi gtong ba dang / chos yongs su mi gtong ba dang / byang chub kyi sems yongs su mi gtong ba dang / dge ba'i chos thams cad yongs su mi gtong
395a7(mdo sde): ba ste/ byang chub sems dpa' ni chos bzhi po de dag yongs su mi gtong bas sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa sgrub par byed do// lha'i bu tshul khrims las yang dag par 'dab pa zhes bya ba de ni/ de'i rang bzhin ma
395b1(mdo sde): yin pa'i tshig bla dgas yin te/ tshul khrims las yang dag par 'da' bas ting nge 'dzin dang / ting nge 'dzin las yang dag par 'da' bas shes rab dang / shes rab las yang dag par 'da' bas rnam par
395b2(mdo sde): grol ba shes pa sgrub par byed de/ lha'i bu khyod kyis rnam grangs des/ gang tshul khrims las yang dag par 'da' bde tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgrub par byed pa yin par rig par bya'o// lha'i bu byang
395b3(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' gang gnod sems la zhugs pa ni nyan thos kyi theg pa las log par zhugs pa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa la sa log par zhugs pa yin pas de ni theg pa chen po la legs pa
395b4(mdo sde): zhugs pa yin te/ gang theg pa chen po la legs par zhugs pa de ni bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa sgrub par byed pa yin no// lha'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' lus kyis rtul bar mi byed cing / nga
395b5(mdo sde): dang sems kyis rtul bar mi byed pa de ni le lo can yin la/ gang de ltar chos la mngon par brtson pa de ni brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgrub par byed pa yin no// lha'i bu gzhan yang
395b6(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' ni rmi lam na'ang las gnyis po dag la dga' ba'i sems skyed par mi byed pas de ni brjed ngas pa yin la/ gang nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa la brjed dras pa de
395b7(mdo sde): ni theg pa chen po la mnyam par gzhag pa yin pas/ des ni bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgrub par byed pa yin no// lha'i bu chos thams cad ni bems po ste/ dzA dang / shing dang /
396a1(mdo sde): rtsig pa dang / lam dang / mig yor dang / lug ltar lkugs pa dang 'dra bar rang bzhin gyis nus pa med pa yin pas/ gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' shes rab dang
396a2(mdo sde): ye shes kyis de ltar chos thams cad bems po dang lug ltar thug pa lta bus byang chub sgrub par byed pa de ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgrub par byed pa yin te/ de ltar zhugs pa'i byang chub sems
396a3(mdo sde): dpa' ni lam sgrub par byed pa yin no/ / lha'i bu gzhan yang gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' 'khor ba'i lam yang mi spong la/ mya ngan las 'das pa'i lam yang tshol bar byed pa dang / lam gyi las
396a4(mdo sde): kyi rgyun yang mi gcod cing / lam gyi bya ba'ang sgrub par byed pa dang / lam ngan par zhugs pa'i sems can rnams kyang lam la 'god par byed pa de lta na/ byang chub sems dpa' lam la gnas
396a5(mdo sde): pa yin no/ / lha'i bu gzhan yang gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems can thams cad dang / chos thams cad 'tshal na mi rnyed pa dang / byang chub kyi lam spang bar mi byed pa dang / 'bras bu yod par/
396a6(mdo sde): bsam gtan byed pa de lta na/ byang chub sems dpa' byang chub kyi lam thob pa yin no// lha'i bu gzhan yang gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' nyan thos kyi lam yang rab tu shes la/ nyan thos kyi lam gyis
396a7(mdo sde): nges par 'brang bar yang mi byed pa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi lam yang rab tu shes la/ rang sangs rgyas kyi lam gyi nges par 'byung bar mi byed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i lam yang thob par byed la
396b1(mdo sde): lam des kyang dbang po yongs su ma rdzogs par nges par 'byung bar mi byed pa de lta na/ byang chub sems dpa' lam la gnas pa yin no// byung bu gzhan yang gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' dge ba'i rtsa
396b2(mdo sde): ba thams cad mngon par 'du byed pa dang / mngon par 'du bya ba'i 'bras bu don du mi gnyer ba dang / mngon par 'du byed pa'i skyon gyis mi gos pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba mngon par 'du bya ba thams cad
396b3(mdo sde): byang chub tu yongs su sngo bar byed pa dang / byang chub kyi phyir 'phel ba yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba dang / 'bri ba yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba de lta na/ byang chub sems dpa' lam la gnas pa
396b4(mdo sde): yin no/ / lha'i bu gzhan yang gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' lam ngan pa las lam yongs su tshol bar byed pa dang / lam yongs su btsal nas kyang nges par 'byung bar mi byed pa de lta na/ byang chub
396b5(mdo sde): sems dpa' lam la gnas pa yin no/ / lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' lam ngan pa las lam yongs su tshol bar byed/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu
396b6(mdo sde): lam ngan pa zhes bya ba ni 'khor ba ste/ byang chub sems dpa' ni de la gnas nas sems can nges par 'byung ba'i phyir lam yongs su tshol bar byed kyi/ bdag nyid nges par 'byung ba'i phyir ni ma yin no//
396b7(mdo sde): lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa ni 'jig rten thams cad dang oM mthun pa yin no// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lnga'i bu 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni 'jig rten na
397a1(mdo sde): spyod kyang 'jig rten gyi chos rnams kyis mi gos pa dang / nyon mongs pa dang / nyon mongs pa med pa ston par byed kyang / nyon mongs pa med pa nyid du mi ltung ba dang / gab dang /
397a2(mdo sde): 'chib ston par byed kyang / chos thams cad skye ba med pa dang / 'byung ba med par shes shing / skyon med pa mngon du mi byed pa dang / phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched yongs su spyod par byed
397a3(mdo sde): kyang / phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched don du mi gnyer ba dang / phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched yongs su shes par bya ba'i phyir/ sems can rnams la chos ston kyang / yongs su shes pa de
397a4(mdo sde): dag yongs su shes par mi byed pa dang / bsam gtan dang / rnam par thar pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / snyoms par 'jug pa dag mngon par sgrub par byed cing sems rnam par g.yeng ba rnams te
397a5(mdo sde): bar 'jog par byed kyang / nye bar 'jog pa la 'byung bar mi byed pa dang / bdud kyi yul nye bar ston par byed kyang / bdud kyi las rnams kyis mi 'phrogs pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi yul spong bar mi byed pa
397a6(mdo sde): dang / bdud kyi yul gyi rjes su mi 'jug pa dang / chos kyi dbyings kyi yul las ldog par mi byed pa dang / sems can gyi khams kyi yul nye bar len par byed pas na/ de'i phyir sems can chen po de dag
397a7(mdo sde): gi spyod pa ni 'jig rten thams cad dang mthun pa yin no/ / lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal khyod byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa la spobs par gyis shig/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu
397b1(mdo sde): bsam pa yongs su dag cing nang dang phyi rol dben pa nyid kyis lhag pa'i bsam pa la spyod pa dang / rab tu spyod pa med pa nyid kyis sbyor ba la spyod pa dang / sems mi brjed pa nyid kyis byang chub kyi sems
397b2(mdo sde): mi brjed pa la spyod pa dang / sems dul ba nyid kyis sbyin pa la spyod pa dang / sems zhi ba nyid kyis tshul khrims la spyod pa dang / smras pa med pa nyid kyis bzod pa la spyod pa dang / lus dben
397b3(mdo sde): pa nyid kyis brtson 'grus la spyod pa dang / chos kyi dbyings rnam par g.yeng ba med pa nyid kyis bsam gtan la spyod pa dang / spros pa med pa nyid kyis shes rab la spyod pa dang / sems can la
397b4(mdo sde): bdag med pa nyid kyis byams pa la spyod pa dang / nyon mongs pa yod pa ma yin pa rab tu zhi ba nyid kyis snying rje la spyod pa dang / rang bzhin gyis rnam par grol ba'i phyir dga' ba la spyod pa dang / mtha'
397b5(mdo sde): gnyis dang bral ba'i phyir btang snyoms la spyod pa dang / gzod ma nas ma skyes pa'i phyir mi rtag pa la so sor rtog pa la spyod pa dang / yongs su rtog pa sdug bsngal ba'i phyir sdug bsngal la so sor rtog
397b6(mdo sde): pab la spyod pa dang / phyin ci log rang bzhin med pa'i phyir bdag med pa la so sor rtog pa la spyod pa dang / 'du shes yongs su shes pa'i phyir zhi ba la so sor rtog pa la spyod pa dang / phung po sgyu ma lta
397b7(mdo sde): bur yongs su shes pa'i phyir sdug bsngal yongs su shes pa la spyod pa dang / ma rig pa sngon du 'gro ba'i phyir kun 'byung ba shes pa la spyod pa dang / rang bzhin gyis 'gags pa'i phyir 'gags pa shes pa
398a1(mdo sde): pa spyod pa dang / 'dus byas la mngon par zhen pa med pa'i phyir lam shes pa la spyod pa dang / 'bras bu yongs su shes pa nyid kyis rgyu shes pa la spyod pa dang / rten cing
398a2(mdo sde): 'brel par 'byung ba'i phyir rkyen shes pa la spyod pa dang / du ma'i phyir tshogs pa la spyod pa dang / brjod du med pa'i phyir don so so yang dag par rig pa la spyod pa dang / chos kyi dbyings dbyer med pa'o/
398a3(mdo sde): phyir chos so so yang dag par rig pa la spyod pa dang / ming dang gzugs 'byung ba med pa'i phyir nges pa'i tshig so so yang dag par rig pa la spyod pa dang / sgra brag cha dang mtshungs pa'i phyir spobs pa so so
398a4(mdo sde): yang dag par rig pa la spyod pa dang / chog 'bru gsal ba nyid kyis don la rton pa la spyod pa dang / rnam par shes pa'i spyod yul ma spangs pa nyid kyis ye shes la rton pa la spyod pa dang / las kyi rnam
398a5(mdo sde): par smin pa ston pa nyid kyis nges pa'i don gyi mdo sde la rton pa la spyod pa dang / gang brag yongs su smin par bya ba nyid kyis chos la rton pa la spyod pa dang / las rnam par dag pa'i phyir lha'i mig la spyodapa
398a6(mdo sde): dang / tshul khrims rnam par dag pa'i phyir lha'i rna ba la spyod pa dang / ting nge 'dzin rnam par dag pa'i phyir pha rol gyi sems shes pa la spyod pa dang / dus gsum mnyam pa nyid kyis phyir sngon gyi gnas /
398a7(mdo sde): su dran pa shes pa la spyod pa dang / sems la dbang sgyur ba'i phyir rdzu 'phrul mngon par sgrub pa la spyod pa dang / mi phyed pa'i phyir spyod pa brtan pa la spyod pa dang / mi lhod pa'i phyir spyod pa sra ba la
398b1(mdo sde): spyod pa dang / bskyod du med pa'i phyir gnas pa med pa la spyod pa dang / tha dad pa med pa nyid kyis spyod pa mnyam pa la spyod pa dang / thams cad du rjes su ma brtags pa'i phyir sa dang / chu dang / me
398b2(mdo sde): dang / rlung dang / nam mkha' lta bur spyod pa dang / rnam par bsgrubs pa'i mtshan nyid kyis sgyu ma lta bu la spyod pa dang / yang dag pa ma yin pa'i mtshan nyid kyis rmi lam lta bu la spyod pa dang / rnam
398b3(mdo sde): par rmongs pa'i mtshan nyid kyis smig rgyu lta bu la spyod pa dang / bdag mi srid pa'i mtshan nyid kyis stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / sems rang bzhin med pa'i mtshan nyid kyis mtshan ma med pa la spyod pa
398b4(mdo sde): dang / khams gsum rang bzhin med pa'i mtshan nyid kyis smon pa med pa la spyod pa dang / 'dus byas rang bzhin med pa'i mtshan nyid kyis mngon par 'du byed pa med pa la spyod pa dang / sems dang / yid dang /
398b5(mdo sde): rnam par shes pa 'jug pa med pa'i mtshan nyid kyis bdud tshar gcad pa la spyod pa dang / spyod pa thams cad rnam par bsgrubs pa'i mtshan nyid kyis dkon mchog gsum gyi gdung rgyun mi gcad pa la spyod pa ste/
398b6(mdo sde): lha'i bu de ltar spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa la spyod pa yin no// / bam po gsum pa ste tha ma'o// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal
398b7(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa de ni nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad las yang dag par 'das pa yin no/ / 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu de de bzhin te/ lha'i bu kho bo ni byang chub sems dpa'/
399a1(mdo sde): gang dad pas rjes su 'brang ba ma yin pa dang / chos kyi rjes su 'brang ba ma yin pa dang / gang brgyad pa ma yin pa dang / rgyun du zhugs pa ma yin pa dang / lan cig phyir 'ong /
399a2(mdo sde): ba ma yin pa dang / phyir mi 'ong ba ma yin pa dang / dgra bcom pa ma yin pa dang / dang nyan thos ma yin pa dang / rang sangs rgyas ma yin pa dang / gang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ma yin pa dang / de
399a3(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pa ma yin pa dang / bcom ldan 'das ma yin pa dang / yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ma yin pa dang / ston pa ma yin pa de ni byang chub sems dpa' yin par mi smra'o// lha'i bu
399a4(mdo sde): kho bo ni byang chub sems dpa' gang so so'i skye bo'i chos can ma yin pa dang / 'dod chags kyi chos can ma yin pa dang / zhe sdang gi chos can ma yin pa dang / gti mug gi chos can ma yin pa dang / gang
399a5(mdo sde): 'khor ba'i chos can ma yin pa dang / yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba'i chos can ma yin pa de ni byang chub sems dpa' yin par mi smra'o// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal ci las bsams te de skad smra/ 'jam
399a6(mdo sde): dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' dad pas rjes su 'brang ba dang / chos kyi rjes su 'brang ba dang / brgyad pa dang / rgyun du zhugs pa dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang / phyir mi 'ong ba dang / dgra
399a7(mdo sde): bcom pa dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dang / de bzhin gshegs pa dang / bcom ldan 'das dang / yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dang /
399b1(mdo sde): ston pa dang / so so'i skye ba'i chos can dang / 'dod chags kyi chos can dang / zhe sdang gi chos can dang / gti mug gi chos can dang / 'khor ba'i chos can dang / yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba'i chos
399b2(mdo sde): can yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la dad par byed pa dang / chags pa thams cad la dad par byed kyang de la chags par mi 'gyur
399b3(mdo sde): ba dang / gzhan gyi dad pas mi 'gro ba dang / pha rol tu phyin pa drug gi lam la dad pa bskyed cing 'dzin par byed pa dang / chags pas chags par gyur pa rnams thar par byed pa dang / chags pa med pa'i ye
399b4(mdo sde): shes yongs su tshol bar byed pa dang / 'khor ba la chags par mi byed pa dang / mya ngan las 'das par mi ltung ba de tsam gyis na/ lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' dad pas rjes su 'brang ba yin no// lha'i bus
399b5(mdo sde): smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi rjes su 'brang ba yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas thams cad kyis gsungs pa
399b6(mdo sde): 'dzin par byed pa dang / kun 'dzin par byed pa dang / chos kyi zas dang ldan zhing zang zing gi bas med pa dang / chos la gnas shing nyon mongs pa la mi gnas pa dang / chos kyi stobs can yin gyi/
399b7(mdo sde): rgyal gyi stobs can ma yin pa dang / chos smra ba yin gyi/ 'jig rten rgyang 'phen pa'i gtam smra ba ma yin pa dang / chos kyi dbang phyug yin gyi/ nyon mongs pa'i dbang phyug ma yin pa dang / chos la rngon pa/
400a1(mdo sde): yin gyi/ gang zag la rton pa ma yin pa dang / chos smra ba yin gyi/ chos ma yin pa mi smra ba dang / chos kyi rjes su 'thun pa'i chos la rton pa yin gyi/ brtson pa btab/
400a2(mdo sde): ba'i chos la mi gnas pa dang / chos skyon med pa nyid du chos thams cad shes par byed pa dang / gzungs kyi sgo chags pa med pa dang ldan pa dang / nor bdun dang ldan pa dang / dam pa'i chos
400a3(mdo sde): yongs su 'dzin par byed pa dang / chos kyi khyad par la gnas pa de lta na/ b+hu'i bu byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi rjes su 'brang ba yin no// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub
400a4(mdo sde): sems dpa' brgyad pa yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' log pa nyid brgyad las yang dag par 'das pa dang / yang dag pa nyid brgyad la rab tu gnas
400a5(mdo sde): pa dang / lam yan lag brgyad pa rnam par sbyang ba la mkhas pa dang / sbyor ba yongs su ma rdzogs par lam nges par 'byung bar mi byed pa dang / mi khom pa brgyad du skyes pa'i sems can rnam/
400a6(mdo sde): dal ba phun sum tshogs padag la 'god par byed pa dang / skyes bu dam pa'i rnam par rtog pa brgyad la gnas pa dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad la bsam gtan byed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i lhag
400a7(mdo sde): ba'i bsam pa mi spong ba de lta na/ g+ha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' brgyad pa yin no// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' rgyun du zhugs pa yin/ 'jam dpal gyis
400b1(mdo sde): smras pa/ lha'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems can rgyan phyogs su dad pa rnams rgyun las zlog par byed pa dang / 'khor ba'i rgyun thams cad gcod par byed la/ 'khor ba mi gcod pa
400b2(mdo sde): dang / ngan song thams cad kyang gcod par byed pa dang / sems can rnams bde 'gro dang / mya ngan las 'das pa mngon du bya ba'i lam la 'god par byed pa dang / mtshams gcad pa dang /
400b3(mdo sde): dang / mi la gzhol ba dang / bden pa ston par byed pa dang / rlom sems su mi ltung ba dang / the tsom dang bral ba dang / nges pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos la gzhol ba dang / so so'i skye bo'i lam
400b4(mdo sde): las yang dag par 'das pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi lam la rab tu gnas pa dang / 'khor ba'i gting rnyed pa dang / mya ngan las 'das pa la mngon du phyogs par gyur pa dang / 'jig rten gyi spyan
400b5(mdo sde): gnas su gyur pa dang / 'dus byas la snang ba dang / 'dus ma byas pas rab tu phye ba dang / phyir ldog par mi 'gyur ba dang / dge 'dun la yang dag par gzhol ba de lta na/ lha'i bu byang chub
400b6(mdo sde): sems dpa' rgyun du zhugs pa yin no/ / lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' lan cig phyir 'ong ba yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub
400b7(mdo sde): sems dpa' chos thams cad 'ong ba med pa dang / 'gro ba med par shes nas sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir bsams bzhin du 'ong ba dang / sems can rnams yongs su smin par byed
401a1(mdo sde): pa dang / 'ong ba dang / 'gro ba ston par byed pa dang / chos nyid la 'ong ba dang / 'gro ba med par mthong ba dang / 'ong ba'ang nyon mongs pa med pas 'ong ba dang / rang gi las yongs
401a2(mdo sde): su dag pas 'gro ba dang 'ong ba mnyam pa nyid mi spong ba dang / bdud kyi dbang gis mi 'gro ba dang / byang chub kyi lam nye bar ston pa'i phyir 'ong ba dang / nye bar blangs pa'i sems can bsgral ba'i phyir 'ong ba dang /
401a3(mdo sde): byang chub kyi lhag pa'i bsam pa sra zhing mi phyed pa de lta na/ lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' yan cig phyir 'ong ba yin no// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' phyir mi 'ong
401a4(mdo sde): ba yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' lta ba rnams dang / phyin ci log rnams dang / sgrib pa rnams su'ang mi 'ong ba dang / 'dun pa dang / 'dod
401a5(mdo sde): chags dang / zhe sdang dang / 'jigs pa dang / gti mug gis yang 'ong ba dang / 'gro bar mi 'gyur ba dang / byas pa nges par ma gyur cing / sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams ma rdzogs par mi 'ong ba dang /
401a6(mdo sde): 'ong ba med pa dang / 'pho ba med pa la mkhas pa dang / rga shi med pa la thob pa dang / mthar gnas dang / byas pa nges pa dang / lung bstan pa thob pa dang / dmigs pa med pa dang / rnam pa
401a7(mdo sde): med pa thob pa dang / shes pas gzhan la rag ma las pa de lta na/ lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' phyir mi 'ong ba yin no// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' dgra bcom
401b1(mdo sde): pa yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' chags pa med cing 'dod chags gdul ba'i phyir sems can rnams la chos ston pa dang / sdang ba med cing zhe sdang gdul/
401b2(mdo sde): pa'i phyir sems can rnams la chos ston pa dang / rmongs pa med cing gti mug gdul ba'i phyir sems can rnams la chos ston pa dang / chos thams cad la nyon mongs pa med par gnas pa dang / sems
401b3(mdo sde): can thams cad la sems ma btang ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la brtson 'grus brtsams pa dang / 'dod pa'i longs spyod thams cad la dga' ba med pas dgar ba dang / dgra bcom pa dang /
401b4(mdo sde): pad+ma bzhin du nyon mongs pa thams cad kyis ma gos pa dang / shes pas 'phags pa dang mnyam pa dang / thabs kyis 'phags pa ma yin par gnas pa dang / nye bar len pa thams cad la bdag gi
401b5(mdo sde): med cing yongs su 'dzin pa med pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la bdag gir byed cing yongs su 'dzin pa dang / rang gi sems kyi rgyud dag la zag pa med pa'i sems dang ldan pa dang / gan
401b6(mdo sde): gyi sems kyi rgyud dag la zag pa med pa gnas par byed pa dang / sngon dam bcas pa dag la brnag pa yongs su rdzogs pa dang / tshu rol dang pha rol la gnas pa rnams kyi pha rol tu son pa dang /
401b7(mdo sde): rol gyi gnas ma spangs pa dang / gzhan gyi sems can gzhan thar par byed pa de lta na/ lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' dgra bcom pa yin no// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang
402a1(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' nyan thos yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems can thams cad la ma thos pa'i chos sgrogs par byed cing yul
402a2(mdo sde): rnams la spyod par mi byed pa dang / yang dag 'di dam pa'i chos dang / skye ba med pa dang / bkag pa med pa'i chos sgrogs par byed pa dang / sgra dang / rkyen dang / bdag med pa dang / sems can
402a3(mdo sde): med pa dang / rang bzhin gyis g.yo ba med pa sgrogs par byed pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos tshad med pa dang / nam mkha' dang mnyam pa'i chos rnams sgrogs par byed pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi ye shes
402a4(mdo sde): dang / ye shes chen po la chos thams cad rgyus nye bar 'gro bar rtsoms shig ces sgrogs par byed pa dang / sgrogs pa'ang gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog pa dang / thos pas kyang rlom sems mi byed pa dang /
402a5(mdo sde): sgrogs pa thams cad kyi sngon dang phyi ma'i mtha' mi 'chad pa yongs su shes pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa mi zad pa thob pa dang / don dang / tshig dang / yig 'bru mi zad pa dang / sems can
402a6(mdo sde): thams cad kyi sems dang / spyod pa dang / shes pa ston par byed pa dang / so so ci rigs par chos ston par byed pa dang / zhi ba'i sa la gnas pa dang / spros pa med pa dang / sngon gyi smon lam pa
402a7(mdo sde): spyod pa de lta na lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' nyan thos yin no/ / lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' rang sangs rgyas yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu gang gi
402b1(mdo sde): tshe byang chub sems dpa' chos thams cad rkyen la rag las pa dang / sems can med pa dang / srog med pa dang / gang zag med pa dang / bdag po med pa dang / rnam par bsgrubs pa nye bar gnas pa'i mtshan
402b2(mdo sde): nyid du shes pa dang / des rkyen rnams legs par mthong ba'i phyir byang chub 'dren par byed pa'i rkyen 'di lta ste/ pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad kyi phyogs dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams kyi phyogs dang /
402b3(mdo sde): bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi'i phyogs dang / tshad med pa bzhi'i phyogs dang / mngon par shes pa'i phyogs yang dag par sgrub par byed pa dang / de rkyen nye bar sgrub par byed cing / gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog pas
402b4(mdo sde): byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar byed pa dang / sa ngan pa dag las sems skyo bar byed pa dang / nyi tshe ba'i shes pa 'dul ba la mkhas pa dang / theg pa chen po la legs par rab tu gnas pa dang /
402b5(mdo sde): chos thams cad la mngon du gyur pa de lta na/ lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' rang sangs rgyas yin no// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas yin/ 'jam
402b6(mdo sde): dpal gyis spras pa/ lha'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' chos thams cad gzod ma nas dben pa nyid du rtogs par byed pa dang / sems can thams cad gzod ma nas bdag med pa nyid du rtogs par
402b7(mdo sde): byed pa dang / ming mngon par rtogs par bya ba'i phyir spyod pa dman pa dang / mchog dang bar ma thams cad rtogs par byed pa dang / rang gi nyon mongs pa stong pa nyid kyis nyon mongs pa thams cad
403a1(mdo sde): rtogs par byed pa dang / skad cig gcig la rjes su rtogs pa'i rim gyis sa dang spyod pa sna tshogs ston par byed pa dang / sems can gyi dbang po dang mos pas chos ston par byed pa
403a2(mdo sde): dang / 'bras bu yod par chos ston par byed pa de lta na/ lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas yin no// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs
403a3(mdo sde): pa yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa'i lam du 'gro ba dang / de bzhin nyid mi brjed pa dang / de bzhin nyid la rab tu gnas pa dang /
403a4(mdo sde): de bzhin nyid kyi sbyin pa dang / de bzhin nyid kyi tshul khrims dang / de bzhin nyid kyi bzod pa dang / de bzhin nyid kyi brtson 'grus dang / de bzhin nyid kyi bsam gtan dang / de bzhin nyid kyi shes rab dang /
403a5(mdo sde): de bzhin nyid kyi thabs dang / de bzhin nyid kyi smon lam dang / de bzhin nyid kyi stobs dang / de bzhin nyid kyi ye shes dang ldan pa dang / de bzhin nyid kyi sems can med pa dang / sems can yongs su thar
403a6(mdo sde): bar byed pa dang / sems can gyi gnas 'khor ba na'ang spyod la/ spyod pa thams cad las kyang yang dag par 'das pa dang / spyod pa las sgrol bar byed pa dang / de na'ang yin la/ de na'ang ma yin pa dang /
403a7(mdo sde): 'di na'ang yin la/ 'di na'ang ma yin pa dang / gnyis ka las dag pa dang / mun pa dang bral ba dang / rtag tu gsal ba dang / mun pa med pa dang / mun pa'i ling tog dang bral ba dang / de bzhin nyid
403b1(mdo sde): kyi rjes su song ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sa'i rjes su song ba de lta na/ lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa zhes bya'o// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems/
403b2(mdo sde): dpa' bcom ldan 'das zhes bya/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' nyon mongs pa bcom pa dang / chu bo las brgal ba dang / srid pa mthong ba dang / sems can thams cad
403b3(mdo sde): kyi khur dang / srid pa 'joms pa dang / srid pa'i 'du shes dang bral ba dang / bdud bcom pa dang / khur bor ba dang / srid pa'i 'gro bar 'chi 'pho ba dang / skye ba dang / bya ba shes pa dang / srid pa'i
403b4(mdo sde): 'dod chags bsal ba dang / lus dang sems bsgoms pa dang / tshul khrims dang / shes rab bsgoms pa dang / srid pa'i skyon legs par mthong ba dang / srid pa'i sred pa dang bral ba dang / semra
403b5(mdo sde): na la bsam pa ma btang ba dang / srid pa'i rgya mtsho las sgrol ba dang / chu lon dang zam pa legs par byas pa dang / mi gnas pas legs par mthong ba dang / rtag tu bsgom pa la yid kyis brtson
403b6(mdo sde): pa dang / sems can gyi srid pa zad par byed pa dang / srid pa thams cad las rnam par log pa dang / thabs la mkhas pa dang / nyon mongs pa thams cad thal bar rlog par byed pa dang / srid pas
403b7(mdo sde): rnam par rtse ba la mkhas pa dang / srid pa gsum na yod pa rnams kyis mchod pa de lta na/ lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' bcom ldan 'das zhes bya'o// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal
404a1(mdo sde): ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' mtshams med pas/
404a2(mdo sde): dang mnyam pa byang chub kyang de dang mnyam pas mnyam pa nyid du mngon par rdzogs par byang chub par byed pa dang / lta ba'i rnam pa rnams dang / phyin ci log pa rnams dang / sgrib pa rnams dang / chod pa rnams
404a3(mdo sde): dang / kun nas ldang ba rnams gang dang mnyam pa byang chub kyang de dang mnyam pas mnyam pa nyid du mngon par rdzogs par byang chub par byed pa dang / 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug gang dang mnyam
404a4(mdo sde): ba dang / nyon mongs pa thams cad gang dang mnyam pa byang chub kyang de dang mnyam pas mnyam pa nyid du mngon par rdzogs par byang chub par byed pa dang / so so'i skye bo'i chos rnams dang / slob pa'i chos
404a5(mdo sde): rnams dang / nyan thos kyi chos rnams dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams dang / byang chub sems dpa'i chos rnams gang dang mnyam pa byang chub kyang de dang mnyam pas mnyam pa nyid du mngon pa 'jos
404a6(mdo sde): par byang chub par byed pa dang / mnyam pa nyid du rnam par 'khrug par mi byed pa dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum mnyam pa nyid kyis mnyam pa nyid du lta bar byed pa dang / chos thams cad gzod ma
404a7(mdo sde): nas dag pa'i phyir rkyen la rag las pa dang / yod pa ma yin pa'i yongs su rtog pas kun nas blang ba nam mkha' dang mnyam pa nyid du mngon par rdzogs par byang chub par byed pa de lta na/ lha'i bu byang
404b1(mdo sde): rgyu ba sems dpa' yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas yin no/ / lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar ra byang chub sems dpa' ston pa yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu gang
404b2(mdo sde): gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' gang la ston pa dang / rab tu ston pa dang / rjes su ston par byed pa de dag thams cad mi g.yo pa'i chos can du 'gyur ba dang / bstan pa yongs su 'dzin par 'gyur
404b3(mdo sde): ba dang / stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams su ston pa dang / rab tu ston pa dang / ston pa gcig pur 'gyur ba dang / sems can thams cad kyi skyabs dang / gling dang / dpung
404b4(mdo sde): gnyen du 'gyur ba dang / mtshan ma thams cad zhi ba dang / rab tu zhi ba dang / nye bar zhi bar 'gyur ba dang / the tshom dang bral ba dang / sems can thams cad kyi the tshom gcod pa la mkhas pa dang /
404b5(mdo sde): brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong gis phyag byas pa dang / yang dag par smra ba dang / khams gsum pas phyag byas pa dang / sems nam mkha' dang mnyam zhing khengs pa med
404b6(mdo sde): pa dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' legs par mthong ba'i phyir smad pa dang / brdeg pa dang / dgod ba dang / gshung ba dang / khro ba dang / spro ba dang / bsdigs pa thams cad dang / rlom sems
404b7(mdo sde): thams cad kyis zhum par mi 'gyur ba dang / sems can gyi rang bzhin legs par mthong ba'i phyir sems can thams cad la phan zhing snying brtse ba dang / 'jig rten la ston par grags par 'gyur
405a1(mdo sde): bde lta na lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' ston pa yin no/ / lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' so so'i skye bo'i chos can yin/ 'jam dpal
405a2(mdo sde): gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' thabs kyis so so'i skye bo'i spyod pa thams cad kyang ston par byed la/ shes pas so so skye bo'i spyod pa thams cad la chags par yang
405a3(mdo sde): mi 'gyur ba de lta na/ lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' so so'i skye bo'i chos can yin no// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' 'dod chags kyi chos can yin//
405a4(mdo sde): 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' rtag tu sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams la rjes su chags par 'gyur ba dang / rtag tu sangs rgyas kyi sku la kun tu chags par
405a5(mdo sde): 'gyur ba dang / bsam gtan dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / snyoms par 'jug pa sgrub pa'i phyir rtag tu dgon par gnas pa la rjes su chags par 'gyur ba dang / sems can rnams bsdu ba'i dngos po
405a6(mdo sde): bzhis bsdu ba la rtag tu rjes su chags par 'gyur ba dang / sems can thams cad la zhe 'gras pa'i sems med par 'gyur ba de lta na/ lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' 'dod chags kyi chos can yin no// lha'i
405a7(mdo sde): bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' zhe sdang gi chos can yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' 'dus byas rnams la gcig tu nyes pa'i
405b1(mdo sde): skyon chags par lta bar byed pa dang / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa la sdang bar byed pa dang / nyon mongs pa thams cad dang / 'du byed thams cad la skyon du'ang 'du shes la/ nyon
405b2(mdo sde): mongs pa rnams dang / 'du byed rnams spong bar yang mi byed pa dang / sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir brtson 'grus rgyun mi gcod par byed pa dang / snying rje chen pos yang dag par
405b3(mdo sde): zin pa'i yid kyis snying brtse ba rgya chen po yang dag par skyed par byed pa dang / sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir sems can rnams nyon mongs pa'i 'dam rdzab las 'byin par byed pa dang /
405b4(mdo sde): sems can zhe sdang can rnams la bzod pa nye bar sgrub par byed cing / nyon mongs pa rnams la nyes pa sbyin par byed pa dang / 'ching bo'i thabs thams cad dang 'khor ba sun 'byin par byed pa de
405b5(mdo sde): na/ lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' zhe sdang gi chos can yin no// b+ha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' gti mug gi chos can yin/ 'jam dpal gyis
405b6(mdo sde): smras pa/ lha'i bu gti mug ces bya ba ni gang cung zad kyang mi shes pa yin pas/ de la gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi ngo bo nyid la snyoms par zhugs pa de shes par mi byed/ rnam
405b7(mdo sde): par shes par mi byed/ kun tu shes par mi byed/ len par mi byed/ spong bar mi byed/ 'byung bar mi byed/ 'jig par mi byed/ g.yo bar mi byed/ rlos sems su mi byed/ skyo bar
406a1(mdo sde): mi byed cing / chos kyi rang bzhin gyis 'gog pa la snyoms par zhugs pa de lta na/ b+ha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' gti mug gi chos can yin no// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam/
406a2(mdo sde): dpa' ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' 'khor ba'i chos can yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' 'khor ba las kyang mi g.yo la/ de nyid las sangs rgyas kyi
406a3(mdo sde): chos rnams tshol bar yang byed pa dang / bdud thams cad dang thun mong ma yin zhing spyod pa dman pa rnams dang ma 'dres pa dang / sems can rnams spyod pa dman pa las bral zhing spyod pa rgya chen po
406a4(mdo sde): la 'god par byed pa dang / don 'thun par byed pa dang / mi dge ba thams cad la mi bsngags pa rjod par byed cing 'dun pa zlog pa dang / phyir zlog par byed pa dang / byang chub 'khor ba la gzhol bar
406a5(mdo sde): shes par byed pa dang / 'khor ba mnyam pa nyid kyis sangs rgyas mnyam pa nyid du lta bar byed pa dang / 'khor ba las mi g.yo zhing gnas par yang mi byed pa de lta na/ lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa
406a6(mdo sde): 'khor ba'i chos can yin no/ / lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba'i chos can yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu gang /
406a7(mdo sde): gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems can rang bzhin gyis yongs su mya ngan las 'das par lta bar byed pa dang / chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis nye bar zhi bar shes par byed pa dang / sems can thams
406b1(mdo sde): cad yongs su mya ngan las bzla ba dang / nye bar zhi bar bya ba'i phyir chos ston par byed pa dang / sems can dpag tu med pa me gsum gyis 'bar bar gyur pa rnams nye bar zhi bar byed cing
406b2(mdo sde): yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar byed pa dang / yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa la'ang spyod par byed la/ gtan du yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bas yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar yang mi
406b3(mdo sde): byed pa de lta na/ lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba'i chos can yin te/ thabs mkhas pa dang / thabs shes pa la nges par skyes pa dang / sems can thams
406b4(mdo sde): cad la phan pa dang / rjes su snying brtse ba dang ldan pa yin no// 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas bstan pa 'di bshad pa na/ srog chags 'bum lhag tsam chos rnams la chos kyi mig rdul med/
406b5(mdo sde): cing dri ma dang bral ba rnam par dag go// srog chags drug khri ni len pa med par zag pa rnams las sems rnam par grol lo// sngon dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed cing sangs rgyas mang po la bsnyen bkur bya
406b6(mdo sde): pa'i sems can rnams kyis ni mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur to/ / byang chub sems dpa' nyi khri lnga stong gis ni mi zad pa'i rnam pa'i mdzod ces bya ba'i gzungs so sor thob par gyur to// /
406b7(mdo sde): srog chags sa ya phrag gnyis dang lnga 'bum gyis ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do// steng gi bar snang las kyang bcom ldan 'das dang / 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur/
407a1(mdo sde): pa la mchod par bya ba'i phyir me tog gi char dag mngon par rab tu bab bo// de nas spu'i bu rab rtsal sems kyis/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras/
407a2(mdo sde): so// 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' thabs dang shes rab kyis nges par 'byung ba yin/ de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas/ lha'i bu rab rtsa la sems la tshigs su bca
407a3(mdo sde): de smras pa/ gang tshe sems ni chags med pa// bla med byang chub sems yin te// sems kyi rang bzhin mngon sum pa// de ni shes rab mtshan nyid do// sems rnams bskyed pa thams
407a4(mdo sde): cad ni/ / byang chub tu ni yongs sngo zhing // byang chub sems las rab rtas pa// de ni thabs kyi mtshan nyid do// sems can thams cad bdag med cing // mi bden ya ma brla gsog tu// gang tshe
407a5(mdo sde): shes pas shes byed pa/ / de ni shes rab mtshan nyid do// gang phyir sems can thams cad dag/ byang chub phyir ni sbyin byed cing // bsam pa thag pas sdud byed pa// de ni thabs kyi mtshan nyid
407a6(mdo sde): do/ / gang tshe bdag dang byang chub dag/ gtan du mthong bar mi byed cing // 'khor gsum yongs su dag gyur pa// de ni shes rab mtshan nyid do// nang dang yang ni phyi rol dag/ thams cad yongs su
407a7(mdo sde): gtong byed cing / / sems can kun la yongs bsngo ba// de ni thabs kyi mtshan nyid do// zhi zhing rab zhi gtsang dag cing // tshul khrims rlom sems mi byed la// lus dang ngag yid zhi gyur pa//
407b1(mdo sde): de ni shes rab mtshan nyid do// tshul khrims la ni zhugs gyur cing // gzhan yang tshul khrims sbyor byed la// sangs rgyas tshul khrims sngo byed pa// de phyir thabs shes bya ba yin// chos rnams
407b2(mdo sde): thams cad rab stong zhing / / bdag med bzod pa sgom byed la// lus dang sems kyis ma smras pa// de ni shes rab pha rol phyin// lus kyis sbyor bar mi byed cing // ngag dang sems kyis
407b3(mdo sde): ma yin la/ / chos sems kun la dben gyur pa// de ni shes rab pha rol phyin// sems can kun gyi khro ba dang // gsod dang 'ching ba bzod byed cing // sems can de dag mi spong ba// de ni
407b4(mdo sde): thabs kyi pha rol phyin/ / sems can yongs su smin bya'i phyir// bsam gtan bde ba rab spangs nas// grong dang yul 'khor snang byed pa// de ni thabs kyi pha rol phyin// tshu rol ma yin pa
407b5(mdo sde): rol min/ / mthun pa'i pha rol rab gnas shing // spros pa'i lta ba rgyun bcad pa// shes rab pha rol phyin rtogs yin// gang gis stong nyid rtogs gyur nas// de ni btang snyoms mi byed cing
407b6(mdo sde): sems can stong nyid sbyor byed pa/ / de ni thabs kyi tshul yin no// sangs rgyas gzung med mkha' 'dra bar// chos kyi sgo nas lta byed cing // de tshe gzugs la zhen med pa// de ni shes rab mtshan nyid
407b7(mdo sde): do/ / sangs rgyas mtshan nyid mchod 'dod cing // sangs rgyas bye ba mchod byed la// 'dren kun mchod tu 'jug byed pa// de phyir thabs shes bya ba yin// chos rnams rdul med rdul bral zhing //
408a1(mdo sde): mkha' dang mnyam pas mnyam gyur la// chos 'ga' yang 'dzin par mi byed pa// de ni shes rab pha rol phyin// chos ni yongs su gzung ba'i phyir// lus dang srog/
408a2(mdo sde): ni 'dor byed cing // 'jig rten kun gyis dben gyur pa// de ni thabs kyi sgo yin no// chos dbyings gnas pa nyid kyi phyir// yang dag mtha' la rab gnas shing // de bzhin nyid las mi
408a3(mdo sde): g.yo bas/ / de ni shes rab sgo yin no// gang gis chos nyid ci 'dra ba// sems can de 'drar shes byed cing // de ltar rtogs par byed pa'i mtha'// de ni shes rab pha rol phyin// chos kun 'chi
408a4(mdo sde): 'pho yod min zhing / / sgru ba med par shes byed la// mi 'gro rgyug par mi byed pa// de ni shes rab pha rol phyin// sems can yongs su smin bya'i phyir// mkhas pa 'dod dang gzugs rnams su/
408a5(mdo sde): bsam bzhin du ni skye byed po// de dag thabs kyi yon tan yin// dgon pa gnas rab gnas byed cing // nyon mongs med la rab gnas la// bsam gtan rnam thar sten byed pa// de dag shes
408a6(mdo sde): rab mtshan nyid yin/ / grong dang yul 'khor rnams su ni// song nas snyan gtam ston byed cing // mi zad zhum pa yod min pa'i// mkhas pa thabs la mkhas pa yin// 'jig rten gsum
408a7(mdo sde): po thams cad las/ / skrag cing 'du 'dzi rten med la// bdag nyid dul zhing ni gyur pa// de ni shes rab pha rol phyin// 'gro ba dag na 'dus chen dang // tshogs dang 'du 'dzi ji snyed pa//
408b1(mdo sde): kun na snang ba de dag ni// thabs kyis spras pa med pa yin// brtan pa chabs med spyod byed cing // yi ge don gnyer mi byed la// brjed med nges don don mnye' ba// de ni shes rab pha rol phyin//
408b2(mdo sde): mkhas pa chags pa thams cad na// snang zhing chos rnams ston byed la// dkon mchog gsum gyi bsngags brjod pa// de ni thabs kyi pha rol phyin// mngon shes shes pa mkhas gyur cing // /
408b3(mdo sde): zhi zhing dul la zag pa med// gdeg med bzhag pa yod min pa// de ni shes rab pha rol phyin// mngon shes dag la rnam 'phrul zhing // zhing rnams bye bar 'gro byed la// sangs rgyas bye ba mchod
408b4(mdo sde): byed pa/ / de ni thabs kyi mtshan nyid yin// phung po sgyu ma 'drar shes shing // nyon mongs dngos med shes byas nas// de dag bdud bzhi zhi gyur pa// des ni shes rab pha rol phyin// bdud rnams/
408b5(mdo sde): thams cad ston byed cing // bstan nas rgyal bar byed gyur la// de las sems can thar byed pa// de ni thabs kyi sgo yin no// stong nying mtshan ma med pa dang / smon par byed pa yod min pa'i// /
408b6(mdo sde): rnam thar sgo la sten byed pa// de ni shes rab mtshan nyid yin// chags med sdang ba yod min zhing // rmongs med shes pa'i spyod yul dang // blang med dor ba yod min pa// de ni shes rab mtshan
408b7(mdo sde): nyid yin/ / rnam pa kun gyi mchog ldan zhing // stong nyid rab tu bsten gyur la// kun gyi pha rol son gyur pa// mnyam med 'gog pa'i mtshan nyid yin// zag med brtul ba ma yin pa/
409a1(mdo sde): dag shes rab ldan 'gyur zhing // 'khor ba'i spyod yul de dag ni// sems can kun gyi grogs su 'gyur// bsod nams tshogs kyis mi ngoms pa'i// mkhas pa thubs
409a2(mdo sde): la mkhas pa yin/ / shes rab thabs la mkhas pa yin// yan lag gnyis ldan lam de ni// shes ldan byang chub sems dpa'i ste// des ni 'dren rnams nges par 'byung // thabs dang mi ldan
409a3(mdo sde): shes rab kyis/ / ma byung 'byung bar 'gyur ba med// shes rab med pa'i thabs kyis ni// mkhrab rab tu zhi mi 'gyur// shes rab dang ni thabs shes pa// de gnyis kun tu 'dres gyur cing //
409a4(mdo sde): gnyis ka zung du 'jug 'gyur na// don dam pa rtogs par 'gyur// gang dag bgrod pa 'dir 'gro ba// sangs rgyas kun gyis rab bsngags shing // ye shes pha rol phyin gyur te// de ni chos
409a5(mdo sde): rnams chos nyid do/ / de dag sangs rgyas spyod yul gyis// chos dbyings dbyer med dga' byed cing // sangs rgyas byang chub bla med pa'i// rdul med byang chub rtogs par 'gyur// lha'i bu rangab

410b1(mdo sde): dpal byang chub sems dpa'i lam gang yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa'i lam ni lta ba'i rnam pa drug cu rtsa gnyis dang / phyin ci log bzhi dang

411a1(mdo sde): dpa'i kham ma yin nam/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu stong pa nyid ni btsal bar mi nus la/ mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'ang btsal bar mi
411a2(mdo sde): nus so/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ lha'i bu de la ni sems dang / yid dang / rnam par shes pa 'jug par mi 'gyur la/ gang la sems dang / yid dang / rnam par shes pa 'jug par mi 'gyur
411a3(mdo sde): ba de ni btsal bar mi nus pa'i phyir ro/ / lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal lam ji ltar mngon par rtogs par bya/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu yang dag par lta ba gang dang mnyam pa
411a4(mdo sde): khog pa'i lta ba'ang de dang mnyam pa de ltar mngon par rtogs pa gang yin pa de ni lam mngon par rtogs pa yin no/ / yang dag pa'i rtog pa gang dang mnyam pa log pa'i rtog pa'ang de dang mnyam

411a7(mdo sde): pa log pa'i dran pa'ang de dang mnyam pa dang / yang dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin gang dang mnyam pa log pa'i ting nge 'dzin kyang de dang mnyam pa de ltar mngon par rtogs pa gang yin pa de ni lam mngon

414b1(mdo sde): khri yang len pa med par zag pa rnams las sems rnam par grol lo// srog chags dang / dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen dang ngag bsnyen ma nyi khri yang len pa med par zag pa rnams las sem rnam
414b2(mdo sde): par grol lo/ / byang chub sems dpa' sngon dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa bdun khri nyis stong gis ni mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur to// thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor rnams kyang dga' ba dang / mgu ba dang /
414b3(mdo sde): yi rangs pa dang / rab tu dga' ba dang / dga' ba dang / yid bde ba skyes nas/ ched du rjod pa 'di ched du brjod do// e ma'o kun nas yongs su grol ba yi// dmigs med chos ni legs par bshad// 'jam
414b4(mdo sde): dpal gzhon nur gyur pa yis/ / shin tu legs par bshad pa byas// de nas byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang / lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang
414b5(mdo sde): mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang / mi ma yin pa de dag gis lha dang mi'i mchod pa dag byas te/ steng gi bar snang las kyang lha'i me tog gi char dag kyang phab/ rin po che'i char dag kyang
414b6(mdo sde): phab/ gos kyi char dag kyang phab/ bdug spos kyi char dag dang / spos chu'i char dag dang / phye ma'i char dag kyang phab bo// lha'i bu rnams kyis steng gi bar snang las lha'i sil snyan brgya stong dag
414b7(mdo sde): kyang rab tu gsil bar gyur to/ / dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma rnams dang / rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis kyang rang rang gi 'byor pa ci bdog pa dag gis bcom ldan 'das dang
415a1(mdo sde): 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la mchod pa byas so/ / thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor rnams kyis kyang thal mo sbyar te tshig 'di skad ces bcom ldan 'das gang dag chos kyi rnam tha/
415a2(mdo sde): 'di la dad par mi bgyid pa de dag la ni sangs rgyas 'byung ba ma mchis lags so// gang dag chos kyi rnam grangs 'di spong bar bgyid pa de dag la ni rab tu 'byung ba ma mchis lags so// gang
415a3(mdo sde): dag chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bsgrubs te gnas par mi bgyid pa de dag la ni bsnyen par rdzogs pa ma mchis lags so/ / de dag la ni 'phags pa'i bsnyen par rdzogs pas bsnyen par rdzogs pa'ang ma
415a4(mdo sde): mchis lags so/ / gang dag chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bgrod par mi mchi ba de dag la ni dge sbyong gi tshul ma mchis lags so// de dag la ni bram ze'i tshul yang ma mchis lags so// gang dag chos kyi rnam grang//
415a5(mdo sde): 'di la skrag par 'gyur ba de dag la ni thob pa'ang ma mchis/ mngon par rtogs pa'ang ma mchis lags so// gang dag chos kyi rnam grangs 'di nyan par bgyid pa dang / thos nas kyang mos par bgyid pa
415a6(mdo sde): dang / len par bgyid pa dang / kun chub par bgyid pa dang / 'dzin par bgyid pa dang / klog par bgyid pa dang / yi ger 'dri bar bgyid pa dang / snod 'tshal bar bgyid pa nas/ gzhan dag la
415a7(mdo sde): 'ang ston par bgyid pa dang / skyo ba ma mchis pa'i yid kyis 'doms par bgyid pa dang / rjes su ston par bgyid pa dang // 'di la nan tan sgrub par bgyid pa dang / gzhan dag kyang nan tan gyis sgrub
415b1(mdo sde): tu stsol ba dang / / nyams par mi bgyid pa de dag ni sems can dam pa dang / sems can chen po dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba bsrungs pa dang / sangs rgyas mang po la bsnyen bkur bgyis pa dang / gting
415b2(mdo sde): rnyed pa dang / log par ltung ba'i rgyun bkum pa dang / ngan song dang ngan 'gro'i sgo bkum pa dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su zin pa dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnams la shin tu gus
415b3(mdo sde): pa dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnams la bgyis pa gzo zhing bgyis pa tshol ba lags shing / de dag ni 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi
415b4(mdo sde): dam pa'i chos yongs su gzung ba'i slad du zhugs pa lags te/ skyes bu dam pa de dag la ni sangs rgyas 'byung ba'ang mchis lags so// de dag la ni chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'ang mchis lags so// de
415b5(mdo sde): dag ni 'bras bu mchis pa dang / khom pa dang ldan pa lags so zhes kyang gsol to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dag la legs so zhes bya ba byin nas/ byang chub sems
415b6(mdo sde): dpa' byams pa la bka' stsal pa/ / byams pa chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad pa na/ lha dang mi rnams kyi skye dgu las srog chags nyi khri nyis stong ni chos rnams la chos kyi mig rdul med cing dri ma dang bral
415b7(mdo sde): ba rnam par dag go/ / lha dang mi rnams kyi skye dgu las srog chags 'bum phrag brgyad ni len pa med par zag pa rnams las sems rnam par grol lo// lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma
416a1(mdo sde): yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen mas ya phrag gnyis kyis ni byang chub tu sems
416a2(mdo sde): bskyed do/ / 'di na gnas pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan dag nas 'dus pa'i byang chub sems dpa' lnga 'bum gyis ni mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur to// byang chub sems dpa' bsam pa tha
416a3(mdo sde): dad pa nyis stong tsam gyis ni gzungs sna tshogs so sor thob par gyur to/ / byang chub sems dpa' 'bum gyis ni gzungs dri ma med pa so sor thob par gyur to// de dag las byang chub sems dpa' mang po dag byang
416a4(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' byams pa khyod kyis byang chub thob pa'i dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin par 'gyur zhing mdo sde zab mo 'di lta bu dag gnod pa dang / ston pa dang / 'dzin pa dang / klog par yang 'gyur te/ de dag ni byams pa/
416a5(mdo sde): khyod nyid kyis byang chub tu lung ston par 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ byang chub sems dpa' byams pas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang dag mdo sde 'dzin pa
416a6(mdo sde): dang / klog pa dang / ston pa dang / yi ger 'dri ba dang / dam pa'i chos yun ring du gnas par bgyi ba'i slad du// glegs pam du bgyis te 'chang ba dang / than lan 'ga' zhig nyan par bgyid pa dang / rnalam du grags par
416a7(mdo sde): bgyid pa de dag bsod nams ji tsam skyed par 'gyur lags/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' byams pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// byams pa khyod de bzhin gshegs
416b1(mdo sde): pa la don 'di yongs su 'dri bar sems pa ni legs so legs so/ / byams pa de'i phyir legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zung zhig dang / ngas khyod la bshad par bya'o// byams pa nan gyis dper na/ lha dang mi rnam
416b2(mdo sde): kyi skye dgra las lha 'am/ mi gang zhig gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'khor gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dang bcas pa gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed cig la bskal pa gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du bde ba'i yo byad tham cad kyis
416b3(mdo sde): bsnyen bkur byas par gyur pa de bas ni/ gang gis mdo sde legs par gsungs pa 'di yi ger bris te 'dzin pa dang / klog pa dang / de bzhin du sgrub par byed pa dang / gzhan dag la ston par byed pa de ches bsod nams
416b4(mdo sde): mang du skyed par 'gyur te/ byang chub mngon par rdzog par 'tshang rgya ba'i phyir ring po mi thogs par byang chub kyi snying por nye bar 'gro bar yang 'gyur ro// byams pa nga ni gang dag gis mdo sde 'di thos nas spong bar mi byed
416b5(mdo sde): cing mos par byed pa dang / tha na glegs bam du 'dri bar byed pa de dag kyang mos pa ji lta ba bzhin du phyir mi ldog pa nyid du lung ston to// byams pa nga ni gang dag gis mdo sde zab mo 'di lta bu 'di'i ming tsam thos pa de dag
416b6(mdo sde): kyang 'bras bu yod par lung ston par byed na/ gang dag mos pa dang / yi ger 'dri ba dang // klog pa dang / gzhan dag la'ang ston par byed pa dag la lta smos kyang ci dgos/ gang dag mdo sde 'di yi ger 'dri ba dang //
416b7(mdo sde): lung ston pa dang / kha ton byed pa dang / klog pa dang // de bzhin nyid du sgrub par byed pa de dag gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dang lhan cig tu gtam 'dre bar byed pa dang / phebs par smra bar byed par 'gyur te/ de dag ni
417a1(mdo sde): rtag tu sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang mi 'bral bar 'gyur zhing / 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan dag na bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang / byang chub sems
417a2(mdo sde): dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis kyang de dag la ston par mdzad cing bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung ston par yang 'gyur ro/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal
417a3(mdo sde): pa kun dga' bo chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos pa de ni sangs rgyas 'byung ba dang 'dra ba yin gyi/ kun dga' bo khyod kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di zung zhig/ gzhan dag la'ang rgya cher ston cig/ kun dga' bos gsol pa/ bcom ldan
417a4(mdo sde): 'das chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i ming ci zhes bgyi/ 'di ji ltar gzung bar bgyi/ 'di'i ming ji skad bstan par bgyi lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo chos kyi rnam grangs 'di lha'i bu rab rtsal sems
417a5(mdo sde): kyis zhus pa zhes bya ba dang / 'jams pal gyis bstan pa chos thams cad rnam par gtan la dbab pa bstan pa zhes bya bar yang zung zhig/ de nas 'khor de dag gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i ming thos nas thal mo sbyar te/ bcom
417a6(mdo sde): ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ / bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas chos bstan pa mang du thos lags na/ ji ltar chos kyi rnam grangs 'di rab tu rnam par phye ste rgya cher bstan pa
417a7(mdo sde): dang / de lta bu'i chos ni nam yang ma byung lags so// bdag cag gis kyang chos kyi rnam grangs la dga' ba 'di lta bu thob pa ni sngon ma myong lags te/ de lta lags pas/ bcom ldan 'das yongs su mya ngan las 'das
417b1(mdo sde): nas kyang / skye bo mang po la sman pa dang / ma 'ongs pa'i skye bo rnams kyi slad du/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ci nas sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa bgyid par 'gyur ba dang / sems can mos pa tha dad pa rnams kyis
417b2(mdo sde): chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos nas mos pa ji lta ba bzhin du theg pa tha dad pas nges par 'byung bar 'gyur ba dang / de dag bde 'gror mchi bar bgyi bar bcom ldan 'das kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di les
417b3(mdo sde): par byin gyis brlab tu gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor bzhi po de dag gis gsol ba btab par thugs su chud nas phyogs bcur rnam par gzigs so// bcom ldan 'das kyis phyogs
417b4(mdo sde): bcur rnam par gzigs ma thag tu de nas de'i mod la stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di'i sa gzhi chen po rnam pa drug tu rab tu g.yos par gyur cing / lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang /
417b5(mdo sde): dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyang dga' ba dang / mgu ba dang / yi rangs pa dang / spro ba dang / dga' ba dang / yid bde ba skyes nas/
417b6(mdo sde): ci nas kyang phyi ma'i dus na chos kyi rnam grangs 'di nub par mi 'gyur bar byin gyis brlab par bya ba'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems can la dga' ba rnams dang /
417b7(mdo sde): nyan thos kyi dge 'dun la lha'i mchod pa dag byas shing / steng gi bar snang las me tog gi char dag kyang rab tu phab/ lha'i sil snyan dang glu dbyangs dag kyang rab tu gsil cing blangs so// de
418a1(mdo sde): nas de bzhin gshegs pas thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor nga la 'di skad ces ngadang 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas chos kyi rnam grangs 'di byin gyis brlabs so/ /
418a2(mdo sde): zhes go bar yang mdzad do// de nas thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dang / byang chub sems dpa' de dag dga' ba dang / mgu ba dang / yi rangs pa dang / rab tu dga' ba dang /
418a3(mdo sde): dga' ba dang / yid bde ba skyes nas/ bcom ldan 'das dang / 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la ma rlod pa byas te rang rang gi gnas su dong ngo // bcom ldan
418a4(mdo sde): 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ byang chub sems dpa' byams pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang / thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de yi rangs te/ bcom ldan
418a5(mdo sde): 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/ / 'phags pa lha'i bu rab rgyal sems kyis zhus pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so// / rgyag
